text: Deathrattle: Summon a random minion from\nyour hand that costs (2) or less.
flavor: New facial recognition systems keep out the Lorewalkers and Doomsayers.

name: Prismatic Lens
text: Draw a minion and a spell from your deck. Swap their Costs.
flavor: Mined exclusively from the dark side of the moon.

name: Replicating Menace
text: Magnetic\nDeathrattle: Summon three 1/1 Microbots.
flavor:
It's a car!
*Whomp whomp whomp*
It's a robot!
*Whomp whom-CRUNCH*
It's… three.. smaller robots!

name: Steel Rager
text: Rush
flavor: Rage alongside the machine.

name: Storm Chaser
text: Battlecry: Draw a spell from your deck that costs_(5) or more.
flavor: Best drank after a stiff gale.

name: Thunderhead
text: [x]After you play a card with\nOverload, summon two\n1/1 Sparks with Rush.
flavor: Most of his friends are still Metalheads.

name: Weaponized Piñata
text: Deathrattle: Add a random Legendary minion to your_hand.
flavor: It'll be fine.  It's not like they have any reason to hate us.

name: Whizbang the Wonderful
text: [x]You start the game\nwith one of Whizbang's\nWonderful Decks!
flavor: From the prestigious Westfall Wonderfuls.

name: Crazed Chemist
text: Combo: Give a friendly minion +4 Attack.
flavor: You don't have to be crazy to work here, but it helps.

name: Dyn-o-matic
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all minions_except_Mechs.
flavor: Star player on the inter-office Boomball team.

name: E.M.P. Operative
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Mech.
flavor:
"I said this looks like a job for me
So everybody just follow me
'Cause we need a little E.M.P.
'Cause it feels so mechy without me…"

name: Glowstone Technician
text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: "Windell! More light!"\n\n"I'm givin' it all she's got, Kangor!"

name: Holomancer
text: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a 1/1_copy of it.
flavor: Help me, worthy opponent. You're my only hope.

name: Loose Specimen
text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage randomly split among other friendly minions.
flavor: You leave Deathstalker Rexxar alone in the lab for TWO minutes…

name: Mechano-Egg
text: Deathrattle: Summon an 8/8 Robosaur.
flavor: When you need more iron in your diet.

name: Myra Rotspring
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a\nDeathrattle minion. Also\ngain its Deathrattle.
flavor: On her first day on the job, Myra removed the smoke detectors.

name: Myra's Unstable Element
text: Draw the rest of\nyour deck.
flavor: What could go wrong?

name: Necrium Vial
text: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle twice.
flavor: Two near-death experiences for the price of one!

name: Omega Agent
text: [x]Battlecry: If you have 10\nMana Crystals, summon\n_2 copies of this minion.
flavor: They don't just find the truth. They give it a ten second head start, then hunt it down.

name: Power Word: Replicate
text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a 5/5 copy of it.
flavor: Available as a bundle, along with Power Words: Detonate, Animate, Annihilate, and Paper Weight.

name: Reckless Experimenter
text: [x]Deathrattle minions you\nplay cost (3) less, but die\nat the end of the turn.
flavor: It's hard to call her reckless when it's clear she knows what she's doing.

name: Rusty Recycler
text: Taunt\nLifesteal
flavor: Ironic. It could recycle others, but not itself.

name: Seaforium Bomber
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle a Bomb into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 5 damage.
flavor: Dress for the bomb you want, not the bomb you have.

name: Shrink Ray
text: Set the Attack and Health of all minions\nto 1.
flavor: Actually works by enlarging the rest of the world.

name: Subject 9
text: Battlecry: Draw 5 different Secrets from your deck.
flavor: The original clever girl.

name: Supercollider
text: [x]After you attack a minion,\nforce it to attack one\nof its neighbors.
flavor: Boom's Second Law of Motion:\nHIT IT VERY HARD!

name: Wargear
text: Magnetic
flavor: WAR! GEAR! What is it good for?

name: Zilliax
text: Magnetic\nDivine Shield, Taunt, Lifesteal, Rush
flavor: Everything but the kitchen sink. Oh wait, there's one on his back.

name: Arcane Dynamo
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell that costs (5) or more.
flavor: We ran out of jars, so we started putting brains in other stuff.

name: Damaged Stegotron
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Deal 6 damage to this minion.
flavor: Sadly the warranty does not cover fireballs or acts of Boom.

name: Dr. Morrigan
text: Deathrattle: Swap this with a minion from your deck.
flavor: She will NOT STOP until she gets tenure.

name: Ectomancy
text: Summon copies of all Demons you control.
flavor: "Zerek! Stay out of my lab!"

name: Eureka!
text: Summon a copy of_a_random minion from your hand.
flavor: Genius is 1% inspiration, and 99% drawing your Deathwing.

name: Giggling Inventor
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/2 Mechs with Taunt and_Divine Shield.
flavor: "I shall build a mighty golden paladin! And he will GREET the WORLD!"

name: Mechanical Whelp
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 7/7 Mechanical Dragon.
flavor: "Well if I didn't build the whelp and YOU didn't build the whelp…"

name: Meteorologist
text: Battlecry: For each card in your hand, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: Some say the world will end in fire. Some say in ice. Why not BOTH?

name: Missile Launcher
text: [x]Magnetic At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other characters.
flavor: We asked, "Where do the missiles go?" and he answered, "Yes."

name: Security Rover
text: [x]Whenever this minion\ntakes damage, summon a\n2/3 Mech with Taunt.
flavor: Insecurity detected. Alerting hugbots.

name: Spark Drill
text: Rush\nDeathrattle: Add two\n1/1 Sparks with Rush to your hand.
flavor: Preferred weapon of Dr. Boom's orthodontist.

name: Tending Tauren
text: [x]Choose One - Give your other minions +1/+1; or Summon two 2/2 Treants.
flavor: That racial bonus to Herbalism finally paid off.

name: The Storm Bringer
text: Transform your minions into random Legendary minions.
flavor: Finally, Electra can work from home.

name: Zerek, Master Cloner
text: Deathrattle: If you've cast any spells on this minion, resummon it.
flavor: His original name was Aerek. Then the first clone was Berek. They went evil around Merek.

name: Astromancer
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a\nrandom minion with Cost\nequal to your hand size.
flavor: All signs point to Antonidas.

name: Beryllium Nullifier
text: Magnetic\nElusive
flavor: Why Beryllium? Because it's hard to spell.

name: Boommaster Flark
text: Battlecry: Summon four 0/2 Goblin Bombs.
flavor: Every good plan requires a bit of patience. And a lot of explosives.

name: Dr. Boom, Mad Genius
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Mechs have Rush.
flavor: "Of course I've gone mad with power. Ever try going mad without it?"

name: Dreampetal Florist
text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of a random minion in your hand by (7).
flavor: Unlike gnomes, dreampetals grow more than 3 feet tall.

name: Flark's Boom-Zooka
text: [x]Summon 3 minions from\nyour deck. They attack\nenemy minions, then die.
flavor: It used to be a Ba-zooka but we ran out of sheep.

name: Gloop Sprayer
text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of each adjacent minion.
flavor: "Are you sure that's enough gloop?"\n\n"Hold on."

name: Kangor's Endless Army
text: Resurrect 3 friendly Mechs. They keep any Magnetic upgrades.
flavor: "That's three, Kangor. Three isn't endless."\n- Countess Ashmore

name: Luna's Pocket Galaxy
text: Change the Cost of minions in your\ndeck to (1).
flavor: Luna became head of the astronomy department when her boss invented the Pocket Black Hole.

name: Star Aligner
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control 3\nminions with 7 Health, deal\n7 damage to all enemies.
flavor: "You're a Sagittarius? Me too! Just gimme a sec."

name: Bull Dozer
text: Divine Shield
flavor: Leave them alone for two minutes and they go right into sleep mode.

name: Mulchmuncher
text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each friendly Treant that died this game.
flavor: The latest advancement in\nhippo-botany.

name: The Boomship
text: Summon 3 random minions from your hand. Give them Rush.
flavor: Dr. Boom ends his motivational speeches by dropping the mechs.

name: Zerek's Cloning Gallery
text: Summon a 1/1 copy of_each minion in your_deck.
flavor: Cloning can be a jarring experience.

name: Mecha'thun
text: [x]Deathrattle: If you have no cards in your deck, hand, and battlefield, destroy the enemy hero.
flavor: "Your software will fail. Your users will abandon you. You are already obsolete."

name: Elemental Evocation
text: The next Elemental you_play this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: It's just lighter fluid.

name: Pounce
text: Give your hero +2_Attack this turn.
flavor: Comes with an overwhelming urge to jump into the nearest open box.

name: Regenerate
text: Restore #3 Health.
flavor: Finally a cure for degenerates.

name: Bloodclaw
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavor: This weapon – ow! Requires a little – OWW! Finesse.

name: Daring Fire-Eater
text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power this turn deals 2_more damage.
flavor: A few hours later he DESTROYED the arena bathrooms.

name: Devastate
text: Deal $4 damage to a damaged minion.
flavor: No thanks, I already devast-ate.

name: Grim Rally
text: Destroy a friendly minion. Give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: There’s no “Aiiiieeee” in “Team.”

name: Gurubashi Chicken
text: Overkill: Gain +5 Attack.
flavor: “Ya hold it by da feet, mon. Den ya THROW.”

name: Gurubashi Offering
text: At the start of your turn, destroy this and gain 8_Armor.
flavor: For a limited time, loa blessings are on a pray-one-get-two deal (on selected sacrifices only).

name: Helpless Hatchling
text: Deathrattle: Reduce the Cost of a Beast in your hand by (1).
flavor: It can’t be all that helpful. Not wif dose widdle wings!

name: Saronite Taskmaster
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 0/3 Free Agent with Taunt for_your opponent.
flavor: Don't even think of asking for time off.

name: Serrated Tooth
text: Deathrattle: Give your minions Rush.
flavor: The tooth hurts, don’t it?

name: Shriek
text: Discard your lowest Cost card. Deal $2 damage to all minions.
flavor: The first warning sign of an oncoming warlock temper tantrum.

name: Spirit of the Dead
text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn. After a friendly minion dies, shuffle a 1-Cost copy of it into your deck.
flavor: Just because you’re dead doesn’t mean you’re off the team.

name: Spirit of the Raptor
text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn.\nAfter your hero attacks and\n__kills a minion, draw a card.__
flavor: “Loti! LOTI! Drop it. Drop it Loti! Down! Down Loti!”

name: Spirit of the Rhino
text: Stealth for 1 turn.\nYour Rush minions are Immune the turn they're summoned.
flavor: Where did they get this preposterous hypothesis?

name: Springpaw
text: [x]Rush\nBattlecry: Add a 1/1 Lynx\nwith Rush to your hand.
flavor: The terrible thing about lynxes is lynxes are terrible things. Their teeth are made out of biting, their paws are made out of springs!

name: The Beast Within
text: Give a friendly Beast +1/+1, then it attacks a random enemy minion.
flavor: Undoes years of obedience school training.

name: Totemic Smash
text: Deal $2 damage. Overkill: Summon a basic Totem.
flavor: Trolls are the first group to have a totem survive atmospheric re-entry.

name: Wartbringer
text: Battlecry: If you played 2_spells this turn, deal 2_damage.
flavor: “Does she cause them with magic, or just…like have a bucket she brings with her?”

name: Auchenai Phantasm
text: Battlecry: This turn, your healing effects deal damage instead.
flavor: “Okay kids did everyone remember to heal before we left?”

name: Belligerent Gnome
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If your opponent has 2 or more minions, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: Maybe don't put this one in your garden.

name: Big Bad Voodoo
text: Give a friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon a random minion that costs (1) more."
flavor: Murlocs practice Small Nice Voodoo.

name: Bloodsail Howler
text: [x]Rush Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other Pirate you control.
flavor:
They saw their fate a closin'
Aboard a pirate ship
On deck: The Howlin' Hozen
About to let one rip.

name: Booty Bay Bookie
text: Battlecry: Give your opponent a Coin.
flavor: Also makes a great librarian. She's really good at fixing books!

name: Cheaty Anklebiter
text: Lifesteal\nBattlecry: Deal 1 damage.
flavor: Famed hunter of the deadly Achilliosaur.

name: Dozing Marksman
text: Has +4 Attack while damaged.
flavor: It's the sleeper of the set.

name: Dragon Roar
text: Add 2 random Dragons to your hand.
flavor: Not to be confused with Dragon Yodel.

name: Firetree Witchdoctor
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, Discover a spell.
flavor: If your tree is on fire - stop, drop, and troll.

name: Flash of Light
text: Restore #4 Health.\nDraw a card.
flavor: Hey! No cameras allowed!

name: Headhunter's Hatchet
text: [x]Battlecry: If you\ncontrol a Beast, gain\n+1 Durability.
flavor: Zul'jin's primary recruiting tool.

name: Immortal Prelate
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle this into your deck. It keeps any enchantments.
flavor:
She protec.
She attac.
But most importantly,
she come bac.

name: Likkim
text: Has +2 Attack while you have Overloaded Mana Crystals.
flavor: "I double frog dare you!"

name: Revenge of the Wild
text: Summon your Beasts that died this turn.
flavor: My roommates only use Revenge of the Passive Aggressive.

name: Savage Striker
text: Battlecry: Deal damage to an enemy minion equal to your hero's Attack.
flavor: Ruthless at tribal roasts.

name: Scarab Egg
text: Deathrattle: Summon three 1/1 Scarabs.
flavor: They say you can’t make an omelet without AHHH THEY’RE EATING MY FACE!

name: Seance
text: Choose a minion. Add_a copy of it to your hand.
flavor: “The spirits spoke to me.”\n"What did they say?"\n"You had lethal two turns ago."

name: Serpent Ward
text: At the end of your turn,\ndeal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: When snakes get sick, they get sent to the Serpent Ward.

name: Sharkfin Fan
text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Pirate.
flavor: His taste in soup is criminal.

name: Shieldbreaker
text: Battlecry: Silence an enemy minion with Taunt.
flavor: Can also break up fights, relationships, and unions.

name: Soup Vendor
text: Whenever you restore 3 or more Health to your hero, draw a card.
flavor: Fresh from the floor of the arena!

name: Spellzerker
text: Has Spell Damage +2 while damaged.
flavor: But don’t ask her to use it in a sentence.

name: Spirit of the Bat
text: Stealth for 1 turn.\nAfter a friendly minion dies, give a minion in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Nah nah nah nah, nah nah nah nah, nah nah nah nah, nah nah nah nah

name: Spirit of the Dragonhawk
text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn.\nYour Hero Power also targets\n adjacent minions.
flavor: Dragonhawks aren’t known for their accuracy.

name: Stolen Steel
text: Discover a weapon (from another class).
flavor: Because Thrall wouldn't lend me Doomhammer.

name: Waterboy
text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power this turn costs (0).
flavor: 100% organic troll sweat.

name: Banana Buffoon
text: Battlecry: Add 2 Bananas to your hand.
flavor: You could say he has a certain appeal.

name: Bloodscalp Strategist
text: Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, Discover a spell.
flavor: “Shoot them in the face” is more of a tactic than a strategy.

name: Bog Slosher
text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion to your hand and give it +2/+2.
flavor: It's the bane of freshly mopped floors everywhere.

name: Drakkari Trickster
text: [x]Battlecry: Give each player a\ncopy of a random card from\ntheir opponent's deck.
flavor: “It’s an illusion, Malacrass!”

name: Haunting Visions
text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (3) less. Discover a spell.
flavor: When you're awake at 3 AM and can't stop thinking about that time you called your teacher "mom."

name: High Priest Thekal
text: Battlecry: Convert all but 1_of your Hero's Health into Armor.
flavor: "…and then I beat him with 1 Health!"

name: Masked Contender
text: Battlecry: If you control a_Secret, cast a Secret from_your deck.
flavor: Knew Mysterious Challenger back when he was a Mysterious Squire.

name: Master's Call
text: Discover a minion in your deck.\nIf all 3 are Beasts,\ndraw them all.
flavor: "Hello? Yes, this is Huffer."

name: Ornery Tortoise
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavor: "Dude, where's my pizza?!"

name: Overlord's Whip
text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to it.
flavor: "This merit badge is for cruelty. This one's for whipping. And this one is for embroidery..."

name: Pyromaniac
text: Whenever your Hero Power_kills a minion, draw a card.
flavor: She prefers “Flammably Inclined.”

name: Raiding Party
text: Draw 2 Pirates from_your deck.\nCombo: And a weapon.
flavor: And a bowl of chips. And some of those little cocktail weenies!

name: Reckless Diretroll
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Discard your lowest Cost card.
flavor: "Reck less!? ME WRECK MOAR!"

name: Sand Drudge
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Zombie with Taunt.
flavor: Loves long walks on the beach, raising the dead, and chocolates.

name: Smolderthorn Lancer
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy a damaged enemy minion.
flavor: Here comes “The Smolder.”

name: Spirit of the Lynx
text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn.\nWhenever you summon a \nBeast, give it +1/+1.
flavor: Much of this shrine’s power lies in the can-opener noise it makes.

name: Splitting Image
text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon a copy of it.
flavor: Sometimes you get punched so hard they see double.

name: Surrender to Madness
text: [x]Destroy 3 of your Mana\nCrystals. Give all minions\nin your deck +2/+2.
flavor: Never give up, always surrender!

name: Time Out!
text: Your hero is Immune until your next turn.
flavor: Highly effective against 3 year olds.

name: Untamed Beastmaster
text: Whenever you draw a Beast, give it +2/+2.
flavor: All it takes is a tummy rub.

name: Wardruid Loti
text: Choose One - Transform into one of Loti's four dinosaur forms.
flavor:
“Ravasaur!”
“Pretty scary”
“…Blammodax!”
“Is that a thing?”
“SMAXODON!”
“….now you’re just making those up.”

name: Zentimo
text: [x]Whenever you target a\nminion with a spell, cast it\nagain on its neighbors.
flavor: Serenity. Peace. Many frogs.

name: Arena Fanatic
text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Her fantasy Rumble league gives double points for dismemberment.

name: Arena Treasure Chest
text: Deathrattle: Draw 2 cards.
flavor: Yeah it's great, but did you see the Arena Treasure Arms?!

name: Griftah
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover two\ncards. Give one to your\nopponent at random.
flavor: With Griftah in your deck, sometimes you start the game with The Coin!

name: Half-Time Scavenger
text: Stealth\nOverkill: Gain 3 Armor.
flavor: One player's trash is another's “Best In Slot”.

name: High Priestess Jeklik
text: [x]Taunt, Lifesteal When you discard this, add 2 copies of it to your hand.
flavor: If you love Jeklik, set her free. YOU CAN'T GET RID OF HER.

name: Ice Cream Peddler
text: Battlecry: If you control a_Frozen minion, gain 8_Armor.
flavor: I scream, you scream, we all scream when we see a Freeze Mage.

name: Mark of the Loa
text: Choose One - Give a minion +2/+4 and Taunt; or Summon two 3/2 Raptors.
flavor: Ah, yes. Mark. The mightiest Loa.

name: Murloc Tastyfin
text: [x]Deathrattle: Draw 2 Murlocs\nfrom your deck.
flavor: He was destined for the soup. One way or another…

name: Predatory Instincts
text: [x]Draw a Beast from your\ndeck. Double its Health.
flavor: Somebody’s been eating their funnel cakes.

name: Regeneratin' Thug
text: At the start of your turn, restore #2 Health to this_minion.
flavor: Regenerates any injury except heartbreak.

name: Rumbletusk Shaker
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/2 Rumbletusk Breaker.
flavor:
Rub a dub dub, three trolls in a tub.
And who do you think dey be?
Da Shaker, Da Breaker, and Da Undatakah.
And all of dem comin' for me.

name: Scorch
text:
[x]Deal $4 damage to a
minion. Costs (1) if you
played an Elemental
last turn.
flavor: The hoof.\nThe hoof.\nThe hoof is on fire.

name: Spirit of the Shark
text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn.\nYour minions' Battlecries\n__and Combos trigger twice._
flavor: It has Stealth, but its ominous theme music keeps giving it away.

name: Spirit of the Tiger
text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn. After you cast a spell, summon a Tiger with stats equal to its Cost.
flavor: Less of a cantrip and more of a cat-nip.

name: Ticket Scalper
text: Overkill: Draw 2 cards.
flavor: Takes ten percent off the top.

name: Walk the Plank
text: Destroy an undamaged minion.
flavor: Pirates will fall for anything.

name: War Master Voone
text: Battlecry: Copy all\nDragons in your hand.
flavor: War Master sounds cooler than Dragon Sitter.

name: Zandalari Templar
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've restored\n10 Health this game, gain\n+4/+4 and Taunt.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: YOU WERE A TEMPLAR, JONDAR!

name: Arena Patron
text: Overkill: Summon another Arena Patron.
flavor: Everybody with a ticket get in here!

name: Baited Arrow
text: Deal $3 damage. Overkill: Summon a 5/5 Devilsaur.
flavor: The card is common, but the steak is rare.

name: Blast Wave
text: Deal $2 damage to_all minions.\nOverkill: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavor: If you’re burning and you know it, wave your hands!

name: Dragonmaw Scorcher
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Caution: Contains Flammable Material

name: Emberscale Drake
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain 5 Armor.
flavor: The third little dragon made his armor out of adamantite.

name: Farraki Battleaxe
text: Overkill: Give a minion in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: Only two things in life are certain: death and axes.

name: Former Champ
text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5_Hotshot.
flavor: The last time he saw action, Undertaker ruled the meta.

name: Gral, the Shark
text: [x]Battlecry: Eat a minion in your deck and gain its stats. Deathrattle: Add it to your hand.
flavor: “… We’re gonna need a bigger board.”

name: Halazzi, the Lynx
text: Battlecry: Fill your hand with 1/1 Lynxes that have_Rush.
flavor: Remember, you’re only as strong as your weakest lynx.

name: Mass Hysteria
text: Force each minion to_attack another random minion.
flavor: Black Friday gets worse every year.

name: Mosh'Ogg Announcer
text: [x]Enemies attacking this\nhave a 50% chance to\nattack someone else.
flavor: One's play-by-play. The other is off-color.

name: Sightless Ranger
text: Rush\nOverkill: Summon two 1/1_Bats.
flavor: An eye for sore sights.

name: Snapjaw Shellfighter
text: [x]Whenever an adjacent\nminion takes damage, this\n_minion takes it instead.
flavor: Nonono, the turtle is the Shellfighter.

name: Spirit of the Frog
text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn. Whenever you cast a spell, draw a spell from your deck that costs (1) more.
flavor: It is Wednesday, my dudes.

name: Treespeaker
text: Battlecry: Transform your Treants into 5/5 Ancients.
flavor: Honestly, his delivery is a little wooden.

name: Arcanosaur
text: Battlecry: If you played an_Elemental last turn, deal_3_damage_to_all other minions.
flavor: Arcane energy… finds a way.

name: Cannon Barrage
text: [x]Deal $3 damage to a\nrandom enemy. Repeat\nfor each of your Pirates.
flavor: Why fire your cannons strategically when you can fire them all at once?

name: Heavy Metal!
text: [x]Summon a random\nminion with Cost equal\nto your Armor (up to 10).
flavor: This metal is so heavy it will satisfy your iron requirements for the next year.

name: Krag'wa, the Frog
text: Battlecry: Return all spells you played last turn to_your hand.
flavor: Krag'wa has a ritual to honor his friends and a ritual to devour his enemies. No one can tell them apart.

name: Mojomaster Zihi
text: Battlecry: Set each player to 5 Mana Crystals.
flavor: Sadly, she was still two credits short of her Witch Doctorate.

name: Rain of Toads
text: Summon three 2/4 Toads with Taunt. Overload: (3)
flavor: "Oh, THAT'S how she brings the warts!"

name: Soulwarden
text: Battlecry: Add 3 random cards you discarded this game to your hand.
flavor: Reduce, reuse, resoul.

name: Stampeding Roar
text: Summon a random Beast from your hand and give it Rush.
flavor: [x]The Gurubashi Arena has an\nextremely permissive policy on\npets in the workplace.

name: Sul'thraze
text: Overkill: You may attack again.
flavor: “Griftah here with de Sul’chop. One chop, you get four damage. Two chops, eight damage - you gonna change de way you fight."

name: A New Challenger...
text: Discover a 6-Cost minion. Summon it with Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: … Arrives? Approaches? TELL US ALREADY!

name: Amani War Bear
text: Rush\nTaunt
flavor: "I used to farm for hours! Now they just come in packs?"

name: Blood Troll Sapper
text: After a friendly minion dies, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Main supplier of Blood Troll Syrup to the Intercontinental Hut of Funnel Cakes.

name: Bwonsamdi, the Dead
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw 1-Cost\nminions from your deck\nuntil your hand is full.
flavor: Everyone's dying to meet him.

name: Crowd Roaster
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, deal 7 damage\nto an enemy minion.
flavor: Every major show has an opening act to warm up the crowd.

name: Gonk, the Raptor
text: After your hero attacks and_kills a minion, it may_attack again.
flavor: There’s a word for Zandalari druids who refuse to pledge loyalty to Gonk: “Delicious.”

name: Gurubashi Hypemon
text: Battlecry: Discover a 1/1 copy of a Battlecry minion. It costs (1).
flavor: Throw your hands in the air!\nThey cost (1).

name: Ironhide Direhorn
text: Overkill: Summon a 5/5_Ironhide Runt.
flavor: "Boy! Bring me my masks and skull rams."

name: Jan'alai, the Dragonhawk
text: [x]Battlecry: If your Hero Power dealt 8 damage this game, summon Ragnaros the Firelord.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: You mess with the Bird, you get the Firelord.

name: Linecracker
text: Overkill: Double this minion's Attack.
flavor: "Tell me if you’ve heard this one!"

name: Rabble Bouncer
text: Taunt\nCosts (1) less for each enemy minion.
flavor: "Shirt? Shoes!? No service!"

name: Akali, the Rhino
text: Rush\nOverkill: Draw a Rush minion from your deck. Give it +5/+5.
flavor: Most trolls only get to “AAAAHHH!” and don’t make it to the “kali” part.

name: Captain Hooktusk
text: Battlecry: Summon 3 Pirates from your deck. Give them Rush.
flavor: "You three! Get in the cannon!"

name: Da Undatakah
text: [x]Battlecry: Gain the Deathrattle effects of 3 friendly minions that died this game.
flavor: First Deathrattle: Draw a card.\nSecond: Draw 2 cards.\nThird: Throw Mon'kind off a steel cage and plummet sixteen feet through an announcer’s table.

name: Demonbolt
text: Destroy a minion. Costs (1) less for each minion you control.
flavor: Or as it’s known in troll, “De bolt, mon.”

name: Hex Lord Malacrass
text: Battlecry: Add a copy of your opening hand to your hand (except this card).
flavor: Extremely awkward cousin of Hex Lord Malaclass.

name: Hir'eek, the Bat
text: Battlecry: Fill your board with copies of this minion.
flavor: REPEL’S EFFECT WORE OFF.

name: Mosh'Ogg Enforcer
text: Taunt\nDivine Shield
flavor: Can’t break the rules if you can’t read ‘em.

name: Princess Talanji
text: Battlecry: Summon all minions from your hand that_didn't start in your_deck.
flavor: Everyone wants to be a princess, but nobody ever considers the size of the hat.

name: Void Contract
text: Destroy half of each player's deck.
flavor: “YOU SIGNED WHAT?!”

name: Oondasta
text: Rush\nOverkill: Summon a Beast from your hand.
flavor: Adorning devilsaurs with armor and feathers is a respected job in troll culture, although it has a high turnover rate.

name: Hakkar, the Soulflayer
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a Corrupted Blood into each player's deck.
flavor: ATTENTION: Do not enter any major city while infected with the Corrupted Blood!

name: Zul'jin
text: [x]Battlecry: Cast all spells\nyou've played this game\n(targets chosen randomly).
flavor: If you can dodge an axe, you can dodge a ball.

name: Grave Horror
text: [x]Taunt\nCosts (1) less for each spell\nyou've cast this game.
flavor: Trolls can regenerate lost limbs, but this is what they do with the leftovers.

name: Shirvallah, the Tiger
text: [x]Divine Shield, Rush, Lifesteal\n Costs (1) less for each Mana\nyou've spent on spells.
flavor: On bended knee Thekal placed his weapon upon Shirvallah’s altar, whereupon she slowly knocked it off with her paw.

name: Forbidden Words
text: [x]Spend all your Mana.\nDestroy a minion with that\nmuch Attack or less.
flavor: Please confirm your age before reading this flavor text.

name: Lazul's Scheme
text: Reduce the Attack of an enemy minion by\n@ until your next turn. (Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: "What's that you're dreaming?\nYou're weak and you're screaming!\nIt must be my scheming..."

name: Mutate
text: Transform a friendly minion into a random one that costs (1) more.
flavor: You'll get the transformation you want when murlocs fly.

name: Acornbearer
text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Squirrels to your hand.
flavor: You’d be nuts to mess with the squirrel squad.

name: Crystal Power
text: Choose One - Deal $2 damage to a minion; or_Restore #5 Health.
flavor: Often used as healing crystals, but also good for throwing at people.

name: Daring Escape
text: Return all friendly minions to your hand.
flavor: Impossible to cast without cackling evilly.

name: Desperate Measures
text: Twinspell\nCast a random Paladin Secret.
flavor: Desperate times call for disparate secrets.

name: Improve Morale
text: [x]Deal $1 damage to a minion. If it survives, add a Lackey to your hand.
flavor: "The beatings will continue until MY morale improves."

name: Magic Trick
text: Discover a spell that costs (3) or less.
flavor: The world is not ready for an illusion of this depth and intricacy!

name: Never Surrender!
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, give your minions +2_Health.
flavor: But sometimes concede.

name: Potion Vendor
text: Battlecry: Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: Everyone gets two because that’s all she can hold.

name: Ray of Frost
text: Twinspell Freeze a minion. If it's already Frozen, deal $2 damage to it.
flavor: If you have zero chill, this can help.

name: Shimmerfly
text: Deathrattle: Add a random Hunter spell to your hand.
flavor: Plenty of buzz around this card.

name: Sludge Slurper
text: Battlecry: Add a Lackey to your hand. Overload: (1)
flavor: You can't stop slurping this delicious sludge!

name: Togwaggle's Scheme
text: Choose a minion. Shuffle @ |4(copy, copies) of it into your deck.\n(Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: "Many minions equals many treasures for king. Kobold arithmetic!"

name: Toxfin
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Murloc Poisonous.
flavor: I'm addicted to him, but I know that he's Toxfin.

name: Arcane Servant
flavor: "Would sir like me to punch something?"

name: Crystalsong Portal
text: Discover a Druid minion. If your hand has no minions, keep all 3.
flavor: Experience the draw of the wild!

name: Dalaran Librarian
text: Battlecry: Silence\nadjacent minions.
flavor: Don't make her raise her "shush"!

name: Dreamway Guardians
text: Summon two 1/2 Dryads with Lifesteal.
flavor: They're a nightmare to deal with.

name: EVIL Cable Rat
text: Battlecry: Add a Lackey to_your hand.
flavor: Gradually driven to darkness by the promise of unobtainable cheese.

name: EVIL Conscripter
text: Deathrattle: Add a Lackey to your hand.
flavor: Kobold! There’s a place you can handle\nI said kobold! When you’re short in the candle\nCast a spell with the E! V! I! L!

name: EVIL Genius
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion to add 2 random Lackeys_to_your_hand.
flavor: You do not want to be on the business end of this intellect!

name: Hench-Clan Hogsteed
text: Rush\nDeathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Murloc.
flavor: This is CLEARLY their first rodeo.

name: Keeper Stalladris
text: After you cast a Choose One spell, add copies of both choices_to_your_hand.
flavor: Keeps your choices handy.

name: Khadgar
text: Your cards that summon minions summon twice_as_many.
flavor: "What do you call two minions summoned at once? Twinions, haha! Wait... where are you going?"

name: Lightforged Blessing
text: Twinspell\nGive a friendly minion Lifesteal.
flavor: Some might call this a lightforgery.

name: Magic Dart Frog
text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor: There's a powerful throat in this frog.

name: Mana Cyclone
text: [x]Battlecry: For each spell you've cast this turn, add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavor: It'll put a good spin on your spells.

name: Mana Reservoir
text: Spell Damage +1
flavor: If it soaks too long, it becomes a reservoir hog.

name: Mysterious Blade
text: Battlecry: If you control a\nSecret, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: It knows every secret you have left.

name: Plot Twist
text: Shuffle your hand\ninto your deck.\nDraw that many cards.
flavor: It’s coming from inside the deck!

name: Rapid Fire
text: Twinspell\nDeal $2 damage.
flavor: Pew! Pew!

name: Shadowy Figure
text: Battlecry: Transform into a_2/2 copy of a friendly Deathrattle minion.
flavor: Terrible at shadow puppets: “This is… a tentacle! And this is… two tentacles!”

name: Soul of the Murloc
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Murloc."
flavor: Previously thought nonexistent.

name: Spellbook Binder
text: Battlecry: If you have Spell Damage, draw a card.
flavor: You're bound to love his work!

name: Sunreaver Spy
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, gain +1/+1.
flavor: She's watching. Always watching.

name: Sweeping Strikes
text: Give a minion "Also damages minions next to whomever this attacks."
flavor: Infinitely preferable to mopping strikes.

name: Underbelly Angler
text: After you play a Murloc, add a random Murloc to your hand.
flavor: Attracts murlocs… and moths.

name: Underbelly Fence
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na card from another class,\n_gain +1/+1 and Rush.
flavor: She’ll take anything you have—except scruples and a good work ethic.

name: Vicious Scraphound
text: Whenever this minion\ndeals damage, gain that much Armor.
flavor: It begs for scraps.

name: Witch's Brew
text: Restore #4 Health. Repeatable this turn.
flavor: The swill has eyes!

name: Zayle, Shadow Cloak
text: You start the game with one of Zayle's EVIL Decks!
flavor: E.V.I.L. is the new black.

name: Arcane Watcher
text: Can't attack unless you have Spell Damage.
flavor: Now his watch has ended… until you have Spell Damage.

name: Blessing of the Ancients
text: Twinspell\nGive your minions +1/+1.
flavor: Arguably the cutest blessing.

name: Bronze Herald
text: Deathrattle: Add two 4/4 Dragons to your hand.
flavor: This is why you shouldn’t shoot the messenger.

name: Call to Adventure
text: Draw the lowest Cost minion from your deck. Give it +2/+2.
flavor: Even the smallest minion can change the outcome of the game.

name: Clockwork Goblin
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle a Bomb into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 5 damage.
flavor: They always wind up bombing.

name: Commander Rhyssa
text: Your Secrets trigger twice.
flavor: Two people can keep a secret as long as neither of them are Commander Rhyssa.

name: Conjurer's Calling
text: Twinspell\nDestroy a minion. Summon 2 minions of the same Cost to replace it.
flavor: If only you’d let it go to voicemail…

name: EVIL Miscreant
text: Combo: Add two random Lackeys to your hand.
flavor: Because there are no G.O.O.D. Miscreants.

name: Faceless Rager
text: Battlecry: Copy a friendly minion's Health.
flavor: When you need to rage anonymously.

name: Flight Master
text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2 Gryphon for each player.
flavor: Your gryphon will be summoned following a brief safety demonstration.

name: Hench-Clan Sneak
text: Stealth
flavor: He’d be a lot sneakier if he wasn’t trailing 300 yards of power cable…

name: Impferno
text: Give your Demons +1 Attack. Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Imps don't get mad when you set them on fire. They think it's cozy.

name: Lifeweaver
text: Whenever you restore Health, add a random Druid spell to your hand.
flavor: Lifeweaving is all well and good until it's time to cut the thread.

name: Madame Lazul
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a\ncopy of a card in your\nopponent's hand.
flavor: Of course she knows the future, she’s been looking at your cards the WHOLE TIME!

name: Magic Carpet
text: After you play a 1-Cost minion, give it +1 Attack and Rush.
flavor: Its small yet fierce riders are affectionately known as rug rats.

name: Messenger Raven
text: Battlecry: Discover a\nMage minion.
flavor: You can make a collect CAW!

name: Nine Lives
text: Discover a friendly Deathrattle minion that died this game. Also trigger its Deathrattle.
flavor: Beware the night of the living pets!

name: Rafaam's Scheme
text: Summon @ 1/1 |4(Imp, Imps). (Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: "When your first plan fails... imp-rovise."

name: Spellward Jeweler
text: Battlecry: Your hero is Elusive until next turn.
flavor: The fanciest possible way of distracting enemies with shiny things.

name: Ursatron
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Mech from your deck.
flavor: It's been programmed to include all the bear necessities.

name: Arcane Fletcher
text: [x]Whenever you play a\n1-Cost minion, draw a\nspell from your deck.
flavor: Stop trying to make fletch happen. It's not going to happen.

name: Archmage Vargoth
text: [x]At the end of your turn, cast\na spell you've cast this turn\n(targets are random).
flavor: He's an archmage, but he might want to brush up on the basics... like aiming.

name: Dr. Boom's Scheme
text: Gain @ Armor.\n(Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: “We did it! We blew up the vault!”\n“You mean the vault door?”\n“Oh. The doooor…”

name: Eager Underling
text: Deathrattle: Give two random friendly minions +2/+2.
flavor: Eager to please, even if it kills him.

name: Hecklebot
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Your opponent summons a minion from their deck.
flavor: Built by goblins, designed by a troll.

name: Hench-Clan Burglar
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from another class.
flavor: She’s more of a rat burglar.

name: Hench-Clan Hag
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Amalgams with all minion types.
flavor: The Hench Clan is an equal opportunity employer, no matter which parts of you came from where.

name: Hench-Clan Shadequill
text: Deathrattle: Restore 5 Health to the enemy hero.
flavor: The Hench-Clan has a point.

name: Kirin Tor Tricaster
text: Spell Damage +3\nYour spells cost (1) more.
flavor: The math checks out!

name: Marked Shot
text: Deal $4 damage to_a_minion. Discover_a_spell.
flavor: Obviously it's marked for greatness.

name: Omega Devastator
text: [x]Battlecry: If you have 10\nMana Crystals, deal 10\ndamage to a minion.
flavor: The Alpha Devastator didn’t devastate enough. The Beta Devastator devastated too much. But the Omega was just right!

name: Portal Keeper
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/2 Demon with Rush.
flavor: No longer allowed to be “it” when playing demon tag.

name: Proud Defender
text: Taunt\nHas +2 Attack while you [x]have no other minions.
flavor: It'll take a humble offender to defeat him.

name: Soldier of Fortune
text: Whenever this minion attacks, give your opponent a Coin.
flavor: His allies call him invaluable.

name: Traveling Healer
text: [x]Divine Shield\nBattlecry: Restore #3 Health.
flavor: Some heroes have soft hearts and hard shells.

name: Unsleeping Soul
text: Silence a friendly minion, then summon a copy of it.
flavor: It's 3 am. Do you know where your soul is?

name: Vendetta
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. Costs (0) if you're holding a card from another class.
flavor: A vengeful and vicarious vanguard against violent villains or vexed victims.

name: Violet Spellsword
text: [x]Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack\nfor each spell in your hand.
flavor: If you have to wield a spell and a sword, then neither is performing to expectation.

name: Waggle Pick
text: [x]Deathrattle: Return a random friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.
flavor: Kobolds informally refer to its effect as a deathwaggle.

name: Wrenchcalibur
text: After your hero attacks, shuffle a Bomb into your [x]opponent's deck.
flavor: Whoso pulleth out this wrench from the toolbox is rightwise king of the lab.

name: Azerite Elemental
text: At the start of your turn, gain Spell Damage +2.
flavor: This is some bad blood.

name: Barista Lynchen
text: Battlecry: Add a copy of each of your other Battlecry minions_to_your_hand.
flavor: "Thanks a latte!"

name: Convincing Infiltrator
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Destroy a\n random enemy minion.
flavor: It’s always nice to steal a familiar face.

name: Crystal Stag
text: Rush. Battlecry: If you've restored 5 Health this game, summon a copy of this.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: Arrives alone, but usually leaves with a friend just like him.

name: Dalaran Crusader
text: Divine Shield
flavor: Stops for nothing—except donuts.

name: Dragon Speaker
text: Battlecry: Give all Dragons in your hand +3/+3.
flavor: All of his speeches really drag on.

name: Duel!
text: Summon a minion from each player's deck.\nThey fight!
flavor: If you don’t fight to the death, it’s Duel Yielding.

name: Hagatha's Scheme
text: Deal $@ damage\nto all minions.\n(Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: "All shall suffer!"\n"But Hagatha, those are your minions..."\n"I said ALL!!!"

name: Hunting Party
text: Copy all Beasts in your_hand.
flavor: Not sure I’d call it a good party if everyone ends up beside themselves.

name: Muckmorpher
text: [x]Battlecry: Transform into\na 4/4 copy of a different\nminion in your deck.
flavor: Fan favorite in the muck morphin' sewer strangers.

name: Recurring Villain
text: Deathrattle: If this minion has 4 or more Attack, resummon it.
flavor: Mwahahaha! You'll never catch him this time!

name: Scargil
text: Your Murlocs cost (1).
flavor: Wanna know how he got those scars? So does he.

name: Sunreaver Warmage
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, deal 4 damage.
flavor: What, did you expect the Sunreavers to be coldages?

name: Aranasi Broodmother
text: [x]Taunt\nWhen you draw this, restore\n#4 Health to your hero.
flavor: She's got a big brood and a big mood.

name: Darkest Hour
text: Destroy all friendly minions. For each one, summon a random minion from your deck.
flavor: It's always darkest just before you find the light switch.

name: Eccentric Scribe
text: Deathrattle: Summon\nfour 1/1 Vengeful Scrolls.
flavor: Them’s fightin’ words!

name: Heistbaron Togwaggle
text: Battlecry: If you control a_Lackey, choose a fantastic treasure.
flavor: A staunch ally of Rafaam, at least while the shinies keep flowing.

name: Mad Summoner
text: [x]Battlecry: Fill each player's\nboard with 1/1 Imps.
flavor: Does he summon because of his madness, or is he mad from all the summoning?

name: Oblivitron
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a\nMech from your hand and\ntrigger its Deathrattle.
flavor: Reduce, reuse, re-rattle!

name: Portal Overfiend
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/2 Demon with Rush.
flavor: It’s like an interdimensional game of demon tag.

name: Safeguard
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon a 0/5\nVault Safe with Taunt.
flavor: Keep it secret. Keep it safeguarded!

name: Unidentified Contract
text: Destroy a minion. Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
flavor: The terms of service are constantly changing.

name: Unleash the Beast
text: Twinspell\nSummon a 5/5 Wyvern with Rush.
flavor: The Kirin Tor have always been lax in enforcing leash laws.

name: Unseen Saboteur
text: Battlecry: Your opponent casts a random spell from their hand (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: Far more effective than the flamboyant saboteur.

name: Violet Warden
text: Taunt\nSpell Damage +1
flavor: He's got magic, a shield, and an unwavering obsession with the color purple.

name: Arch-Villain Rafaam
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Replace your hand and deck with Legendary minions.
flavor: Minions must wash hands before being LIQUIDATED AND REPLACED BY SOMEONE BETTER.

name: Blastmaster Boom
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 1/1\nBoom Bots for each Bomb\nin your opponent's deck.
flavor: He's gonna fly through the air with the greatest of grease.

name: Catrina Muerte
text: At the end of your turn, resurrect another friendly Undead minion.
flavor: She always manages to lift your spirits.

name: Chef Nomi
text: Battlecry: If your deck is empty, summon six 6/6 Greasefire_Elementals.
flavor: His cooking is always very well done.

name: Exotic Mountseller
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random\n3-Cost Beast.
flavor: *Taps roof of mammoth* “You can fit so many squirrels in this thing!”

name: Swampqueen Hagatha
text: [x]Battlecry: Add a 5/5\nHorror to your hand. Teach\nit two Shaman spells.
flavor: Rafaam mainly enjoys working with Hagatha because she never laughs at Dr. Boom's jokes.

name: Tak Nozwhisker
text: [x]Whenever you shuffle a\ncard into your deck, add\na copy to your hand.
flavor: "One for me and one for future me!"

name: Tunnel Blaster
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Deal 3 damage\nto all minions.
flavor: And you always thought they wore the candles just for fun.

name: Underbelly Ooze
text: After this minion survives damage, summon a copy_of it.
flavor: It's always accepting of the less successful adventurers.

name: Vereesa Windrunner
text: Battlecry: Equip Thori'dal, the Stars' Fury.
flavor: Good things come in threes: Windrunner sisters and arrows of Thori'dal.

name: Archivist Elysiana
text: Battlecry: Discover 5 cards. Replace your deck with 2_copies of each.
flavor: Your deck is just another organizational challenge to her.

name: Batterhead
text: Rush. After this attacks and kills a minion, it may_attack again.
flavor: When it comes to problem-solving, he always uses his head.

name: Fel Lord Betrug
text: [x]Whenever you draw a minion, summon a copy with Rush that dies at end of turn.
flavor: Nobody else likes rush hour.

name: Heroic Innkeeper
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +2/+2 for each other friendly minion.
flavor: We reserve the right to refuse service to any 1/1.

name: Jepetto Joybuzz
text: Battlecry: Draw 2 minions from your deck. Set their Attack, Health, and Cost to 1.
flavor: “I’m a real toy now!”

name: Kalecgos
text: Your first spell each turn costs (0). Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavor: He was once the Aspect of Magic but gave it up to focus on cheap tricks.

name: Lucentbark
text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Go Dormant. Restore 5 Health to awaken this minion.
flavor: Always feels refreshed after a little dirt nap.

name: Power of Creation
text: Discover a 6-Cost minion. Summon two copies of it.
flavor: Mostly used for party tricks, to be honest.

name: The Forest's Aid
text: Twinspell\nSummon five 2/2 Treants.
flavor: Delicious Forest’s Aid! Made from real forests.

name: Walking Fountain
text: Lifesteal, Rush, Windfury
flavor: The weirdest part is that it doesn't have legs.

name: Whirlwind Tempest
text: Your minions with Windfury have Mega-Windfury.
flavor: And your minions with mega-windfury get... dizzy.

name: Burly Shovelfist
text: Rush
flavor: Shovel beats paper and rock!

name: Mass Resurrection
text: Summon 3 friendly minions that died\nthis game.
flavor: One's company, two's a crowd, and three's a “mass” resurrection, apparently.

name: Big Bad Archmage
text: At the end of your turn, summon a random\n6-Cost minion.
flavor: "My, my, what big minions I have!"

name: Dimensional Ripper
text: Summon 2 copies of a minion in your deck.
flavor: The first dimensional ripper had a point.\nThe second fell flat.\nThe THIRD one really started to take shape!

name: Jumbo Imp
text: Costs (1) less whenever a friendly Demon dies while this is in your hand.
flavor: Jumbo in size! Huge in E.V.I.L.!

name: Nozari
text: Battlecry: Restore both heroes to full Health.
flavor: In another timeline, she was called Yeszari.

name: The Boom Reaver
text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of a minion in your deck. Give it Rush.
flavor: “What’s better than reaving? BOOM reaving!”

name: Totemic Surge
text: Give your Totems +2_Attack.
flavor: It's not really advanced shamanic magic, you just draw nasty eyebrows on them.

name: Activate the Obelisk
text: Quest: Restore 15_Health.\nReward: Obelisk's Eye.
flavor: A one-eyed, one stone, towering purple minion healer.

name: Bazaar Burglary
text: [x]Quest: Add 4 cards from\nother classes to your hand.\nReward: Ancient Blades.
flavor: Just when you set up your "All-Natural Scented Candles" at the farmer's market and then some STUPID KOBOLD COMES AND TAKES THEM ALL!

name: Beaming Sidekick
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Health.
flavor: Sure, I'll carry the water! And the food! And the tents! And the cursed monkey paw!

name: Brazen Zealot
text: Whenever you summon a minion, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: Some paladins really Light it up.

name: Corrupt the Waters
text: [x]Quest: Play 6 Battlecry\ncards.\nReward: Heart of Vir'naal.
flavor: This is why Hagatha is banned from public pools.

name: Embalming Ritual
text: Give a minion Reborn.
flavor: "Guess what! We're getting a new cat."

name: Hack the System
text: [x]Quest: Attack 5 times\nwith your hero.\nReward: Anraphet's Core.
flavor: Anything can be hacked, if you're holding an axe.

name: Into the Fray
text: Give all Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: "You are in my FRAY!"

name: Jar Dealer
text: [x]Deathrattle: Add a random\n1-Cost minion to your hand.
flavor: What's in the jar? It could be anyone!

name: Making Mummies
text: [x]Quest: Play 5 Reborn\nminions.\nReward: Emperor Wraps.
flavor: "I do say, this gives me the vapors every single time!"

name: Mogu Cultist
text: Battlecry: If your board is full of Mogu Cultists, sacrifice them all and summon Highkeeper Ra.
flavor: Mogu cultists have the worst team-building exercises.

name: Murmy
text: Reborn
flavor: Unlike other mummies, they rolled him up with rice, sliced cucumbers, and soy sauce on the side.

name: Pharaoh Cat
text: Battlecry: Add a random Reborn minion to your_hand.
flavor: Mightiest of mousers, enduring in kingship of the upper and lower cat tree, conqueror of the red dot, the all-wise Catshepsut.

name: Plague of Flames
text: [x]Destroy all your minions.\nFor each one, destroy a\nrandom enemy minion.
flavor: This is fine.

name: Plague of Madness
text: Each player equips\na 2/2 Knife with Poisonous.
flavor: Don't bring a candle to a knife fight.

name: Raid the Sky Temple
text: Quest: Cast 10 spells.\nReward: Ascendant Scroll.
flavor: "Why can't I hold all these scrolls?"

name: Sinister Deal
text: Discover a Lackey.
flavor: "So, what's in the sack?" \n"Something... sinister." \n"Okay, it's a deal."

name: Supreme Archaeology
text: Quest: Draw 20 cards.\nReward: Tome of Origination.
flavor: Archaeology is the discovery of rare and powerful artifacts. Supreme Archaeology is TAKING THEM!

name: Unseal the Vault
text: Quest: Summon 20_minions.\nReward: Pharaoh's Warmask.
flavor: "Huh... That's a nice card back."

name: Untapped Potential
text: [x]Quest: End 4 turns\nwith any unspent Mana.\nReward: Ossirian Tear.
flavor: The official term is "strategic laziness."

name: Worthy Expedition
text: Discover a Choose One card.
flavor: This isn't where I parked my mount.

name: Ancient Mysteries
text: Draw a Secret from your deck. It costs (0).
flavor: I'm not saying it was aliens, but it was TOTALLY aliens!

name: Arcane Flakmage
text: After you play a Secret, deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Ancient pandaren proverb: He who is without secrets lacks flak.

name: Bug Collector
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Locust with Rush.
flavor: The only one who likes BEEEES!!!

name: Clever Disguise
text: Add 2 random spells from another class to_your hand.
flavor: "It me! Togwaggle!"

name: Crystal Merchant
text: If you have any unspent Mana at the end of your turn, draw a card.
flavor: I won't ask about your mana curve if you don't ask where I got these.

name: EVIL Totem
text: At the end of your turn,\nadd a Lackey to your hand.
flavor: A lot of people blame the parents when a totem goes bad.

name: Expired Merchant
text: [x]Battlecry: Discard your highest Cost card. Deathrattle: Add 2 copies of it to your hand.
flavor: The "best by" date is more like a guideline.

name: Fishflinger
text: Battlecry: Add a\nrandom Murloc to each player's_hand.
flavor: The scent of fish lingers on the fishflinger's fish fingers.

name: Frightened Flunky
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Discover a Taunt_minion.
flavor: Some people just aren't cut out to be supervillain material.

name: Grandmummy
text: [x]Reborn\n Deathrattle: Give a random\nfriendly minion +1/+1.
flavor: A grandmummy’s love is eternal.

name: Holy Ripple
text: Deal $1 damage to all enemies. Restore #1_Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: I still prefer the taste of banana fudge ripple.

name: Injured Tol'vir
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Deal 3 damage to this minion.
flavor: Me-OW!

name: Kobold Sandtrooper
text: Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to the enemy_hero.
flavor: Stay while, take candle.

name: Micro Mummy
text: [x]Reborn At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Attack.
flavor: The dramatically detailed terrifically trimmed replica of the real thing!

name: Neferset Ritualist
text: Battlecry: Restore adjacent minions to full_Health.
flavor: The Neferset are great—they'll always make sure their friends are feline fine.

name: Penance
text: Lifesteal\nDeal $3 damage to a_minion.
flavor: This is what happens when you don’t give a sincere apology.

name: Pressure Plate
text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, destroy a random enemy_minion.
flavor: The appropriate dishware for stressful situations.

name: Questing Explorer
text: Battlecry: If you control a Quest, draw a card.
flavor: Earned her merit badges the hard way—twelve zhevra hooves at a time.

name: Quicksand Elemental
text: Battlecry: Give all enemy minions -2 Attack this_turn.
flavor: Use a light abrasive to buff blemishes away but use a heavy abrasive to debuff problems.

name: Sandstorm Elemental
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. Overload: (1)
flavor: Doot doot doot doot doot [Pause] Doot doot doot doot doot DEE doot doot doot doot doot!

name: Sandwasp Queen
text: Battlecry: Add two 2/1 Sandwasps to your hand.
flavor: Oooh, see that wasp! \nWatch that sting! \nDig in the Sandwasp Queen!

name: Serpent Egg
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/4 Sea Serpent.
flavor: These things go from "adorable danger noodle!" to "MY FACE IS MELTING!" all too quickly.

name: Sir Finley of the Sands
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has\nno duplicates, Discover an\nupgraded Hero Power.
flavor: "The sands shall be my sea! And this scarab shall be my, er, strange and wriggly boat!"

name: Spitting Camel
text: [x]At the end of your turn,\n__deal 1 damage to another__\nrandom friendly minion.
flavor: Were you expectorating another bad pun?

name: Subdue
text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 1.
flavor: Like humility but more humiliating.

name: Temple Berserker
text: Reborn\nHas +2 Attack while damaged.
flavor: He's back. He's angry. And he's here to wrap things up.

name: Vilefiend
text: Lifesteal
flavor: Dreamed of becoming a Stylefiend, but fel was never in season.

name: Whirlkick Master
text: Whenever you play a Combo card, add a random Combo card to your hand.
flavor: C-c-combo!

name: Zephrys the Great
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, wish for the perfect card.
flavor: "Of course it's perfect, you're just not seeing how to use it."

name: BEEEES!!!
text: [x]Choose a minion.\nSummon four 1/1 Bees\nthat attack it.
flavor: Right before CEEEES!!!

name: Bloodsworn Mercenary
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a\ndamaged friendly minion.\nSummon a copy of it.
flavor: You look really hurt. You could use a friend!

name: Candletaker
text: Reborn
flavor: "You no waaaake caaaandle!"

name: Desert Hare
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Desert Hares.
flavor: After they're caught, they’re dessert hares.

name: Desert Spear
text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Locust with Rush.
flavor: Goes on the right, next to the desert spoon.

name: Dune Sculptor
text: [x]After you cast a spell,\nadd a random Mage\nminion to your hand.
flavor: Come for the magic show, stay for the sand castles.

name: Dwarven Archaeologist
text: Battlecry: Discover a card. Reduce its Cost by (1).
flavor: She's making great progress on paying off that advanced degree.

name: EVIL Recruiter
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly Lackey to summon a 5/5 Demon.
flavor: I'm starting to think the lackeys aren't evil, just taken advantage of.

name: Flame Ward
text: Secret: After a minion attacks your hero, deal $3 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Not to be confused with the burn ward.

name: Generous Mummy
text: Reborn\nYour opponent's cards cost (1) less.
flavor: Yeah, she's mummified, but her money hasn’t dried up!

name: Golden Scarab
text: Battlecry: Discover a\n4-Cost card.
flavor: Who actually puts all the gold plating on these things, and why?

name: History Buff
text: Whenever you play a minion, give a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Actually... what happened was...

name: Hooked Scimitar
text: [x]Combo: Gain +2 Attack.
flavor: Oooooooooooow. I'm hooked on a scimitar!

name: Hunter's Pack
text: Add a random Hunter Beast, Secret, and weapon to your_hand.
flavor: Oh look! It's a trap!

name: Infested Goblin
text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Add two 1/1 Scarabs with Taunt to your hand.
flavor: Trust us. DON'T go cheap on the scarab repellent.

name: Livewire Lance
text: After your hero attacks, add a Lackey to your_hand.
flavor: The lance is heavy but it’s the battery pack that really does a number on the shoulders.

name: Mischief Maker
text: Battlecry: Swap the top card of your deck with your_opponent's.
flavor: Fair trade is for noble-minded suckers with dignity and honor.

name: Neferset Thrasher
text: Whenever this attacks, deal 3 damage to your_hero.
flavor: Tough to do skateboard tricks with four legs.

name: Plague of Murlocs
text: Transform all minions into random Murlocs.
flavor: This is horrible! And adorable!

name: Ramkahen Wildtamer
text: Battlecry: Copy a random Beast in your hand.
flavor: She gets to decide what cards go to the Hall of Fame.

name: Salhet's Pride
text: Deathrattle: Draw two\n1-Health minions from your_deck.
flavor: Pride cometh before the maul.

name: Vulpera Scoundrel
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell or pick a mystery choice.
flavor: A spell is a spell, but the mystery choice could be anything! (It's also a spell.)

name: Weaponized Wasp
text: Battlecry: If you control\na Lackey, deal 3_damage.
flavor: Dr. Boom had one simple request: wasps with flippin' laser beams attached to their heads.

name: Wretched Reclaimer
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a friendly\nminion, then return it to life\nwith full Health.
flavor: "Ok, here's the plan. We kill you, then bring you back." "Stronger?" "No, about the same."

name: Ancestral Guardian
text: Lifesteal\nReborn
flavor: No one knows whose ancestor he is, but he's still upset that you never call.

name: Body Wrapper
text: Battlecry: Discover a friendly minion that died this game. Shuffle it into your deck.
flavor: She uses pickle slices for the eyes. Keeps them well-preserved.

name: Bone Wraith
text: Taunt\nReborn
flavor: It uses only the eco-friendly bones from free-range humanoids.

name: Conjured Mirage
text: Taunt\nAt the start of your turn, shuffle this minion into your deck.
flavor: What you see is Isiset.

name: Diseased Vulture
text: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, summon a random\n3-Cost minion.
flavor: He's off the twig! He's kicked the bucket! THIS IS AN EX-VULTURE!

name: Garden Gnome
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na spell that costs (5) or more,\nsummon two 2/2 Treants.
flavor: "Greetings, my little shrubs... It's whittlin' time."

name: High Priest Amet
text: [x]Whenever you summon a\nminion, set its Health equal\nto this minion's.
flavor: All minions are equal, but some minions are more equal than others.

name: Hyena Alpha
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control\na Secret, summon two\n2/2 Hyenas.
flavor: Everything the sun touches is ours—so long as it's already dead.

name: Impbalming
text: Destroy a minion. Shuffle 3 Worthless Imps into your deck.
flavor: With your complexion, Imp Balm is a great demonizer.

name: Psychopomp
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game. Give it Reborn.
flavor: "Come with me if you want to re-live."

name: Restless Mummy
text: Rush\nReborn
flavor: Life-separation anxiety syndrome.

name: Sahket Sapper
text: Deathrattle: Return a _random enemy minion to_ your_opponent's_hand.
flavor: "Here, you dropped this."

name: Shadow of Death
text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 3 'Shadows' into your deck that summon a copy when drawn.
flavor: Making new friends takes skill.

name: Splitting Axe
text: Battlecry: Summon copies of your Totems.
flavor: The ancient shaman chant, "Control Axe, Control Vee."

name: Sunstruck Henchman
text: At the start of your turn, this has a 50% chance to_fall asleep.
flavor: There is E.V.I.L. here that DOES sleep.

name: Vessina
text: While you're Overloaded, your other minions have +2 Attack.
flavor: She wasn't happy when Hagatha sent her back to Uldum. But her "angry" hiss sounds like her "happy" hiss, so no one knew the difference.

name: Anka, the Buried
text: Battlecry: Change each Deathrattle minion in your hand into a 1/1 that costs (1).
flavor: "You look familiar. Were you at my first funeral?"

name: Anubisath Defender
text: Taunt. Costs (0) if you've cast a spell that costs (5) or more this turn.
flavor: Also comes running when he hears a can opener.

name: Bazaar Mugger
text: Rush\nBattlecry: Add a random minion from another class to your hand.
flavor: Premium muggings at a discount price.

name: Cloud Prince
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, deal 6 damage.
flavor: "In West Cloudidelphia, born and raised; flinging lightning for the rest of my days."

name: Dark Pharaoh Tekahn
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Lackeys are 4/4.
flavor: He'll get that League of Explorers and their little murloc too!

name: Desert Obelisk
text:
[x]If you control 3 of these
at the end of your turn,
deal 5 damage to a
random enemy.
flavor: The Obelisk of the Stars can hide an entire land from prying eyes! Or zap a rando.

name: Elise the Enlightened
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, duplicate your hand.
flavor: From cartographer to combatant, Elise has taken the road less traveled—because no one else could find it on a map.

name: Faceless Lurker
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Double this minion's Health.
flavor: Longtime lurker, first time attacker.

name: Mortuary Machine
text: After your opponent plays a minion, give it Reborn.
flavor: The ankle bone's connected to the shin bone. The knuckle bone's connected to the... eh, it'll be fine.

name: Naga Sand Witch
text: [x]Battlecry: Change the Cost\nof spells in your hand to (5).
flavor: 5 mana footlong, anyone?

name: Oasis Surger
text: Rush\nChoose One - Gain +2/+2; or Summon a copy of this minion.
flavor: Surge's up, dude!

name: Phalanx Commander
text: Your Taunt minions\nhave +2 Attack.
flavor: Turns out he's really good at herding cats.

name: Plague of Wrath
text: Destroy all damaged minions.
flavor: "Thanks, I HATE it!"

name: Sandhoof Waterbearer
text: At the end of your turn, restore #5 Health to a damaged friendly character.
flavor: Used to carrying for his team.

name: Wasteland Assassin
text: Stealth\nReborn
flavor: They'll never see me coming, what with my glowing body, eyes and daggers.

name: Armagedillo
text: [x]Taunt At the end of your turn, give all Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: We may never know what provoked it, but we will never forget the consequences.

name: Armored Goon
text: Whenever your hero attacks, gain 5 Armor.
flavor: Armored except for non-critical areas, such as the head, torso, fists and thighs.

name: Blatant Decoy
text: [x]Deathrattle: Each player\nsummons the lowest Cost\nminion from their hand.
flavor: "Hah! You is being tricked by ME! Togwaggle!"

name: Hidden Oasis
text: Choose One - Summon a 6/6 Ancient with Taunt; or Restore #12 Health.
flavor: Amazing that it's been hidden, given the twenty-foot treant splashing around in it.

name: Khartut Defender
text: [x]Taunt, Reborn\nDeathrattle: Restore #3\nHealth to your hero.
flavor: Gesundheit!

name: Pharaoh's Blessing
text: Give a minion +4/+4, Divine Shield, and Taunt.
flavor: Life hack: Sneeze near a pharaoh.

name: Reno the Relicologist
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemy minions.
flavor: All his life, Reno Jackson was only a gatling wand away from becoming the greatest and most terrifying mage who ever existed.

name: Riftcleaver
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Your hero takes damage equal to its Health.
flavor: Brings you face to face with your destructive impulses.

name: Scarlet Webweaver
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of a random Beast in your_hand by (5).
flavor: Isn't that nice? The spider made the explorer a sleeping bag!

name: Swarm of Locusts
text: Summon seven 1/1 Locusts with Rush.
flavor: Good things never come in swarms.

name: Wild Bloodstinger
text: Battlecry: Summon a minion from your opponent's hand. Attack it.
flavor: Tame Bloodstingers would politely invite your minion to tea.

name: Dinotamer Brann
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, summon King Krush.
flavor: Brann's new dino-taming hobby is going well—his pet can already make him sit, stand, and roll over!

name: Earthquake
text: Deal $5 damage to all minions, then deal $2 damage to all minions.
flavor: Shake it, sh-sh-sh-shake it like a Kalimdor fissure.

name: Overflow
text: Restore #5 Health\nto all characters.\nDraw 5 cards.
flavor: It's a high five followed by a low tide.

name: Siamat
text: [x]Battlecry: Gain 2 of Rush,\nTaunt, Divine Shield, or\nWindfury (your choice).
flavor: TAUNT. TAUNT.

name: Wasteland Scorpid
text: Poisonous
flavor: After they get to a certain size, it doesn't matter if they're poisonous or not.

name: Wrapped Golem
text: [x]Reborn At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Scarab with Taunt.
flavor: The end result of one of the greatest wrap battles of all time.

name: Octosari
text: Deathrattle: Draw 8 cards.
flavor: Eight arms of sand-flinging, foe-wringing, card-slinging fury!

name: Pit Crocolisk
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage.
flavor: PIT! Not PET!

name: Tip the Scales
text: Summon 7 Murlocs from your deck.
flavor: Hold on, I need to get some murlocs to weigh in on this.

name: Tomb Warden
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
flavor: Also known as an ancient copy machine.

name: Tortollan Pilgrim
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell\nin your deck and cast it\nwith random targets.
flavor: A tortollan made it to the desert!

name: Anubisath Warbringer
text: Deathrattle: Give all minions in your hand +3/+3.
flavor: Some dogs will bring you a bone or a squeaky toy. This one brings war!

name: Mogu Fleshshaper
text: [x]Rush. Costs (1) less for each\nminion on the battlefield.
flavor: He's here to shape *clap* you up!

name: Plague of Death
text: Silence and destroy all_minions.
flavor: Don't worry, there's a happy little funhouse right under that sand pit.

name: Colossus of the Moon
text: Divine Shield\nReborn
flavor: Strike him down, and you'll face the Colossus of the New Moon.

name: King Phaoris
text: [x]Battlecry: For each spell in your hand, summon a random minion of the same Cost.
flavor: When you're the king of the cats, the whole desert is your litterbox.

name: Living Monument
text: Taunt
flavor: This is not the greatest card in the world. This is just a monument.

name: Puzzle Box of Yogg-Saron
text: Cast 10 random spells (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: "PUT THE BOX DOWN, RENO!"

name: Embiggen
text: Give all minions in your deck +2/+2. They cost (1) more (up to 10).
flavor: Did you set it to "wumbo?"

name: Whispers of EVIL
text: Add a Lackey to your_hand.
flavor: Madame Lazul’s ASMR program is off to a promising start!

name: Arcane Breath
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a spell.
flavor: One of many side effects from eating mana cookies.

name: Blazing Battlemage
flavor: Weaponized an ancient technique once used to slice cold butter.

name: Bloodsail Flybooter
text: Battlecry: Add two 1/1 Pirates to your hand.
flavor: They’re pretty fly for some pirate guys.

name: Clear the Way
text: [x]Sidequest: Summon 3 Rush minions. Reward: Summon a 4/4 Gryphon with Rush.
flavor: The terrifying part is the gryphons' squeaky voices afterward.

name: Depth Charge
text: At the start of your turn, deal 5 damage to ALL_minions.
flavor: * Does not have Charge.

name: Disciple of Galakrond
text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
flavor: Raising Galakrond will cause thurible, thurible damage.

name: Dragon's Hoard
text: Discover a Legendary_minion from another class.
flavor: The Alliance loves this hoard.

name: Dwarven Sharpshooter
text: Your Hero Power can target_minions.
flavor: Scissors, knives, needles, you name it! He'll shoot it.

name: Elemental Allies
text: [x]Sidequest: Play an Elemental 2 turns in a row. Reward: Draw 3 spells from your deck.
flavor: Reno’s lucky he wasn’t caught by a fire elemental.

name: Hot Air Balloon
text: At the start of your turn, gain +1 Health.
flavor: The Gadgetzan Pilgrim's Bounty parade is missing a float this year.

name: Invocation of Frost
text: Freeze an enemy. \nInvoke Galakrond.
flavor: Galakrond adores a little frosting.

name: Learn Draconic
text: [x]Sidequest: Spend 8 Mana on spells. Reward: Summon a 6/6 Dragon.
flavor: Upon taking up the spellbook, Reno realized with a start: "I can't read."

name: Praise Galakrond!
text: [x]Give a minion +1 Attack.\nInvoke Galakrond.
flavor:
"Turn to Galakrond, Chapter 3 Verse 12.

'SNARL! ROAR! GRAAAAGH!'

Let us reflect on this wisdom."

name: Rain of Fire
text: Deal $1 damage to all_characters.
flavor: You know it’s autumn when the skies rain brimstone and fire. Also: pumpkin spice!

name: Righteous Cause
text: Sidequest: Summon 5 minions.\nReward: Give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: "And I hereby dub thee a cadet of the Explorer’s League! NEXT!"

name: Sand Breath
text: [x]Give a minion +1/+2.\nGive it Divine Shield if\nyou're holding a Dragon.
flavor: After Uldum, EVERYONE had sand breath.

name: Secure the Deck
text: Sidequest: Attack twice with your hero. Reward: Add 3 'Claw' spells to your hand.
flavor: "Tied it down, boss. I don't really know why you asked me to do that."

name: Sky Raider
text: Battlecry: Add a random Pirate to your hand.
flavor: Maybe he should've hatched a plan that could actually carry booty back too.

name: Storm's Wrath
text: Give your minions +1/+1.\nOverload: (1)
flavor: How many dragons does it take to destroy a hot air balloon? One, two, three, CRUNCH!

name: Strength in Numbers
text: Sidequest: Spend 10 Mana on minions.\nReward: Summon a minion from your deck.
flavor: One minion, two minions... tree minions!

name: Surging Tempest
text: Has +1 Attack while you_have Overloaded Mana Crystals.
flavor: "Overloaded? Should've gotten a surge protector."

name: Toxic Reinforcements
text: [x]Sidequest: Use your Hero Power three times. Reward: Summon three 2/1 Leper Gnomes.
flavor: In the event of a sudden loss of cabin pressure, a slingshot will be deployed for convenient evacuation.

name: Treenforcements
text: [x]Choose One - Give a minion +2 Health and Taunt; or Summon a 2/2 Treant.
flavor: Treemendous value!

name: Violet Spellwing
text: Deathrattle: Add an 'Arcane Missiles' spell to_your hand.
flavor: A bird in the hand is worth three missiles in the grave.

name: Breath of Dreams
text: Draw a card. If you're holding a Dragon, gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavor: Ysera has the worst morning breath.

name: Corrosive Breath
text:
[x]Deal $3 damage to a
minion. If you're holding
a Dragon, it also hits
the enemy hero.
flavor: It's a breath of fresh terror!

name: Dragon Breeder
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Dragon. Add a copy of it to_your hand.
flavor: Deathwing would have been more well-adjusted if he'd been raised by this guy.

name: Envoy of Lazul
text: [x]Battlecry: Look at 3 cards. Guess which one is in your opponent's hand to get a copy of it.
flavor: "Note to self: possess someone who's local and knows directions next time."

name: Evasive Chimaera
text: Poisonous\nElusive
flavor: One head only tells the truth, while the other head only tells lies. But they both spit poison.

name: Grizzled Wizard
text: Battlecry: Swap Hero Powers with your opponent until your next turn.
flavor: When he was young, he was an Outrageous Magus.

name: Nether Breath
text: Deal $2 damage.\nIf you're holding a Dragon, deal $4 damage with Lifesteal instead.
flavor:
"Whether the Nether is cold,
whether the Nether is hot,
we'll burn together,
whatever the Nether,
whether we like it or not."

name: Parachute Brigand
text: [x]After you play a Pirate,\nsummon this minion\nfrom your hand.
flavor: She flies standby.

name: Phase Stalker
text: [x]After you use your Hero\nPower, cast a Secret\nfrom your deck.
flavor: It's not just a phase! I don't have to tell you anything! GAWSH!

name: Ritual Chopper
text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
flavor: Chop chop, Galakrond!

name: Sanctuary
text: [x]Sidequest: Take no damage for a turn. Reward: Summon a 3/6 minion with Taunt.
flavor: Few quests are completed by cowering under a table.

name: Shrubadier
text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2_Treant.
flavor: Her shoots can kill.

name: Tasty Flyfish
text: Deathrattle: Give a Dragon in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: Reinforced with vitamins and mrglrls.

name: Transmogrifier
text: Whenever you draw a card, transform it into a random Legendary minion.
flavor: All it takes is some imagination and a cardboard box.

name: Wyrmrest Purifier
text: [x]Battlecry: Transform all Neutral cards in your deck into random cards from your class.
flavor: She keeps your deck classy.

name: Ancharrr
text: After your hero attacks, draw a Pirate from your_deck.
flavor: The problem with anchors is they often end up sinking to the bottom of your deck.

name: Awaken!
text: Invoke Galakrond. Deal_$1 damage to all_minions.
flavor: This is an alarm clock you can't ignore.

name: Bad Luck Albatross
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle two 1/1 Albatross into your opponent's deck.
flavor: Legend holds that it's bad luck to harm it. So maybe just pat it on the head, okay?

name: Blowtorch Saboteur
text: Battlecry: Your opponent's next Hero Power costs (3).
flavor: Before he came along, we went through a lot of duct tape.

name: Breath of the Infinite
text: Deal $2 damage to all minions. If you're holding a Dragon, only damage enemies.
flavor: It's called "circular breathing."

name: Bronze Explorer
text: Lifesteal\nBattlecry: Discover a Dragon.
flavor: Always ready to explore new friendships! Except with Deathwing.

name: Chenvaala
text: After you cast three spells in a turn, summon a 5/5_Elemental.
flavor: Like the Dragon Soul. If dragons had souls of ice.

name: Dark Skies
text: [x]Deal $1 damage to a\nrandom minion. Repeat\nfor each card in your hand.
flavor: "It's a drizzle of fire. A fine mist, really."

name: Diving Gryphon
text: Rush\nBattlecry: Draw a Rush minion_from_your_deck.
flavor: Warning: May cause carousel flashbacks.

name: Dragonblight Cultist
text: [x]Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.\nGain +1 Attack for each\nother friendly minion.
flavor: Galakrond would be extra mad if he was resurrected with gnaw marks on his bones.

name: Dragonrider Talritha
text: Deathrattle: Give a Dragon in your hand +3/+3 and this Deathrattle.
flavor: You can't just run away from your problems. Unless you have another dragon to jump to.

name: Dread Raven
text: Has +3 Attack for each other Dread Raven you_control.
flavor: Fun Fact: A group of three Dread Ravens is an unkindness. Four is lethal!

name: EVIL Quartermaster
text: Battlecry: Add a Lackey to your hand. Gain 3 Armor.
flavor: He trained for a whole year to become quarter-master. Three more, and he'll be a full-master.

name: Fiendish Rites
text: Invoke Galakrond.\nGive your minions +1_Attack.
flavor: "You have the right to sacrifice an ally. If you do not have an ally, then one will be sacrificed for you."

name: Fire Hawk
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each card in your opponent's hand.
flavor: It’s our fault for making all those card backs that look like food.

name: Goboglide Tech
text: Battlecry: If you control a_Mech, gain +1/+1 and_Rush.
flavor: The word "glide" is always in quotes in the manual.

name: Lightning Breath
text:
[x]Deal $4 damage to a
minion. If you're holding
a Dragon, also damage
its neighbors.
flavor: Recipe: One dragon, four wool socks, thick shag carpet.

name: Living Dragonbreath
text: Your minions can't be_Frozen.
flavor: If you want that muscular physique, you've really gotta feel the burn.

name: Mindflayer Kaahrj
text: Battlecry: Choose an\nenemy minion.\nDeathrattle: Summon a new copy of it.
flavor: It’s pronounced "Kaahrj."

name: Primordial Explorer
text: Poisonous\nBattlecry: Discover a Dragon.
flavor: "We're letting the poisonous dude carry the bags?"

name: Ramming Speed
text: Force a minion to attack one of its neighbors.
flavor: Her deductible keeps going up.

name: Scalerider
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 2 damage.
flavor: Do Re Me Fa So La Spear Throw!

name: Scion of Ruin
text: Rush. Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, summon 2_copies of this.
flavor: Ruined! RUINED!

name: Seal Fate
text: Deal $3 damage to an undamaged character. Invoke Galakrond.
flavor: Firmly press the seal of your fates instead of leaving the flap open.

name: Sky Claw
text: Your other Mechs\nhave +1 Attack.\nBattlecry: Summon two 1/1 Microcopters.
flavor: Carefully engineered to never grab the Mimiron plush toy.

name: Skybarge
text: [x]After you summon a\nPirate, deal 2 damage\nto a random enemy.
flavor: It's more of a ship-gun than a gunship.

name: Stormhammer
text: Doesn't lose Durability while you control a_Dragon.
flavor: It brings the storm before the calm.

name: Azure Explorer
text: Spell Damage +2\nBattlecry: Discover a Dragon.
flavor: Has an appetite for knowledge!

name: Devoted Maniac
text: Rush\nBattlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
flavor: There are plenty of apathetic maniacs, but they couldn't be bothered.

name: Dragonbane
text: After you use your Hero Power, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: *Thunk* "That wasn’t a dragon!" *Thunk* "THAT wasn’t a dragon!"

name: Dragonmaw Poacher
text: Battlecry: If your opponent controls a Dragon, gain +4/+4 and Rush.
flavor: I prefer my dragons over-easy.

name: Evasive Feywing
text: Elusive
flavor: I've never heard of this fey-dragon called "Brightwing," but if I HAD, I’d say we’d be best friends.

name: Fate Weaver
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Invoked\ntwice, reduce the Cost of\ncards in your hand by (1).
flavor: Do not draw the attention of a Fate Weaver, for it will always loom over your destiny.

name: Frizz Kindleroost
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Dragons in your deck by_(2).
flavor: Frizz knows that baby dragons need warmth, care, and the highest possible level of goblin engineering.

name: Grave Rune
text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Summon 2 copies of this."
flavor: I'm gravely sorry to rune this.

name: Hippogryph
text: Rush\nTaunt
flavor: Known for its ferocious grace, the hippogryph is a truly majestic creature. Except when molting.

name: Hoard Pillager
text: Battlecry: Equip one of your destroyed weapons.
flavor: Better to have stabbed and lost. And then found again!

name: Lightforged Zealot
