text: Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, equip a __4/2_Truesilver_Champion._
flavor: Card-carrying member of the Paladins Only Paladin Club.

name: Molten Breath
text: [x]Deal $5 damage to a\nminion. If you're holding\na Dragon, gain 5 Armor.
flavor: Pizza so hot it burns OTHER PEOPLE’S MOUTHS.

name: Necrium Apothecary
text: Combo: Draw a Deathrattle minion from your deck and gain its Deathrattle.
flavor: Necrium: Get the afterlife without the aftertaste!

name: Nozdormu the Timeless
text: Battlecry: Set each player to 10 Mana Crystals.
flavor: Time is mana!

name: Squallhunter
text: Spell Damage +2\nOverload: (2)
flavor: "Oh, the weather outside is frightful… But Squallhunter's so delightful!\n \nAnd since we've gone down this road--overload, overload, overload!"

name: Troll Batrider
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor: "Quiet! The bat can't hear where he's goin'!"

name: Umbral Skulker
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Invoked\ntwice, add 3 Coins to\nyour hand.
flavor: "Three gold?! Do you have any idea how long this quest chain was?"

name: Veiled Worshipper
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Invoked\ntwice, draw 3 cards.
flavor: If you’re not wearing your regulation cultist clothing, how will Galakrond know to devour you last?

name: Wing Commander
text: Has +2 Attack for each Dragon in your hand.
flavor: "Flap! Flap! FLAP!"

name: Zul'Drak Ritualist
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Summon three random 1-Cost minions for your opponent.
flavor: Generosity is a core value in cult culture.

name: Aeroponics
text: Draw 2 cards.\nCosts (2) less for each Treant you control.
flavor: Good seeds can go far.

name: Amber Watcher
text: Battlecry: Restore #8_Health.
flavor: Healing really resin-ates with him.

name: Bandersmosh
text: [x]Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a 5/5 copy of a random Legendary minion.
flavor: The Shudderwock finds him particularly frumious.

name: Big Ol' Whelp
text: Battlecry: Draw a card.
flavor: A chonker, a real absolute unit.

name: Chromatic Egg
text: [x]Battlecry: Secretly Discover\na Dragon to hatch into.\nDeathrattle: Hatch!
flavor: Nefarian was known for creating two things: horrible monsters and excellent breakfasts.

name: Chronobreaker
text: [x]Deathrattle: If you're holding\na Dragon, deal 3 damage\nto all enemy minions.
flavor: If he asks to borrow your watch, just say no.

name: Cobalt Spellkin
text: Battlecry: Add two 1-Cost spells from your class to_your hand.
flavor: Spews more spells than a sleep-talking wizard.

name: Corrupt Elementalist
text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond twice.
flavor: Her element is "Horns."

name: Crazed Netherwing
text: Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other characters.
flavor: Always tail swipes left.

name: Cumulo-Maximus
text: Battlecry: If you have Overloaded Mana Crystals, deal 5 damage.
flavor: "Are your clouds not entertained?!"

name: Dragon's Pack
text: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. If you've Invoked twice, give them +3/+3.
flavor: Each dragon's pack is guaranteed to have at least one rare.

name: Faceless Corruptor
text: [x]Rush. Battlecry: Transform\none of your minions into\na copy of this.
flavor: What does Madame Lazul have against faces?!

name: Kobold Stickyfinger
text: Battlecry: Steal your opponent's weapon.
flavor: He no take candle. He take sword.

name: Malygos, Aspect of Magic
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, Discover an\n upgraded Mage spell.
flavor: It's official. We can say Malygeese.

name: Platebreaker
text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's Armor.
flavor: Worst. Dinner guest. Ever.

name: Rolling Fireball
text: Deal $8 damage to a minion. Any excess damage continues to\nthe left or right.
flavor: Why don't they ever run perpendicular?

name: Shield of Galakrond
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
flavor: Realistically, she's the shield for Galakrond's big toe.

name: Skyfin
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, summon 2 random Murlocs.
flavor: "Do you want to be a murloc or a dragon?" \n\n"Yes."

name: Stowaway
text: [x]Battlecry: If there are cards\nin your deck that didn't start\nthere, draw 2 of them.
flavor: Cut him a break. Even economy class tickets are pretty expensive these days.

name: Tentacled Menace
text: Battlecry: Each player draws a card. Swap their_Costs.
flavor: He calls this one the "Calamari Special."

name: Time Rip
text: Destroy a minion.\nInvoke Galakrond.
flavor: "It's time. R.I.P."

name: Waxadred
text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle a Candle into your deck that resummons Waxadred when drawn.
flavor: Waxadred the dragon fought for his king, frolicking through the fields melting everything!

name: Abyssal Summoner
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a\nDemon with Taunt and stats\nequal to your hand size.
flavor: But gnomes have tiny hands...

name: Camouflaged Dirigible
text: Battlecry: Give your other Mechs Stealth until your_next turn.
flavor: "What does that cloud look like to you?" \n\n"Trouble."

name: Candle Breath
text: Draw 3 cards. Costs (3)_less while you're holding a Dragon.
flavor: "And Waxadred shall light their fires, with roaring breath hotter than pyres!\n \nCome before him, scamp and vandal, pledge your faith and lift your candle!"

name: Dragoncaster
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, your next spell this turn costs (0).
flavor: It’s challenging to perform magic on dragonback. It’s so easy to drop the rabbit.

name: Emerald Explorer
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Discover a Dragon.
flavor: Make it a double dragon!

name: Evasive Wyrm
text: Rush\nDivine Shield\nElusive
flavor: Deftly dodges spells like a real wiggle wyrm.

name: Flik Skyshiv
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a\nminion and all copies of it\n(wherever they are).
flavor: Junior explorers scan the night sky in fear of her candle’s flame!

name: Gyrocopter
text: Rush\nWindfury
flavor: The hula doll is still absolutely required.

name: Kronx Dragonhoof
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw Galakrond.\nIf you're already Galakrond,\nunleash a Devastation.
flavor: The only one who knows how to properly prepare Galakrond's coffee.

name: Nithogg
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 0/3 Eggs. Next turn they hatch into 4/4 Drakes with Rush.
flavor: Not to be confused with Nithogger.

name: Utgarde Grapplesniper
text: Battlecry: Both players draw a card. If it's a Dragon, summon it.
flavor: Note: The dragon may be a little cranky upon arrival.

name: Veranus
text: Battlecry: Change the Health of all enemy minions to 1.
flavor: As an empty nester, she just misses her little ones.

name: Evasive Drakonid
text: Taunt\nElusive
flavor: Doesn't respond to spells, hero powers, calls, or text messages.

name: Galakrond, the Nightmare
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw 1 card.\nIt costs (0).\n(@)
flavor: The enormous creature unfurled terrifying claws dripping with poisonous ichor. King Togwaggle was pleased, but inwardly disappointed the great Nightmare refused to wear the candle.

name: Galakrond, the Tempest
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two\n2/2 Storms with Rush.\n(@)
flavor: Hagatha cried out over the winds: "Truly, you are as powerful as the Maelstrom!" To which the Tempest answered: "I AM THE MAELSTROM."

name: Galakrond, the Unbreakable
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw 1 minion.\nGive it +4/+4.\n(@)
flavor: The ground quaked beneath the behemoth as Dr. Boom continued: "…with over 400 TONS of solid Storm Silver plate." Then he beeped a small remote. "And luxury spikes!"

name: Galakrond, the Unspeakable
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy 1\nrandom enemy minion.\n(@)
flavor: Lazul called Galakrond’s name, her voice echoed by whispers from the deep. Both of Galakrond’s eyes opened… and then other eyes opened, as well.

name: Galakrond, the Wretched
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon\n1 random Demon.\n(@)
flavor: Fel-flames slowly writhed around the skeleton, until the great bones knit themselves together into a demonic monstrosity. Rafaam shielded his face from the heat but could not hide his grin.

name: Goru the Mightree
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Treants have +1/+1.
flavor: He's untreefeated.

name: Lightforged Crusader
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, add 5 random Paladin cards to your hand.
flavor: Self-appointed president of the Paladins Only Paladin Club.

name: Shu'ma
text: At the end of your turn,\nfill your board with 1/1_Tentacles.
flavor: How to tell your mother to go away.

name: Valdris Felgorge
text: Battlecry: Increase your maximum hand size to 12. Draw 4 cards.
flavor: I don't mean to pry, but you don't by chance happen to have six fingers on both of your hands?

name: Deathwing, Mad Aspect
text: Battlecry: Attack ALL\nother minions.
flavor: Bite that one, bite that other one, claw this one, swallow that one whole....

name: Mana Giant
text:
[x]Costs (1) less for each
card you've played this
game that didn't start
in your deck.
flavor: Spell more and save more with a GIANT discount!

name: Murozond the Infinite
text: Battlecry: Play all cards your opponent played last_turn.
flavor: "Well, I'm glad YOU knew what I should be doing this turn."

name: Twin Tyrant
text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to two random enemy minions.
flavor: They can never agree on whether it's too hot or too cold.

name: Zzeraku the Warped
text: [x]Whenever your hero\ntakes damage, summon\na 6/6 Nether Drake.
flavor: The extra Z is for "zesty."

name: Dragonqueen Alexstrasza
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, add 2 other random Dragons to your hand. They cost (0).
flavor: Givin' lives and takin' names.

name: Sathrovarr
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a copy of it to_your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavor: Just wait until you also find a copy in your pocket. And your desk! And your FRIDGE!!

name: Ysera, Unleashed
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 7 Dream Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a random Dragon.
flavor: Releash the Dragon!

name: Boom Squad
text: Discover a Lackey, Mech, or Dragon.
flavor: Discover the meaning of squad goals.

name: Cleric of Scales
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a spell from your deck.
flavor: If she can't find a spell, it's a clerical error.

name: Fiendish Servant
text: [x]Deathrattle: Give this\nminion's Attack to a random\nfriendly minion.
flavor: Putting the "r" in fiend.

name: Risky Skipper
text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to all_minions.
flavor: Sworn enemy of the Safety Matey.

name: Air Raid
text: Twinspell\nSummon two 1/1 Silver_Hand Recruits with Taunt.
flavor: It's difficult to get an air raid together. You have to get twenty-five people, and they all want to play a paladin!

name: Explosive Evolution
text: Transform a minion into a random one that costs (3) more.
flavor: Let's give a big hand for goblin experimentation!

name: Fresh Scent
text: Twinspell\nGive a Beast +2/+2.
flavor: *Sniff, sniff* Elite troops... *sniff, sniff* ...armed to the teeth and... *sniff, sniff* ...BAAACON!

name: Licensed Adventurer
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control\na Quest, add a Coin\nto your hand.
flavor: "Just point me in the vague direction of the things you want smashed, and you got yourself a deal!"

name: Rising Winds
text: Twinspell\nChoose One - Draw a card; or Summon a 3/2_Eagle.
flavor: Do not talk to me or my chick ever again.

name: Shotbot
text: Reborn
flavor: Impact detected. Assuming hero pose.

name: Skyvateer
text: Stealth\nDeathrattle: Draw a card.
flavor: When you go without fruits in an airship, you get a nasty case of skyvy.

name: Steel Beetle
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, gain 5 Armor.
flavor: Steel you can trust—fashioned from the husk of an over-sized creepy-crawly.

name: Twisted Knowledge
text: Discover 2 Warlock cards.
flavor: People eat eight spiders in their sleep per year. Centaurs have two rib cages. Dwarves are just counterfeit titans.

name: Waxmancy
text: Discover a Battlecry minion. Reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor: The waxmancer works with flame and form, giving shape to figures warm. \n\nSome think he's a crazy creeper, but crafting minions is simply cheaper.

name: Arcane Amplifier
text: Your Hero Power deals 2_extra damage.
flavor: Not on good terms with warlocks.

name: Bomb Wrangler
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a_1/1 Boom Bot.
flavor: Bomb Wranglers tend to have short fuses and even shorter lifespans.

name: Chaos Gazer
text: [x]Battlecry: Curse a playable card in your opponent's hand. They have 1 turn to play it!
flavor: No matter the game rules, it's always playing Go Fish.

name: Chopshop Copter
text: After a friendly Mech dies, add a random Mech to your hand.
flavor: Invention is the mother of entropy.

name: Dark Prophecy
text: Discover a 2-Cost minion. Summon it and give it +3 Health.
flavor: It's always a dark prophecy with Madame Lazul. Where's my happy, fluffy prophecy?!

name: Skydiving Instructor
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a\n1-Cost minion from\nyour deck.
flavor: "Is it dangerous?"\n \n"For me? Not at all. Now jump!"

name: Escaped Manasaber
text: [x]Stealth Whenever this attacks, gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavor: Captive manasabers don't behave much better--they're always scratching your furniture and coughing up mana balls.

name: Frenzied Felwing
text: Costs (1) less for each damage dealt to your opponent this turn.
flavor: Not to be confused with the "friendsy” felwing.

name: Grand Lackey Erkh
text: After you play a Lackey, add a Lackey to your hand.
flavor: Esteemed leader of Rafaam's Inhuman Resources department.

name: Sky Gen'ral Kragg
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you've played a Quest this game, summon a 4/2 Parrot with Rush.
flavor: He's gunning for Sky Adm'ral.

name: The Fist of Ra-den
text: [x]After you cast a spell, summon a Legendary minion of that Cost. Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: The mighty Ra-den was known as the Keeper of Storms. Unfortunately, he could not keep his fist.

name: Boompistol Bully
text: Battlecry: Enemy Battlecry_cards cost (5)_more next turn.
flavor: Preventing insults with injuries.

name: Hailbringer
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 1/1\nIce Shards that Freeze.
flavor: Knows every way to greet someone.

name: Rotnest Drake
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, destroy a random\nenemy minion.
flavor: Clean your room, or I'm taking your favorite minion away!

name: Scalelord
text: Battlecry: Give your Murlocs Divine Shield.
flavor: It's about what they have in common, not what makes them different.

name: Shadow Sculptor
text: Combo: Draw a card for each card you've played this turn.
flavor: Carving out new territory in the realm of shadow puppetry.

name: Aeon Reaver
text: Battlecry: Deal damage to_a minion equal to its_Attack.
flavor: Ripping centuries asunder helps him manage his busy schedule.

name: Animated Avalanche
text: [x]Battlecry: If you played\nan Elemental last turn,\nsummon a copy of this.
flavor: Always sliding down mountains because it can't stop talking with its hands.

name: Winged Guardian
text: Taunt\nReborn\nElusive
flavor: Take these broken wings, be reborn, and learn to fly again.

name: Eye of the Storm
text: Summon three 5/6 Elementals with Taunt. Overload: (3)
flavor: If that's the eye, I would hate to see the rest of the storm.

name: The Amazing Reno
text: Battlecry: Make all minions disappear. *Poof!*
flavor: "Reno!" "Please address me by my proper title." " Amazing Reno..."

name: Aldor Attendant
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost_of your Librams by_(1) this game.
flavor: Will check to make sure you have a valid libramary card.

name: Blackjack Stunner
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a Secret, return a minion to its owner's hand. It costs (2) more.
flavor: "I'm about to ruin this 10-cost minion's whole career."

name: Crimson Sigil Runner
text: Outcast: Draw a card.
flavor: He's not the fastest of the bunch, but he'll take a stab at it anyway.

name: Ethereal Augmerchant
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it Spell Damage +1.
flavor: According to him, undamaged minions just spell problems.

name: Evocation
text: Fill your hand with random Mage spells.\nAt the end of your turn, discard them.
flavor: You too could be the winner of the national spelling spree!

name: Font of Power
text: Discover a Mage minion. If your deck has no minions, keep all 3.
flavor: It's Comic Sans.

name: Guardian Augmerchant
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it Divine Shield.
flavor: "What doesn't kill you makes me money!"

name: Helboar
text: Deathrattle: Give a random Beast in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Beasts love Helbacon Strips!

name: Imprisoned Gan'arg
text: Dormant for 2 turns.\nWhen this awakens,\nequip a 3/2 Axe.
flavor: Factory Direct Fiery War Axe. Please allow two turns for delivery.

name: Imprisoned Homunculus
text: Dormant for 2 turns.\nTaunt
flavor: He got a time out for excessive vulgarity.

name: Imprisoned Sungill
text: Dormant for 2 turns.\nWhen this awakens, summon two 1/1\nMurlocs.
flavor: Imprisoned for ten thousand years! Not because it's a demon. Because of the dancing.

name: Infectious Sporeling
text: After this damages a minion, turn it into an Infectious_Sporeling.
flavor: "The best thing about being me—there’s so many 'me's."

name: Reliquary of Souls
text: [x]Lifesteal Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Reliquary Prime' into your deck.
flavor: These three represent Anger, Desire, and Suffering. Much like raid night guild chat.

name: Renew
text: Restore #3 Health. Discover a spell.
flavor: I am rejuvenated, I am renewed, I am my own nightlight!

name: Rocket Augmerchant
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it Rush.
flavor: "Don't worry, this won't hurt me a bit."

name: Shadow Council
text: Replace your hand\nwith random Demons.\nGive them +2/+2.
flavor: Why is everybody in Outland replacing their hands?!

name: Soulbound Ashtongue
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, also deal that amount to your hero.
flavor: He claims to be "soulbound," but I just think he's clingy.

name: Spymistress
text: Stealth
flavor: Spies in Outland must blend into the environment. That means hot-pink gear and bright green hair. It’s a weird place.

name: Sword and Board
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Gain 2 Armor.
flavor: Stab and Slab. Charge and Targe. Slash and Bash. You get the idea.

name: Unstable Felbolt
text: Deal $3 damage to an enemy minion and a random friendly one.
flavor: Warning! Your minions are seated in the splash zone.

name: Ambush
text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a 2/3 Ambusher with Poisonous.
flavor: Clip-clop clip-clop CLIP-CLOP STAB!

name: Apexis Smuggler
text: After you play a Secret, Discover a spell.
flavor: "S-secrets? I don't have any! Whoa, look, a spell!"

name: Ashtongue Slayer
text: Battlecry: Give a Stealthed minion +3 Attack and Immune this turn.
flavor: Her other hand attachments include a corkscrew and a bottle opener.

name: Astromancer Solarian
text: [x]Spell Damage +1 Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Solarian Prime' into your deck.
flavor: Loyal to Kael'thas Sunstrider, this blood elf mage sought arcane power in the Void. Did she find it... or did IT find her?

name: Bamboozle
text: [x]Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, transform it into a random one that costs (3) more.
flavor: "WE DO YOU A BAMBOOZLE, HOOMAN!"

name: Bladestorm
text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. Repeat until one dies.
flavor:
Dear minions: 

Woosh, woosh, woosh, woosh, woosh.

Best regards,
Bladestorm

name: Bonechewer Brawler
text: [x]Taunt\nWhenever this minion takes\n_damage, gain +2 Attack.
flavor: When you get this swole, arrows are basically free acupuncture.

name: Corsair Cache
text: Draw a weapon.\nGive it +1/+1.
flavor: Where's a corsair's favorite place to hide treasure? Under their deck!

name: Dirty Tricks
text: [x]Secret: After your\nopponent casts a spell,\ndraw 2 cards.
flavor: "Ahh sand in my eyes! Also, I'm being stabbed."

name: Dragonmaw Sentinel
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Lifesteal.
flavor: On the side, she's training for the annual Dragonmaw hammer throw tournament.

name: Furious Felfin
text: [x]Battlecry: If your hero\nattacked this turn, gain\n+1 Attack and Rush.
flavor: Signature moves include Eye Bream, Feast of Soles, and Metamorphofish.

name: Hand of A'dal
text: Give a minion +2/+1.\nDraw a card.
flavor: When it meets the Hand of Gul'dan, they're SHAKING.

name: Immolation Aura
text: Deal $1 damage to all minions twice.
flavor: If you can't take the heat, stop standing in the fire.

name: Imprisoned Felmaw
text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns.\nWhen this awakens,\n__attack a random enemy.
flavor: It doesn't care who woke it up, someone's getting bitten.

name: Imprisoned Scrap Imp
text: Dormant for 2 turns.\nWhen this awakens,\ngive all minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: His impish imports imply impressively impetuous impropriety.

name: Imprisoned Vilefiend
text: Dormant for 2 turns.\nRush
flavor: If you do the time, you gotta make up the time.

name: Ironbark
text: Give a minion +1/+3 and Taunt.\nCosts (0) if you have at least 7 Mana Crystals.
flavor: "The important thing, son, is to protect your spores! I have spoken!"

name: Kanrethad Ebonlocke
text: [x]Your Demons cost (1) less. Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Kanrethad Prime' into your deck.
flavor: After Illidan's downfall, Kanrethad formed the Council of the Black Harvest to study Illidan's fel magic. Some say he was... green with envy.

name: Libram of Wisdom
text: [x]Give a minion +1/+1 and "Deathrattle: Add a 'Libram of Wisdom' spell to your hand."
flavor: The best wisdom is passed on.

name: Mo'arg Artificer
text: All minions take double damage from spells.
flavor: Double-damage. You know the drill.

name: Murgur Murgurgle
text: [x]Divine Shield Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Murgurgle Prime' into your deck.
flavor: Murlocs are not native to Outland. When the Sungills arrived, one among them rose to the challenge of this dark world. They call him... Murgurgle. Murgur Murgurgle.

name: Netherwalker
text: Battlecry: Discover a Demon.
flavor: You got to Nethercrawl before you can Netherwalk.

name: Pack Tactics
text: Secret: When a friendly minion is attacked, summon a 3/3 copy.
flavor: "Just you wait, I’ll go get on my main!"

name: Rustsworn Initiate
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Impcaster with\nSpell Damage +1.
flavor: The Rusted Legion's training leaves a little to be desired. He hasn't even had a tetanus shot yet!

name: Scavenger's Ingenuity
text: Draw a Beast.\nGive it +3/+3.
flavor: "A beast, barely alive. Gentlemen, we can rebuild it! Make it stronger, faster... spikier."

name: Sethekk Veilweaver
text: [x]After you cast a spell on\na minion, add a Priest\nspell to your hand.
flavor: The Sethekk weren't able to survive this long by being wasteful with their power. Or their wacky hats.

name: Shadowjeweler Hanar
text: [x]After you play a Secret,\nDiscover a Secret from\na different class.
flavor: What is a shadowjeweler? A miserable little pile of secrets.

name: Spectral Sight
text: [x]Draw a card.\nOutcast: Draw another.
flavor: "Pick a card, any card! Preferably the left- or right-most card."

name: Starscryer
text: Deathrattle: Draw a spell.
flavor: Often grieves with the Starsweeper.

name: Akama
text: [x]Stealth\nDeathrattle: Shuffle 'Akama\nPrime' into your deck.
flavor: "To many of my people, I am known as a traitor... as Illidan's lapdog. I will remain in the shadows, for now... Actually, maybe I'll just remain in the shadows forever."

name: Apotheosis
text: Give a minion +2/+3 and Lifesteal.
flavor: Defined as the absolute pinnacle of existence. Plus Lifesteal.

name: Archspore Msshi'fn
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Msshi'fn Prime' into your deck.
flavor: Brave leader of the Sporeggar. Guided by the philosophy that one should not mssh with matters that are not one's msshiness.

name: Augmented Porcupine
text: [x]Deathrattle: Deal this minion's Attack damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Pokey-man. Gotta spike 'em all!

name: Blistering Rot
text: [x]At the end of your turn,\nsummon a Rot with stats\nequal to this minion's.
flavor: Known as 'Fel Gel' to the Illidari, it's excellent protection against harsh Draenic sunshine.

name: Bogbeam
text: Deal $3 damage to_a minion.\nCosts (0) if you have at least 7 Mana Crystals.
flavor: Some think the mysterious bright lights in the bog are alien invaders, others think they're just swamp gas. Turns out, it's just druids.

name: Bogstrok Clacker
text: Battlecry: Transform adjacent minions into random minions that cost (1) more.
flavor: This clacker's crackers for hacking slackers into whack attackers.

name: Bonechewer Raider
text: Battlecry: If there is a damaged minion, gain +1/+1 and Rush.
flavor: And if that minion has a frisbee, LOOK OUT!

name: Bulwark of Azzinoth
text: [x]Whenever your hero would\ntake damage, this loses\n_1 Durability instead.
flavor: This plate turned shield you shall wield, praying its powers fel will serve you well.

name: Darkglare
text: After your hero takes damage, refresh a Mana_Crystal.
flavor: He's got a dark glare, but he sees crystal clear!

name: Dragonmaw Overseer
text: At the end of your turn, give another friendly minion +2/+2.
flavor: Ah, the Booterang... nothing cures peon laziness faster.

name: Frozen Shadoweaver
text: Battlecry: Freeze an_enemy.
flavor: She still wears her Frozen Shadoweave set despite the many, many nerfs. She just can't let it go!

name: Fungal Fortunes
text: Draw 3 cards. Discard any minions drawn.
flavor: Far superior to a beanstalk boondoggle.

name: Greyheart Sage
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control\na Stealthed minion,\ndraw 2 cards.
flavor: "What am I drinking again?"

name: Imprisoned Observer
text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Currently serving two turns on charges of aggravated minion slaughter.

name: Imprisoned Satyr
text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, reduce the Cost of a random minion in your hand by (5).
flavor: "C'mon down to Illhoof's bargain bin! When the satyr's free, he'll lower your fee!"

name: Lady Vashj
text: [x]Spell Damage +1\nDeathrattle: Shuffle 'Vashj\nPrime' into your deck.
flavor: Personal handmaiden to Queen Azshara turned lieutenant to Illidan Stormrage. Also quite the hair sssstylist.

name: Marshspawn
text: Battlecry: If you cast\na spell last turn,\nDiscover a spell.
flavor: Hopes to someday promote to Marshsqueen.

name: Netherwind Portal
text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, summon a random\n4-Cost minion.
flavor: More aromatic than a regular portal.

name: Overconfident Orc
text: Taunt\nWhile at full Health,\nthis has +2 Attack.
flavor: "I am da powerful! You are da poop!"

name: Serpentshrine Portal
text: Deal $3 damage. Summon a random 3-Cost minion. Overload: (1)
flavor: This is why you never flush a three-cost minion.

name: Teron Gorefiend
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy all other friendly minions. Deathrattle: Resummon them with +1/+1.
flavor: "You’re fine, friendly minions! You're fine! Don’t tell Mom!"

name: Terrorguard Escapee
text: Battlecry: Summon three 1/1 Huntresses for your_opponent.
flavor: Poor guy is terrified, look at his faces.

name: Totemic Reflection
text: Give a minion +2/+2.\nIf it's a Totem, summon a copy of it.
flavor: "Upon reflection, I have decided that your board needs more ME."

name: Underlight Angling Rod
text: After your Hero attacks, add a random Murloc to your hand.
flavor: "I said I wanted the ASHbringer not FISHbringer!"

name: Warmaul Challenger
text: Battlecry: Choose\nan enemy minion.\nBattle it to the death!
flavor: Old gladiator rules: first one to die loses.

name: Zixor, Apex Predator
text: [x]Rush\nDeathrattle: Shuffle 'Zixor\nPrime' into your deck.
flavor: A living terror. Teleports at will. Feasts on tainted helboar meat. No head scritches unless you're Leoroxx.

name: Ashtongue Battlelord
text: Taunt\nLifesteal
flavor: Demons have destroyed the lives of the Ashtongue draenei. Now he’s got a shoulder-axe to grind.

name: Burrowing Scorpid
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.\nIf that kills the target,\ngain Stealth.
flavor: It's a game of hide and go sting.

name: Disguised Wanderer
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 9/1 Inquisitor.
flavor: He wanders east... always into the east.

name: Felfin Navigator
text: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs +1/+1.
flavor: Return my fishes to me, and I myself shall carry you to the gates of Mrrhalla!

name: Germination
text: Summon a copy of a friendly minion.\nGive the copy Taunt.
flavor: I regret asking how sporelings are made.

name: Incanter's Flow
text: Reduce the Cost of spells in your deck by_(1).
flavor: "Gettin' them discounts in bulk amounts, spells can come, and spells can go, castin' costs drop with my sweet, sweet flow."

name: Kargath Bladefist
text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Kargath Prime' into your deck.
flavor: He rules the Shattered Hand orc clan with an iron... bladefist.

name: Kayn Sunfury
text: Charge\nAll friendly attacks ignore_Taunt.
flavor: "Armor and heals may slow my zeal, but fel and glaives excite me!"

name: Magtheridon
text: [x]Dormant. Battlecry: Summon three 1/3 enemy Warders. When they die, destroy all minions and awaken.
flavor: Came from another world to invade Outland and bend it to his will… only to be overthrown by an elf from another world who invaded Outland and bent it to his will.

name: Maiev Shadowsong
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion.\nIt goes Dormant for 2 turns.
flavor: Go directly to Demon Jail. Do not attack minions, do not collect mana crystals.

name: Metamorphosis
text: Swap your Hero Power to "Deal 5 damage." After 2 uses, swap it back.
flavor: As the humble caterpillar becomes a beautiful butterfly, so too does a demon hunter become a hideous mass of writhing destruction and unfettered chaos.

name: Mok'Nathal Lion
text: Rush. Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Gain a copy of its Deathrattle.
flavor: Never underestimate a lioness when her pride is on the line.

name: Nightshade Matron
text: Rush\nBattlecry: Discard your highest Cost card.
flavor: Throws shade at those "high-cost" minions.

name: Overgrowth
text: Gain two empty Mana_Crystals.
flavor: Zangarmarsh: it's a fungal out there!

name: Replicat-o-tron
text: At the end of your turn, transform a neighbor into a copy of this.
flavor: According to the Boom Labs sales brochure, it "impractically makes itself!"

name: Rustsworn Cultist
text: [x]Battlecry: Give your\nother minions "Deathrattle:\nSummon a 1/1 Demon."
flavor: "Rust… I love it. It's all coarse, and rough, and irritating. And it gets everywhere."

name: Scrap Shot
text: Deal $3 damage.\nGive a random Beast in_your hand +3/+3.
flavor: Make your foe's armor your fauna's fashion!

name: The Dark Portal
text: Draw a minion. If you have at least 8 cards in hand, it costs (5) less.
flavor: Some say it's the source of Azeroth's greatest problems—aside from the gnomes.

name: Torrent
text: [x]Deal $8 damage to a\nminion. Costs (3) less if\nyou cast a spell last turn.
flavor: Weeks of underwater cross-training have really built up her fourarms.

name: Vivid Spores
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
flavor: Hey man, I just feel like... death is just a construct of our imaginations, ya know?

name: Al'ar
text: Deathrattle: Summon a\n 0/3 Ashes of Al'ar that resurrects this minion on your next turn.
flavor: Week #679: Still no mount...

name: Aldor Truthseeker
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of your Librams by (2) this game.
flavor: It’s under 'T.'

name: Apexis Blast
text: Deal $5 damage.\nIf your deck has no minions, summon a random 5-Cost minion.
flavor: Lonely mages can still have a blast!

name: Boggspine Knuckles
text: After your hero attacks, transform your minions into random ones that cost (1) more.
flavor: I would NOT want to put my hand in there. It's... SQUISHY.

name: Glowfly Swarm
text: Summon a 2/2 Glowfly for each spell in your_hand.
flavor: Glowflies are distant relations to spelling bees.

name: Imprisoned Antaen
text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Can I get a pair of size XXXXXL manacles?

name: Libram of Justice
text: Equip a 1/4 weapon. Change the Health of all enemy minions to 1.
flavor: Proper justice. Throw the book at him!

name: Psyche Split
text: Give a minion +1/+2. Summon a copy of it.
flavor: This is how the arakkoa make friends.

name: Ruststeed Raider
text: Taunt, Rush\nBattlecry: Gain +4 Attack this turn.
flavor: Three-time winner (and sole survivor) of the Crashes of Outland motocross!

name: Scrap Golem
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Gain Armor equal to this minion's Attack.
flavor: Abuse, reuse, recycle.

name: Shattered Rumbler
text: Battlecry: If you cast a spell last turn, deal 2 damage to all other minions.
flavor: HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO THE GROUND!

name: Warglaives of Azzinoth
text: After attacking a minion, your hero may attack again.
flavor: The blades glow green from things unseen, dark dreams whirling in the felfire gleam.

name: Waste Warden
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to\na minion and all others of\nthe same minion type.
flavor: Recycle that can, or you get the cuffs!

name: Dragonmaw Sky Stalker
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/4 Dragonrider.
flavor: "I will find you, sky!"

name: Fel Summoner
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random Demon from your_hand.
flavor: All's well that ends fel when the fel summoner summons well.

name: Hand of Gul'dan
text: When you play\nor discard this,\ndraw 3 cards.
flavor: His skull also draws three cards. Imagine how many cards he could draw with HIS ENTIRE BODY!

name: Kael'thas Sunstrider
text: Every third spell you cast each turn costs (1).
flavor: “Descent of Dragons was merely a set back!”

name: Keli'dan the Breaker
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a minion. If drawn this turn, instead destroy all minions except this one.
flavor: He calms down a lot if you just give him a turn.

name: Scavenging Shivarra
text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage randomly split among all_other minions.
flavor: Say what you want but finding a matching set of six swords takes commitment.

name: Skull of Gul'dan
text: Draw 3 cards.\nOutcast: Reduce their Cost by (3).
flavor: A fellow of evil possessed, of most devious shadow. He hath turned on his kin a thousand times, and now, how abhorred in all imagination he is!

name: The Lurker Below
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to an enemy minion. If it dies, repeat on one of its neighbors.
flavor: "Throw it back! THROW IT BACK!"

name: Bloodboil Brute
text: Rush\nCosts (1) less for each damaged minion.
flavor: Call Gurtogg a brute if you like, but no one else cares about the wounded like he does.

name: Bonechewer Vanguard
text: [x]Taunt\nWhenever this minion takes\ndamage, gain +2 Attack.
flavor: She came here to taunt you and chew on bones, and she's all outta bones.

name: Cursed Vagrant
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 7/5 Shadow with Stealth.
flavor: Little did he know… it was really the talbuk leg that was cursed.

name: Lady Liadrin
text: [x]Battlecry: Add a copy of each spell you cast on friendly characters this game to your hand.
flavor: When it comes to spells, she loves 'em then she librams.

name: Marsh Hydra
text: [x]Rush After this attacks, add a random 8-Cost minion to your hand.
flavor: Three heads of marsh-mashing, bog-bashing, swamp-stomping fury!

name: Priestess of Fury
text: At the end of your turn, deal 6 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Furious that she only has six warglaives. The Sightless Watcher has eight! The fel is always greener on the other side.

name: Skeletal Dragon
text: [x]Taunt\nAt the end of your turn, add\na Dragon to your hand.
flavor: I wish to complain about this dragon what I purchased not half an hour ago from this very boutique.

name: Soul Mirror
text: Summon copies of enemy minions. They attack their copies.
flavor: It’s a doppelgang-war!

name: Beastmaster Leoroxx
text: Battlecry: Summon 3 Beasts from your hand.
flavor: Father of Rexxar, Champion of the Horde, and Flexxar, Champion of the Gym.

name: Coilfang Warlord
text: [x]Rush\nDeathrattle: Summon a\n 5/9 Warlord with Taunt.
flavor: Prepare for the staunch conch launch!

name: Deep Freeze
text: Freeze an enemy. Summon two 3/6 Water Elementals.
flavor: "Dancing with the Satyrs… on Ice!"

name: Enhanced Dreadlord
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon a 5/5\nDreadlord with Lifesteal.
flavor: Photo actually taken across the street in the reflection of a doorknob.

name: Supreme Abyssal
text: Can't attack heroes.
flavor: Yet, you still feel attacked.

name: Libram of Hope
text: Restore 8 Health. Summon an 8/8 Guardian with Taunt and_Divine Shield.
flavor: "Think you got lethal? Libram of NOPE!"

name: Pit Commander
text: Taunt\nAt the end of your turn, summon a Demon from your deck.
flavor: "Pit! Do as I say!"

name: Ysiel Windsinger
text: Your spells cost (1).
flavor: Reach down into your lungs. The wind that resides there is your greatest treasure. It provides the gift of song, which is free. \n*But not less than (1)

name: Nagrand Slam
text: Summon four 3/5 Clefthoofs that attack random enemies.
flavor: Come on and slam, and welcome to Nagrand!

name: Scrapyard Colossus
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 7/7 Felcracked Colossus with Taunt.
flavor: Heap on heapin' on.

name: Desk Imp
flavor: "I feel inky!"

name: Lightning Bloom
text: Refresh 2 Mana Crystals.\nOverload: (2)
flavor: Curiously, this plant never blooms in the same place twice.

name: Raise Dead
text: Deal $3 damage to your hero. Return two friendly minions that died this game to your hand.
flavor: Technically, it’s just really late healing.

name: Adorable Infestation
text: Give a minion +1/+1. Summon a 1/1 Cub. Add a Cub to your hand.
flavor: Some cards are strong by sheer power; others draw strength from love.

name: Animated Broomstick
text: Rush\nBattlecry: Give your other minions Rush.
flavor: "Blimey, that's a Stratocumulus 1000!"

name: Athletic Studies
text: Discover a Rush minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: It's a quick read.

name: Brain Freeze
text: Freeze a minion. Combo: Also deal $3 damage to it.
flavor: "The professor called on me, and I totally froze!"

name: Carrion Studies
text: Discover a Deathrattle minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: A good read but a little too much fluff.

name: Demon Companion
text: Summon a random Demon Companion.
flavor: Owning a pet can be real hell at times.

name: Demonic Studies
text: Discover a Demon. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: "Do you wanna summon a demon? I wanna summon a demon!"

name: Devolving Missiles
text:
[x]Shoot three missiles
at random enemy minions
that transform them into
ones that cost (1) less.
flavor: Most intermural spell-dueling contests end with a field of wisps.

name: Double Jump
text: Draw an Outcast card from your deck.
flavor: The key to every speed run.

name: Draconic Studies
text: [x]Discover a Dragon. Your\nnext one costs (1) less.
flavor: Our Draconic Studies program has a high rate of burnout.

name: Felosophy
text: [x]Copy the lowest Cost\nDemon in your hand.\nOutcast: Give both +1/+1.
flavor: "Like, isn't evil subjective man?"

name: First Day of School
text: Add 2 random 1-Cost minions to your hand.
flavor: "Report to the bookstore to buy your books, the alchemist to buy your potions, and then get your wands at the… wandryroom?"

name: Frazzled Freshman
flavor: "Late to bed, early to rise, makes a student unable to open her eyes."

name: Intrepid Initiate
text: Spellburst: Gain +2_Attack.
flavor: How you like them apples?

name: Lab Partner
text: Spell Damage +1
flavor: "Professor, a gnome burned my homework!"

name: Nature Studies
text: Discover a spell. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: "I have a first edition! Go ahead, count the rings."

name: Overwhelm
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Deal one more damage for each Beast you control.
flavor: Scholomance student Brewfest prank gone terribly, terribly awry.

name: Partner Assignment
text: Add a random 2-Cost and 3-Cost Beast to_your hand.
flavor: In every group assignment, someone does all the legwork.

name: Pen Flinger
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion. Spellburst: Return this to_your hand.
flavor: The pen is also a more aerodynamic short-range projectile than the sword.

name: Primordial Studies
text: Discover a Spell Damage minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: A long forgotten tome whose very essence seeps of magic. 40 dust, used.

name: Secret Passage
text: Replace your hand with 4 cards from your deck. Swap back next turn.
flavor: I use this to sneak out at night and do some villainous baking in the kitchen.

name: Shield of Honor
text: Give a damaged minion +3 Attack and Divine Shield.
flavor: "Sir, this shield would've been more helpful last turn!"

name: Sphere of Sapience
text:
[x]At the start of your turn,
look at your top card. You
can put it on the bottom
_and lose 1 Durability.
flavor: This is what it sounds like when spheres scry.

name: Spirit Jailer
text: Battlecry: Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
flavor: "Sure, they're in your deck, but the mind is like, the REAL prison."

name: Tour Guide
text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power costs (0).
flavor: "Here is the original blueprint for the Academy grounds! Don't mind those so-called dark chambers… They'll be at the end of the tour."

name: Trueaim Crescent
text: After your Hero attacks a minion, your minions attack it too.
flavor: You could have just pointed.

name: Wand Thief
text: Combo: Discover a Mage_spell.
flavor: "What’re ya buyin’?”

name: Wave of Apathy
text: Set the Attack of all enemy minions to 1 until your next turn.
flavor: "Flavor text? Eh. Can’t be bothered."

name: Wolpertinger
text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this.
flavor: Scholomance student Brewfest prank gone awry.

name: Argent Braggart
text: [x]Battlecry: Set this minion's\nAttack and Health to the\nhighest in the battlefield.
flavor: Not sure why he's bragging, he's got the same stats as the next guy.

name: Boneweb Egg
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon two 2/1 Spiders. If you discard this, trigger its Deathrattle.
flavor: Noblegarden is going to be really exciting this year!

name: Cram Session
text: Draw $1 |4(card, cards) (improved by Spell Damage).
flavor: The font of the arcane gives nearly limitless access to power and energy! But it can't keep you awake, for that we still use coffee.

name: Cult Neophyte
text: Battlecry: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more next_turn.
flavor: Make a new recruit's deficiencies your efficiencies.

name: Diligent Notetaker
text: Spellburst: Return the spell to your hand.
flavor: You never know what cards are going to be on the test.

name: Gibberling
text: Spellburst: Summon a Gibberling.
flavor: "As a Linguistics student I have studied the Gibberlings. I have determined they are speaking Gibberish."

name: In Formation!
text: Add 2 random Taunt minions to your hand.
flavor: None can doubt the strength of the Scholomance student body.

name: Manafeeder Panthara
text: Battlecry: If you've used your Hero Power this turn, draw a card.
flavor: Feeds on mana, crystal kibble, and whatever it was you were just snacking on.

name: Plagiarize
text: Secret: At the end of your opponent's turn, add copies of the cards they played to your hand.
flavor: Copying is just using your resources wisely.

name: Power Word: Feast
text: Give a minion +2/+2. Restore it to full Health at the end of this turn.
flavor: Some people are here for the stellar, world-renowned academic program. Others are here for the buffet.

name: Rune Dagger
text: After your hero attacks, gain Spell Damage +1 this turn.
flavor: Turns out being stabbed makes you more vulnerable to magic.

name: Sneaky Delinquent
text: Stealth. Deathrattle: Add a 3/1 Ghost with Stealth to your hand.
flavor: All right, now open your lid and say "Ahh!"

name: Soul Shear
text: [x]Deal $3 damage to a\nminion. Shuffle 2 Soul\nFragments into your deck.
flavor: "Just a little off the sides please."

name: Transfer Student
text: This has different effects based on which game board you're on.
flavor:
Oh, the places you'll go!
There is so much to fight!
There are boards to be explored.
There are dreams to take flight.

name: Trick Totem
text: At the end of your turn, cast a random spell that costs (3) or less.
flavor: It knows how to sit still and do tricks. Still working on rolling over, though.

name: Wandmaker
text: Battlecry: Add a 1-Cost spell from your class to_your hand.
flavor: She creates incredibly affordable wands of all shapes and sizes. But not owls. The owl is all-natural.

name: Ace Hunter Kreen
text: Your other characters are Immune while attacking.
flavor: This grandmaster marksman loves winning tournaments and eating a bit of ice cream.

name: Bloated Python
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/4 Hapless Handler.
flavor: This is why Scholomance engineering students prefer C++.

name: Ceremonial Maul
text: Spellburst: Summon a Student with Taunt and stats equal to the spell's Cost.
flavor: For the most discerning of hall monitors.

name: Coerce
text: Destroy a damaged minion. Combo: Destroy any minion.
flavor: "Give me your lunch money, or the sandwich gets it!"

name: Combustion
text: [x]Deal $4 damage to\na minion. Any excess\ndamages both neighbors.
flavor: Sally is friends with three Silverhand Recruits conveniently standing in a line. After casting this spell, how many friends does she have left? (Show your work.)

name: Educated Elekk
text: [x]Whenever a spell is played, this minion remembers it. Deathrattle: Shuffle the spells into your deck.
flavor: "This reminds me of a saying. 'An elekk never…' something. I can't remember."

name: Enchanted Cauldron
text: Spellburst: Cast a random spell of the same Cost.
flavor: Do you smell what the cauldron is cooking? If so, we apologize.

name: Firebrand
text: Spellburst: Deal 4 damage randomly split among all_enemy minions.
flavor: Too cool for school, too hot for thought.

name: Gift of Luminance
text: Give a minion Divine Shield, then summon a_1/1 copy of it.
flavor: You get a small version of yourself in a snow globe to remember the moment.

name: Goody Two-Shields
text: Divine Shield\nSpellburst: Gain Divine Shield.
flavor: These are my shields. There are at least two like them, and both are mine.

name: Instructor Fireheart
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell that costs (1) or more. If you play it this turn, repeat this effect.
flavor: When you have fire in your heart, even death can't stop you.

name: Lord Barov
text: [x]Battlecry: Set the Health of all other minions to 1. Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavor: Alexei Barov stayed at Scholomance despite leasing it to Kel’Thuzad. He says it’s for "supervision."

name: Magehunter
text: Rush\nWhenever this attacks a minion, Silence it.
flavor: Hates waiting. Abhors chit chat. Fond of the color purple.

name: Mindrender Illucia
text: [x]Battlecry: Replace your hand with a copy of your opponent's until end of turn.
flavor: "…and that's how I ended up with a Murloc Cultural Studies major."

name: Molten Blast
text: Deal $2 damage. Summon that many 1/1 Elementals.
flavor: Well, how would YOU celebrate after finals week?!

name: Playmaker
text: [x]After you play a Rush\nminion, summon a copy\n_with 1 Health remaining.
flavor: "Here's the plan: you go left, I go right, and the wounded guy takes the hit."

name: Professor Slate
text: Your spells are Poisonous.
flavor: "Don’t worry, this will be over in a second. It might FEEL like an eternity, but I assure you, it’s quite quick!"

name: Robes of Protection
text: Your minions have Elusive.
flavor: Warning: Robes of Protection are intended for targeted effects only and are not an effective defense against Flamestrike, Twisting Nether, or other AOE attacks.

name: School Spirits
text: [x]Deal $2 damage to all\nminions. Shuffle 2 Soul\nFragments into your deck.
flavor: "B-E A-G-G-R-E-S-S-I-V-E!"

name: Self-Sharpening Sword
text: After your hero attacks, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: You no longer have to bring a stack of #2 swords to a test!

name: Shadowlight Scholar
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to deal 3 damage.
flavor: Imagine having the power of soul magic and using it as a reading light.

name: Shan'do Wildclaw
text: [x]Choose One - Give Beasts in your deck +1/+1; or Transform into a copy of a friendly Beast.
flavor: She holds both an academic post and a scratching post.

name: Shardshatter Mystic
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to deal 3 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Enjoys a good soul-crushing defeat.

name: Speaker Gidra
text: [x]Rush, Windfury Spellburst: Gain Attack and Health equal to the spell's Cost.
flavor: If a teacher lectures in a forest, does she even make a sound?

name: Voracious Reader
text: At the end of your turn, draw until you have 3 cards.
flavor: But how much of it is skimming?

name: Vulpera Toxinblade
text: Your weapon has +2_Attack.
flavor: The blade works well enough on its own… but this is just in case.

name: Brittlebone Destroyer
text: [x]Battlecry: If your hero's\nHealth changed this turn,\ndestroy a minion.
flavor: Broke many a leg in drama class.

name: Cabal Acolyte
text: [x]Taunt Spellburst: Gain control of a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
flavor: How did he get to the top of his class? He pulled a few strings!

name: Crimson Hothead
text: Spellburst: Gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
flavor: Has a real passion for spelling.

name: Disciplinarian Gandling
text: [x]After you play a minion,\ndestroy it and summon a\n4/4 Failed Student.
flavor: "He doesn’t grade on a curve, but on a sharp spike instead."

name: Divine Rager
text: Divine Shield
flavor: For when you need to rage, rage against the dying of the Light.

name: Fishy Flyer
text: Rush. Deathrattle: Add a_4/3 Ghost with Rush to_your hand.
flavor: Like a fish out of water.

name: Glide
text: [x]Shuffle your hand into your deck. Draw 4 cards. Outcast: Your opponent does the same.
flavor: "Come with me, and you'll see, a whole new hand of possibly the same cards."

name: Groundskeeper
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, restore 5 Health.
flavor: It’s tricky for dryads to tend the garden without trampling the flowers.

name: High Abbess Alura
text: Spellburst: Cast a spell from your deck (targets this if possible).
flavor: She's all about hitting the books. Literally.

name: Infiltrator Lilian
text: [x]Stealth Deathrattle: Summon a 4/2 Forsaken Lilian that attacks a random enemy.
flavor: She'll get to the bottom of this even if it kills her. Twice!

name: Krolusk Barkstripper
text: Spellburst: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: My friend went krolusk tipping once… once!

name: Lorekeeper Polkelt
text: [x]Battlecry: Reorder your deck\nfrom the highest Cost card\nto the lowest Cost card.
flavor: quicksort [] = [] quicksort (x:xs) = quicksort small ++ (x : quicksort large) where small = [y | y <- xs, y <= x] large = [y | y <- xs, y > x]

name: Marrowslicer
text: Battlecry: Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
flavor: Perfect for killing the first boss in Icecrown Citadel.

name: Potion of Illusion
text: Add 1/1 copies of your minions to your hand. They cost (1).
flavor: Unfortunately, there's no potion that can make you unsee all the faces in that bottle.

name: Reaper's Scythe
text: [x]Spellburst: Also\ndamages adjacent\nminions this turn.
flavor: Die. Die. Die.

name: Shifty Sophomore
text: Stealth\nSpellburst: Add a Combo card to your hand.
flavor: Experienced enough to do crimes, inexperienced enough to be super obvious about it.

name: Star Student Stelina
text: [x]Outcast: Look at 3 cards in your opponent's hand. Shuffle one of them into their deck.
flavor: Cheating is just using your resources wisely.

name: Steeldancer
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a random\nminion with Cost equal to\nyour weapon's Attack.
flavor: Pretty powerful if you blade your cards right.

name: Vilefiend Trainer
text: Outcast: Summon two 1/1_Demons.
flavor: My Vilefiend Trainers give me a much better sprint than my Air Gul'dans.

name: Wretched Tutor
text: Spellburst: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
flavor: "If you like my tutoring, you'll love my sister the art therapist, my father the driver, and my mother the housekeeper."

name: Wyrm Weaver
text: Spellburst: Summon two 1/3 Mana Wyrms.
flavor: Studied basket weaving as an undergrad.

name: Blessing of Authority
text: Give a minion +8/+8. It_can't attack heroes this turn.
flavor: A paladin fights with honor! We don't go face... until next turn!

name: Blood Herald
text: Whenever a friendly minion dies while this is in your hand, gain +1/+1.
flavor: "Red Blood, it gives you wings."

name: Cutting Class
text: [x]Draw 2 cards.\nCosts (1) less per Attack\nof your weapon.
flavor: When you actually are the sharpest tool in the shed.

name: Doctor Krastinov
text: Rush\nWhenever this attacks, give your weapon +1/+1.
flavor: He is not a medical doctor.

name: Headmaster Kel'Thuzad
text: Spellburst: If the spell destroys any minions, summon them.
flavor: "You wish to know my secrets, hmm? I carry little bits of tuna in the sleeves of my robe, he loves that. Oh, you meant the risen dead? That was trivial, trivial."

name: Jandice Barov
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two random 5-Cost minions. Secretly pick one that dies _when it takes damage.
flavor: Her parents own Scholomance. Of course she's going to play tricks on the students!

name: Lake Thresher
text: Also damages the minions next to whomever\nthis attacks.
flavor: "There’s a monster in the lake?!" \n"That’s not a monster, that’s Gary."

name: Mozaki, Master Duelist
text: After you cast a spell, gain Spell Damage +1.
flavor: Treats her students like her peers, which means defeating them in one-sided duels all day long.

name: Ogremancer
text: [x]Whenever your opponent\ncasts a spell, summon a 2/2\nSkeleton with Taunt.
flavor: After their third attempt, Tharg began to suspect that Krul was summoning the skeletons on purpose.

name: Ras Frostwhisper
text: At the end of your turn,\ndeal $1 damage to all enemies (improved by Spell Damage).
flavor: Always the favorite of Headmaster Kel'Thuzad, Ras nonetheless received a chilly reception from the other faculty.

name: Soulshard Lapidary
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to give your hero +5 Attack this turn.
flavor: Also known as a soul sequincer.

name: Steward of Scrolls
text: Spell Damage +1\nBattlecry: Discover a spell.
flavor: Oh dang it, I spilled ink elemental all over my essay!

name: Teacher's Pet
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon a\nrandom 3-Cost Beast.
flavor: Really goes the extra mile to get the Hay+.

name: Totem Goliath
text: Deathrattle: Summon all four basic Totems.\nOverload: (1)
flavor: It was an art project, and nobody knew when to stop.

name: Twilight Runner
text: Stealth\nWhenever this attacks, draw 2 cards.
flavor: Every morning you find two dead cards at your doorstep.

name: Vectus
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps. Each gains a Deathrattle from your minions that died this game.
flavor: Don’t let that dark magic worry you. He’ll ensure they hatch without a scratch.

name: Void Drinker
text: [x]Taunt. Battlecry: Destroy\na Soul Fragment in your\ndeck to gain +3/+3.
flavor: It has no taste.

name: Devout Pupil
text: [x]Divine Shield, Taunt Costs (1) less for each spell you've cast on friendly characters this game.
flavor: He considers textbooks Light reading.

name: Forest Warden Omu
text: Spellburst: Refresh your Mana Crystals.
flavor: She wishes all things could grow and flourish at Scholomance. If only she knew…

name: Initiation
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. If that kills it, summon a new copy.
flavor: The things a murloc's gotta go through to graduate from Scholomance…

name: Judicious Junior
text: Lifesteal
flavor: She's judge, jury, and junior!

name: Onyx Magescribe
text: Spellburst: Add 2 random spells from your class to_your hand.
flavor: Sometimes you gotta spend spells to earn spells.

name: Runic Carvings
text: Choose One - Summon four 2/2 Treant Totems; or Overload: (2) to summon them with Rush.
flavor: "That totem was beautiful… and you runed it!"

name: Smug Senior
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Add a_5/7 Ghost with Taunt to_your hand.
flavor: You want to see something funny? Go visit him in five years.

name: Sorcerous Substitute
text: Battlecry: If you have Spell Damage, summon a copy of this.
flavor: This substitute's substitution is a dangerous institution.

name: Commencement
text: Summon a minion from your deck. Give it Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: "Remember, graduates—you carry a heavy weight on your shoulders now."

name: Cycle of Hatred
text: Deal $3 damage to all minions. Summon a 3/3 Spirit for every minion killed.
flavor: If you run 2 of these, would that make it the bi-cycle of hatred?

name: Fel Guardians
text: Summon three 1/2 Demons with Taunt. Costs (1) less whenever a_friendly minion dies.
flavor: What happened after the guardians tripped? They Fel.

name: Guardian Animals
text: Summon two Beasts that cost (5) or less from your deck. Give_them Rush.
flavor: The guidelines specifically state: "Students may also bring an ironbeak owl OR an alleycat OR a toad." They never said how big.

name: Keymaster Alabaster
text: [x]Whenever your opponent\n_draws a card, add a copy to_\n_your hand that costs (1).
flavor: The key to his mastery is a solid stack of backup copies.

name: Soulciologist Malicia
text: Battlecry: For each Soul Fragment in your deck, summon a 3/3 Soul with Rush.@ (@)
flavor: If you value your life, don't call it a "soft science."

name: Archwitch Willow
text: Battlecry: Summon a random Demon from your hand and deck.
flavor: One of the demons will do all the work while the other gets the same grade.

name: Plagued Protodrake
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 7-Cost minion.
flavor: "What’s in the drake?! WHAT’S IN THE DRAKE?"

name: Tidal Wave
text: Lifesteal\nDeal $3 damage to\nall minions.
flavor: "Hang Four, mon!"

name: Troublemaker
text: At the end of your turn, summon two 3/3 Ruffians that attack random enemies.
flavor: "Prepare for trouble!"\n"Make it double!"

name: Turalyon, the Tenured
text: [x]Rush. Whenever this attacks\na minion, set the defender's\nAttack and Health to 3.
flavor: "Let evil flee before righteousness; let the innocent live in peace. Let the day come when none need fear. For that day, I give my life gladly."

name: Ancient Void Hound
text: [x]At the end of your turn,\nsteal 1 Attack and Health\nfrom all enemy minions.
flavor: What happened to my 1/1 Void Pup? And the glee club?!

name: Rattlegore
text: Deathrattle: Resummon this with -1/-1.
flavor: He looks bad now, but he was pretty handsome in his 20/20s.

name: Flesh Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each time your hero's Health changed during your turns.
flavor: "A BIG mistake."

name: Survival of the Fittest
text: Give +4/+4 to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavor: Sometimes the fittest is the one smart enough to not start a fight with seven 6/6 Treants.

name: Blur
text: Your hero can't take damage this turn.
flavor: "What are you trying to tell me? That I can dodge axes?" \n"I’m trying to tell you that when you’re a Demon Hunter, you won’t have to."

name: Battlefiend
text: After your hero attacks, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: Say what you like about my hatchet-headed hooligan, he’s my battle-friend.

name: Consume Magic
text: Silence an enemy_minion.\nOutcast: Draw a card.
flavor: Please be mindful when consuming raw or undercooked magic.

name: Feast of Souls
text: Draw a card for each friendly minion that died this turn.@ (@)
flavor: Nothing fills you up like soul food!

name: Mana Burn
text: Your opponent has 2 fewer Mana Crystals next turn.
flavor: One way to ensure that they are not prepared.

name: Twin Slice
text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. Add 'Second Slice' to your hand.
flavor: The slice so nice, it'll cut you twice.

name: Ur'zul Horror
text: Deathrattle: Add a 2/1 Lost Soul to your hand.
flavor: You face face face face face Jaraxxus!

name: Umberwing
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Felwings.
flavor: Demon Hunters refer to these glaives as "the ol’ flappy-attackys."

name: Blade Dance
text: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to 3 random enemy minions.
flavor: The surest way to clear the dance floor.

name: Eye Beam
text: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to a minion.\nOutcast: This costs (1).
flavor: Sometimes looks CAN kill.

name: Wrathscale Naga
text: After a friendly minion dies, deal 3 damage to a_random enemy.
flavor: If throwing glaives is what you crave; \nsummon tokens and make 'em broken.

name: Altruis the Outcast
text:
[x]After you play the left-
or right-most card in your
hand, deal 1 damage
to all enemies.
flavor: Altruis betrayed Illidan to forge his own way in Outland. With Blackjack. And Netherdrakes.

name: Illidari Felblade
text: Rush\nOutcast: Gain Immune this_turn.
flavor: A whirling dervish of demonic devastation.

name: Raging Felscreamer
text: Battlecry: The next Demon you play costs (2) less.
flavor: Screaming loudly will not reduce the cost of non-demonic goods.

name: Soul Split
text: Choose a friendly Demon. Summon a copy of it.
flavor: Spoiler: they're both the evil twin.

name: Command the Illidari
text: Summon six 1/1_Illidari with Rush.
flavor:
Give me an R! 
Give me a U! 
Give me an S! 
Give me an H! 
You two, you’re exclamation points!

name: Wrathspike Brute
text: [x]Taunt After this is attacked, deal 1 damage to all enemies.
flavor: You scratch her back, her back scratches back.

name: Flamereaper
text: Also damages the minions next to whomever your hero_attacks.
flavor: Honestly it sows more flame than it reaps.

name: Hulking Overfiend
text: Rush. After this attacks and kills a minion, it may_attack again.
flavor: To hulk, perhaps, to fiend: ay, there's the rub.

name: Nethrandamus
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two random @-Cost minions. (Upgrades each time a friendly minion dies!)
flavor: Missed the big descent with the other dragons. But better late and nether!

name: Armor Vendor
text: Battlecry: Give 4 Armor to_each hero.
flavor: "You look like the kind of person that would buy three sets of armor. One to wear, a spare, and a spare for the spare."

name: Felscream Blast
text: Lifesteal. Deal $1 damage to a minion and its neighbors.
flavor: All the souls start running when they see the felscream truck.

name: Glacier Racer
text: Spellburst: Deal 3 damage to all Frozen enemies.
flavor: It’s just not the same without a super suit.

name: Guidance
text: Look at two spells. Add one to your hand or Overload: (1) to get both.
flavor: Plainsrunning will result in disqualification.

name: Illidari Studies
text: Discover an Outcast card. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: "Don't read texts and drive."

name: Mystery Winner
text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret.
flavor: Yeah, but the mystery prize could be anything! Even a boat!

name: Oh My Yogg!
text: [x]Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, they instead cast a random one of the same Cost.
flavor: Many wonders lie within, but they are not mere toys when your mind is their plaything.

name: Prize Plunderer
text: [x]Combo: Deal 1 damage to\na minion for each other card\nyou've played this turn.
flavor: But he'll never be able to plunder the prize of a happy childhood.

name: Resizing Pouch
text: [x]Discover a card with Cost\nequal to your remaining\nMana Crystals.
flavor: Just don't put a Resizing Pouch inside the Resizing Pouch.

name: Revolve
text: Transform all minions into random ones with the same Cost.
flavor: "Please don't ride the carousel for thirty minutes after eating. After the carousel eats, I mean."

name: Safety Inspector
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle the _lowest-Cost card from your hand into your deck. Draw a card.
flavor: "All right, you're good. No sign of safety anywhere."

name: Spiked Wheel
text: Has +3 Attack while your hero has Armor.
flavor: Great for driving, terrible for steering.

name: Stage Dive
text: Draw a Rush minion. Corrupt: Give it +2/+1.
flavor: The most metal trust fall.

name: Throw Glaive
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it dies, add a_temporary copy of this to your hand.
flavor: "No, no, I said SHOW me the glaive!"

name: Wicked Whispers
text: Discard your lowest Cost card. Give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: When the Old Ones whisper, others will scream.

name: Bola Shot
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion and $2 damage to its neighbors.
flavor: On second thought, bolas aren't very good against flying worms.

name: Bumper Car
text: Rush\nDeathrattle: Add two 1/1 Riders with Rush to_your hand.
flavor:
Subject: Re: Unsafe Rides?


bump

name: Cagematch Custodian
text: Battlecry: Draw a weapon.
flavor: Cleans up after a dust up.

name: Confection Cyclone
text: Battlecry: Add two 1/2 Sugar Elementals to your_hand.
flavor: "Oh, I thought it was a desert elemental?"

name: Conjure Mana Biscuit
text: Add a Biscuit to your hand that refreshes 2 Mana Crystals.
flavor: So THIS is why she was AFK.

name: Costumed Entertainer
text: [x]Battlecry: Give a random\nminion in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: Just remember not to talk. It breaks character.

name: Crabrider
text: Rush\nWindfury
flavor: "Now I'm falling asleep and she's calling a crab…"

name: Dancing Cobra
text: Corrupt: Gain Poisonous.
flavor: Snakes are just tentacles with fangs.

name: Deathmatch Pavilion
text: Summon a 3/2 Duelist.\nIf your hero attacked this turn, summon another.
flavor: Worth it for the stuffed toy at the end.

name: Deck of Lunacy
text: Transform spells in your deck into ones that cost (3) more. (They keep their original Cost.)
flavor: Voted "Most Lunacy" in Madness Monthly magazine.

name: Don't Feed the Animals
text: Give all Beasts in your hand +1/+1.\nCorrupt: Give them +2/+2 instead.
flavor: They're still cleaning up the mess from the last time someone fed the basilisk a deep fried candybar.

name: E.T.C., God of Metal
text: After a friendly Rush minion attacks, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: There are Old Gods and then there are Rock Gods.

name: Felfire Deadeye
text: Your Hero Power costs (1) less.
flavor: She only shoots people who pet her cat without asking first.

name: Foxy Fraud
text: Battlecry: Your next\nCombo card this turn costs_(2) less.
flavor: His other street con involves a druid. He can't pull it off without a plant.

name: Game Master
text: The first Secret you play each turn costs (1).
flavor: "You hear the mrgrgls of angry murlocs approaching. Roll initiative!"

name: Guess the Weight
text: Draw a card. Guess if your next card costs more or less to draw it.
flavor: "And then at the last second, I'll shapeshift into cat form!"

name: Horrendous Growth
text: Corrupt: Gain +1/+1. Can be Corrupted endlessly.
flavor: Stop picking at it! You’re only making it worse.

name: Imprisoned Phoenix
text: Dormant for 2 turns.\nSpell Damage +2
flavor: It's actually pretty easy to escape chains when you can burst into flames.

name: Insight
text: Draw a minion. Corrupt: Reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor: Shouldn't the eyes be facing backwards for insight?

name: Landslide
text: [x]Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. If you're Overloaded, deal $1 damage again.
flavor: "And they win it by a landslide! Wait, where did all the other racers go?"

name: Lunar Eclipse
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Your next spell this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: When the Azeroth is between the Sun and the Moon.

name: Midway Maniac
text: Taunt
flavor: Faire owners hate him! Learn his secrets with one simple spell!

name: Minefield
text: Deal $5 damage randomly split among all minions.
flavor: Dodge bombs like you're playing Tonksweeper!

name: Nitroboost Poison
text: Give a minion +2 Attack.\nCorrupt: And your weapon.
flavor: Pouring iced milk into your vehicle's fuel tank does NOT provide a Nitro boost, but it does go great with your victory cookies.

name: Open the Cages
text: [x]Secret: When your turn starts, if you control two minions, summon an Animal Companion.
flavor: "Coming out of my cage, and I'm dead by turn nine..."

name: Parade Leader
text: After you summon a Rush minion, give it +2 Attack.
flavor: He's always going to reign on his parade.

name: Prize Vendor
text: Battlecry: Each player draws a card.
flavor: He's just making sure they're real. Authentic tickets taste like strawberry.

name: Redeemed Pariah
text: After you play an Outcast card, gain +1/+1.
flavor: "Look at this stick. Look at it!"

name: Redscale Dragontamer
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Dragon.
flavor: Sir Finley made this look a lot easier three expansions ago...

name: Ringmaster's Baton
text: After your hero attacks, give a Mech, Dragon, and Pirate in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: A mech, a dragon, and a pirate walk into an Old God's gaping maw. The mech was too crunchy, the dragon was too hot, but the pirate was just right.

name: Rock Rager
text: Taunt
flavor: Still doesn't understand why he can't beat Paper Rager.

name: Shadow Clone
text: Secret: After a minion attacks your hero, summon a copy of it with_Stealth.
flavor: "You thought you were attacking face, but it was me! You!"

name: Shenanigans
text: Secret: When your opponent draws their second card in a turn, transform it into a Banana.
flavor: It's not personal, it's just monkey business.

name: Showstopper
text: Deathrattle: Silence all_minions.
flavor: This act is killing it!

name: Snack Run
text: Discover a spell. Restore Health to your hero equal to its Cost.
flavor: "I'll have two monster churros, a combo box of Yogg-Saron, and one of those turkey legs that ate the Silver Hand Recruit."

name: Solar Eclipse
text: The next spell you cast this turn casts twice.
flavor: When the Moon is between the Sun and the Azeroth.

name: Stage Hand
text: [x]Battlecry: Give a random\nminion in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Holds everything himself because people wouldn't stop touching the prop table.

name: Sweet Tooth
text: Corrupt: Gain +2 Attack and Stealth.
flavor: He's been eyeballing that ice cream cone all day!

name: Swindle
text: Draw a spell.\nCombo: And a minion.
flavor: You know, it's probably just cheaper to find a place that sells the plushie…

name: Tenwu of the Red Smoke
text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It costs (1) this turn.
flavor: Red, the color of subtlety.

name: Wriggling Horror
text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1.
flavor: Created to scare. Born to wriggle.

name: Acrobatics
text: Draw 2 cards. If you play both this turn, draw 2 more.
flavor: He soars through the air with the greatest of fleas.

name: Backfire
text: Draw 3 cards. Deal $3 damage to your hero.
flavor: "That's the last time I let an imp spit gasoline into my car."

name: Banana Vendor
text: Battlecry: Add 2 Bananas to each player's hand.
flavor: There's always money in the banana stand.

name: Carnival Barker
text: Whenever you summon a 1-Health minion, give it +1/+2.
flavor: The barking initially confused faire-goers, so he switched to words.

name: Darkmoon Dirigible
text: Divine Shield\nCorrupt: Gain Rush.
flavor: "It's dirigible? I don’t even know what diriging is!"

name: Darkmoon Statue
text: Your other minions have +1 Attack. Corrupt: This gains +4 Attack.
flavor: As far as workplace injuries go, Silas is protected by his statue of limitations.

name: Day at the Faire
text: Summon 3 Silver\nHand Recruits.\nCorrupt: Summon 5.
flavor: Karl knew he would someday regret that turkey leg.

name: Deathwarden
text: Deathrattles can't trigger.
flavor: Ride or die takes on a new meaning.

name: Dreadlord's Bite
text: [x]Outcast: Deal 1 damage\nto all enemies.
flavor: When it gets too dull, it's more of a nibble.

name: Dreaming Drake
text: Taunt\nCorrupt: Gain +2/+2.
flavor: Some dragons dream of conquering Azeroth, some just dream of being 5/6s.

name: Faire Arborist
text: [x]Choose One - Draw a card;\nor Summon a 2/2 Treant.\nCorrupt: Do both.
flavor: The bad apple never falls far from the treant.

name: Fairground Fool
text: Taunt\nCorrupt: Gain +4 Health.
flavor: "What did Illidan say when his rocketeer broke down on the Darkmoon racetrack? YOU ARE NOT REPAIRED!"

name: Feat of Strength
text: Give a random Taunt minion in your hand +5/+5.
flavor: Generally happens right after the airing of grievances.

name: Felsteel Executioner
text: Corrupt: Become a weapon.
flavor: "My mom said I could be anything I want."

name: Free Admission
text: Draw 2 minions. If they're both Demons, reduce their Costs by (2).
flavor: "Quick, get in before someone sees you, or worse, someone sees me."

name: Grand Totem Eys'or
text: At the end of your turn,\ngive +1/+1 to all other Totems in your hand, deck and battlefield.
flavor: Some say it can see straight into the soul of any who dare to read its flavor text...

name: Gyreworm
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, deal 3_damage.
flavor: This game of ring toss just got really intense.

name: Imprisoned Celestial
text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns.\nSpellburst: Give your minions\nDivine Shield.
flavor: "Look at your deck, now back to me, now back at your deck, now back to me. Who am I? None of your—I'm on a horse."

name: Inconspicuous Rider
text: Battlecry: Cast a Secret from your deck.
flavor: Improvise, adapt, overcome.

name: Insatiable Felhound
text: Taunt\n Corrupt: Gain +1/+1 and_Lifesteal.
flavor: Back-to-back winner of the annual hot dog eating contest... and the judge-eating contest.

name: Ironclad
text: Battlecry: If your hero has Armor, gain +2/+2.
flavor: With one inch of clearance, Ironclad proved ineffective against speedbumps.

name: K'thir Ritualist
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Add a random 4-Cost minion to your opponent's hand.
flavor: Something evil this way comes… and it's bringing friends over!

name: Kiri, Chosen of Elune
text: Battlecry: Add a Solar Eclipse and Lunar Eclipse to your hand.
flavor: Now, when the Sun is between the Moon and the Azeroth... that's when you've got a problem.

name: Line Hopper
text: Your Outcast cards cost (1)_less.
flavor: There are two things Demon Hunters know: hopping, and cutting.

name: Luckysoul Hoarder
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 2 Soul\nFragments into your deck.\nCorrupt: Draw a card.
flavor: Always brings his own reusable shopping bag, satchel, barrel, trunk, tray, and fluffy pillow.

name: Magicfin
text: After a friendly Murloc dies, add a random Legendary minion to your hand.
flavor: The best part is when he pulls Deathwing out of a top hat!

name: Man'ari Mosher
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Demon +3 Attack and Lifesteal this turn.
flavor: "E.T.C. is sooo mainstream. Have you heard of Blight Boar?"

name: Moontouched Amulet
text: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn. Corrupt: And gain 6 Armor.
flavor: The Suntouched Amulet melted.

name: Nazmani Bloodweaver
text: [x]After you cast a spell,\nreduce the Cost of a random\ncard in your hand by (1).
flavor: Her first stage name, Ketchupweaver, failed to excite the audience.

name: Palm Reading
text: Discover a spell. Reduce the Cost of spells in your hand by (1).
flavor: Actual palms not required.

name: Petting Zoo
text: Summon a 3/3 Strider. Repeat for each Secret you control.
flavor: Welcome to the petting zoo. DO NOT TOUCH THE ANIMALS.

name: Pit Master
text: Battlecry: Summon a 3/2_Duelist.\nCorrupt: Summon two.
flavor: If you win your duel, he'll throw in some of his famous Pit Master barbecue.

name: Relentless Pursuit
text: Give your hero +4 Attack and Immune this turn.
flavor: If you steal a Demon Hunter's corn dog, you'll get what's coming.

name: Revenant Rascal
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Mana Crystal for each player.
flavor: Turns out his face really did get stuck that way.

name: Rigged Faire Game
text: Secret: If you didn't take any damage during your opponent's turn, draw 3 cards.
flavor: What's faire is fair.

name: Saddlemaster
text: After you play a Beast, add_a random Beast to_your hand.
flavor: Seat covers. Check.\nRacing stripes. Check.\nCupholder. Check.

name: Sparkjoy Cheat
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Secret, cast it and draw a card.
flavor: "These do NOT spark joy!"

name: Stiltstepper
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a card. If you\nplay it this turn, give your\nhero +4 Attack this turn.
flavor: Circus school was tough, sometimes you had to step on people to make it to the top.

name: Stormstrike
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Give your hero +3 Attack this turn.
flavor: When your phone is at 5%.

name: Ticket Master
text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle 3 Tickets into your deck. When drawn, summon a 3/3 Plush Bear.
flavor: You can exchange one ticket for a bear or save up thousands for a tacky light-up paperweight!

name: Whack-A-Gnoll Hammer
text: After your hero attacks, give a random friendly minion +1/+1.
flavor: Hogger's most hated attraction.

name: Auspicious Spirits
text: Summon a random 4-Cost minion. Corrupt: Summon a 7-Cost minion instead.
flavor: "I'm not AWE-spicious, but I am a little spicious."

name: Balloon Merchant
text: Battlecry: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +1 Attack and Divine Shield.
flavor: It's a shiny yellow balloon! But it can be popped with a single point of damage.

name: Barricade
text: Summon a 2/4 Guard with Taunt. If it's_your only minion, summon another.
flavor: The Alliance and Horde join forces to enforce the fire safety capacity.

name: Cascading Disaster
text: [x]Destroy a random enemy\nminion. Corrupt: Destroy 2.\nCorrupt Again: Destroy 3.
flavor: Please keep all hands, arms, feet and legs inside the ride until the monster comes to a complete stop.

name: Circus Amalgam
text: Taunt\nThis has all minion types.
flavor: Who needs a petting zoo when you have all the creatures right here?!

name: Circus Medic
text: Battlecry: Restore #4 Health. Corrupt: Deal 4 damage instead.
flavor: Just be careful not to mix this with any creepy eyeballs, tentacles, or dark whispers, and you'll be fine in the morning.

name: Cloak of Shadows
text: Give your hero Stealth until your next turn.
flavor: Only worthy emperors can see the cloak.

name: Dunk Tank
text: Deal $4 damage.\nCorrupt: Then deal $2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: "When I said bring a tank to the dungeon, this is not what I had in mind!"

name: Fantastic Firebird
text: Windfury
flavor: The original flaming chicken.

name: Felsaber
text: Can only attack if your hero attacked this turn.
flavor: Some drivers rev their engines. This one growls all on its own.

name: Fire Breather
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all minions except Demons.
flavor: "Phew! That skull has been stuck between my teeth for hours!"

name: Hysteria
text: [x]Choose an enemy minion.\nIt attacks random\nminions until it dies.
flavor: "My mount and I share a special connection. Just not a good one."

name: Il'gynoth
text: [x]Lifesteal Your Lifesteal damages the enemy hero instead of healing you.
flavor: Well, that just sounds like damage with extra steps.

name: Knife Vendor
text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to each hero.
flavor: "They're perfectly safe! These gloves totally aren't hiding any bandages."

name: Lightsteed
text: Your healing effects also give affected minions\n+2_Health.
flavor: All the steed, half the calories.

name: Occult Conjurer
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, summon a copy of_this.
flavor: Like mirror image, but more secretive and angsty.

name: Rally!
text: Resurrect a friendly\n1-Cost, 2-Cost, and\n3-Cost minion.
flavor: One for the squire, two for the gnome, three for the glory, and GO, GO, GO!

name: Renowned Performer
text: [x]Rush\nDeathrattle: Summon two\n__1/1 Assistants with Taunt.__
flavor: Cutting the assistant in half is the easy part.

name: Ring Toss
text: Discover a Secret and cast it. Corrupt: Discover 2 instead.
flavor: If you liked it, then you shoulda put a ring on it!

name: Rinling's Rifle
