text: After your hero attacks, Discover a Secret and cast it.
flavor: This rifle needs a muzzle for its muzzle.

name: Sword Eater
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Equip a 3/2_Sword.
flavor: How tough is he? He eats swords for breakfast! Without any milk.

name: The Nameless One
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Become a 4/4 copy of it, then Silence it.
flavor: Used to be called "             , the Nameless," but everyone got confused.

name: Arbor Up
text: Summon two 2/2 Treants. Give your minions +2/+1.
flavor: If you can’t outrun a tree, you really shouldn’t be here anyway.

name: Carousel Gryphon
text: Divine Shield\nCorrupt: Gain +3/+3 and_Taunt.
flavor: "When does this bird land in Stormwind? I've been flying for hours!"

name: Dark Inquisitor Xanesh
text: [x]Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of all Corrupt and Corrupted cards in your hand and deck by (2).
flavor: Fear is the mind-killer, and also the name of my wurm.

name: Deck of Chaos
text: Swap the Cost and Attack of all minions in_your deck.
flavor: Yeah, it's chaos, but it's organized chaos.

name: Derailed Coaster
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Rider with Rush for each minion in your hand.
flavor: So long as it doesn’t kill you, it's considered part of the ride "experience."

name: Envoy Rustwix
text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle 3\nrandom Prime Legendary\nminions into your deck.
flavor: "Time to roll. Rusted Legion, ho!"

name: Firework Elemental
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage\nto a minion. Corrupt:\nDeal 12 instead.
flavor: The brightest spark can still go dark.

name: Fleethoof Pearltusk
text: Rush\nCorrupt: Gain +4/+4.
flavor: Guest interactions may vary over the duration of the visit.

name: Fortune Teller
text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Gain +1/+1 for\neach spell in your hand.
flavor: "I see a giant piano in your future."

name: Greybough
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon Greybough."
flavor: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The next best time is when you lose a minion.

name: Inara Stormcrash
text: On your turn, your hero has +2 Attack and Windfury.
flavor: A fan favorite, Inara is always met with thunderous applause.

name: Keywarden Ivory
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a Dual Class spell from any class. Spellburst: Get another copy.
flavor: She learned exactly one thing from her old man: copying.

name: Lothraxion the Redeemed
text: [x]Battlecry: For the rest of the game, after you summon a Silver Hand Recruit, give it Divine Shield.
flavor: So infused with the Light, he has to wear double sleep masks at night.

name: Malevolent Strike
text:
[x]Destroy a minion.
 Costs (1) less for each
_ card in your deck that
_ didn't start there.
flavor: "I don't know how those got in there, but I'm blaming you two."

name: Mistrunner
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3/+3.\nOverload: (1)
flavor: "Get IT off me!!!"

name: Moonfang
text: Can only take 1 damage at_a time.
flavor: Moonforehead just didn't have the same ring to it.

name: Optimistic Ogre
text: 50% chance to attack the correct enemy.
flavor: "What if this goes wrong?" "But what if this goes right?"

name: Ringmaster Whatley
text: Battlecry: Draw a Mech, Dragon, and Pirate.
flavor: His main qualification is that he'll work with anyone. Or anything.

name: Tent Trasher
text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each friendly minion with a unique minion type.
flavor: "I consider it redecorating."

name: Trampling Rhino
text: Rush. After this attacks\nand kills a minion, excess damage hits the enemy hero.
flavor: "Whew. I thought you said 'Trampoline Rhino.' Now that would have been scary."

name: Zai, the Incredible
text: Battlecry: Copy the left- and right-most cards in your hand.
flavor: Following this act will be her younger brother, Frank the Mediocre.

name: Bladed Lady
text: [x]Rush\nCosts (1) if your hero has\n6 or more Attack.
flavor: While you were busy learning magic, she studied the blade.

name: Claw Machine
text: Rush. Deathrattle: Draw a minion and give it +3/+3.
flavor: "I have been mrglrlglr… chosen!"

name: Grand Empress Shek'zara
text: Battlecry: Discover a card in your deck and draw all copies of it.
flavor: So is a Grand Empress an empress that's grand or an empress's empress?

name: Hammer of the Naaru
text: Battlecry: Summon a 6/6 Holy Elemental with Taunt.
flavor: The naaru wasn't using it. It doesn't have arms.

name: Maxima Blastenheimer
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a minion\nfrom your deck. It attacks the\nenemy hero, then dies.
flavor: Believe it or not, this is only the faire's fourth most dangerous game.

name: Ring Matron
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon\ntwo 3/2 Imps.
flavor: But where does she keep them?

name: Sayge, Seer of Darkmoon
text: Battlecry: Draw @ |4(card, cards). (Upgraded for each friendly Secret that has triggered this game!)
flavor: There are no secrets between us... or refunds.

name: Tickatus
text: [x]Battlecry: Remove the top 5 cards from your deck. Corrupt: Your opponent's deck instead.
flavor: "These are all.... EXPIRED!"

name: Darkmoon Tonk
text: Deathrattle: Fire four missiles at random enemies that deal 2 damage each.
flavor: "Ready to roll out!"

name: Expendable Performers
text: Summon seven 1/1 Illidari with Rush. If_they all die this turn, summon seven more.
flavor: When someone gets injured, it's considered performance art.

name: Libram of Judgment
text: Corrupt: Gain Lifesteal.
flavor: You really can't judge a book by its cover.

name: Mask of C'Thun
text: Deal $10 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Hide in the mask, but it will wear you. Through its gleaming eye, you shall see true.

name: Silas Darkmoon
text: Battlecry: Choose a direction to rotate all minions.
flavor: "You might remember me from such attractions as 'Being Shot out of a Cannon' or 'That Carousel Ate My Friend.'"

name: Strongman
text: Taunt\nCorrupt: This costs (0).
flavor: Sure, it looks impressive until you realize it's a barrel of helium.

name: Umbral Owl
text: [x]Rush\nCosts (1) less for each spell\nyou've cast this game.
flavor: It sleeps with one eye open.

name: Cenarion Ward
text: Gain 8 Armor.\nSummon a random\n8-Cost minion.
flavor: Don't ask about his right hand. He's still growing into it.

name: G'huun the Blood God
text: Battlecry: Draw 2 cards. They cost Health instead of Mana.
flavor: All of the other Old Gods used to laugh and call him names. They never let poor G'huun join in any Old God games.

name: Grand Finale
text: Summon an 8/8 Elemental. Repeat for each Elemental you played last turn.
flavor: Considering all the other hazards at Darkmoon, overindulgent pyrotechnics seem downright pedestrian.

name: High Exarch Yrel
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, gain Rush, Lifesteal, Taunt, and Divine Shield.
flavor: There can be no neutrality in the fight against darkness.

name: Idol of Y'Shaarj
text: Summon a 10/10 copy_of a minion in your deck.
flavor: Without a tongue, it speaks in seven. Without a voice, its echo lingers forever.

name: Jewel of N'Zoth
text: Summon three friendly Deathrattle minions that died this game.
flavor: This coveted gem calls for you to free it… and unleash an inescapable prison.

name: Blood of G'huun
text: [x]Taunt At the end of your turn, summon a 5/5 copy of a minion in your deck.
flavor: An attempted cure becomes disease, blooming and thriving as rot and decay.

name: Carnival Clown
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Summon 2 copies of this. Corrupt: Fill your board with copies.
flavor: Send in the clowns!

name: Fizzy Elemental
text: Rush\nTaunt
flavor: Loved. Hated. Carbonated.

name: N'Zoth, God of the Deep
text: Battlecry: Resurrect a friendly minion of each minion type.
flavor: It really just wants to cuddle all the creatures of Azeroth.

name: Runaway Blackwing
text: [x]At the end of your turn,\ndeal 9 damage to a\nrandom enemy minion.
flavor: It has been 5 minutes since our last Azeroth Racing League violation.

name: C'Thun, the Shattered
text: [x]Start of Game: Break into pieces. Battlecry: Deal 30 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: My grandfather's deck has no useless cards!

name: Darkmoon Rabbit
text: Rush, Poisonous\nAlso damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.
flavor: That's no ordinary rabbit! That's the most foul, cruel, and bad-tempered rodent you ever set eyes on!

name: Y'Shaarj, the Defiler
text: [x]Battlecry: Add a copy of each Corrupted card you've played this game to your hand. They cost (0) this turn.
flavor: Y'Shaarj made an excellent office intern, doing the copying AND defiling.

name: Yogg-Saron, Master of Fate
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast 10 spells this game, spin the Wheel of Yogg-Saron.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: Yogg take the wheel!

name: Desperate Prayer
text: Restore #5 Health to each hero.
flavor: Woah, we're halfway there, woah oh...

name: Flurry (Rank 1)
text: Freeze a random enemy minion. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Flurry, Flurrier, Flurriest.

name: Serpentbloom
text: Give a friendly\nBeast Poisonous.
flavor: "Awww, it's so cute!" —Famous last words

name: Sigil of Silence
text: At the start of your\nnext turn, Silence all\nenemy minions.
flavor: A little heard-of spell.

name: Altar of Fire
text: Destroy the top 3 cards of each deck.
flavor: "I now pronounce you, Crispy and Fried."

name: Cleric of An'she
text: Battlecry: If you've restored Health this turn, Discover a spell from your deck.
flavor: When it's her turn to cook, she'll always go for a Light sear.

name: Conviction (Rank 1)
text: [x]Give a random friendly minion +3 Attack. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: It was the strength of Cariel's faith that emboldened the defenders of Northwatch that day. Although the strength of her giant hammer didn’t exactly hurt either.

name: Final Gasp
text:
[x]Deal $1 damage to a
minion. If it dies, summon
a 2/2 Adventurer with a
random bonus effect.
flavor: And with a raspy whisper, he uttered his final words, "rez plz."

name: Fury (Rank 1)
text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Rank 3 is when your mom uses your middle name.

name: Galloping Savior
text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, summon a 3/4 Steed with Taunt.
flavor: "Look to my coming on the first light of the third card."

name: Grimoire of Sacrifice
text: Destroy a friendly minion. Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: "What kind of bedtime story is this?"

name: Judgment of Justice
text: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, set its Attack and Health to 1.
flavor: Look, we don't need a jury. We've got a paladin right here!

name: Kindling Elemental
text: [x]Battlecry: The next\n Elemental you play\ncosts (1) less.
flavor: Burn baby burn. Little inferno!

name: Knight of Anointment
text: Battlecry: Draw a\nHoly spell.
flavor: "I dub thee... injured."

name: Meeting Stone
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
add a 2/2 Adventurer
with a random bonus effect
to your hand.
flavor: "I'm clicking on it, but nothing's happening."

name: Paralytic Poison
text: [x]Give your weapon +1\nAttack and "Your hero is\nImmune while attacking."
flavor: The hammer is overkill.

name: Savory Deviate Delight
text: [x]Transform a minion in\nboth players' hands into a\nPirate or Stealth minion.
flavor: "Savory" is a creative way to put it.

name: Silverleaf Poison
text: [x]Give your weapon\n"After your hero attacks,\ndraw a card."
flavor: Kazakus has taken to a more direct approach in recent times.

name: Spawnpool Forager
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Tinyfin.
flavor: Putting food on the table requires persistence, enthusiasm, and the finest murloc Gloves of Foraging.

name: Sunscale Raptor
text: Frenzy: Shuffle a Sunscale Raptor into your deck with permanent +2/+1.
flavor: And they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they—

name: Tuskpiercer
text: [x]Deathrattle: Draw a\nDeathrattle minion.
flavor: It's the Barrens, everything has tusks! The Quilboar have tusks, the boars have tusks, the tusks have tusks.

name: Wailing Vapor
text: [x]After you play an Elemental,\ngain +1 Attack.
flavor: If you have The Vapors, your Humors might be imbalanced.

name: Warsong Envoy
text: [x]Frenzy: Gain +1 Attack\nfor each damaged\n character.
flavor: "What do you mean we didn’t give the flag to the Druid?"

name: Whetstone Hatchet
text: After your hero attacks, give a minion in your hand +1 Attack.
flavor: A bad hatchet can make a good spear better.

name: Wildfire
text: [x]Your Hero Power\ndeals 1 more damage\nthis game.
flavor: The Barrens were a lush jungle. Then this happened.

name: Wound Prey
text: Deal $1 damage. Summon a 1/1 Hyena with Rush.
flavor: You steal the cranberry juice, you pay the price.

name: Yoink!
text: Discover a Hero Power and set its Cost to (0). Swap back after 2 uses.
flavor: Saying the spell’s name makes it work better.

name: Apothecary's Caravan
text: [x]At the start of your turn,\nsummon a 1-Cost minion\nfrom your deck.
flavor: If you won't bring out your dead, we'll bring the dead to you.

name: Bulk Up
text: Give a random Taunt minion in your hand +1/+1 and copy it.
flavor: "For breakfast I usually go for a couple of kodo steaks, 5 Plainstrider eggs and an ice-cold milk to wash it down… all raw."

name: Chain Lightning (Rank 1)
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and a random adjacent one. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Still better than receiving a chain letter.

name: Condemn (Rank 1)
text: [x]Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: "I wished you no harm, but for your cruelty, by the light, I condemn you all!" Xyrella shouted, unaware that irony was not her strong suit.

name: Conditioning (Rank 1)
text: Give minions in your hand +1/+1. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Now drop and give me 5 Mana.

name: Far Watch Post
text: [x]Can't attack. After your\nopponent draws a card, it\n___costs (1) more (up to 10).__
flavor: Dabu, man. Like, far out.

name: Hecklefang Hyena
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavor: Even their teeth are laughing at you.

name: Imp Swarm (Rank 1)
text: Summon a 3/2 Imp. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Not a cauldron, or a mischief, or a cackle, but a swarm.

name: Kolkar Pack Runner
text: [x]After you cast a spell,\nsummon a 1/1 Hyena\nwith Rush.
flavor: Is he running or galloping?

name: Living Seed (Rank 1)
text: Draw a Beast. Reduce its Cost by (1). (Upgrades when you\nhave 5 Mana.)
flavor: Every desert needs an oasis. And it's Guff's duty to make it happen.

name: Lushwater Murcenary
text: Battlecry: If you control a Murloc, gain +1/+1.
flavor: You can't just switch sides because they have more fish!

name: Lushwater Scout
text: After you summon a Murloc, give it +1 Attack and Rush.
flavor: Only knows how to play "Careless Murgl" and "Mrgl Mrgl Little Star."

name: Man-at-Arms
text: Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, gain +1/+1.
flavor: Arch nemesis of the Man-at-Legs.

name: Mark of the Spikeshell
text: Give a minion +2/+2.\nIf it has Taunt, add a copy of it to your hand.
flavor: "I'm DEFINITELY turtle-y enough for the turtle club."

name: Oasis Thrasher
text: Frenzy: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Didn't get tickets for E.T.C.'s show.

name: Peon
text: [x]Frenzy: Add a random\nspell from your class\nto your hand.
flavor: Joke's on the peon: the job's never done.

name: Perpetual Flame
text: Deal $3 damage to a random enemy minion. If it dies, recast this. Overload: (1)
flavor: Flame is perpetual.*\n\n *Perpetual only applies to current turn.

name: Prospector's Caravan
text: At the start of your turn, give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Prospectors came from all around in the Golden Legendary Rush of '49.

name: Razorboar
text: Deathrattle: Summon a Deathrattle minion that costs (3) or less from your hand.
flavor: And this little pig built his house out of VENGEANCE.

name: Razormane Battleguard
text: The first Taunt minion you_play each turn costs_(2) less.
flavor: Where there's a quill, there's a way.

name: Runed Orb
text: Deal $2 damage. Discover a spell.
flavor: The most dangerous Winter Veil ornament.

name: Serena Bloodfeather
text: Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Steal Attack and Health from it until this has more.
flavor: She’s really into networking! After all, she’s introduced countless low-level Horde players to the Spirit Healer.

name: Sigil of Flame
text: At the start of your next turn, deal $3 damage\nto all minions.
flavor: "Huh, it reads F-I-R-E. Wonder what that means?"

name: Sigil of Summoning
text: At the start of your next turn, summon two 2/2 Demons with Taunt.
flavor: Look, summoning ain’t exactly a science. Sometimes it takes a turn.

name: Soldier's Caravan
text: [x]At the start of your turn,\nsummon two 1/1\nSilver Hand Recruits.
flavor: It’s a clown car… for JUSTICE!

name: Soothsayer's Caravan
text: At the start of your turn, copy a spell from your opponent's deck to your hand.
flavor: With tusks like those, you might call her a "Toothsayer."

name: South Coast Chieftain
text: Battlecry: If you control another Murloc, deal 2_damage.
flavor: It got the conch. You let it speak!

name: Sword of the Fallen
text: [x]After your hero attacks,\ncast a Secret from\nyour deck.
flavor: Hoarding secrets is no fun, so play each and every one.

name: Talented Arcanist
text: Battlecry: Your next spell_this turn has Spell_Damage +2.
flavor: "Ey mon, you don't get this good just on raw talent ... but it helps."

name: Tame Beast (Rank 1)
text: Summon a 2/2 Beast with Rush. (Upgrades when you\nhave 5 Mana.)
flavor: "Trust me laddie, I never eat seafood!"

name: Thorngrowth Sentries
text: Summon two 1/2 Turtles with Taunt.
flavor: Maybe we shouldn't drink from this Oasis…

name: Tinyfin's Caravan
text: At the start of your turn, draw a Murloc.
flavor: Movin' right along, mrgl mrg mrgl mrg.

name: Toad of the Wilds
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you're holding a Nature spell, gain +2 Health.
flavor: "Someday we'll find it. The Oasis Connection. The peons, the caravans, and me."

name: Unstable Shadow Blast
text: [x]Deal $6 damage to a\nminion. Excess damage\nhits your hero.
flavor: "Unstable" usually means "awesome!"

name: Wicked Stab (Rank 1)
text: Deal $2 damage. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Always go for the glowing weak point.

name: Arcane Luminary
text: [x]Cards that didn't start in\nyour deck cost (2) less\n(but not less than 1).
flavor: They say true value is the cards you find along the way.

name: Archdruid Naralex
text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns. While Dormant, add a Dream card to your hand __at the end of your turn.
flavor: "Dormant? I think you mean naptime."

name: Arid Stormer
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, gain Rush and Windfury.
flavor: Some people chase storms, some storms chase elementals.

name: Barrens Trapper
text: Your Deathrattle cards\ncost (1) less.
flavor: Just add a bit of murloc meat for bait. Beasts can’t resist that special seasoning…

name: Blood Shard Bristleback
text: [x]Lifesteal. Battlecry: If your deck contains 10 or fewer cards, deal 6 damage to a minion.
flavor:
I'm bringin' bristle back (Yeah)
Those other minions don't know how to act (Yeah)
I think it's special how these crystals crack (Yeah)
So turn around and I'll give you a smack (Yeah)
(Take 'em to the Barrens)

name: Crossroads Gossiper
text: After a friendly Secret is revealed, gain +2/+2.
flavor: Not afraid to spill the tea.

name: Death's Head Cultist
text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Restore 4 Health to your hero.
flavor: Nothing can stop death. Except a Taunt. With Healing.

name: Devouring Ectoplasm
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a\n2/2 Adventurer with\n_a random bonus effect.
flavor: When it's on keto, it only devours tauren.

name: Devouring Plague
text: [x]Lifesteal. Deal $4 damage\nrandomly split among\nall enemy minions.
flavor: "How’d we miss this one in Uldum?" —Rafaam

name: Devout Dungeoneer
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a spell.\nIf it's a Holy spell,\nreduce its Cost by (2).
flavor: "Please do smaller pulls, this is my first time healing."

name: Efficient Octo-bot
text: Frenzy: Reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1).
flavor: Pull the lever, Octo-bot... Wrong leverrrrr!

name: Fangbound Druid
text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Reduce the Cost of a Beast in your hand by (2).
flavor: Bound by the law of the fang, these druid floss their teeth twice a day.

name: Felrattler
text: [x]Rush\nDeathrattle: Deal 1 damage\nto all enemy minions.
flavor: It only rattles when YOU'RE in danger.

name: Field Contact
text: [x]After you play a Battlecry\nor Combo card, draw a card.
flavor: That's not a knife... THIS is a knife!

name: Frostweave Dungeoneer
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a spell. If it's a Frost spell, summon two 1/1 ___Elementals that Freeze.
flavor: It's a woven blanket of ice but surprisingly comforting.

name: Guff Runetotem
text: After you cast a Nature spell, give another friendly minion +2/+2.
flavor: "By the twins above and twins below, our companions will lead us through." —Guff Runetotem

name: Hog Rancher
text: Battlecry: Summon a\n2/1 Hog with Rush.
flavor: Suspiciously close to a Quilboar village.

name: Horde Operative
text: Battlecry: Copy your opponent's Secrets and put them into play.
flavor: "We all have our secrets. I mean, your secrets."

name: Kabal Outfitter
text: [x]Battlecry and Deathrattle:\nGive another random\n_friendly minion +1/+1.
flavor: Don’t ask her for feathers on your necklace though.

name: Mankrik
text: [x]Battlecry: Help Mankrik find\nhis wife! She was last seen\nsomewhere in your deck.
flavor: Relives his nightmare every day a new Horde player is created.

name: Mor'shan Watch Post
text: [x]Can't attack. After your\nopponent plays a minion,\n_summon a 2/2 Grunt.
flavor: Pushing into Ashenvale made this post uneventful.

name: Nofin Can Stop Us
text: [x]Give your minions\n+1/+1. Give your\nMurlocs an extra +1/+1.
flavor: "I'm having a good time! I don't want to stop at all!"

name: Northwatch Commander
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, draw a minion.
flavor: It was all going well until some Horde had the cunning idea of attacking from the south.

name: Oasis Ally
text: [x]Secret: When a friendly minion is attacked, summon a 3/6 Water Elemental.
flavor: As gentle as a bellyflop.

name: Pack Kodo
text: Battlecry: Discover a Beast, Secret, or weapon.
flavor: He looks simple, but there’s a lot to unpack.

name: Primal Dungeoneer
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a spell.\nIf it's a Nature spell, also\ndraw an Elemental.
flavor: They wanted a Mature Dungeoneer. Instead they got this.

name: Ratchet Privateer
text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
flavor: There's a fine line between privateering and pirating. It comes down to tax breaks.

name: Razorfen Beastmaster
text: Deathrattle: Summon a Deathrattle minion that costs (4) or less from your hand.
flavor: It's a homebrew variant on my favorite role-playing game.

name: Rimetongue
text: After you cast a Frost spell, summon a 1/1 Elemental that Freezes.
flavor:
Warriors are red,
Frost spells are blue,
If you're being hit by a weapon,
Rimetongue's got you.

name: Rokara
text: [x]Rush After a friendly minion attacks and survives, give it +1/+1.
flavor: "Tread carefully, but stand tall, and stand together. For strength and honor!" —Rokara

name: Seedcloud Buckler
text: [x]Deathrattle: Give your\n_minions Divine Shield.
flavor: A shield to some, a frisbee to others (mainly dogs).

name: Shattering Blast
text: Destroy all Frozen minions.
flavor: Let's be honest, they weren't going to unfreeze anyway.

name: Shroud of Concealment
text: Draw 2 minions. Any played this turn gain Stealth for 1 turn.
flavor: This page left intentionally blank.

name: Sunwell Initiate
text: Frenzy: Gain Divine Shield.
flavor: Initiates don’t study pronunciation until level 20.

name: Swinetusk Shank
text: [x]After you play a Poison,\n_gain +1 Durability.
flavor: Comes with a rack of ribs!

name: Tamsin Roame
text:
[x]Whenever you cast a Shadow
spell that costs (1) or more,
add a copy to your hand
that costs (0).
flavor: In life, Tamsin Roame was one of the Alliance's most promising mages; now she is the Horde's most dangerous warlock.

name: Tavish Stormpike
text: After a friendly Beast attacks, summon a Beast from your deck that costs (1) less.
flavor: "Hurry up, laddie, we're getting overrun! Serpents everywhere! They may look cute, but do ye see the fury in their eyes?!" —Tavish Stormpike

name: Venomous Scorpid
text: Poisonous\nBattlecry: Discover a spell.
flavor: Despite what Guff says, he is NOT a "nice little guy."

name: Vile Call
text: Summon two 2/2 Demons with Lifesteal.
flavor: "We're calling to inform you that your vehicle's insurance is about to expire."

name: Water Moccasin
text: [x]Stealth\nHas Poisonous while you\n_have no other minions.
flavor: You need to be specific when you're ordering waterproof shoewear.

name: Apothecary Helbrim
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a random Poison to your hand.
flavor: The best way to maintain your health is to poison everyone else.

name: Blademaster Samuro
text: [x]Rush Frenzy: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack _to all enemy minions.
flavor: Artists paint their visions meticulously on canvas. Blademasters paint with, uh, broader strokes.

name: Bru'kan
text: Nature Spell Damage +3
flavor: Bru'kan, his body weathered and weary, felt his time nearing its end. Teaching brave champions like Rokara gives him hope for a greater future.

name: Cariel Roame
text: [x]Rush, Divine Shield Whenever this attacks, reduce the Cost of Holy ______spells in your hand by (1).___
flavor: Cariel had pledged her honor to the Alliance, but when someone matching her long-lost sister's description was sighted at the Crossroads, Cariel did the unthinkable: she abandoned her post and set out across the Barrens.

name: Crossroads Watch Post
text: [x]Can't attack. Whenever your\nopponent casts a spell, give\nyour minions +1/+1.
flavor: All of Barrens Chat is recorded and kept on thousands of scrolls stored beneath this tower.

name: Darkspear Berserker
text: Deathrattle: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavor: "If I die, I'm taking my hero down with me."

name: Earth Revenant
text: [x]Taunt\n Battlecry: Deal 1 damage\nto all enemy minions.
flavor: Have you guys seen a pair of rock legs lying around anywhere?

name: Firemancer Flurgl
text: [x]After you play a Murloc,\ndeal 1 damage to\nall enemies.
flavor: Diss tracks spitting straight fire.

name: Gruntled Patron
text: Frenzy: Summon another Gruntled Patron.
flavor: Gruntled and whelmed.

name: Injured Marauder
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Deal 6 damage to this minion.
flavor: He’ll keep going despite the neighsayers.

name: Invigorating Sermon
text: Give +1/+1 to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavor: Every underdog sports coach knows this one.

name: Kazakus, Golem Shaper
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 4-Cost cards, build a custom Golem.
flavor: With a little love and some tenderness, we’ll CRUSH OUR FOES!

name: Kurtrus Ashfallen
text: [x]Battlecry: Attack the left and\nright-most enemy minions.\nOutcast: Immune this turn.
flavor: Kurtrus fled the Black Temple, abandoning Illidan's cause, to seek revenge against the Dreadlord Anetheron.

name: Oil Rig Ambusher
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.\nIf this entered your hand\n_this turn, deal 4 instead.
flavor: Days since last accident: 0

name: Outrider's Axe
text: After your hero attacks and kills a minion, draw a card.
flavor: "I only have to get 4 Zhevra hooves? How hard could that be?"

name: Piercing Shot
text: Deal $6 damage to a minion. Excess damage hits the enemy hero.
flavor: Goblins hate wasting money on unnecessary ammunition.

name: Plaguemaw the Rotting
text: [x]After a friendly minion with\n Taunt dies, summon a new\n_copy of it without Taunt.
flavor: This is why you should brush your teeth three times a day!

name: Pride's Fury
text: Give your minions +1/+3.
flavor: Day 4: I think they're starting to suspect.

name: Rancor
text: [x]Deal $2 damage to all\nminions. Gain 2 Armor\nfor each destroyed.
flavor: Wise men say "Only fools rush in." Wise Orcs say the opposite.

name: Reckless Apprentice
text: Battlecry: Fire your Hero Power at all enemies.
flavor: It’s all a great learning experience until someone accidentally aggros the boss.

name: Scabbs Cutterbutter
text: [x]Combo: The next two\ncards you play this turn\ncost (3) less.
flavor: "Never lie, steal, cheat, or drink. Unless you're compelled to, that is…" —Scabbs Cutterbutter

name: Sin'dorei Scentfinder
text: Frenzy: Summon four 1/1 Hyenas with Rush.
flavor: Loves candles. Hates deodorant.

name: Soul Rend
text: [x]Deal $5 damage to all\nminions. Destroy a card in\nyour deck for each killed.
flavor: About as close to feeling guilt as a warlock's ever going to get.

name: Southsea Scoundrel
text: Battlecry: Discover a card in your opponent's deck. They draw theirs as well.
flavor: "…and here we see the Southsea Scoundrel in their natural habitat: a den of scum and villainy."

name: Spirit Healer
text: After you cast a Holy spell, give a random friendly minion +2 Health.
flavor: "You again? What did I tell you about trying to fight ALL the quilboars."

name: Stealer of Souls
text: The first card you draw each turn costs Health instead of Mana.
flavor: The tooth fairy gig didn't work out.

name: Thickhide Kodo
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Gain 5 Armor.
flavor: The introduction of professions was devastating for kodo populations.

name: Varden Dawngrasp
text: [x]Battlecry: Freeze all enemy minions. If any are already Frozen, deal 4 damage to them instead.
flavor: Varden Dawngrasp could wield fire, summon hailstorms, and morph a night elf into a sheep with a snap of their fingers. Knowing how malleable reality could be, certain labels felt downright trivial.

name: Vengeful Spirit
text: Outcast: Draw 2 Deathrattle minions.
flavor: Sheesh, even the spirits are edgy when it comes to Demon Hunters.

name: Venomstrike Bow
text: Poisonous
flavor: "You know you only have to coat the arrowhead in poison and not the entire bow, right?"

name: Veteran Warmedic
text: [x]After you cast a Holy spell,\nsummon a 2/2 Medic\nwith Lifesteal.
flavor: In times of war, warmedics bring their own medics.

name: Void Flayer
text: [x]Battlecry: For each spell in your hand, deal 1 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor: The Void, just like onions, has flayers.

name: Warsong Wrangler
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a Beast from your deck. Give all copies of it +2/+1 (wherever_they_are).
flavor: "Me? Playing favorites? I love my beasts all the same!"

name: Whirling Combatant
text: [x]Battlecry and Frenzy:\nDeal 1 damage to all\nother minions.
flavor: It's called capoeira! And yes, it is dangerous!

name: Xyrella
text: Battlecry: If you've restored Health this turn, deal that much damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: On the Night of Falling Stars, Xyrella had a vision of a shattered naaru. "Go to the Barrens," the being said. "Seek the shards of my broken body. Restore me, and I will restore your daughter."

name: Against All Odds
text: Destroy ALL\nodd-Attack minions.
flavor: Time to EVEN out the playing field.

name: Barak Kodobane
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a 1, 2,\n__and 3-Cost spell.
flavor: They say he's a pro at horseback archery.

name: Barrens Blacksmith
text: Frenzy: Give your other minions +2/+2.
flavor: "Maybe someday you’ll make it to Gadgetzan, kid."

name: Burning Blade Acolyte
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/8 Demonspawn\nwith Taunt.
flavor: Wields a disappointingly normal looking blade.

name: Cannonmaster Smythe
text: Battlecry: Transform your Secrets into 3/3 Soldiers. They transform back when they die.
flavor: "Smythe, it's been a real blast serving the Alliance with you."

name: Gold Road Grunt
text: [x]Taunt\nFrenzy: Gain Armor equal\nto the damage taken.
flavor: No, no, no, Gold Roads are very different from Yellow Brick Roads.

name: Lilypad Lurker
text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, transform an enemy minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
flavor: Honestly, the frog did nothing wrong.

name: Mor'shan Elite
text: [x]Taunt. Battlecry: If your hero\nattacked this turn, summon\na copy of this.
flavor: "Fear not the orc who has slain a million training dummies, but the orc who keeps CAMPING MY CORPSE!"

name: Neeru Fireblade
text: Battlecry: If your deck is empty, open a portal that fills your board with 3/2 Imps each turn.
flavor: Look at this guy! He’s obviously evil! OBVIOUSLY!!!

name: Priest of An'she
text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you've restored Health this turn, gain +3/+3.
flavor: "An’she?" "Bless you!" "No, you, An'she…" "Bless you again!"

name: Razormane Raider
text: Frenzy: Attack a\nrandom enemy.
flavor: "Call me hedgehog one more time. I dare you."

name: Refreshing Spring Water
text: Draw 2 cards.\nRefresh 2 Mana Crystals for each spell drawn.
flavor: "Mana" is just another name for "electrolytes."

name: Shadow Hunter Vol'jin
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Swap it with a random one in its owner's hand.
flavor: You wouldn’t see this swap-meet on the Zandalari Roadshow.

name: Stonemaul Anchorman
text: [x]Rush\nFrenzy: Draw a card.
flavor: "Brug will read anything you put on the parchment prompter. Anything."

name: Barrens Scavenger
text: [x]Taunt\nCosts (1) while your deck\nhas 10 or fewer cards.
flavor: When the hundredth centaur dropped, so did her bracers.

name: Floecaster
text: Costs (2) less for each Frozen enemy.
flavor: His real name is Melvin, but he prefers his friends call him ... <sigh> ..."Floecaster."

name: Kresh, Lord of Turtling
text: Frenzy: Gain 8 Armor. Deathrattle: Equip a 2/5 Turtle Spike.
flavor: Never should have flushed him.

name: Lady Anacondra
text: Your Nature spells\ncost (2) less.
flavor: Do you think she got her name before or after she turned into a snake?

name: Lightshower Elemental
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Restore #8 Health\nto all friendly characters.
flavor: The forecast calls for light showers, but you won’t need an umbrella.

name: Taurajo Brave
text: Frenzy: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: "He's brave, but splinters will make any Tauren cry."

name: Death Speaker Blackthorn
text: Battlecry: Summon 3 Deathrattle minions that cost (5) or less from your deck.
flavor: He can speak death but has a hard time reading it.

name: Druid of the Plains
text: Rush\nFrenzy: Transform into a 6/7 Kodo with Taunt.
flavor: Not to be confused with the aeronautically advanced Druid of the Planes.

name: Kargal Battlescar
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Lookout for each Watch Post you've __summoned this game.
flavor: One if by land, two if by tree.

name: Mutanus the Devourer
text: [x]Battlecry: Eat a minion in\nyour opponent's hand.\nGain its stats.
flavor: As long as Naralex stays under the blanket, Mutanus can't get him.

name: Overlord Saurfang
text: Battlecry: Resurrect 2 friendly Frenzy minions. Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Eats more than his fair share of sour candy.

name: Party Up!
text: Summon five 2/2 Adventurers with random bonus effects.
flavor: Random? But what if we don't get a tank?

name: Selfless Sidekick
text: Battlecry: Equip a random weapon from your deck.
flavor: "I got a real sense of humility from her when she bashed that quilboar's head in."

name: Celestial Alignment
text: Set your Mana Crystals to 0. Set the Cost of cards in your hand and deck to (1).
flavor: "Is my deck any good?"\n"I mean, if the stars align."

name: Deviate Dreadfang
text: After you cast a Nature spell, summon a 4/2 Viper with Rush.
flavor: Even with wings, snakes STILL don't have legs.

name: Mordresh Fire Eye
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've dealt 10 damage with your Hero Power this game, deal 10 damage to all enemies.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: You're not hardcore unless you died hardcore.

name: Power Word: Fortitude
text: Give a minion +3/+5. Costs (1) less for each spell in your hand.
flavor: Part of a balanced breakfast.

name: Primordial Protector
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw your highest Cost spell. Summon a random minion with the same Cost.
flavor: I thought the "shape of water" meant something else.

name: Taintheart Tormenter
text: Taunt\nYour opponent's spells cost (2) more.
flavor: Oh boo hoo, did someone's World Tree burn down?

name: Ancestral Healing
text: Restore a minion\nto full Health and\ngive it Taunt.
flavor: I personally prefer some non-ancestral right-the-heck-now healing, but maybe that is just me.

name: Backstab
text: Deal $2 damage to an undamaged minion.
flavor: It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.

name: Innervate
text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavor: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

name: Moonfire
text: Deal $1 damage.
flavor: "Cast Moonfire, and never stop." - How to Be a Druid, Chapter 5, Section 3

name: Ritual of Doom
text: Destroy a friendly minion. If you had 5 or more, summon a\n5/5 Demon.
flavor: "Who wants to sing the Doom song?!"

name: Sacrificial Pact
text: Destroy a friendly Demon. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
flavor: This is the reason that Demons never really become friends with Warlocks.

name: Totemic Might
text: Give your Totems +2_Health.
flavor: Totem-stomping is no longer recommended.

name: Arcane Missiles
text: Deal $3 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: You'd think you'd be able to control your missiles a little better since you're a powerful mage and all.

name: Arcane Shot
text: Deal $2 damage.
flavor: Magi conjured arcane arrows to sell to hunters, until hunters learned just enough magic to do it themselves.  The resulting loss of jobs sent Stormwind into a minor recession.

name: Blessing of Might
text: Give a minion +3_Attack.
flavor: "As in, you MIGHT want to get out of my way." - Toad Mackle, recently buffed.

name: Bloodsail Deckhand
text: [x]Battlecry: The next\nweapon you play costs\n(1) less.
flavor: Piracy is technically a discount.

name: Call of the Void
text: Add a random Demon to your hand.
flavor:
"Marco!"
"Polo!"
"Marco!"
"Who dares summon me?!"

name: Claw
text: Give your hero +2_Attack this turn. Gain 2 Armor.
flavor: The claw decides who will stay and who will go.

name: Corruption
text: Choose an enemy minion. At the start of your turn, destroy it.
flavor: It starts with stealing a pen from work, and before you know it, BOOOM!  Corrupted!

name: Crimson Clergy
text: Overheal: Draw a card.
flavor: He won't drop the ball.

name: Deadly Poison
text: Give your weapon +2_Attack.
flavor: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells.  Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison?  Poison Elemental?  Nobody wants that.

name: Elven Archer
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
flavor: Don't bother asking her out on a date.  She'll shoot you down.

name: Emerald Skytalon
text: Rush
flavor: Sworn protectors of Ysera at the Emerald Dragonshrine, these majestic owls have been touched by the powers of the Emerald Dream, taking on an almost crystalline appearance.

name: Execute
text: Destroy a damaged enemy minion.
flavor: It's okay, he deserved it.

name: Focused Will
text: Silence a minion, then give it +3 Health.
flavor: Extreme focus is almost as effective as a really flashy distraction.

name: Frost Shock
text: Deal $1 damage to an enemy character and Freeze it.
flavor: FROST SHOCK!

name: Goldshire Footman
text: Taunt
flavor: If 1/2 minions are all that is defending Goldshire, you would think it would have been overrun years ago.

name: Grimscale Oracle
text: Your other Murlocs have +1 Attack.
flavor: These are the brainy murlocs.  It turns out that doesn’t mean much.

name: Hand of Protection
text: Give a minion Divine Shield.
flavor: This spell has been renamed so many times, even paladins don’t know what it should be called anymore.

name: Heart Strike
text: Deal $3 damage to\na minion. If that kills it, gain a Corpse.
flavor: Love hurts.

name: Holy Smite
text: Deal $3 damage\nto a minion.
flavor: It doesn't matter how pious you are.  Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

name: Humility
text: Change a minion's Attack to 1.
flavor: This card makes something really damp.  Oh wait.  That's "Humidity."

name: Hunter's Mark
text: Change a minion's Health to 1.
flavor: Never play 'Hide and Go Seek' with a Hunter.

name: Light's Justice
flavor: Prince Malchezaar was a collector of rare weapons. He'd animate them and have them dance for him.

name: Mind Vision
text: Put a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand into your hand.
flavor: I see what you did there.

name: Mirror Image
text: Summon two 0/2 minions with Taunt.
flavor: Oh hey it's Mirror Image! !egamI rorriM s'ti yeh hO

name: Mortal Coil
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card.
flavor: If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let's be honest, you should get to draw some cards.

name: Murloc Raider
flavor: Mrrraggglhlhghghlgh, mrgaaag blarrghlgaahahl mrgggg glhalhah a bghhll graggmgmg Garrosh mglhlhlh mrghlhlhl!!

name: Northshire Cleric
text: Whenever a minion is healed, draw a card.
flavor: They help the downtrodden and distressed.  Also they sell cookies.

name: Pilfer
text: Add a random card from another class to_your hand.
flavor: The class is always greener on the other side of the board.

name: Power Word: Shield
text: Give a minion +2_Health.\nDraw a card.
flavor: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

name: Psychic Conjurer
text: Battlecry: Copy a card in your opponent’s deck and add it to your hand.
flavor: "I see... a WISP? Why do you have a wisp?!"

name: Radiance
text: Restore #5 Health to your hero.
flavor: Because you're worth it!

name: Reckoning
text: Secret: After an enemy minion deals 3 or more damage, destroy it.
flavor: He would henceforth be known as "Karmerr, the Doom of Kazzak."

name: Runeforging
text: Draw a weapon.\nSpend a Corpse to reduce its Cost by (1).
flavor: I swear the runes are genuine!

name: Scarlet Subjugator
text: Battlecry: Give an enemy minion -2 Attack until your_next turn.
flavor: At the Scarlet Monastery, he learned the sacred art of kicking people when they're up.

name: Shadowhoof Slayer
text: Battlecry: Give your hero +1_Attack this turn.
flavor: Was a humble Elven Archer before Sargeras got to him.

name: Sinister Strike
text: Deal $3 damage to the_enemy hero.
flavor: There's something about this strike that just feels off.  Sinister, even.

name: Soulfire
text: [x]Deal $4 damage.\nDiscard a random card.
flavor: Are you lighting a soul on fire? Or burning someone with your OWN soul? This seems like an important distinction.

name: Stonetusk Boar
text: Charge
flavor: This card is boaring.

name: Timber Wolf
text: Your other Beasts have +1_Attack.
flavor: Other beasts totally dig hanging out with timber wolves.

name: Tome of Intellect
text: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavor: Just a compilation of napkins of intellect.

name: Tracking
text: Discover a card from your deck.
flavor: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!

name: Voidwalker
text: Taunt
flavor: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.

name: Voodoo Doctor
text: Battlecry: Restore #2_Health.
flavor: Voodoo is an oft-misunderstood art. But it is art.

name: Whirlwind
text: Deal $1 damage to ALL_minions.
flavor: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

name: Acidic Swamp Ooze
text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon.
flavor: Oozes love Flamenco.  Don't ask.

name: Arcane Explosion
text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: This spell is much better than Arcane Implosion.

name: Bloodfen Raptor
flavor: "Kill 30 raptors." - Hemet Nesingwary

name: Bluegill Warrior
text: Charge
flavor: He just wants a hug.   A sloppy... slimy... hug.

name: Bonedigger Geist
text: Battlecry: Spend a Corpse to gain +1/+2.
flavor: He's a grave-half-full kind of geist.

name: Captain's Parrot
text: Battlecry: Draw a Pirate from your deck.
flavor: Pirates and Parrots go together like Virmen and Carrots.

name: Chaos Strike
text: Give your hero +2_Attack this turn. Draw a card.
flavor: "What do we want?" "CHAOS!"\n "When do we want it?"\n "WHEN LEAST EXPECTED!"

name: Cleave
text: [x]Deal $2 damage to\ntwo random enemy\nminions.
flavor: Hey you two…could you stand next to each other for a second…

name: Defrost
text: Draw a card.\nSpend 2 Corpses to draw another.
flavor: Shouldn't this NOT be a Frost spell?

name: Divine Spirit
text: Double a minion's Health.
flavor: Double the trouble. Double the fun!

name: Fan of Knives
text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. Draw_a card.
flavor: I wouldn't say I LOVE knives, but I'm definitely a fan.

name: Felstalker
text: Battlecry: Discard a random card.
flavor: This puppy chews up cards instead of shoes.

name: Fiery War Axe
flavor: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

name: Flametongue Totem
text: Adjacent minions have +2_Attack.
flavor: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems.  There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

name: Frostbolt
text: Deal $3 damage to a_character and Freeze it.
flavor: It is customary to yell "Chill out!" or "Freeze!" or "Ice ice, baby!" when you play this card.

name: Frostwolf Grunt
text: Taunt
flavor: Grunting is what his father did and his father before that.   It's more than just a job.

name: Heroic Strike
text: Give your hero +4_Attack this turn.
flavor: Really, if you're a hero, this is every strike.

name: Holy Light
text: Restore #8 Health to your hero.
flavor: If you are often bathed in Holy Light, you should consider wearing sunscreen.

name: Icicle
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it's Frozen, draw a card.
flavor: This may appear weak at frost glance, but it's actually a very ice spell.

name: Kobold Geomancer
text: Spell Damage +1
flavor: In the old days, Kobolds were the finest candle merchants in the land. Then they got pushed too far...

name: Kor'vas Bloodthorn
text: [x]Charge, Lifesteal After you play a card with Outcast, return this to your hand.
flavor: Illidan taught her that demon hunters should sacrifice EVERYTHING… but she still brought Lifesteal just in case.

name: Kul Tiran Chaplain
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Health.
flavor: The maritime Kul Tiran clergy are unique among priests for using holy saltwater.

name: Mark of the Wild
text: Give a minion Taunt and +2/+3.\n(+2 Attack/+3 Health)
flavor: Not to be confused with Jim of the Wild.

name: Mind Blast
text: Deal $5 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: This spell blasts you directly in the MIND.

name: Murloc Tidehunter
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1_Murloc Scout.
flavor: "Death will rise, from the tides!"

name: Novice Engineer
text: Battlecry: Draw a card.
flavor: "Half of this class will not graduate… since they'll have been turned to chickens." - Tinkmaster Overspark, teaching Gizmos 101.

name: Obliterate
text: Destroy a minion. Deal_3 damage to your hero.
flavor: Why is 6 afraid of 7? Because Obliterate 9!

name: Pursuit of Justice
text: Give +1 Attack to Silver Hand Recruits you summon this game.
flavor: "Is this about justice or just us?"

name: River Crocolisk
flavor: Edward "Lefty" Smith tried to make luggage out of a river crocolisk once.

name: Rockbiter Weapon
text: Give a friendly character +3 Attack this turn.
flavor: This would be real handy if your enemy is made of rock.

name: Sap
text: Return an enemy minion to your opponent's hand.
flavor: Rogues love sappy movies.

name: Selective Breeder
text: Battlecry: Discover a copy of a Beast in your deck.
flavor: His ethics are top notch. Just look at that smiling kitty!

name: Shadow Word: Death
text: Destroy a minion with 5_or more Attack.
flavor: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

name: Shadow Word: Pain
text: Destroy a minion with 3_or less Attack.
flavor: A step up from a spell cast by many beginning acolytes: "Shadow Word: Annoy".

name: Shield Block
text: Gain 5 Armor.\nDraw a card.
flavor: Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.

name: Shiv
text: Deal $1 damage.\nDraw a card.
flavor: Rogues are experts at SHIV-al-ry.

name: Sightless Watcher
text: Battlecry: Look at 3 cards in your deck. Choose one to put on top.
flavor: What he lacks in sight, he makes up for in sleight-of-tentacle tricks.

name: Starving Buzzard
text: Whenever you summon a Beast, draw a card.
flavor: If you feed him, he loses his whole identity.

name: Vanessa VanCleef
text: Combo: Add a copy of the last card your opponent played to your hand.
flavor: Some people collect stamps or flowers. She collects enemies.

name: Wild Growth
text: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavor: Grow your own mana crystals with this Mana Crystal Growth Kit, only 39.99!

name: Windfury
text: Give a minion Windfury.
flavor: Windfury is like Earthfury and Firefury, but more light and airy.

name: Aldrachi Warblades
text: Lifesteal
flavor: The ancient Aldrachi were the greatest warriors in the universe. Imagine their power if they'd put the handle at the END of the blade.

name: Animal Companion
text: Summon a random Beast Companion.
flavor: You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer!  Huffer is more trouble than he's worth.

name: Arcane Intellect
text: Draw 2 cards.
flavor: Playing this card makes you SMARTER.  And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

name: Brightwing
text: Battlecry: Add a random Legendary minion to your_hand.
flavor: Little faerie dragons are made of sugar and spice and maniacal vice.

name: Charge
text: Give a friendly minion +2 Attack and Charge.
flavor: "Guys! Guys! Slow down!" - some kind of non-warrior minion

name: Consecration
text: Deal $2 damage to all enemies.
flavor: Consecrated ground glows with Holy energy.  But it smells a little, too.

name: Coordinated Strike
text: Summon three 1/1_Illidari with Rush.
flavor: Undisputed champions of "Dancing with the Satyrs."

name: Dalaran Mage
text: Spell Damage +1
flavor: You don't see a lot of Dalaran warriors.

name: Drain Life
text: Deal $2 damage. Restore #2 Health to your hero.
flavor: "I've just sucked one year of your life away."

name: Frost Nova
text: Freeze all enemy minions.
flavor: Hey man, that's cold.  Literally and metaphorically.

name: Graveyard Shift
text: [x]Summon two 1/1\nZombies with Reborn.
flavor: "Why are we even open at night? This place is dead!"

name: Hammer of Wrath
text: Deal $3 damage.\nDraw a card.
flavor: A good paladin has many tools.  Hammer of Wrath, Pliers of Vengeance, Hacksaw of Justice, etc.

name: Healing Touch
text: Restore #8 Health.
flavor: 8 Health, no waiting.

name: Hellfire
text: Deal $3 damage to ALL_characters.
flavor: It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

name: Hex
text: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
flavor: If you Hex a Murloc... it really isn't much of a change, is it?

name: Holy Nova
text: Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions. Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell.  Also, you're probably a jerk.

name: Ironforge Rifleman
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
flavor: "Ready! Aim! Drink!"

name: Ironfur Grizzly
text: Taunt
flavor: "Bear Carcass 1/10"

name: Kill Command
text: Deal $3 damage. If you control a Beast, deal\n$5 damage instead.
flavor: "Kill!", he commanded.

name: Magma Rager
flavor: He likes to think he is powerful, but pretty much anyone can solo Molten Core now.

name: Raid Leader
text: Your other minions have +1 Attack.
flavor: "That's a 50 DKP minus!"

name: Razorfen Hunter
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1_Boar.
flavor: Someone did mess with Tuskerr once.  ONCE.

name: Rimefang Sword
text: [x]After your hero attacks,\nreduce the Cost of a spell\nin your hand by (1).
flavor: Those definitely don't rhyme.

name: Satyr Overseer
text: After your hero attacks, summon a 2/2 Satyr.
flavor: What he lacks in communication skills, he makes up for with highly responsive staffing allocations.

name: Savage Roar
text: Give your characters +2_Attack this turn.
flavor: What do they roar? Nobody can quite tell, but it sounds like "Elephant Macho Breeze".  It's probably not that, though.

name: Shadow Bolt
text: Deal $4 damage\nto a minion.
flavor: It’s a Bolt.   It's made out of Shadow.   What more do you need to know!

name: Shadowed Spirit
text: [x]Deathrattle: Deal 3\ndamage to the\nenemy hero.
flavor: They can't all be grim grinning ghosts.

name: Shattered Sun Cleric
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +1/+1.
flavor: They always have a spare flask of Sunwell Energy Drink™!

name: Silverback Patriarch
text: Taunt
flavor: He likes to act like he's in charge, but the silverback matriarch actually runs things.

name: Soul Cleave
text: Lifesteal\nDeal $2 damage to two random enemy minions.
flavor: The way to a demon's soul is through its stomach.

name: Swipe
text: Deal $4 damage to an enemy and $1 damage to all other enemies.
flavor: When a bear rears back and extends his arms, he's about to Swipe!  ... or hug.

name: War Cache
text: Add a random Warrior minion, spell, and weapon to your hand.
flavor: It's much tidier than Illidan's storage locker.

name: Warsong Commander
text: Whenever you summon a minion with 3 or less Attack, give it Charge.
flavor: The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

name: Wolfrider
text: Charge
flavor: Orcish raiders ride wolves because they are well adapted to harsh environments, and because they are soft and cuddly.

name: Ymirjar Deathbringer
text: [x]Taunt. Deathrattle: Spend 3\nCorpses to summon a 3/3\nRisen Ymirjar with Taunt.
flavor: Purple cotton candy is the snack of choice in Ymirheim.

name: Assassin's Blade
flavor: Guaranteed to have been owned by a real assassin.   Certificate of authenticity included.

name: Assassinate
text: Destroy an enemy minion.
flavor: If you don't want to be assassinated, move to the Barrens and change your name. Good luck!

name: Blessing of Kings
text: Give a minion +4/+4. (+4 Attack/+4 Health)
flavor: Given the number of kings who have been assassinated, are you sure you want their blessing?

name: Chillwind Yeti
flavor: He always dreamed of coming down from the mountains and opening a noodle shop, but he never got the nerve.

name: Dragonling Mechanic
text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/1 Mechanical Dragonling.
flavor: She is still working on installing the rocket launcher add-on for Mr. Bitey.

name: Fireball
text: Deal $6 damage.
flavor: This spell is useful for burning things.  If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

name: Footman
text: Taunt\nAdjacent minions are Immune while attacking.
flavor: Ha ha HAAAH huHAH!

name: Gnomish Inventor
text: Battlecry: Draw a card.
flavor: She's never quite sure what she's making, she just knows it's AWESOME!

name: Houndmaster
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2 and Taunt.
flavor: "Who let the dogs out?" he asks.  It's rhetorical.

name: Kor'kron Elite
text: Charge
flavor: The Kor'kron are the elite forces of Garrosh Hellscream. Let's just say you don't want to run into these guys while wearing a blue tabard.

name: Multi-Shot
text: Deal $3 damage to two random enemy minions.
flavor: You see, it's all about throughput.

name: Nordrassil Druid
text: Battlecry: The next spell you cast this turn costs_(3)_less.
flavor: The World Tree Nordrassil provides life-giving energy to the world--and excellent mana savings.

name: Oasis Snapjaw
flavor: His dreams of flying and breathing fire like his idol will never be realized.

name: Ogre Magi
text: Spell Damage +1
flavor: Training Ogres in the art of spellcasting is a questionable decision.

name: Old Murk-Eye
text: Charge. Has +1 Attack for each other Murloc on the battlefield.
flavor: He's a legend among murlocs.  "Mrghllghghllghg!", they say.

name: Plaguebringer
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Poisonous.
flavor: One sip and you've got the grippe.

name: Polymorph
text: Transform a minion\ninto a 1/1 Sheep.
flavor: There was going to be a pun in this flavor text, but it just came out baa-d.

name: Power Infusion
text: Give a minion +2/+6.
flavor: It infuses, it enthuses, it amuses!

name: Repulsive Gargantuan
text: Enemy characters\ncan't be healed.
flavor: "EW, YUCK, GROSS, ICKY-" "Stop, you're hurting my feelings!"

name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta
text: Taunt
flavor: Sen'jin Village is nice, if you like trolls and dust.

name: Shadow Word: Ruin
text: Destroy all minions with 5 or more Attack.
flavor: Discovered by a worgen priest after a giant spilled a drink on her new white robes.

name: SI:7 Infiltrator
text: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy Secret.
flavor: What will she destroy? It’s a secret!

name: Stormwind Knight
text: Charge
flavor: They're still embarrassed about "The Deathwing Incident".

name: Truesilver Champion
text: Whenever your hero attacks, restore #3_Health to it.
flavor: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)

name: Warsong Outrider
text: Rush
flavor: When it comes to the Warsong clan, outriders are the insiders.

name: Water Elemental
text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
flavor: Don't summon a water elemental at a party.  It'll dampen the mood.

name: Windspeaker
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Windfury.
flavor: Is there anything worse than a Windspeaker with halitosis?

name: Aegwynn, the Guardian
text: Spell Damage +2\nDeathrattle: The next minion_you draw inherits these powers.
flavor: With Medivh as her son, nothing YOU do could ever disappoint her.

name: Arcanite Reaper
flavor: No… actually you should fear the Reaper.

name: Bloodlust
text: Give your minions +3_Attack this turn.
flavor: blaarghghLLGHRHARAAHAHHH!!

name: Booty Bay Bodyguard
text: Taunt
flavor: You can hire him... until someone offers him enough gold to turn on you.

name: Chaos Nova
text: Deal $4 damage to all_minions.
flavor: Illin' Illidan laying down the damage, flinging out the chaos as far as he can manage.

name: Darkscale Healer
text: Battlecry: Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: Healing is just something she does in her free time.  It's more of a hobby really.

name: Elite Tauren Chieftain
text: Battlecry: Give both players the power to ROCK! (with a Power Chord card)
flavor: He's looking for a drummer.  The current candidates are: Novice Engineer, Sen'jin Shieldmasta', and Ragnaros the Firelord.

name: Felsoul Jailer
text: [x]Battlecry: Your opponent\ndiscards a minion.\nDeathrattle: Return it.
flavor: He can lock 'em up, but he just can't keep 'em.

name: Frostwolf Warlord
text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly minion on the battlefield.
flavor: The Frostwolves are locked in combat with the Stormpike Expedition over control of Alterac Valley.  Every attempt at peace-talks has ended with Captain Galvangar killing the mediator.

name: Glaivebound Adept
text: Battlecry: If your hero attacked this turn,\ndeal 4 damage.
flavor: "Initiate, this is your glaive. Think of it as an extension of yourself... Did you just throw it?!"

name: Gurubashi Berserker
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +3_Attack.
flavor: No Pain, No Gain.

name: Night Elf Huntress
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage\nto three different enemies.\n(You pick the targets!)
flavor: A triple threat, all on her own.

name: Nightblade
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Your face is the place you'd probably least like a dagger, and where rogues are most likely to deliver them.

name: Possessifier
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Fighters with Rush and Reborn.
flavor: Beating the best, being the best, and brainwashing the rest.

name: Righteousness
text: Give your minions Divine Shield.
flavor: Shield yourself in righteousness! It feels like a warm fuzzy blanket.

name: Rime Sculptor
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 2/1 Rime Elementals with "Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy."
flavor: Also known as a Rapper.

name: Sprint
text: Draw 4 cards.
flavor: Rogues are not good joggers.

name: Stormpike Commando
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.
flavor: The Stormpike Commandos are demolition experts.  They also bake a mean cupcake.

name: Tundra Rhino
text: Your Beasts have Charge.
flavor: Tundra rhinos are often mistaken for kodos.  Or am I mistaken?

name: Warsong Grunt
text: Rush. After this attacks and kills a minion, it may attack again.
flavor: Where do you think the chickens learned to be angry?

name: Archmage
text: Spell Damage +1
flavor: You earn the title of Archmage when you can destroy anyone who calls you on it.

name: Boulderfist Ogre
flavor: "ME HAVE GOOD STATS FOR THE COST"

name: Corrupted Ashbringer
text: Lifesteal
flavor: Put your faith in the blight!

name: Dread Infernal
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to ALL other characters.
flavor: "INFERNOOOOOOOOOO!" - Jaraxxus, Eredar Lord of the Burning Legion

name: Fire Elemental
text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage.
flavor: He can never take a bath. Ewww.

name: Gelbin Mekkatorque
text: Battlecry: Summon an AWESOME invention.
flavor: He's the leader of the gnomes, and an incredible inventor.  He's getting better, too; He turns things into chickens WAY less than he used to.

name: Gnomelia, S.A.F.E. Pilot
text: [x]Rush. Also damages minions next to whomever this attacks. Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
flavor: Never learned how to L.A.N.D.

name: High Inquisitor Whitemane
text: Battlecry: Summon all friendly minions that died_this turn.
flavor: No one told her that champions want to sleep in.

name: Lord of the Arena
text: Taunt
flavor: He used to be a 2100+ rated arena player, but that was years ago and nobody can get him to shut up about it.

name: Overseer Frigidara
text: Battlecry: Draw 2 spells.\nIf they're both Frost spells, deal 2 damage to all enemies.
flavor: Is your refrigidarator running?

name: Reckless Rocketeer
text: Charge
flavor: One Insane Rocketeer.   One Rocket full of Explosives.   Infinite Fun.

name: Starfire
text: Deal $5 damage.\nDraw a card.
flavor: Balance is important to druids.  This card is perfectly balanced.

name: Vanish
text: Return all minions to their owner's hand.

name: Barrens Stablehand
text: Battlecry: Summon a random Beast.
flavor: It’s never Huffer.

name: Core Hound
flavor: You don’t tame a Core Hound. You just train it to eat someone else before it eats you.

name: Enslaved Fel Lord
text: Taunt. Also damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.
flavor: He's not really chained up. He just wears that to scare the imps when they get too unruly.

name: Flamestrike
text: Deal $5 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

name: Guardian of Kings
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Restore #6 Health to your hero.
flavor: Holy beings from the beyond are so cliché!

name: Patchwerk
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a random\nminion in your opponent's\n_hand, deck, and battlefield._
flavor: This card is so good, it might need patch work.

name: Siegebreaker
text: Taunt\nYour other Demons have +1 Attack.
flavor: Has a side hustle as a siegebroker.

name: Stormwind Champion
text: Your other minions have +1/+1.
flavor: When Deathwing assaulted the capital, this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive. Now he's all bitter and stuff.

name: War Golem
flavor: Golems are not afraid, but for some reason they still run when you cast Fear on them.  Instinct, maybe?  A desire to blend in?

name: Arcane Devourer
text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2/+2.
flavor: Likes her magic with a pinch of salt.

name: Gift of the Wild
text: Give your minions +2/+2 and Taunt.
flavor: The gift that keeps on living.

name: Inner Demon
text: Give your hero +8_Attack this turn.
flavor: Critical component of any tragic backstory.

name: Ironbark Protector
text: Taunt
flavor: I dare you to attack Darnassus.

name: Lord Marrowgar
text: [x]Battlecry: Raise ALL of your Corpses as 1/1 Risen Golems with Rush. For each that can't fit, give one +2/+2.
flavor: And now, Lord Marrowgar with the weather.

name: Natalie Seline
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion and gain its Health.
flavor: She discovered Xal'atath, Blade of the Black Empire, a terrible weapon of shadow magic that could both swallow a soul and cut a mean julienne.

name: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a character. If it's friendly, restore 8 Health. If it's an ___enemy, deal 8 damage.
flavor: Friendly Fire: Off

name: Mind Control
text: Take control of an enemy minion.
flavor: Nominated as "Spell Most Likely to Make Your Opponent Punch the Wall."

name: Ysera the Dreamer
text: Battlecry: Add one of each Dream card to your hand.
flavor: Quick! Quick! Write it down before you forget them all!

name: Backstab
text: Deal $2 damage to an undamaged minion.
flavor: It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.

name: Horn of Winter
text: Refresh 2 Mana Crystals.
flavor: Much better than the Horn of Loseter.

name: Innervate
text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavor: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

name: Preparation
text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: "Be Prepared" - Rogue Motto

name: Shadowstep
text: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It_costs (2) less.
flavor: Rogue dance troops will sometimes Shadowstep away at the end of a performance.  Crowds love it.

name: Snowflipper Penguin
flavor: On land, a group of penguins is called a "waddle."

name: Abusive Sergeant
text: Battlecry: Give a minion +2_Attack this turn.
flavor: ADD ME TO YOUR DECK, MAGGOT!

name: Air Elemental
text: Elusive
flavor: Makes a mean puff pastry.

name: Arcane Artificer
text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain Armor equal to its_Cost.
flavor: Ethereal armor dissipates in 6 hours which can cause extreme awkwardness for first time buyers.

name: Arcane Shot
text: Deal $2 damage.
flavor: Magi conjured arcane arrows to sell to hunters, until hunters learned just enough magic to do it themselves.  The resulting loss of jobs sent Stormwind into a minor recession.

name: Armor Vendor
text: Battlecry: Give 4 Armor to_each hero.
flavor: "You look like the kind of person that would buy three sets of armor. One to wear, a spare, and a spare for the spare."

name: Babbling Book
text: Battlecry: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavor: His idol is the Green Hills of Stranglethorn, and he won't shut up about it.

name: Battlefiend
text: After your hero attacks, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: Say what you like about my hatchet-headed hooligan, he’s my battle-friend.

name: Beaming Sidekick
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Health.
flavor: Sure, I'll carry the water! And the food! And the tents! And the cursed monkey paw!

name: Body Bagger
text: Battlecry: Gain a Corpse.
flavor: Gotta get that bag.

name: Crimson Clergy
text: Overheal: Draw a card.
flavor: He won't drop the ball.

name: Crimson Sigil Runner
text: Outcast: Draw a card.
flavor: He's not the fastest of the bunch, but he'll take a stab at it anyway.

name: Deadly Poison
text: Give your weapon +2_Attack.
flavor: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells.  Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison?  Poison Elemental?  Nobody wants that.

name: Demonic Studies
text: Discover a Demon. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: "Do you wanna summon a demon? I wanna summon a demon!"

name: Elven Archer
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
flavor: Don't bother asking her out on a date.  She'll shoot you down.

name: Execute
text: Destroy a damaged enemy minion.
flavor: It's okay, he deserved it.

name: Fire Fly
text: Battlecry: Add a 1/2 Elemental to your hand.
flavor: Archnemeses: small children with glass jars.

name: Flame Geyser
text: Deal $2 damage.\nAdd a 1/2 Elemental to_your hand.
flavor: Oh, a wise geyser eh?

name: Flame Imp
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavor: Imps like being on fire.  They just do.

name: Flash Heal
text: Restore #5 Health.
flavor: Flash!  Ahhhhhhh~

name: Glacial Shard
text: Battlecry: Freeze an_enemy.
flavor: Ice, ice, baby!

name: Holy Smite
text: Deal $3 damage\nto a minion.
flavor: It doesn't matter how pious you are.  Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

name: Illidari Studies
text: Discover an Outcast card. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: "Don't read texts and drive."

name: Jeweled Macaw
text: Battlecry: Add a random Beast to your hand.
flavor: It’s not LITERALLY jeweled. The goblins were terribly disappointed.

name: Lesser Jasper Spellstone
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. @(Gain 3 Armor to upgrade.)
flavor:
In ancient woods, elves fought the curse
The demon’s shadow to disperse
But hatred raged and frail souls turned
Now horned and hooved their forests burned.

name: Lightning Bolt
text: Deal $3 damage. Overload: (1)
flavor: Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt!

name: Living Roots
text: Choose One - Deal $2 damage; or Summon two 1/1 Saplings.
flavor: 2 out of 2 saplings recommend that you summon the saplings.

name: Mortal Coil
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card.
flavor: If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let's be honest, you should get to draw some cards.

name: Muck Pools
text: Transform a friendly minion into one that costs (1) more.
flavor: Making a dredger is easier than you'd think. You don't need to worry about mucking it up!

name: Murloc Tidecaller
text: Whenever you summon a Murloc, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: This guy gets crazy strong at family reunions.

name: Murmy
text: Reborn
flavor: Unlike other mummies, they rolled him up with rice, sliced cucumbers, and soy sauce on the side.

name: Novice Zapper
text: Spell Damage +1 Overload: (1)
flavor: The novices would prefer that he did not.

name: Noxious Cadaver
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage\nto an enemy and your hero.
flavor: Shouldn't have eaten that gas station sushi.

name: Overdraft
text: [x]Tradeable Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals to deal that much damage.
flavor: Wait. It costs mana to be out of mana?!

name: Plagued Grain
text: Gain 4 Corpses. Shuffle four Crates into your deck that summon a 2/2 Undead when drawn.
flavor: Oh, don’t mind the smell. They're just aged!

name: Psychic Conjurer
text: Battlecry: Copy a card in your opponent’s deck and add it to your hand.
flavor: "I see... a WISP? Why do you have a wisp?!"

name: Raven Idol
text: Choose One -\nDiscover a minion; or Discover a spell.
flavor: Was petrified when it found out it didn't make the cut for Azerothian Idol.

name: Righteous Protector
text: Taunt\nDivine Shield
flavor: Original name was Tubular Protector, but this seems more bodacious.

name: Sanguine Depths
text: [x]Deal 1 damage to a \nminion and give it \n+2 Attack.
flavor: There may not be any skeletons in the closets at Castle Nathria, but there sure are souls in the basement.

name: Shield Slam
text: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each Armor you have.
flavor: "What is a better weapon? The sharp one your enemies expect, or the blunt one they ignore?" - The Art of Warrior, Chapter 9

name: Ship's Chirurgeon
text: After you summon a minion, give it +1 Health.
flavor: Knows the answer to every medical question except how to pronounce his name.

name: Shooting Star
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.
flavor: Literally starstruck.

name: Skeletal Sidekick
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Undead +2 Attack.
flavor: He's got your back. And your arm.

name: Slam
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.
flavor: "Dun da dun, dun da dun": if you've heard an ogre sing this, it's too late.

name: Southsea Deckhand
text: Has Charge while you have a weapon equipped.
flavor: Pirates are into this new fad called "Planking".

name: Spirit Bomb
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion and your hero.
flavor: Might take a few episodes to power up.

name: Spirit Claws
text: [x]Has +2 Attack while you\nhave Spell Damage.
flavor: They'll be MUCH easier to use once they add the spiritthumb.

name: Swashburglar
text: Battlecry: Add a random card from another class to_your hand.
flavor: Was almost named "Swashb-AAAARRHHH-gler"

name: Town Crier
text: Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion from your deck.
flavor: When he was younger, he was the town crybaby.

name: Tracking
text: Discover a card from your deck.
flavor: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!

name: Vicious Slitherspear
text: [x]After you cast a spell,\ngain +1 Attack until\nyour next turn.
flavor: He goes by ‘Fun-Loving Slitherspear’ on his dating profile.

name: Voidwalker
text: Taunt
flavor: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.

name: Voodoo Doctor
text: Battlecry: Restore #2_Health.
flavor: Voodoo is an oft-misunderstood art. But it is art.

name: Whirlwind
text: Deal $1 damage to ALL_minions.
flavor: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

name: Witchwood Apple
text: Add two 2/2 Treants to your hand.
flavor: An apple a day keeps the worgen at bay.

name: Worgen Infiltrator
text: Stealth
flavor: If you want to stop a worgen from infiltrating, just yell, "No! Bad boy!"

name: Ancestral Knowledge
text: Draw 2 cards. Overload: (1)
flavor: MOMMMMMYYYYYYYYY!!!

name: Annoy-o-Tron
text: Taunt\nDivine Shield
flavor: The inventor of the Annoy-o-Tron was immediately expelled from Tinkerschool, Tinkertown, and was eventually exiled from the Eastern Kingdoms altogether.

name: Arcanologist
text: Battlecry: Draw a Secret.
flavor: What did you draw? Shhhh… it’s a secret.

name: Argent Protector
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Divine Shield.
flavor: "I'm not saying you can dodge fireballs.  I'm saying with this shield, you won't have to."

name: Bash
text: Deal $3 damage.\nGain 3 Armor.
flavor: You might think bashing doesn't take a lot of practice.  It doesn't.

name: Battlefield Necromancer
text: [x]At the end of your turn,\nraise a Corpse as a 1/3\n__Risen Footman with Taunt.__
flavor: Coming soon: the Hand Necromancer and the Deck Necromancer.

name: Bladestorm
text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. Repeat until one dies.
flavor:
Dear minions: 

Woosh, woosh, woosh, woosh, woosh.

Best regards,
Bladestorm

name: Blood Tap
text: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.\nSpend 2 Corpses to give them +1/+1 more.
flavor: Come join us in the tavern! We have whatever you're drinking on tap. Yes, even that.

name: Bloodbound Imp
text: Whenever this attacks, deal 2 damage to your_hero.
flavor: ALWAYS read the terms and conditions.

name: Bloodmage Thalnos
text: Spell Damage +1\nDeathrattle: Draw a card.
flavor: He's in charge of the Annual Scarlet Monastery Blood Drive!

name: Bloodsail Raider
text: Battlecry: Gain Attack equal to the Attack\nof your weapon.
flavor: "I only plunder on days that end in 'y'."

name: Chaos Strike
text: Give your hero +2_Attack this turn. Draw a card.
flavor: "What do we want?" "CHAOS!"\n "When do we want it?"\n "WHEN LEAST EXPECTED!"

name: Crazed Alchemist
text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.
flavor: "You'll love my new recipe!" he says... especially if you're not happy with your current number of limbs.

name: Cult Neophyte
text: Battlecry: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more next_turn.
flavor: Make a new recruit's deficiencies your efficiencies.

name: Defile
text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. If any die, cast this again.
flavor: This spell was originally designed to help warlocks clean up their hard drives.

name: Dire Wolf Alpha
text: Adjacent minions have +1_Attack.
flavor: We are pretty excited about the upcoming release of Dire Wolf Beta, just repost this sign for a chance at a key.

name: Dirty Rat
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Your opponent summons a random minion from their hand.
flavor: It's not his fault…  Someone keeps stealing his soap!

name: Doomsayer
text: At the start of your turn, destroy ALL minions.
flavor: He's almost been right so many times. He was sure it was coming during the Cataclysm.

name: Drain Soul
text: Lifesteal\nDeal $3 damage\nto a minion.
flavor: Cleans even the toughest clogs with just a flick of the wrist!

name: Equality
text: Change the Health of ALL minions to 1.
flavor: We are all special unique snowflakes... with 1 Health.

name: Eviscerate
text: Deal $2 damage. Combo: Deal $4 damage instead.
flavor: There is a high cost to Eviscerating your opponent. You might tweak your elbow! That really hurts!

name: Explosive Trap
text: Secret: When your hero is attacked, deal $2 damage to all enemies.
flavor: It traps your food AND cooks it for you!

name: Faerie Dragon
text: Elusive
flavor: Adorable.  Immune to Magic.  Doesn't pee on the rug.  The perfect pet!

name: Fan of Knives
text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. Draw_a card.
flavor: I wouldn't say I LOVE knives, but I'm definitely a fan.

name: Fiery War Axe
flavor: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

name: Flametongue Totem
text: Adjacent minions have +2_Attack.
flavor: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems.  There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

name: Flash of Light
text: Restore #4 Health.\nDraw a card.
flavor: Hey! No cameras allowed!

name: Fogsail Freebooter
text: Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, deal_2_damage.
flavor: Goes cheap on wardrobe so he can spend on weaponry.

name: Freezing Trap
text: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, return it to its owner's hand. It costs (2) more.
flavor: "Dang, that's cold." - appropriate response to Freezing Trap, or a mean joke.

name: Frightened Flunky
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Discover a Taunt_minion.
flavor: Some people just aren't cut out to be supervillain material.

name: Frost Strike
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. If that kills it, Discover a Frost Rune card.
flavor: Anyone up for some frost bowling?

name: Frostbolt
text: Deal $3 damage to a_character and Freeze it.
flavor: It is customary to yell "Chill out!" or "Freeze!" or "Ice ice, baby!" when you play this card.

name: Grimestreet Outfitter
text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: If you bargain hard, he'll throw in the hat.

name: Hand of A'dal
text: Give a minion +2/+1.\nDraw a card.
flavor: When it meets the Hand of Gul'dan, they're SHAKING.

name: Harbinger of Winter
text: Deathrattle: Draw a\nFrost spell.
flavor: Winter: it be comin'.

name: Hematurge
text: Battlecry: Spend a\nCorpse to Discover a\nBlood Rune card.
flavor: She's here to PUMP! YOU UP!

name: Ice Trap
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, return it to their hand instead. It costs (1) more.
flavor: I literally watched the Hunter place it down in front of me and I still stepped in it.

name: Immolation Aura
text: Deal $1 damage to all minions twice.
flavor: If you can't take the heat, stop standing in the fire.

name: Injured Tol'vir
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Deal 3 damage to this minion.
flavor: Me-OW!

name: Kobold Geomancer
text: Spell Damage +1
flavor: In the old days, Kobolds were the finest candle merchants in the land. Then they got pushed too far...

name: Loot Hoarder
text: Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavor: Always roll need.

name: Mad Bomber
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage randomly split between all other characters.
flavor: He's not really all that crazy, he is just not as careful with explosives as he should be.

name: Mana Geode
text: Overheal: Summon a\n2/2 Crystal.
