flavor: He just wants people to see his vacation photos.

name: Lord of the Arena
text: Taunt
flavor: He used to be a 2100+ rated arena player, but that was years ago and nobody can get him to shut up about it.

name: Priestess of Elune
text: Battlecry: Restore #4 Health to your hero.
flavor: If she threatens to "moon" you, it's not what you think.

name: Reckless Rocketeer
text: Charge
flavor: One Insane Rocketeer.   One Rocket full of Explosives.   Infinite Fun.

name: Savannah Highmane
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Hyenas.
flavor: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion gets slowly consumed by hyenas.

name: Siphon Soul
text: Destroy a minion. Restore #3 Health to_your hero.
flavor: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul.  You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

name: Starfire
text: Deal $5 damage.\nDraw a card.
flavor: Balance is important to druids.  This card is perfectly balanced.

name: Sunwalker
text: Taunt\nDivine Shield
flavor: She doesn’t ACTUALLY walk on the Sun.  It's just a name.  Don’t worry!

name: Sylvanas Windrunner
text: Deathrattle: Take\ncontrol of a random\nenemy minion.
flavor: Sylvanas was turned into the Banshee Queen by Arthas, but he probably should have just killed her because it just pissed her off.

name: Temple Enforcer
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
flavor: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

name: The Beast
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a\n3/3 Pip Quickwit for\nyour opponent.
flavor: He lives in Blackrock Mountain.  He eats Gnomes.  That's pretty much it.

name: The Black Knight
text: Battlecry: Destroy an enemy minion with Taunt.
flavor: He was sent by the Lich King to disrupt the Argent Tournament.   We can pretty much mark that a failure.

name: Vanish
text: Return all minions to their owner's hand.

name: Windfury Harpy
text: Windfury
flavor: Harpies are not pleasant sounding.  That's the nicest I can put it.

name: Ancient of Lore
text: Choose One - Draw 2 cards; or Restore #5 Health.
flavor: Go ahead, carve your initials in him.

name: Ancient of War
text: Choose One -\n+5 Attack; or +5 Health and Taunt.
flavor: Young Night Elves love to play "Who can get the Ancient of War to Uproot?"  You lose if you get crushed to death.

name: Archmage Antonidas
text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a 'Fireball' spell to_your hand.
flavor: Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor, and Jaina's mentor.  This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.

name: Baron Geddon
text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL other characters.
flavor: Baron Geddon was Ragnaros's foremost lieutenant, until he got FIRED.

name: Core Hound
flavor: You don’t tame a Core Hound. You just train it to eat someone else before it eats you.

name: Flamestrike
text: Deal $4 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

name: Gladiator's Longbow
text: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
flavor: The longbow allows shots to be fired from farther away and is useful for firing on particularly odorous targets.

name: Gorehowl
text: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.
flavor: Grommash Hellscream's famous axe.  Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar's possession.  Quite the mystery!

name: Guardian of Kings
text: Battlecry: Restore #6 Health to your hero.
flavor: Holy beings from the beyond are so cliché!

name: Prophet Velen
text: Double the damage and healing of your spells and Hero Power.
flavor: He's been exiled from his home, and all his brothers turned evil, but otherwise he doesn't have a lot to complain about.

name: Ravenholdt Assassin
text: Stealth
flavor: Just mail him a package with a name and 10,000 gold.  He'll take care of the rest.

name: Sprint
text: Draw 4 cards.
flavor: Rogues are not good joggers.

name: Stormwind Champion
text: Your other minions have +1/+1.
flavor: When Deathwing assaulted the capital, this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive. Now he's all bitter and stuff.

name: War Golem
flavor: Golems are not afraid, but for some reason they still run when you cast Fear on them.  Instinct, maybe?  A desire to blend in?

name: Al'Akir the Windlord
text: Charge, Divine Shield, Taunt, Windfury
flavor: He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords.  And the other three don't let him forget it.

name: Grommash Hellscream
text: Charge\nEnrage: +6 Attack
flavor: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes!  Maybe not his best decision.

name: Gruul
text: At the end of each turn, gain +1/+1 .
flavor: He's Gruul "the Dragonkiller".  He just wanted to cuddle them… he never meant to…

name: Ironbark Protector
text: Taunt
flavor: I dare you to attack Darnassus.

name: Lay on Hands
text: Restore #8 Health. Draw_3 cards.
flavor: A grammatically awkward life saver.

name: Ragnaros the Firelord
text: Can't attack. At the end of your turn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: Ragnaros was summoned by the Dark Iron dwarves, who were eventually enslaved by the Firelord.  Summoning Ragnaros often doesn’t work out the way you want it to.

name: Tirion Fordring
text: Divine Shield, Taunt Deathrattle: Equip a 5/3_Ashbringer.
flavor: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

name: Twisting Nether
text: Destroy all minions.
flavor: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

name: Alexstrasza
text: Battlecry: Set a hero's remaining Health to 15.
flavor: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder brings life and hope to everyone.  Except Deathwing.  And Malygos.  And Nekros.

name: Cenarius
text: Choose One - Give your other minions +2/+2; or Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.
flavor: Yes, he's a demigod. No, he doesn't need to wear a shirt.

name: King Krush
text: Charge
flavor: The best defense against King Krush is to have someone you don’t like standing in front of you.

name: Lord Jaraxxus
text: Battlecry: Destroy your hero and replace it with Lord Jaraxxus.
flavor: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"

name: Malygos
text: Spell Damage +5
flavor: Malygos hates it when mortals use magic.  He gets so mad!

name: Nozdormu
text: Players only have 15 seconds to take their_turns.
flavor: Time to write some flavor text.

name: Onyxia
text: Battlecry: Summon 1/1 Whelps until your side of the battlefield is full.
flavor: Onyxia long manipulated the Stormwind Court by disguising herself as Lady Katrana Prestor.   You would have thought that the giant wings and scales would have been a giveaway.

name: Ysera
text: At the end of your turn, add_a Dream Card to_your hand.
flavor: Ysera rules the Emerald Dream.  Which is some kind of green-mirror-version of the real world, or something?

name: Deathwing
text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions and discard your_hand.
flavor: Once a noble dragon known as Neltharion, Deathwing lost his mind and shattered Azeroth before finally being defeated.  Daddy issues?

name: Mind Control
text: Take control of an enemy minion.
flavor: Nominated as "Spell Most Likely to Make Your Opponent Punch the Wall."

name: Pyroblast
text: Deal $10 damage.
flavor: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

name: Sea Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each other minion on the battlefield.
flavor: See?  Giant.

name: Mountain Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
flavor: His mother said that he was just big boned.

name: Molten Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each damage your hero has taken.
flavor: He gets terrible heartburn.  BECAUSE HE IS FULL OF LAVA.

name: Devouring Swarm
text:
[x]Choose an enemy minion.
Your minions attack it,
then return any that die
 to your hand.
flavor: Collect… essence.

name: Hot Streak
text: Your next Fire spell this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: It's easy to catch fire when you're on fire.

name: Provoke
text: [x]Tradeable\nChoose a friendly minion.\nEnemy minions attack it.
flavor: "Heh, Greetings. Heh, Greetings. Heh, Greetings. I will crush you!"

name: Blackwater Cutlass
text: [x]Tradeable After you Trade this, reduce the Cost of a spell in your hand by (1).
flavor: Popular around Stormwind for slashing prices.

name: Blessed Goods
text: Discover a Secret, weapon, or Divine Shield minion.
flavor: Guaranteed to contain no haunted dolls, cursed rings, or corrupted runeblades, or your money back.

name: Call of the Grave
text: [x]Discover a Deathrattle minion. If you have enough Mana to play it, trigger its Deathrattle.
flavor: Necromancy is motivational speaking for the dead.

name: Command the Elements
text: [x]Questline: Play 3 cards with Overload. Reward: Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals.
flavor: What, you expected a shaman to have trouble with a place called STORMWIND?

name: Defend the Dwarven District
text: Questline: Deal damage with 3 spells. Reward: Your Hero Power can target minions.
flavor: Don't shoot until you see the purples of their eyes.

name: Druid of the Reef
text: [x]Choose One - Transform into\na 3/1 Shark with Rush; or\na 1/3 Turtle with Taunt.
flavor: “Wow, there’s a whole sunken city down here!”

name: Elwynn Boar
text: [x]Deathrattle: If you had 7 Elwynn Boars die this game, equip a 15/3 Sword of a ___Thousand Truths.@ (@/7)
flavor: Be grateful we lowered the requirement from 65,340,285.

name: Final Showdown
text: Questline: Draw 4 cards in one turn. Reward: Reduce the Cost of the cards drawn by (1).
flavor: Finally. The last Hearthstone card.

name: Find the Imposter
text: Questline: Play 2\nSI:7 cards.\nReward: Add a Spy Gizmo to your hand.
flavor: My money is on the evil advisor to the king.

name: First Flame
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Add a Second Flame to your hand.
flavor: You never forget your first love: fire.

name: Investment Opportunity
text: [x]Draw an Overload card.
flavor: "It's a real fixer-upper. I mean a REAL fixer upper."

name: Leatherworking Kit
text:
[x]After three friendly
Beasts die, draw a Beast
and give it +1/+1.
Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: Combining taxidermy and tailoring.

name: Lost in the Park
text: Questline: Gain 4 Attack with your hero. Reward: Gain 5 Armor.
flavor: Mister, have you seen my Archdruid?

name: Metamorfin
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: If you've cast a Fel spell this turn, gain +2/+2.
flavor: Always wanted to be the green ranger.

name: Overdraft
text: [x]Tradeable Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals to deal that much damage.
flavor: Wait. It costs mana to be out of mana?!

name: Parrrley
text: Swap this for a card in your opponent's deck.
flavor: Time to engage in some unfriendly negotiations.

name: Peasant
text: At the start of your turn, draw a card.
flavor: Better pay them, or they'll join the Defias.

name: Prismatic Jewel Kit
text: [x]After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, give minions in your hand +1/+1. Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: The divine trick to jewelcrafting is tumbling your own rocks.

name: Raid the Docks
text: [x]Questline: Play 3 Pirates.\nReward: Draw a weapon.
flavor: Winning the annual Ratchet Regatta really went to their heads.

name: Rise to the Occasion
text: Questline: Play 3 different 1-Cost cards.\nReward: Equip a 1/4 Light's Justice.
flavor: Faith is never lost, only repurposed.

name: Seek Guidance
text: [x]Questline: Play a 2, 3, and 4-Cost card. Reward: Discover a card from your deck.
flavor: Xyrella was looking for spiritual guidance but found deck-building tips instead.

name: Shadowblade Slinger
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've taken\ndamage this turn, deal that\n_much to an enemy minion.
flavor: Throwing knives isn’t easy for a warlock. It’s quite painful, in fact.

name: Shadowcloth Needle
text:
[x]After you cast a Shadow
spell, deal 1 damage
to all enemies.
Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: Makes light of the darkest repair jobs.

name: Shard of the Naaru
text: Tradeable\nSilence all enemy minions.
flavor: Fell from the sky, huh? I'll give you ten gold.

name: Shiver Their Timbers!
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If you control a Pirate, deal $5 instead.
flavor: Who knew there was overlap between pirates and lumberjacks?

name: SI:7 Extortion
text: Tradeable\nDeal $3 damage to an undamaged character.
flavor: "It's a dangerous world out there. It'd be a shame if your protection insurance were to suddenly run out…"

name: Sigil of Alacrity
text: [x]At the start of your next\nturn, draw a card and\n_reduce its Cost by (1).
flavor: Red means stop. Purple means GO REALLY FAST.

name: Sorcerer's Gambit
text: Questline: Cast a Fire, Frost, and Arcane spell. Reward: Draw a spell.
flavor: After "the incident," the Stockades really had to reevaluate their anti-mage protocols.

name: Sow the Soil
text: Choose One - Give your minions +1 Attack; or_ Summon a 2/2 Treant.
flavor: "I'M NOT A TAILOR!"

name: Stockades Guard
text: [x]Battlecry: Give a\nfriendly minion Taunt.
flavor: "You there! Defend this prison with your life. It's my break."

name: The Demon Seed
text: [x]Questline: Take 10 damage on your turns. Reward: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Just need some elbow grease to get this working. Oh, and your soul.

name: Touch of the Nathrezim
text: [x]Deal $2 damage to a\nminion. If it dies, restore\n3 Health to your hero.
flavor: "You're giving your soul to me? I'm touched."

name: Vibrant Squirrel
text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle 4 Acorns\ninto your deck. When drawn,\nsummon a 2/1 Squirrel.
flavor: Oh, they're cute now. Just wait till they unleash a Savage Roar.

name: Voidtouched Attendant
text: Both heroes take one extra damage from all sources.
flavor: Don't TOUCH the Void. You don't know where it's been.

name: Wicked Shipment
text: [x]Tradeable Summon @ 1/1 |4(Imp, Imps). (Upgrades by 2 when Traded!)
flavor: All horns on deck!

name: Auctioneer Jaxon
text: [x]Whenever you Trade,\nDiscover a card from your\n_deck to draw instead.
flavor: "Who's up for a brand-new wisp? This thing's in perfect condition, folks! Never been played..."

name: Auctionhouse Gavel
text: [x]After your hero attacks, reduce the Cost of a Battlecry minion in your hand by (1).
flavor: "I want to be a judge! Or an auctioneer! Look, all I want is one of those sweet, tiny hammers."

name: Bloodbound Imp
text: Whenever this attacks, deal 2 damage to your_hero.
flavor: ALWAYS read the terms and conditions.

name: Bolner Hammerbeak
text: [x]After you play a Battlecry\nminion, repeat the first\n__Battlecry played this turn._
flavor: Show him how to do something once, and he can do it a thousand times. This turn.

name: Celestial Ink Set
text:
[x]After you spend 5 Mana on
spells, reduce the Cost of a
spell in your hand by (5).
Lose 1 Durability.
flavor:
"Dear Mother,
I have a lot of spells and burst in my hand. You should maybe run more armor and healing next time.
Cordially,
Your child"

name: City Tax
text: [x]Tradeable\nLifesteal. Deal $1 damage\nto all enemy minions.
flavor: "Look pal, I don't care what kind of legion you saved the world from, pay up or else."

name: Composting
text: Give your minions\n"Deathrattle: Draw\n__a card."
flavor: The Treants really give their bodies to the cause.

name: Deeprun Engineer
text: Battlecry: Discover a Mech. It costs (1) less.
flavor: Deeprun Tram instructions: 300,000 pieces, 600,000 steps.

name: Defias Leper
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na Shadow spell, deal\n2 damage.
flavor: Do NOT eat Cookie’s Seafood Surprise.

name: Doggie Biscuit
text: [x]Tradeable Give a minion +2/+3. After you Trade this, give a friendly minion Rush.
flavor: Reserved for Edwin’s favorite lapdogs.

name: Encumbered Pack Mule
text: [x]Taunt\nWhen you draw this, add a\n_copy of it to your hand.
flavor: "Now I can pick up EVERY knick-knack."

name: Fel Barrage
text: [x]Deal $2 damage to\nthe lowest Health\nenemy, twice.
flavor: Kurtrus leapt over a tombstone towards the demonic invaders, yelling "PEW! PEW!" as he shot them down with fel magic.

name: Florist
text: [x]At the end of your turn,\nreduce the Cost of a Nature\n_spell in your hand by (1).
flavor:
Trade district.
Trade district a shop.
Color Legendary.
Color Legendary golden.
Rose is a rose is a rose is a rose.

name: Garrote
text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to the
enemy hero. Shuffle 3
Bleeds into your deck that
deal $2 more when drawn.
flavor: "I don't have money… but what I do have is a particular set of skills."

name: Harbor Scamp
text: Battlecry: Draw a Pirate.
flavor: Hey, that gnome looks awfully fishy…

name: Ignite
text: Deal $@ damage. Shuffle an Ignite into\nyour deck that deals\none more damage.
flavor: "So there I was in the Deadmines, I had VanCleef by the throat, and I was just about to let him have it when... <sniff> What's that smell?"

name: Jerry Rig Carpenter
text: Battlecry: Draw a Choose One spell and split it.
flavor: Choose Two – Good; Cheap; or Fast.

name: Maestra of the Masquerade
text: You start the game as a different class until you play a Rogue card.
flavor: She doesn't drop character until after the DVD commentary.

name: Mailbox Dancer
text: [x]Battlecry: Add a Coin to your hand. Deathrattle: Give your opponent one.
flavor: He is the reason why we have 7 mailboxes in this district.

name: Man the Cannons
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion and $1 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Now THAT’S a lotta splash damage!

name: Moonlit Guidance
text: [x]Discover a copy of a card in your deck. If you play it this turn, draw the original.
flavor: Guff always makes the best decisions after 2 AM.

name: Noble Mount
text: G[x]ive a minion +1/+1 and Divine Shield. When it dies, summon a Warhorse.
flavor: The Horde rued the day that Cariel was allowed to take her pet to work.

name: Pandaren Importer
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a\nspell that didn't start\nin your deck.
flavor: She carries everything you didn't want and more!

name: Prestor's Pyromancer
text: Battlecry: Your next\nFire spell has Spell\nDamage +2.
flavor: Ah, yeah. This guy. Definitely not an evil dragon in disguise either.

name: SI:7 Skulker
text: [x]Stealth\nBattlecry: The next card\n__you draw costs (1) less.
flavor: Burying bones and calling it skullduggery.

name: Stockades Prisoner
text: [x]Starts Dormant.\nAfter you play 3 cards,\nthis awakens.
flavor: She was arrested for lockpicking. Her imprisonment was not well thought out.

name: Twilight Deceptor
text: Battlecry: If any hero took damage this turn, draw a Shadow spell.
flavor: Nobody asks questions if you're carrying a clipboard.

name: Wickerclaw
text: After your hero gains Attack, this minion\ngains +2 Attack.
flavor: They say pets tend to look like their owners.

name: Aimed Shot
text: Deal $3 damage. Your next Hero Power deals 2 more damage.
flavor: Wait, you WEREN'T aiming before?!

name: Alliance Bannerman
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a minion.\nGive minions in your\nhand +1/+1.
flavor: Back in my day, we had to carry our inspiration uphill both ways to war.

name: Amulet of Undying
text: [x]Tradeable Resurrect @ friendly Deathrattle |4(minion, minions). (Upgrades when Traded!)
flavor: Didn't seem to work out too well for this guy.

name: Brilliant Macaw
text: Battlecry: Repeat the last Battlecry you played.
flavor: He's been repeating the same shanty for a month. Four pirates walked the plank last week. Middle of the ocean, just walked right off.

name: Cargo Guard
text: At the end of your turn, gain 3 Armor.
flavor: *Arrrrrmor

name: Catacomb Guard
text: [x]Lifesteal Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to an enemy minion.
flavor: A little dark down here. So much for "serving the Light."

name: Chaos Leech
text: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to a minion.\nOutcast: Deal $5 instead.
flavor: Otherwise known as a nematode.

name: Charged Call
text: [x]Discover a @-Cost minion and summon it. (Upgraded for each Overload card you played this game!)
flavor: You have a collect call from "AL'AKIR, LORD OF AIR AND THE FOUR WINDS." Do you accept these charges?

name: Cookie the Cook
text: [x]Lifesteal\nDeathrattle: Equip a 2/3\n__Stirring Rod with Lifesteal._
flavor: Unsurprisingly, "Seafood Surprise" was no one's favorite dish.

name: Copycat
text: Battlecry: Add a copy of the next card your opponent plays to your hand.
flavor: Whatever you do, DON’T let two of them meet.

name: Crow's Nest Lookout
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage\nto the left and right-most\nenemy minions.
flavor: The extra eyes means he sees extra good.

name: Defias Cannoneer
text: [x]After your hero attacks,\ndeal 2 damage to a\nrandom enemy twice.
flavor: "... three."

name: Dreaded Mount
text: [x]Give a minion +1/+1.\nWhen it dies, summon\nan endless Dreadsteed.
flavor: This is the summoning that never ends, and it goes on and on my friends...

name: Enthusiastic Banker
text: [x]At the end of your turn, store a card from your deck. Deathrattle: Add the stored cards to your hand.
flavor: She offers 0% interest.

name: Entrapped Sorceress
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a\n_Quest, Discover a spell.
flavor: "If you're a city guard, you have to tell me. Otherwise, it's entrapment."

name: Flightmaster Dungar
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a flightpath and go Dormant. Awaken with a bonus __when you complete it!
flavor: Flight’s a little bumpy, but there’s plenty of legroom.

name: Golakka Glutton
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Beast and gain +1/+1.
flavor: We lost our last cook to one of these.

name: Heavy Plate
text: Tradeable\nGain 8 Armor.
flavor: "You asked for unbendable, unwavering armor–I don't see why you're upset."

name: Impatient Shopkeep
text: Tradeable\nRush
flavor: "Oi! This ain't a museum, lady."

name: Lightbringer's Hammer
text: Lifesteal\nCan't attack heroes.
flavor: This entire city must be purged. Or at least just the minions.

name: Lion's Frenzy
text: Has Attack equal to the number of cards you've drawn this turn.
flavor: Only as sharp as your draw.

name: Loan Shark
text: [x]Battlecry: Give your\nopponent a Coin.\n__Deathrattle: You get two.
flavor: Pay up or you'll be swimming with the fishes.

name: Nobleman
text: Battlecry: Create a Golden copy of a random card in your hand.
flavor: What class are you? 'Upper.'

name: Northshire Farmer
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Beast. Shuffle three 3/3 copies_into_your_deck.
flavor: Dual-classed into Farmer/Rancher.

name: Oracle of Elune
text: [x]After you play a minion\nthat costs (2) or less,\nsummon a copy of it.
flavor: Even the moon goddess needs to back up her databases.

name: Package Runner
text: Can only attack if you have at least 8 cards in hand.
flavor: He could go... all... the... way!

name: Psyfiend
text: After you cast a Shadow spell, deal 2 damage to each hero.
flavor: Listens to a LOT of K-pop.

name: Ramming Mount
text: [x]Give a minion +2/+2 and Immune while attacking. When it dies, summon a Ram.
flavor: Tavish has some road rage issues to work through.

name: Righteous Defense
text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 1. Give the stats it lost to a minion in your hand.
flavor: Paladins... Always stealing someone else’s thunder. And stats.

name: Rustrot Viper
text: [x]Tradeable\nBattlecry: Destroy your\nopponent's weapon.
flavor: Poisonous to weapons.

name: SI:7 Operative
text: Rush\nAfter this attacks a minion, gain Stealth.
flavor: What do you mean you're out of ponies?

name: Stormwind Freebooter
text: Battlecry: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn.
flavor: "Just don't stab the ankles! I want his boots!"

name: Stormwind Piper
text: After this minion attacks,\ngive your Beasts +1/+1.
flavor: Throws crazy parties with the Rat King—except when it's raining.

name: Traveling Merchant
text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly _minion you control.
flavor: Northrend's greatest export: funnel cakes.

name: Two-Faced Investor
text: [x]At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of a card in your hand by (1). (50% chance to increase.)
flavor: Should never have opened that joint account...

name: Blacksmithing Hammer
text: [x]Tradeable\nAfter you Trade this,\n_gain +2 Durability.
flavor: Passed through the hands of countless smiths, and eventually the skulls of their enemies.

name: Canal Slogger
text: Rush, Lifesteal\nOverload: (1)
flavor: "Another Monday in the canals huh? What a slog."

name: Cheesemonger
text:
[x]Whenever your opponent
casts a spell, add a random
spell with the same Cost
to your hand.
flavor: Secretly, the Big Cheese of SI:7.

name: Counterfeit Blade
text: [x]Battlecry: Get a copy of a random friendly Deathrattle minion that died this game.
flavor: Don't worry, the blade retracts into the handle!

name: Dark Alley Pact
text: Summon a Fiend with Taunt and stats equal to your hand size.
flavor: "With your help, I can finally install some proper lighting in this alley."

name: Deepwater Evoker
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a spell.\nGain Armor equal to\nits Cost.
flavor: "Cap'n! We've hit an iceberg! ...No, it’s not my fault!"

name: Demonic Assault
text: [x]Deal $3 damage.\nSummon two 1/3\nVoidwalkers with Taunt.
flavor: Right next to the demonic pepper.

name: Edwin, Defias Kingpin
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a card. If you\nplay it this turn, gain +2/+2\nand repeat this effect.
flavor: He’s not going to tear down the walls of Stormwind sitting around in the Hall of Fame.

name: Felgorger
text: Battlecry: Draw a Fel spell. Reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor: The 'everything green' diet.

name: Fire Sale
text: Tradeable\nDeal $3 damage\nto all minions.
flavor: Everything is 50% off now that our warehouse burned down.

name: First Blade of Wrynn
text: [x]Divine Shield\nBattlecry: Gain Rush if this\nhas at least 4 Attack.
flavor: Valedictorian of knight school.

name: Granite Forgeborn
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Elementals in your hand and deck by (1).
flavor: If he stops being useful, just turn him into a kitchen countertop.

name: Guild Trader
text: Tradeable\nSpell Damage +2
flavor: Somehow, she manages six different professions.

name: Hullbreaker
text: [x]Battlecry and Deathrattle:\nDraw a spell. Your hero takes\ndamage equal to its Cost.
flavor: Breaks through the hard shell to reach the ship's gooey interior.

name: Kodo Mount
text: Give a minion +4/+2 and Rush. When it dies, summon a Kodo.
flavor: No matter how big they are or how many times you tell them no, they STILL won't stay off the couch.

name: Monstrous Parrot
text: Battlecry: Get a copy of the last friendly Deathrattle minion that died.
flavor: What kind of crackers are you feeding that thing?

name: Multicaster
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a card for\n_each different spell school_\n_you've cast this game.@ (@)
flavor: Has a questionable talent tree.

name: Park Panther
text: [x]Rush. Whenever this\nattacks, give your hero\n+3 Attack this turn.
flavor: Somebody called animal control once. It didn't work out very well for anybody.

name: Persistent Peddler
text: Tradeable\nDeathrattle: Summon a Persistent Peddler from your deck.
flavor: Loves pyramid schemes and bike rides.

name: Remote-Controlled Golem
text:
[x]After this takes damage,
shuffle two Golem Parts into
your deck. When drawn,
__summon a 2/1 Mech.
flavor: Someone got a little too excited inventing a can opener.

name: Rodent Nest
text: Deathrattle: Summon five 1/1 Rats.
flavor: Pig sty? No, this is a rat's nest.

name: Royal Librarian
text: [x]Tradeable\nBattlecry: Silence\na minion.
flavor: Books on how to flip the Auction House are down that way.

name: SI:7 Informant
text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other SI:7 card you've played this game.
flavor: Sitting in a tavern all day and looking scary is hard work, but somebody has to do it.

name: Sketchy Information
text: [x]Draw a Deathrattle card\nthat costs (4) or less.\nTrigger its Deathrattle.
flavor: "I trust the Forsaken as far as I can smell them. Which, I guess is actually pretty far."

name: Spice Bread Baker
text: Battlecry: Restore Health to your hero equal to your hand size.
flavor: The secret ingredient is love. And a LOT of butter.

name: Spirit Alpha
text: [x]After you play a card with\nOverload, summon a 2/3\nSpirit Wolf with Taunt.
flavor: Just like in the natural world, the alpha of the species is bright purple.

name: Stubborn Suspect
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 3-Cost minion.
flavor: He keeps saying "I'll never talk," but no one has actually asked him anything.

name: Suckerhook
text: [x]At the end of your turn,\ntransform your weapon into\none that costs (1) more.
flavor: A moderately better dining companion than Suckerbeard.

name: Sunwing Squawker
text: [x]Battlecry: Repeat the last\nspell you've cast on a\n__friendly minion on this.
flavor: Most parrots repeat curses, not blessings.

name: Void Shard
text: Lifesteal\nDeal $4 damage.
flavor: Light's easy. Void's hard.

name: Arcane Overflow
text:
[x]Deal $8 damage to an
enemy minion. Summon a
 Remnant with stats equal
to the excess damage.
flavor: On this ship, when you can’t use an int, learn how to float.

name: Darkbishop Benedictus
text: Start of Game: If the spells in your deck are all Shadow, enter Shadowform.
flavor: Dark Bishop takes Light Pawn, check.

name: Defias Blastfisher
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage\nto a random enemy. Repeat\nfor each of your Beasts.
flavor: She's a dynamite fishing trainer.

name: Imported Tarantula
text: [x]Tradeable Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Spiders with Poisonous and Rush.
flavor: Which forbidden forest did you get this from?

name: Lion's Guard
text: [x]Battlecry: If you have 15\nor less Health, gain\n+2/+4 and Taunt.
flavor: She takes the lion's share of the credit, too.

name: Need for Greed
text: Tradeable\nDraw 3 cards. If drawn this turn, this costs (3).
flavor: Sorry guys, I TOTALLY meant to click greed.

name: Runed Mithril Rod
text:
[x]After you draw 4 cards,
reduce the Cost of cards
in your hand by (1).
Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: "Please, I need these greens to disenchant them." —Every Enchanter Ever

name: Sanctum Chandler
text: After you cast a Fire spell, draw a spell.
flavor: Has been burning at both ends to keep the place illuminated.

name: Shady Bartender
text: Tradeable\nBattlecry: Give your Demons +2/+2.
flavor: One sin and tonic, coming right up.

name: Stormwind Guard
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1.
flavor: 1% Guarding, 99% providing directions.

name: The Rat King
text: [x]Rush. Deathrattle: Go\nDormant. Revive after 5\nfriendly minions die.
flavor: "I'm the giant rat that makes all of da rules!"

name: Wealth Redistributor
text: [x]Taunt. Battlecry: Swap the\nAttack of the highest and\nlowest Attack minion.
flavor: WOULD YE LIKE CASH BACK?\n[  ] YAR HAR        [  ] YO HO

name: Anetheron
text: [x]Costs (1) if your hand is full.
flavor: Leads every demonic invasion. Hopefully this one turns out better than the World Tree.

name: Battleground Battlemaster
text: Adjacent minions\nhave Windfury.
flavor: Farm! No wait… Mine! No wait… 3 to Smith—they're taking Farm. Get there now!

name: Best in Shell
text: [x]Tradeable\nSummon two 2/7\n_Turtles with Taunt.
flavor: The agility course takes a while.

name: City Architect
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two\n0/5 Castle Walls\nwith Taunt.
flavor: "Oh, wait, I had this turned the wrong way. This was supposed to be a tower."

name: Cornelius Roame
text: [x]At the start and end\n_of each player's turn,\ndraw a card.
flavor: Raised two perfectly normal daughters. Then one died and brought doom to Stormwind.

name: Cowardly Grunt
text: Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your deck.
flavor: Cowardice is the wisest part of valor.

name: Entitled Customer
text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to your hand size to all other minions.
flavor: "Do you have any idea how much mana I've spent at your store? 6."

name: Grey Sage Parrot
text: Battlecry: Repeat the last spell you've cast that costs (6) or more.
flavor: Nothing is more terrifying than a parrot squawking "Pyroblast!"

name: Highlord Fordragon
text: [x]Divine Shield After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, give a minion __in your hand +5/+5.
flavor: "Through my faith and my courage, I shall be protected. And through my honor and sacrifice, another will rise in my place."

name: Lady Prestor
text: [x]Battlecry: Transform minions in your deck into random Dragons. (They keep their __original stats and Cost.)
flavor: To her credit, the best bodyguard for the king WOULD be a dragon in disguise.

name: Proving Grounds
text: Summon two minions from your deck.\nThey fight!
flavor: 1v1 me on Proving Grounds, DH only, no items, 4 stocks.

name: Rats of Extraordinary Size
text:
[x]Summon seven 1/1
Rats. Any that can't fit
on the battlefield go to
your hand with +4/+4.
flavor: They don't care if you believe they exist.

name: Tiny Toys
text: Summon four random 5-Cost minions.\nMake them 2/2.
flavor: Mom, they're action figures!

name: Clumsy Courier
text: Battlecry: Cast the highest Cost spell from your hand.
flavor: Not the nacho cheese!

name: Elekk Mount
text: Give a minion +4/+7 and Taunt. When it dies, summon an Elekk.
flavor: Pink Elekks are on parade!

name: Irebound Brute
text: [x]Taunt\nCosts (1) less for each\ncard drawn this turn.
flavor: "You don't understand… ogres are an untapped market for vengeance and hatred!"

name: Lothar
text: At the end of your turn, attack a random enemy minion. If it dies, gain +3/+3.
flavor: Has been around since before there were paladins and those newfangled paladin mechs.

name: Mr. Smite
text: Your Pirates have Charge.
flavor: “Please, Mr. Smite was my father. Call me Yorik.”

name: SI:7 Assassin
text: [x]Costs (1) less for each SI:7 card you've played this game. Combo: Destroy an enemy minion.
flavor: You can't keep the streets clean if you're afraid to get your hands dirty.

name: Goliath, Sneed's Masterpiece
text: [x]Battlecry: Fire five rockets at enemy minions that deal 2 damage each. (You pick the targets!)
flavor: “Listen, this baby has blades, rockets, and rocket blades. Only thing it doesn’t have is good gas mileage.”

name: Grand Magus Antonidas
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast a Fire spell on each of your last three turns, cast 3 Fireballs at ___random enemies.@ (@/3)
flavor: He's really disappointed Jaina became a frost mage.

name: Jace Darkweaver
text: Battlecry: Cast all Fel spells you've played this game (targets enemies if possible).
flavor: As a former mage, making the transition from fire to felfire was quite easy.

name: Maddest Bomber
text: Battlecry: Deal 12 damage randomly split among all other characters.
flavor: Talk about a name that limits design space.

name: Mo'arg Forgefiend
text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Gain 8 Armor.
flavor: Enraged not by fel energies, but by an itchy nose he cannot scratch.

name: Sheldras Moontree
text: [x]Battlecry: The next 3\nspells you draw are\nCast When Drawn.
flavor: Sheldras really went to the park for his pilgrimage.

name: Varian, King of Stormwind
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion to gain Rush. Repeat for Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: Man, this guy is so cool. Sure hope nothing happens to him.

name: Goldshire Gnoll
text: [x]Rush\nCosts (1) less for each\n__other card in your hand.
flavor: They're searching for one ring. They're pretty sure someone said Goldshire.

name: Curse of Agony
text:
[x]Shuffle three Agonies
into the opponent's deck.
They deal Fatigue damage
when drawn.
flavor: Now, fools, you shall all understand my back pain!

name: Dreadprison Glaive
text: [x]Honorable Kill: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to the enemy hero.
flavor: Keep your allies close. Keep your evil demons in your weapon.

name: Gift of the Naaru
text:
[x]Restore #3 Health to
all characters. If any
are still damaged,
draw a card.
flavor: What do I look like, a charity?

name: Gnome Private
text: [x]Honorable Kill: Gain\n+2 Attack.
flavor: She's doing her part.

name: Grave Defiler
text: Battlecry: Copy a Fel spell in your hand.
flavor: She keeps her Fel spells nice and organized in her defiling cabinet.

name: Hit It Very Hard
text: Gain +10 Attack and "Can't attack heroes" this turn.
flavor: "...and very fast."

name: Irondeep Trogg
text: [x]After your opponent\ncasts a spell, summon\n_another Irondeep Trogg.
flavor: STOP AGGROING MORE!

name: Ivus, the Forest Lord
text: [x]Battlecry: Spend the rest of your Mana and gain +2/+2, Rush, Divine Shield, or Taunt at random for each.
flavor: He's always welcome at the local tavern, unlike a certain Ancient.

name: Shadow Word: Devour
text: Choose a minion.\nIt steals 1 Health from\n_ALL other minions.
flavor: Devouring souls is like a buffet. You have to take a little bit of everything.

name: Shivering Sorceress
text: [x]Battlecry: Reduce the Cost\nof the highest Cost spell\nin your hand by (1).
flavor: Remember to use your sick days wisely.

name: Shoulder Check
text: Tradeable\nGive a minion +2/+1 and Rush.
flavor: One... two... yeah, all present and correct.

name: Windchill
text: Freeze a minion.\nDraw a card.
flavor: The thermometer says it’s 0° right now, but with the windchill it feels like -25°.

name: Wings of Hate (Rank 1)
text: Summon two 1/1\nFelwings. (Upgrades\nwhen you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: For one day each February, they become the Wings of Love.

name: Amplified Snowflurry
text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power costs (0) and Freezes the target.
flavor: I bet it’s just exaggerating.

name: Battle Vicar
text: Battlecry: Discover a\nHoly spell.
flavor: She's the most down-to-earth paladin you'll ever meet... until she stands up.

name: Battleworn Vanguard
text: [x]After your hero attacks,\nsummon two 1/1 Felwings.
flavor: "Welcome to Dun Baldar Felwings! Do you want 'em mild, spicy, or BURNING Legion?"

name: Bless
text: [x]Give a minion +2 Health,\nthen set its Attack to be\nequal to its Health.
flavor: Bless is bmore.

name: Bloodseeker
text: Honorable Kill:\nGain +1/+1.
flavor: What do you mean shooting them in the back isn’t honorable?!

name: Bracing Cold
text:
[x]Restore #5 Health to
your hero. Reduce the
Cost of a random spell
in your hand by (2).
flavor: Worst. Hug. Ever.

name: Capture Coldtooth Mine
text: Choose One - Draw your lowest Cost card;\nor Draw your highest\nCost card.
flavor: We hit a huge haul! Or wait… no, it's just a coin.

name: Clawfury Adept
text: Battlecry: Give all other friendly characters +1 Attack this turn.
flavor: The Inept Clawfury is a danger only to themselves.

name: Corporal
text: Honorable Kill: Give\nyour other minions\nDivine Shield.
flavor: When he’s sitting in the graveyard ready to rez, he’s incorporal.

name: Dragonbane Shot
text: [x]Deal $2 damage. Honorable Kill: Add a Dragonbane Shot to your hand.
flavor: *Only effective against small dragons.

name: Dun Baldar Bunker
text: [x]At the end of your turn, draw a Secret and set its Cost to (1). Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: Brutalist architecture for brutal times.

name: Field of Strife
text: [x]Your minions have\n+1 Attack.\nLasts 3 turns.
flavor: I heard it's lovely there around this time of year.

name: Forsaken Lieutenant
text: Stealth. After you play\na Deathrattle minion, become a 2/2 copy of it with Rush.
flavor: WE didn’t forsake him. He CHOSE to defend a tower against the entire Alliance front line by himself.

name: Frostbite
text: Deal $3 damage.\nHonorable Kill: Your opponent's next spell costs (2) more.
flavor: The sad reality of a raging toothpaste addiction.

name: Frozen Buckler
text: Gain 10 Armor. At the start of your next turn, lose 5 Armor.
flavor: "Hey, I bet I could shatter this."

name: Furious Howl
text: Draw a card.\nRepeat until you have at least 3 cards.
flavor: Hunters make the worst neighbors.

name: Gankster
text: [x]Stealth\nAfter your opponent plays\na minion, attack it.
flavor: UGH! IM GETTING MY MAIN!

name: Ice Trap
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, return it to their hand instead. It costs (1) more.
flavor: I literally watched the Hunter place it down in front of me and I still stepped in it.

name: Iceblood Garrison
text: [x]At the end of your turn,\ndeal $1 damage to all_\nminions. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: On weekends, it hosts the local community theater rehearsals.

name: Keen Reflex
text: [x]Deal $1 damage to all\nminions. Honorable Kill:\nGain +1 Attack this turn.
flavor: All of Onyxia's whelps were no match for Kurtrus' backflip.

name: Luminous Geode
text: After a friendly minion is healed, give it +2 Attack.
flavor: No take candle. BE CANDLE.

name: Ram Commander
text: [x]Battlecry: Add two\n1/1 Rams with Rush\nto your hand.
flavor: Get your RAM in pairs for better performance.

name: Reconnaissance
text: Discover a Deathrattle minion from another class. It costs (2) less.
flavor: “But Commander, I already did the connaissance.”

name: Ring of Courage
text: Tradeable\nGive a minion +1/+1. Repeat for each enemy minion.
flavor: Now to find the Ring of Wisdom and Ring of Power.

name: Seeds of Destruction
text:
[x]Shuffle four Rifts
into your deck. They
summon a 3/3 Dread
Imp when drawn.
flavor: May your harvest be dreadful.

name: Siphon Mana
text: Deal $2 damage.\nHonorable Kill: Reduce the Cost of spells in your hand by (1).
flavor: Why spend mine when I can take yours?

name: Sleetbreaker
text: Battlecry: Add a Windchill to your hand.
flavor: Likes chilly, hates chili.

name: Sneaky Scout
text: [x]Stealth\nHonorable Kill: Your next\nHero Power costs (0).
flavor: Do you know what they call Scouts that aren't sneaky? Target practice.

name: Spirit Mount
text: [x]Give a minion +1/+2 and Spell Damage +1. When it dies, summon a Spirit Raptor.
flavor: Bru'kan said his spirit would always be with us. He failed to mention that his raptor’s would be too.

name: Stormpike Quartermaster
text: After you cast a spell,\ngive a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Frozen funnel cakes taste just like ice cream, if you pretend real hard.

name: The Lobotomizer
text: [x]Honorable Kill: Get a copy of the top card of your opponent's deck.
flavor: This may hurt a little, but don't worry, you won't remember it.

name: To the Front!
text: Your minions cost (2) less this turn (but not less than 1).
flavor: Except healers. You go to the back.

name: Tooth of Nefarian
text: [x]Deal $3 damage.\nHonorable Kill: Discover a\nspell from another class.
flavor: Nefarian: Lord of Blackrock, creator of the chromatic dragonflight, victim of several root canals.

name: Vitality Surge
text: Draw a minion.\nRestore Health to your hero equal to its Cost.
flavor: If your vitality lasts longer than four hours, consult a Priest.

name: Build a Snowman
text: Summon a 3/3 Snowman that Freezes. Add "Build a Snowbrute" to your hand._
flavor: This is the coolest spell once you get it rolling.

name: Bunker Sergeant
text: [x]Battlecry: If your opponent has 2 or more minions, deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Best hair in the valley.

name: Cheaty Snobold
text: After an enemy is Frozen, deal 3 damage to it.
flavor: This one will knock you out cold.

name: Coldtooth Yeti
text: Combo: Gain +3 Attack.
flavor: Its arrival heralds the Brain Freeze Yeti.

name: Deliverance
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Honorable Kill: Summon a new 3/3\ncopy of it.
flavor: In 30 minutes or less, or else it’s free!

name: Desecrated Graveyard
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
destroy your lowest Attack
minion to summon a
4/4 Shade. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: People are dying to get in.

name: Direwolf Commander
text: Honorable Kill: Summon a 2/2 Wolf with Stealth.
flavor: When you’re riding a wolf, it’s in charge and you're allowed to make suggestions.

name: Double Agent
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na card from another class,\n_summon a copy of this.
flavor: And under the Alliance tabard? Another Horde tabard.

name: Flag Runner
text: Whenever a friendly minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: I see your argument, but…do you have a flag?

name: Frostwolf Kennels
text: [x]At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Wolf with Stealth. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: The #1 reason Alliance members defect to the Horde is to adopt a cute frostwolf puppy.

name: Full-Blown Evil
text: Deal $5 damage randomly split among\nall enemy minions. Repeatable this turn.
flavor: This isn’t your average, everyday evil.\nThis is ADVANCED evil.

name: Glory Chaser
text: After you play a Taunt minion, draw a card.
flavor: When you've reached the peak of competition twice, how hard can winning one valley be?

name: Grimtotem Bounty Hunter
text: Battlecry: Destroy an enemy Legendary minion.
flavor: He’ll take a big weight off your shoulders.

name: Heart of the Wild
text: Give a minion +2/+2, then give your Beasts +1/+1.
flavor: In each of us beats a wild heart. Except the Forsaken.

name: Hold the Bridge
text: [x]Give a minion +2/+1 and Divine Shield. It gains Lifesteal until end of turn.
flavor: You! Shall not! Pass!

name: Horn of Wrathion
text: Draw a minion. If it's\na Dragon, summon two 2/1 Whelps with Rush.
flavor: You can count the rings and find out Wrathion's true age.

name: Kobold Taskmaster
text: [x]Battlecry: Add 2 Armor Scraps to your hand that give +2 Health to a minion.
flavor: Fabled questgiver of the “Get me candle”, “Get me another candle”, and “Get me 11 more candle” questline.

name: Pathmaker
text: [x]Battlecry: Cast the other\nchoice from the last Choose\nOne spell you've cast. @Battlecry: {0}
flavor: You can never choose the wrong path if you make your own.

name: Piggyback Imp
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/1 Imp.
flavor: Imp my ride.

name: Popsicooler
text: [x]Deathrattle: Freeze two\nrandom enemy minions.
flavor: Just passing through Alterac on its way to apply for a job at the Ice Cream Citadel.

name: Pride Seeker
text: [x]Battlecry: Your next\nChoose One card costs\n(2) less.
flavor: When you're putting your head in the lion's mouth, you may as well dress the part.

name: Ram Tamer
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a\nSecret, gain +1/+1\nand Stealth.
flavor: Pump up the ram, pump it up. While your hooves are stompin’.

name: Reflecto Engineer
text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of all minions in both players' hands.
flavor: The whole thing's based on the Rubber-Glue Phenomenon.

name: Revive Pet
text: Discover a friendly Beast that died this game. Summon it.
flavor: Best friends never really leave.

name: Sacrificial Summoner
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion. Summon a minion from your deck that costs (1) more.
flavor: Summoning will cost you an arm and a brother.

name: Saidan the Scarlet
text: Rush. Whenever this minion gains Attack or Health, double that amount (wherever this is).
flavor: An orc mage accidentally kited him all the way from Stratholme.

name: Scrapsmith
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Add two 2/4 Grunts with Taunt to your hand.
flavor: Takes the ugly scraps of armor from dead players and combines them into ridiculous looking PVP armor sets.

name: SI:7 Smuggler
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a random @-Cost minion. (Upgraded for each other SI:7 card you _have played this game.)
flavor: After a while, Onyxia's regurgitated rats start to taste pretty good.

name: Snowball Fight!
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion and Freeze it.\nIf it survives, repeat this on another minion!
flavor: Woahwoahwoah, we said no friendly fire!

name: Snowblind Harpy
text: Battlecry: If you're holding\na Frost spell, gain 5 Armor.
flavor: Not snowblind; she can spot a level 51 noob over 40 yards away.

name: Snowed In
text: Destroy a damaged minion. Freeze all other minions.
flavor: “What do you mean school isn’t cancelled?! It’s a snow day!”

name: Snowfall Graveyard
text: [x]Your Deathrattles\ntrigger twice.\nLasts 3 turns.
flavor: Live fast, die twice.

name: Stonehearth Vindicator
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a spell\nthat costs (3) or less.\nIt costs (0) this turn.
flavor: “True strength comes from within your deck” is a whole lot less inspiring.

name: Stormpike Aid Station
text: [x]At the end of your turn,\ngive your minions +2\nHealth. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: Known by some as the “Stormpike Naptime Lounge.”

name: Stormwind Avenger
text: After you cast a spell on this minion, it gains +2 Attack.
flavor: "I swear if you heal me I will DPS."

name: Whelp Bonker
text: Frenzy and Honorable Kill: Draw a card.
flavor: Bonk!

name: Arcane Brilliance
text: Add a copy of a 7, 8, 9, and 10-Cost spell in your deck to your hand.
flavor: They could probably do with a dash of Arcane Humility.

name: Axe Berserker
text: Rush. Honorable Kill:\nDraw a weapon.
flavor: All the body spray went to her head.

name: Dire Frostwolf
text: Stealth\nDeathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Wolf with Stealth.
flavor:
Tips to survive a frostwolf attack:
-Stay calm
-Lay down
-Drizzle steak sauce over your body
Brought to you by the Frostwolf Council for Alliance Safety.

name: Drek'Thar
text: [x]Battlecry: If this costs more than every minion in your deck, summon one of those minions.
flavor: Inside your deck there are two wolves.\nOne is a frostwolf. The other is a frostwolf.\nYou are a Frostwolf.

name: Dun Baldar Bridge
text: [x]After you summon a\nminion, give it +2/+2.\nLasts 3 turns.
flavor: At least there's no fall damage in Hearthstone.

name: Flanking Maneuver
text: Summon a 4/2 Demon with Rush. If it dies this turn, summon another.
flavor: So, do we have advantage? Can I sneak attack?

name: Frostwolf Warmaster
text: Costs (1) less for each card you've played this turn.
flavor: “The spoils of war ain’t free… Unless you’re me!”

name: Frozen Mammoth
text: This is Frozen until you\ncast a Fire spell.
flavor: *record scratch* "So, you may be wondering how I got here."

name: Gear Grubber
text: Taunt. If you end your turn with any unspent Mana, reduce this card's Cost by (1).
flavor: Yeah, “for off-spec,” suuuuure.

name: Herald of Lokholar
text: Battlecry: Draw a\nFrost spell.
flavor: “I don’t care how hot it is. I am not going over there to be your air conditioning."

name: Ice Revenant
text: Whenever you cast a Frost spell, gain +2/+2.
flavor: There must have been some magic in that old ice mace we found.

name: Korrak the Bloodrager
text: [x]Deathrattle: If this\nwasn't Honorably Killed,\nresummon Korrak.
flavor: “I live, I love, I slay, and I am undying.”

name: Lightmaw Netherdrake
text: Battlecry: If you're holding\na Holy and a Shadow spell, deal 3 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Do you think it's a glass half full kind of Netherdrake, or a glass half empty, inescapable void kind of Netherdrake?

name: Najak Hexxen
text: [x]Battlecry: Take control of an enemy minion. Deathrattle: Give the minion back.
flavor: "I've got friends on the other side... of the battlefield."

name: Onyxian Drake
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Deal damage equal to your Armor to an enemy minion.
flavor: The best offense is a great defense.

name: Raid Negotiator
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a\nChoose One card. It has\nboth effects combined.
flavor: "What do you mean by aggressive negotiation tactics?"\n"Negotiations in bear form."

name: Razorglaive Sentinel
text: After you play the left or right-most card in your hand, draw a card.
flavor: For the worgen that has everything: more claws.

name: Spring the Trap
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion and cast a Secret from your deck. Honorable Kill: Cast 2.
flavor: Talk about starting off on the wrong foot.

name: Stormpike Battle Ram
text: [x]Rush\nDeathrattle: Your next\nBeast costs (2) less.
flavor: Baa ram ewe! To your dwarves, your beard, Stormpike clan be true!

name: Stormpike Marshal
text: [x]Taunt If you took 5 or more damage on your opponent's turn, this costs (1).
flavor: The Stormpike have a very direct take on life insurance.

name: Tamsin's Phylactery
text: Discover a friendly Deathrattle minion that died this game. Give your minions its Deathrattle.
flavor: Eau de Morte. Guaranteed to take your date’s breath away

name: Tower Sergeant
text: Battlecry: If you control at_least 2 other minions, gain +2/+2.
flavor: Best helmet in the valley.

name: Vanndar Stormpike
text: [x]Battlecry: If this costs less than every minion in your deck, reduce their Cost by (3).
flavor: His favorite modes of transportation? Van, car, board, bike.

name: Warden of Chains
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you're holding a Demon that costs (5) or more, gain +1/+2.
flavor: Can’t stay out too late. I gotta head back home to the ol’ ball and chained demon.

name: Wildpaw Cavern
text: [x]At the end of your turn, summon a 3/4 Elemental that Freezes. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: Adventurers were quite confused when they saw how many boots were frozen to the ceiling.

name: Wing Commander Mulverick
text: [x]Rush. Your minions have\n"Honorable Kill: Summon a_\n2/2 Wyvern with Rush."
flavor: “A board full of 2-Health minions? This is what I call a target rich environment.”

name: Blood Guard
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, give your minions +1 Attack.
flavor: Has never donated blood and doesn’t plan on ever doing so.

name: Boomkin
text: Choose One - Restore\n8 Health to your hero; or Deal 4 damage.
flavor: Some Druids consider balance to be a state of harmony between the Natural and the Arcane. Others are more focused on the balance of the opponent’s life total versus their own.

name: Cavalry Horn
text: Deathrattle: Summon the lowest Cost minion in your hand.
flavor: The clarion call of the Alliance skipping every objective and going straight to Drek’Thar.

name: Cera'thine Fleetrunner
text: [x]Battlecry: Replace your minions in hand and deck with ones from other classes. They cost (2) less.
flavor: World Record CTF Champion 16 years running.

name: Contraband Stash
text: Replay 5 cards from other classes you've played this game.
flavor: “Coggsprocket! We happy?"\n"Yeah, we happy."

name: Deep Breath
text: [x]Deal $@ damage to a minion and its neighbors. (Improved by number of_ other spells in your hand.)
flavor: I SAID "RELAX!"

name: Don't Stand in the Fire!
text: Deal $10 damage randomly split among all enemy minions. Overload: (1)
flavor: Apparently the “Caution: Hot Surface” sign had burned up.

name: Felfire in the Hole!
text: Draw a spell and deal $2 damage to all enemies. If it's a Fel spell, deal $1 more.
flavor: Fear not, feebleminded friends, for failure to fell your foes with felfire is fundamentally farfetched!

name: Frantic Hippogryph
text: Rush. Honorable Kill:\n_Gain Windfury._
flavor: It's killed and it'll kill again!

name: Hollow Abomination
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. Honorable Kill: Gain the minion's Attack.
flavor: As soon as you land your first Honorable Kill, trust me, you'll be hooked!

name: Knight-Captain
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage.\nHonorable Kill: Gain +3/+3.
flavor: Very dangerous shoulder-to-ears situation here.

name: Onyxian Warder
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, summon two\n2/1 Whelps with Rush.
flavor: Throwing more whelps at the problem might not help, but they certainly will hurt.

name: Pet Collector
text: Battlecry: Summon a Beast from your deck that costs (5) or less.
flavor: "And I'll call you Mrs. Snugglepants, and you Bubblecuddle, and you Cutie Cakes, and you ..."

name: Protect the Innocent
text: Summon a 5/5 Defender with Taunt. If your hero was healed this turn, summon another.
flavor: "Quick, strike a super hero pose!"

name: Sigil of Reckoning
text: At the start of your next turn, summon a random Demon from your hand.
flavor: “It’s dangerous ‘round these parts, I reckon.”

name: Spammy Arcanist
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 1 damage\nto all other minions.\nIf any die, repeat this.
flavor: You don't have to jump while spamming, but it’s more fun that way.

name: Spawn of Deathwing
text: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy minion. Discard a random card.
flavor: Aww, who’s the most dangerous threat to the world? You are!

name: Spirit Guide
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Draw a Holy spell and a Shadow spell.
flavor:
"Hey Jake."
"Back again?"
"Yup."
"See you in 2 minutes."

name: Wildheart Guff
text: [x]Battlecry: Set your maximum Mana to 20. Gain an empty Mana Crystal. Draw a card.
flavor: Guff faced his biggest challenge yet: making friends on a battlefield.

name: Wildpaw Gnoll
text: [x]Rush Costs (1) less for each non-Rogue Class card added to your hand this game.
flavor: A big fan of four-claw discounts.

name: Balinda Stonehearth
text: Battlecry: Draw 2 spells. Swap their Costs with this minion's stats.
flavor: Imagine her surprise, ending up in a game called Hearthstone.

name: Beaststalker Tavish
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover\nand cast 2 Improved\nSecrets.
flavor: Tavish left home to forge his own path. But it still led him back to Alterac to kick some Frostwolf butt.

name: Captain Galvangar
text: [x]Battlecry: If you have gained 15 or more Armor this game, gain +3/+3 and Charge.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: It wasn't the ravages of war that took Galvangar, it was hypothermia.

name: Caria Felsoul
text: Battlecry: Transform into a 6/6 copy of a Demon in your deck.
flavor: This is what happens when you keep taking the advice of the little demon on your shoulder.

name: Dreadlich Tamsin
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to all minions. Shuffle 3 Rifts into your deck. Draw 3 cards.
flavor: At a certain point, you stop mocking death and start becoming it.

name: Felwalker
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Cast the highest Cost Fel spell from your hand.
flavor: How it feels to chew Fel Gum.

name: Glaciate
text: Discover an 8-Cost minion. Summon and Freeze it.
flavor: We now have a more accurate answer to the age-old question "What's cooler than being cool?"

name: Icehoof Protector
text: Taunt\nFreeze any character damaged by this minion.
flavor: I can't feel my axe!

name: Impfestation
text: Summon a 3/3\nDread Imp to attack each enemy minion.
flavor: Call the imp-sterminator!

name: Kurtrus, Demon-Render
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two @/4 Demons with Rush. (Improved by your hero attacks this game.)
flavor: "I dedicated my life to vanquishing demons, but I never thought to face the demons in me. Maybe, in time, I can help quell the demons in you." -Kurtrus, to Cariel

name: Legionnaire
text: Deathrattle: Give all minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: *not related to the Burning Legion

name: Mi'da, Pure Light
text: [x]Divine Shield, Lifesteal Deathrattle: Shuffle a Fragment into your deck that resummons Mi'da when drawn.
flavor: Unfortunately, Mi’da’s touch will not turn things to gold.

name: Snowfall Guardian
text: [x]Battlecry: Freeze all\nother minions.
flavor: You’re finally awake! That fall looked really bad. Demon Hunters? Mercenaries? What are you talking about? Come on, I just unpacked a Golden Moorabi, let’s go build a Freeze Shaman deck.

name: Undying Disciple
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to all enemy minions.
flavor: We get it, you're undead. But jumping out of a grave? That's a bit much.

name: Bearon Gla'shear
text: [x]Battlecry: For each Frost spell you've cast this game, summon a 3/4 Elemental that Freezes.@ (@)
flavor: When you get hit by a royally bad pun, you just have to grin and bear it.

name: Frostsaber Matriarch
text: [x]Taunt. Costs (1) less\n for each Beast you've\n_summoned this game.
flavor: They say “don’t poke the bear”, but they NEVER said “don’t poke the frostsaber or her cubs”.

name: Humongous Owl
text: Deathrattle: Deal 8 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: "Humongous what?" -Torug's last words.

name: Magister Dawngrasp
text: [x]Battlecry: Recast a spell from each spell school you've cast this game.
flavor: Magister is a humble title for one who united warring armies against the greatest threat to Azeroth.

name: Mass Polymorph
text: Transform all minions into 1/1 Sheep.
flavor: Sheep in Frostwolves' clothing.

name: Mountain Bear
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon two\n2/4 Cubs with Taunt.
flavor: If they want your picnic basket, I recommend giving it to them.

name: Rokara, the Valorous
text: Battlecry: Equip a 5/2 Unstoppable Force.
flavor: As strong-willed and stubborn as her first day in the Horde, Rokara now wielded a weapon that rivaled even her tenacity.

name: Scale of Onyxia
text: Fill your board with 2/1 Whelps with Rush.
flavor: Whelp for scale.

name: Abominable Lieutenant
text: At the end of your turn,\neat a random enemy minion and gain its stats.
flavor: If you can't join 'em, eat 'em.

name: Brasswing
text: [x]At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to all enemies. Honorable Kill: Restore 4 Health to your hero.
flavor: I’ve seen this before. You just have to time it right to avoid the dragon.

name: Bru'kan of the Elements
text: [x]Battlecry: Call upon the\npower of two Elements!
flavor: The elements crackled through Bru'kan's veins and his life flashed before his eyes. He knew this moment would come, but he wondered, had he given them enough?

name: Haleh, Matron Protectorate
text: After you cast a spell, deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Oh, how do you solve a problem like Onyxia?

name: Kazakusan
text: [x]Battlecry: If you played 4 other Dragons this game, craft a custom deck of Treasures.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: Kazakus had always seemed too clever a sort to bottle a brew that could do him any harm. Perhaps it should come as no surprise, then, that the originator of the Dragonfire Potion was a dragon himself.

name: Lightforged Cariel
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all enemies. Equip a 2/5 Immovable Object.
flavor: Her faith, unshakable.\nHer shield, immovable.\nHer enemies, irredeemable.

name: Shadowcrafter Scabbs
text: [x]Battlecry: Return all minions to their owner's hands. Summon two 4/2 Shadows with Stealth.
flavor: Sneaking behind enemy lines isn't so different from being a line cook. People are hostile, something's on fire, and your only hope is to get out of there with all your fingers.

name: Smokescreen
text: [x]Draw 5 cards. Trigger\nany Deathrattles drawn.
flavor: Pocket smoke!

name: Templar Captain
text: [x]Rush. After this attacks\na minion, summon a 5/5\nDefender with Taunt.
flavor: You can combine two of these into a Captain Archon.

name: Troll Centurion
text: [x]Rush. Honorable Kill:\nDeal 8 damage to the\nenemy hero.
flavor: Centurion? Ha, come back when you’re a millennion.

name: Xyrella, the Devout
text: [x]Battlecry: Trigger the Deathrattle of every friendly minion that died this game.
flavor: Xyrella thought she was only saving her daughter. Her actions may very well have saved the entire world.

name: Rune of the Archmage
text: [x]Cast 20 Mana worth of\nMage spells at enemies.
flavor: “It’s not a slot machine! It took YEARS of rigorous studying the intricacies of the universe to unravel the strands of reality. The arcane knowledge alone would enfeeble even the most brilliant of minds. Give it the credence it deserves. It’s a <i>magic</

name: Wing Commander Ichman
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a Beast from your deck and give it Rush. If it kills a minion this turn, repeat.
flavor: “Mulverick, it’s not your flying, it’s your faction.”

name: Drakefire Amulet
text: Tradeable\nDiscover 2 Dragons. Summon them.
flavor: "...and I only had to climb up the mountains in Winterspring 50 times!"

name: Iceblood Tower
text: [x]At the end of your turn,\ncast another spell from\nyour deck. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: “Why is it called Iceblood Tower?”\n“Not really sure. Anyways, try not to lose your footing on any of the frozen bodies as you make your way in.”

name: Lokholar the Ice Lord
text: Rush, Windfury\n Costs (5) less if you have 15 Health or less.
flavor: Suddenly the names of Iceblood Tower and Iceblood Garrison make a lot more sense.

name: Raid Boss Onyxia
text: [x]Rush. Immune while you control a Whelp. Battlecry: Summon six _2/1 Whelps with Rush.
flavor: Onyxia chose her guises to manipulate mortals, but her true form? That was reserved for ending them.

name: Shield Shatter
text: [x]Deal $5 damage to all\nminions. Costs (1) less\nfor each Armor you have.
flavor: "Is the shield being shattered or doing the shattering?"\n"Yes."

name: Ur'zul Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each friendly minion that died this game.
flavor: Nothing personal, tiny human. I have many mouths to feed.

name: Aquatic Form
text: Dredge. If you have the Mana to play the card this turn, draw it.
flavor: How long can YOU hold your breath underwater?

name: Illuminate
text: Dredge. If it's a spell,\nreduce its Cost by (3).
flavor: BEHOLD THE GLORY OF A NEW CUP!

name: Azsharan Gardens
text: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1. Put a 'Sunken Gardens' on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: That's not what I meant when I asked you to water the garden.

name: Azsharan Scroll
text: Discover a Fire, Frost or Nature spell. Put a 'Sunken Scroll' on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: Kids these days are always scrolling on their tomes.

name: Barbed Nets
text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to an
enemy. If you played a
Naga while holding this,
choose a second target.
flavor: I caught'ya a dollar.

name: Bottomfeeder
text: Deathrattle: Add a Bottomfeeder to the bottom of your deck with permanent +2/+2.
flavor: Someone keeps adding fish to my deck, and I'm going to get to the bottom of it.

name: Bubbler
text: [x]After this minion takes\n exactly one damage,\ndestroy it. (Pop!)
flavor: Prefers regular over diet shampoo.

name: Click-Clocker
text: [x]Divine Shield. Battlecry:\nGive a random Mech in\nyour hand +1/+1.
flavor: Allan please add details

name: Dozing Kelpkeeper
text: [x]Rush. Starts Dormant.\nAfter you've cast 5 Mana\n_worth of spells, awaken.
flavor: *Yaaaaawn* wake me up in another 5 Mana.

name: Filletfighter
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
flavor: "What do you mean this isn't the meal you asked for? ! I made you a Fillet Minion!"

name: Gone Fishin'
text: Dredge.\nCombo: Draw a card.
flavor: Rogues want me\nFish fear me

name: Helmet Hermit
text: Can't attack.
flavor: I’d avoid asking if it wants to join the battle. It’s been pretty crabby lately.

name: Holy Maki Roll
text: Restore #2 Health. Repeatable this turn.
flavor: If you use all 10 mana, that's called the 'Lunch Special.'

name: Moonbeam
text: Deal $1 damage to an enemy, twice.
flavor: The light of the moon may have disappeared from Zin-Azshari after the Sundering, but not its power.

name: Pelican Diver
text: Dormant for 1 turn.\nRush
flavor: The pelican’s beak is so big, some Colossal minions can even fit inside!*\n*This is a lie.

name: Piranha Swarmer
text: [x]Rush\nAfter you summon a Piranha\nSwarmer, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: One Fish, Two Fish.\nLess Fish? You wish.

name: Priestess Valishj
text: [x]Battlecry: Refresh an empty\nMana Crystal for each spell\n___you've cast this turn.@ (@)
flavor: Some of the more stoic priestesses worry that she's living too lavishjly.

name: Rock Bottom
text: [x]Summon a 1/1 Murloc, then Dredge. If it's also a Murloc, summon one more.
flavor: I can't... *mrgglrg* understand... *mrgrllrg* your accent. *mrgrlrglr*

name: Scalding Geyser
text: [x]Deal $2 damage.\nDredge.
flavor: ”Wow, what’s that land formation called?”\n“It s’cald a Geyser.”

name: Schooling
text: Add three 1/1 Piranha\nSwarmers to your hand.
flavor: A group of Piranha are known as a Scholomance.

name: Serpent Wig
text:
[x]Give a minion +1/+2.
If you played a Naga while
holding this, add a Serpent
Wig to your hand.
flavor: Legends say that all those who look into her eyes are turned to plush.

name: Shattershambler
text: [x]Battlecry: The next\nDeathrattle minion you\n_play immediately dies.
flavor: Someone didn’t realize the ‘cold, black heart’ thing was supposed to be a metaphor.

name: Sir Finley, Sea Guide
text: [x]Battlecry: Swap your\nhand with the bottom of\nyour deck.
flavor: "No need to worry, ol' chums, I have the map right here. It says to continue going straight down!"

name: Trench Surveyor
text: Battlecry: Dredge.\nIf it's a Mech, draw it.
flavor: Liquid cooled.

name: Urchin Spines
text: Your spells this turn are Poisonous.
flavor: I shouldn't have licked that.

name: Vicious Slitherspear
text: [x]After you cast a spell,\ngain +1 Attack until\nyour next turn.
flavor: He goes by ‘Fun-Loving Slitherspear’ on his dating profile.

name: Whispers of the Deep
text: [x]Silence a friendly minion, then deal damage equal to its Attack randomly split among all enemy minions.
flavor: And in the darkest of depths, the sailor heard a command from inside his own mind… “You will also buff my original card to 9 Mana.”

name: Amalgam of the Deep
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a friendly\nminion. Discover a minion\nof the same minion type.
flavor: Most explorers call it a success to find just one new species. Imagine Finley's excitement when he identified ten at once!

name: Anchored Totem
text: After you summon a 1-Cost minion, give it +2/+1.
flavor: The Naga devised the perfect retaliation to any pirates\ndropping anchor in their domain: vandalism.

name: Azsharan Scavenger
text: Battlecry: Put a 'Sunken Scavenger' on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: Some local Murloc populations have adapted to survive in the harsh conditions of the ruins, much to the fascination of Sir Finley.

name: Chum Bucket
text: [x]Give all Murlocs in your\nhand +1/+1. Repeat for\neach Murloc you control.
flavor: Time to go in for the krill.

name: Emergency Maneuvers
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, summon a copy of it.\nIt's Dormant for 1 turn.
flavor: DO A BARREL ROLL!

name: Forged in Flame
text: Destroy your weapon, then draw cards equal to its Attack.
flavor: Don't worry, your wounds are self-cauterizing!

name: Fossil Fanatic
text: After your hero attacks, draw a Fel spell.
flavor: Praise Lord Helix!

name: Gifts of Azshara
text: Draw a card. If you played a Naga while holding this, do it again.
flavor: Barber: What do you want?\nNaga: You ever have a thirst for arcane power?\nBarber: Say no more.

name: Guard the City
text: Gain 3 Armor.\nSummon a 2/3 Naga with Taunt.
flavor: At thousands of feet below the surface, it's a pretty high-pressure job.

name: Inkveil Ambusher
text: Stealth\nHas +3 Attack and Immune while attacking.
flavor: You’ve got it wrong. She releases ink when you’re scared.

name: Jackpot!
text:
Add two random
spells from other classes
that cost (5) or more
to your hand.
flavor: Find someone who looks at you the way Hooktusk looks at loot.

name: K9-0tron
text: [x]Battlecry: Dredge.\nIf it's a 1-Cost minion,\nsummon it.
flavor: You merely adopted the Battlegrounds. I was born in it. Molded by it.

name: Kotori Lightblade
text: [x]After you cast a Holy spell\non this, cast it again on\n__another friendly minion.
flavor: You need healing.

name: Multi-Strike
text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. They may attack an additional enemy minion.
flavor: “I said you get two attack, not two attacks!”

name: Murkwater Scribe
text: Battlecry: The next spell you play costs (1) less.
flavor: The pen is mightier than the trident.

name: Naval Mine
text: [x]Deathrattle: Deal 4 damage\nto the enemy hero.
flavor: A Naval Mine? I'd rather it be Naval Yours.

name: Obsidiansmith
text: [x]Battlecry: Dredge. If it's\na minion or a weapon,\ngive it +1/+1.
flavor: Was able to produce more effective weapons than his predecessor, Kelpsmith.

name: Predation
text: Deal $2 damage.\nCosts (0) if you played a Naga while holding this.
flavor: No need to worry! The squid is actually being sent to a nice kelp farm upstate.

name: Queensguard
text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1\nfor each spell you've cast this turn.
flavor: Archnemesis of the Guardian of Kings.

name: Radar Detector
text:
[x]Scan the bottom 5 cards
of your deck. Draw any
Mechs found this way,
then shuffle your deck.
flavor: "Yup! I definitely don't know how to read radar."

name: Rainbow Glowscale
text: Spell Damage +1
flavor: She prefers saying that she has Arcane, Fel, Fire, Frost, Holy, Nature, and Shadow Spell Damage +1.

name: Raj Naz'jan
text: After you cast a spell, deal damage equal to its Cost to the enemy Hero.
flavor: When you play the Coin, he deals emotional damage.

name: Seafloor Savior
text: [x]Battlecry: Dredge. If it's a minion, give it this minion's Attack and Health.
flavor: "TURTLE PROCURED. ADMINISTRATING BANDAGES AND KISSES. BOO BOO MUST BE ELIMINATED."

name: Security Automaton
text: After you summon a Mech, gain +1/+1.
flavor: Honestly, I feel less secure when it's around.

name: Spellcoiler
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast a\nspell while holding this,\nDiscover a spell.
flavor: "Look, I know plenty of spells. I just need to see one first is all."

name: Spirit of the Tides
text: [x]If you have any unspent\nMana at the end of\n_your turn, gain +1/+2.
flavor: Cleans the ocean better than any store-brand competitor - guaranteed or your Mana back!

name: Submerged Spacerock
text: [x]Deathrattle: Add two Arcane Mage spells to your hand. At the end of your turn, discard them.
flavor: Time for some out of this world RNG.

name: The Fires of Zin-Azshari
text: Replace your deck with minions that cost (5) or more. They cost (5).
flavor: One heck of a hot tub.

name: Tuskarrrr Trawler
text: Battlecry: Dredge.
flavor: "Fish scales? Junk. A gravestone? Junk. This weird looking puzzle box? Junk. AHA! An Ancharrr!"

name: Voidgill
text: Deathrattle: Give all Murlocs in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: If you stare into the abyss, it’s said that it will stare back at you. What happens to those who’ve gazed at it their entire lives?

name: Volcanomancy
text: Choose a minion. When it dies, deal 3 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Do it again, this time with Pompeii and circumstance.

name: Wayward Sage
text: [x]Outcast: Reduce the Cost\nof the left and right-most\n_cards in your hand by (1).
flavor: Carry on my wayward sage. There'll be peace and no more rage.

name: Abyssal Depths
text: Draw your two lowest Cost minions.
flavor: *Happy Wisp noises*

name: Ancient Krakenbane
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, deal 5 damage.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: "Call me Fishmael."

name: Azsharan Mooncatcher
text: [x]Divine Shield. Battlecry: Put\na 'Sunken Mooncatcher' on\nthe bottom of your deck.
flavor: The light of Elune faded from the ruins of Zin-Azshari, but not its treasures.

name: Azsharan Sweeper
text: Battlecry: Put a 'Sunken Sweeper' on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: The enchanted objects of Zin-Azshari have extremely long warranties.

name: Azsharan Trident
text: [x]Deathrattle: Put\na 'Sunken Trident' on the\n_bottom of your deck.
flavor: Nevermind the barnacles! A well-crafted weapon is eternally useful.

name: Bloodscent Vilefin
text: [x]Battlecry: Dredge. If it's a\nMurloc, change its Cost to\n_Health instead of Mana.
flavor: Tired of eating Jellyfish and Peanut Butter fish, it’s moved on to more gruesome meals.

name: Clash of the Colossals
text: Add a random Colossal minion to both players' hands. Yours costs (2) less.
flavor: Don’t let this distract you from the fact that in 1998, Ozumat threw Neptulon off Shell in a Cell, and plummeted 16 fathoms through an announcer’s table.

name: Clownfish
text: Battlecry: Your next two Murlocs cost (2) less.
flavor: His jokes are hilarious if you know Nerglish.

name: Conch's Call
text: Draw a Naga and\na spell.
flavor: All hail the magic conch!

name: Crushclaw Enforcer
text: Battlecry: If you've cast\n a spell while holding this, draw a Naga.
flavor: Yet another case of carcinization.

name: Cutlass Courier
text: After your hero attacks, draw a Pirate.
flavor: It may be a cutlass, but you can cut lads with it too.

name: Dragged Below
text:
[x]Deal $4 damage
to a minion.
Give your opponent
an Abyssal Curse.
flavor: I know this is a frustrating situation you’re in, Captain, but there’s no need to curse.

name: From the Depths
text: [x]Reduce the Cost of the\nbottom five cards in your\n_deck by (3), then Dredge.
flavor: "This is why I'm afraid of the deep end of the pool."

name: Handmaiden
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, draw 3 cards.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: Why did she unspool the last roll of royal toilet paper?!

name: Harpoon Gun
text: After your hero attacks, Dredge. If it's a Beast, reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor: Get ooooover here!

name: Herald of Chaos
text: [x]Lifesteal Battlecry: If you've cast a Fel spell while holding this, gain Rush.
flavor: They used to be called the Heralds of Order before all of this silly Sundering nonsense.

name: Herald of Light
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast a Holy spell while holding this, restore #6 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: Wake up! No sleeping in with the fishes!

name: Herald of Nature
text: Battlecry: If you've cast a Nature spell while holding this, give your other minions +1/+1.
flavor: A mother of plants in mother of pearl.

name: Herald of Shadows
text: Battlecry: If you've cast a Shadow spell while holding this, steal 2 Health from a minion.
flavor: “IT’S NOT A PHASE, MOM!”

name: Lady S'theno
text: [x]Immune while attacking.\nAfter you cast a spell, attack\nthe lowest Health enemy.
flavor: Only a S'theno deals in absolutes.

name: Mecha-Shark
text: [x]After you summon a Mech,\ndeal 3 damage randomly\n_split among all enemies.
flavor: "Why didn't you just build a normal submarine. Only you can fit inside"\n"WhY DiDn'T YoU JuSt BuIlD anormalsub-WHY DO YOU THINK WREZIG!! If you can build a freaking Mecha-Shark, then you build a freaking Mecha-Shark!"

name: Myrmidon
text: After you cast a spell on this minion, draw a card.
flavor: He didn't have time to Myrmidon the other half of his armor before combat started.

name: Naga's Pride
text: Summon two 2/2 Lionfish. If you played a Naga while holding this, give them +1/+1.
flavor: Lionfish, Naga, and Spears, oh my!

name: Piranha Poacher
text: At the end of your turn,\nadd a 1/1 Piranha Swarmer to your hand.
flavor: This snack certainly isn’t smiling back…

name: Polymorph: Jellyfish
text: Transform a minion\ninto a 4/1 Jellyfish with Spell Damage +2.
flavor: While Ini’s first use of the Spontaneous Gelatin Transmalgamizer may have gotten her banned from the Gnomish Cooking Convention, she’s never one to throw away a new invention.

name: Pufferfist
text: After your hero attacks, deal 1 damage to all enemies.
flavor: "...and then I'll hit 'em with the ol' puffercut!"

name: Radiance of Azshara
text: [x]Fire Spell Damage +2 Your Nature spells cost (1) less. After you cast a Frost spell, gain 3 Armor.
flavor: Uses Arcane, Fire, and Frost magic to vanquish Queen Azshara's foes. And for her skincare routine!

name: Reefwalker
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Piranha Swarmer.
flavor: A gentle giant with some not-so-gentle friends.

name: Seafloor Gateway
text: Draw a Mech. Reduce the Cost of Mechs in your hand by (1).
flavor: It's all about e-fish-ency.

name: Seascout Operator
text: Battlecry: If you control a Mech, summon two 2/1 Mechafish.
flavor: The Mechafish are actually totally autonomous. We gave her a fake control pad, as a joke.

name: Seaweed Strike
text:
[x]Deal $4 damage to a minion.
If you played a Naga while
holding this, also give your
hero +4 Attack this turn.
flavor: Even as mechs, fish will still end up wrapped in seaweed.

name: Shellshot
text:
[x]Deal $3 damage to a
random enemy minion.
Repeat this with 1
less damage.
flavor: Precision over accuracy.

name: Shimmering Sunfish
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Holy Spell, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: Just keep shimmering, just keep shimmering.

name: Sira'kess Cultist
text: Battlecry: Give\nyour opponent an\nAbyssal Curse.
flavor: "Sira'kess, she's the best! Puts her followers to the test.

name: Slimescale Diver
text: Dormant for 1 turn.\nRush, Poisonous
flavor: You try putting on a wetsuit with scales.

name: Smothering Starfish
text: Battlecry: Silence ALL other minions.
flavor: Is a sucker for small talk.

name: Snapdragon
text: [x]Battlecry: Give all\nBattlecry minions in\nyour deck +1/+1.
flavor: Good synergy with Crackledragon, not so much with Popdragon.

name: Swordfish
text: Battlecry: Dredge.\nIf it's a Pirate, give this weapon and the Pirate +2 Attack.
flavor: While you were partying, I studied the fish.

name: Treasure Guard
