text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Draw a card.
flavor: The real treasure was the Naga we met along the way.

name: Twin-fin Fin Twin
text: Rush. Battlecry: Summon a copy of this.
flavor: They call him Murloc Joe, winner of the Big M Memorial Surf Off Competition.

name: Ambassador Faelin
text: Battlecry: Put 3 Colossal minions on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: For thousands of years, Faelin has longed to return to his homeland. Will Zin-Azshari be as he hopes, or are the secrets of the deep better left forgotten?

name: Azsharan Defector
text: [x]Rush. Deathrattle: Put a\n'Sunken Defector' on the_\nbottom of your deck.
flavor: "I've got a sinking feeling about this evil Queen."

name: Azsharan Ritual
text: Silence a minion and summon a copy of it. Put a 'Sunken Ritual' on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: The harmonious silence surrounding the ritual was unceremoniously BROKEN when HAROLD began eating stale potato chips.

name: Azsharan Saber
text: [x]Rush. Deathrattle: Put a\n'Sunken Saber' on the\nbottom of your deck.
flavor: Even in ancient times, the Night Elves were committed cat people.

name: Baba Naga
text: Battlecry: If you've cast\na spell while holding this, deal 3 damage.
flavor: A folktale told to Naga children to scare them from swimming too close to the surface.

name: Bioluminescence
text: Give your minions\nSpell Damage +1.
flavor: The perfect card for Spell Damage Shaman and Spelling Bee Shaman.

name: Blademaster Okani
text: [x]Battlecry: Secretly choose to Counter the next minion or spell your opponent plays while this is alive.
flavor: Yet ANOTHER sword fighter that spams counters.

name: Bubblebot
text: [x]Battlecry: Give your other\nMechs Divine Shield\nand Taunt.
flavor: Bubblebot, bubble bubble bubblebot.

name: Coilfang Constrictor
text: [x]Battlecry: Look at 3 cards in your opponent's hand and choose one. It can't be played next turn.
flavor: How do you know when someone has a crush on you? They take your breath away.

name: Commander Sivara
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, add those spells back to your hand.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: With six legs, gills, and an impressive array of magic, Sivara is an all-terrain-spellcaster.

name: Disarming Elemental
text: [x]Battlecry: Dredge for\nyour opponent. Set its\nCost to (6).
flavor: "You can have these back when you learn to play nice."

name: Drown
text: Put an enemy minion on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: If you play it on a Naga, they drown in their sorrows instead.

name: Excavation Specialist
text: Battlecry: Dredge.\nReduce its Cost by (1).
flavor: With the jungles of Un’goro mapped out and the ruins of Uldum fully uncovered, explorers have to go a little out of their depth in their search of the great unknown.

name: Glaiveshark
text: [x]Battlecry: If your hero\nattacked this turn, deal 2\ndamage to all enemies.
flavor: Can smell a drop of vengeance in the water up to a mile away.

name: Igneous Lavagorger
text: [x]Taunt\n Battlecry: Dredge. Gain\n_Armor equal to its Cost.
flavor: Lava shark, doo doo doo doo doo doo.

name: Immolate
text: Light every card in the opponent's hand on fire. In 3 turns, any still\nin hand are destroyed!
flavor: "Well if you cared about those cards so much, why didn't you play them?"

name: School Teacher
text: Battlecry: Add a 1/1 Nagaling to your hand. Discover a spell that costs (3) or less to teach it.
flavor: She also tutors 3 Piranha Swarmers on her off hours.

name: Selfish Shellfish
text: Deathrattle: Your opponent draws 2 cards.
flavor: Keeps any ancient book it finds all to its shelf.

name: Spitelash Siren
text: [x]After you play a Naga, refresh two Mana Crystals. (Then switch to spell!)@[x]After you cast a spell, refresh two Mana Crystals. (Then switch to Naga!)
flavor: Refresh the rainbow.

name: Swiftscale Trickster
text: Battlecry: Your next spell this turn costs (0).
flavor: If you play your cards fast enough, who's to say how much they cost?

name: Tidelost Burrower
text: Battlecry: Dredge.\nIf it's a Murloc, summon a 2/2 copy of it.
flavor: Burrowing may not be for everyone, but I dig it.

name: Topple the Idol
text: [x]Dredge. Reveal it and\ndeal damage equal to\n_its Cost to all minions.
flavor: No Old Gods or Kings, only Naga.

name: Twinbow Terrorcoil
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast a\nspell while holding this, your\nnext spell casts twice.
flavor: Two shots. Two kills.

name: Azsharan Sentinel
text: [x]Taunt. Deathrattle: Put a\n'Sunken Sentinel' on the\nbottom of your deck.
flavor: For some, the Sundering was the collapse of civilization. For others, it was a great core workout.

name: Azsharan Vessel
text: Summon two 3/3 Pirates with Stealth. Put a 'Sunken Vessel' on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: Not even the sturdiest Highborne ship could survive the churning waters of the Sundering.

name: Bone Glaive
text: Battlecry: Dredge.
flavor: Resourceful Demon Hunters find a use for every part of the Demon.

name: Bootstrap Sunkeneer
text: [x]Combo: Put an enemy\nminion on the bottom of\n_your opponent's deck.
flavor: Part of the deck, part of the crew.

name: Command of Neptulon
text: Summon two 5/4 Elementals with Rush.\nOverload: (1)
flavor: "REVENANT TO F6. CHECKMATE, OZUMAT!"

name: Commander Ulthok
text: Battlecry: Your opponent's cards cost Health instead of Mana next turn.
flavor: He likes to spend his free time in his garden, growing Bloodradish, Bloodcabbage, and his favorite, Bloodbloom.

name: Coral Keeper
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 3/3 Elemental for each spell school you've cast this game.
flavor: This here is Carl. They're in charge of these elementals. Not all of them get along, so sometimes Carl corrals the quarreling coral.

name: Flipper Friends
text: [x]Choose One - Summon a\n6/6 Orca with Taunt; or\nsix 1/1 Otters with Rush.
flavor: Despite the harsh conditions, friends can still be found under the sea.

name: Gangplank Diver
text: Dormant for 1 turn.\nRush. Immune while attacking.
flavor: Cownonball!

name: Gorloc Ravager
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw 3 Murlocs.
flavor: Be careful what you fish for.

name: Ini Stormcoil
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a friendly Mech. Summon a copy of it with Rush, Windfury, and Divine Shield.
flavor: Before setting her sights on exploration, Ini was known for many inventions, such as the airborne breadmaking dirigible, the hypersprocket 200X zoom binoculars, and jobes (jean robes).

name: Lady Ashvane
text: Battlecry: Give all weapons\nin your hand, deck, and battlefield +1/+1.
flavor: This is your brain on Azerite.

name: Lady Naz'jar
text: [x]While in your hand, this\n___transforms after you cast a___\nFire, Frost, or Arcane spell.
flavor: Talk about an identity crisis.

name: Queen Azshara
text: Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, choose an Ancient Relic.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: Hobbies include: Ordering subjects around, making deals with old gods, and taking long walks under the beach.

name: Switcheroo
text: Draw 2 minions.\nSwap their Health.
flavor: Would you rather fight one Whale-sized Goldfish, or 100 Goldfish-sized Whales?

name: Za'qul
text: [x]Your Abyssal Curses heal you for the damage they deal. Battlecry: Give your opponent an Abyssal Curse.
flavor: Everything’s going exzaq’ully to plan.

name: Abyssal Wave
text:
[x]Deal $4 damage to
all minions. Give your
opponent an Abyssal
Curse.
flavor: Often followed up with a chasmic handshake.

name: Barbaric Sorceress
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Swap the Cost of a random spell in each player's hand.
flavor: Her four arms are for casting, and her forearms are for crushing.

name: Blood in the Water
text: Deal $3 damage to an enemy. Summon a 5/5 Shark with Rush.
flavor: Fish are friends, not food! Gilgoblins on the other hand…

name: Coilskar Commander
text: [x]Taunt. Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, summon two __copies of this.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: Then thou shalt count to three, no more, no less. Three shall be the number thou shalt count, and the number of the counting shall be three. Four shalt thou not count, neither count thou two, excepting that thou then proceed to three. Five is right out.

name: Crabatoa
text: Colossal +2\nYour Crabatoa Claws have +2 Attack.
flavor: This giant crab loves to sink entire naval fleets, but it'll settle for a single dinghy in a pinch.

name: Green-Thumb Gardener
text: [x]Battlecry: Refresh empty Mana Crystals equal to the Cost of the highest Cost spell in your hand.
flavor: Sometimes all a plant needs is, like, A LOT of water.

name: Mothership
text: Rush\nDeathrattle: Summon two random Mechs that cost (3) or less.
flavor: Has been known to abduct sea cows and leave kelp circles.

name: Blackscale Brute
text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you\nhave a weapon equipped, summon a 5/6 Naga with Rush.
flavor: Black, the scales of angry Naga! Red, the flames of Azshari's past!

name: Blackwater Behemoth
text: Colossal +1\nLifesteal
flavor: What's a Blackwater Behemoth's favorite meal? Fish n' Ships.

name: Colaque
text: [x]Colossal +1\n Immune while you control\nColaque's Shell.
flavor: Ten thousand years ago, the city of Zin-Azshari fell to the bottom of the sea... and partially onto Colaque's shell.

name: Glugg the Gulper
text: [x]Colossal +3\n After a friendly minion dies,\ngain its original stats.
flavor: Food can be scarce in the Abyssal Depths, leading its top predators to pursue any potential source of sustenance. Even extra crunchy ones.

name: Hedra the Heretic
text: [x]Battlecry: For each spell you've cast while holding this, summon a minion of that spell's Cost.
flavor: Hedra was cast out millennia ago for her divisive opinions among the Naga, such as "Turning into evil underwater serpent people was bad, actually."

name: Hydralodon
text: [x]Colossal +2\nBattlecry: Give your\n_Hydralodon Heads Rush.
flavor: Deep beneath the waves, this hydra grew to incredible size based on a steady diet of literally anything that crossed its path.

name: Immortalized in Stone
text: Summon a 1/2, 2/4, and 4/8 Elemental with Taunt.
flavor: They all secretly have\n'Deathrattle: Become very mortalized.'

name: Miracle Growth
text: [x]Draw 3 cards. Summon a Plant with Taunt and stats equal to your hand size.
flavor: I’ve got NO idea what’s in that fertilizer.

name: Nellie, the Great Thresher
text: [x]Colossal +1\nBattlecry: Discover 3 Pirates\nto crew Nellie's Ship!
flavor: Not to be mistaken for her freshwater cousin, Nessie, this massive creature was harnessed to carry Hooktusk's favorite ship.

name: Pirate Admiral Hooktusk
text: Battlecry: If you've summoned 7 other Pirates this game, plunder the enemy!@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: You win some, you ransom.

name: Slithering Deathscale
text: Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, deal 3 damage to all enemies.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: Colossal minions know her better as Slithering Damagescale.

name: The Leviathan
text: [x]Colossal +1 Rush, Divine Shield After this attacks, Dredge.
flavor: Built by Ini Stormcoil, this massive vessel can withstand almost anything you put it through... although she would prefer you didn't!

name: Wrathspine Enchanter
text: Battlecry: Cast a copy of a Fire, Frost, and Nature spell in your hand (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: If he could see, he might be better at targeting.

name: Xhilag of the Abyss
text: [x]Colossal +4 At the start of your turn, increase the damage of Xhilag's Stalks by 1.
flavor: When ancient heroes drove a felhunter into the sea, they thought it was the end. But for Xhilag, it was only the beginning...

name: Gaia, the Techtonic
text: [x]Colossal +2 After a friendly Mech attacks, deal 1 damage to all enemies.
flavor: Always planning ahead, Ini knew she'd need this invention to protect all her other inventions.

name: Gigafin
text: [x]Colossal +1. Battlecry: Devour all enemy minions. Deathrattle: Spit them back out.
flavor: How much storage does Gigafin's Maw have? About a giga bite.

name: Ozumat
text: [x]Colossal +6 Deathrattle: For each of Ozumat's Tentacles, destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: Deathrattle: You'll be octo-sorry.

name: Tidal Revenant
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage. Gain 8 Armor.
flavor: A big minion that clears the board and gains Armor? Wow, Warrior is really in their element now.

name: Whirlpool
text: Destroy all minions and all copies of them (wherever they are).
flavor: In the southern hemisphere, it actually summons all minions instead.

name: Front Lines
text:
[x]Summon a minion
from each player's deck.
Repeat until either side
of the battlefield is full.
flavor: With the line in the sand crossed, the battle for the Throne of Tides had begun.

name: Lightray
text: Taunt\nCosts (1) less for each Paladin card you've played this game.
flavor: Lightrays, much like rays of light, tend to be seen closer to the surface.

name: Trenchstalker
text: Battlecry: Attack three different random enemies.
flavor: Cooler heads prevail.

name: Neptulon the Tidehunter
text: [x]Colossal +2, Rush, Windfury Whenever Neptulon attacks, if you control any Hands, they attack instead.
flavor: Neptulon, tired of filling hands, is now throwing hands.

name: The Garden's Grace
text: [x]Give a minion +4/+4 and Divine Shield. Costs (1) less for each Mana you've spent on Holy spells this game.
flavor: The perfect place to hold Conchella.

name: Naga Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each Mana you've spent on spells this game.
flavor: He might be giant, but he’s still a couple thousand protein shakes away from competing in the Colossal Wrestling Championship.

name: Dispose of Evidence
text: Give your hero +3 Attack this turn. Choose a card in your hand to shuffle into your deck.
flavor: Just because you did it doesn't mean you have to be guilty.

name: Batty Guest
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 2/1 Bat.
flavor: His favorite food is chocolate cereal.

name: Call to the Stand
text: Your opponent summons a random minion from their hand.
flavor: Don't worry, there is a chair for you to sit in. It's very misleading.

name: Convincing Disguise
text: [x]Transform a friendly minion into one that costs (2) more. Infuse (@): Transform all friendly minions instead.
flavor: Okay gang, let's see who's really under the mask… *gasp* Old Man Bru'kan!?

name: Door of Shadows
text: Draw a spell. Infuse (@): Add a temporary copy of it to your hand.
flavor: Upon arrival, please ring the doorbell of shadows, and wipe your shoes on the doormat of shadows before entering.

name: Dredger Staff
text: [x]Battlecry: Give minions \nin your hand +1 Health.
flavor: The dredger staff held the dredger knife and said, "Dredger bow before the Sire!"

name: Flustered Librarian
text: Has +1 Attack for each\nImp you control.
flavor: A fairly sIMPle card.

name: Muck Pools
text: Transform a friendly minion into one that costs (1) more.
flavor: Making a dredger is easier than you'd think. You don't need to worry about mucking it up!

name: Planted Evidence
text: Discover a spell. It costs (2) less this turn.
flavor: So you're telling me this wasn't Natural Causes?

name: Promotion
text: [x]Give a Silver Hand\nRecruit +3/+3\nand Taunt.
flavor: And with the new title of 'Golden Hand Recruit', you also get a pay raise!

name: Relic of Extinction
text: Deal $@ damage to a random enemy minion, twice. Improve your future Relics.
flavor: Faster than an asteroid, and just as effective.

name: Sanguine Depths
text: [x]Deal 1 damage to a \nminion and give it \n+2 Attack.
flavor: There may not be any skeletons in the closets at Castle Nathria, but there sure are souls in the basement.

name: Sinful Sous Chef
text: Deathrattle: Add 2\nSilver Hand Recruits\nto your hand.
flavor: If this dinner party goes well, she thinks she has a good shot at being on Fel's Kitchen.

name: Sinstone Totem
text: At the end of your turn, gain +1 Health.
flavor: This one's heavier than the wooden totems. Mostly from the weight of your sins.

name: Suspicious Alchemist
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell. If your opponent guesses your choice, they get a copy.
flavor: Side effects may include feeling totally fine! Don't even worry about it.

name: Suspicious Usher
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a Legendary minion. If your opponent guesses your __choice, they get a copy.
flavor: "Oh please, let me take your jacket, luggage, and absurdly large shoulder pads."

name: The Light! It Burns!
text: [x]Deal damage to a minion\n equal to its Attack.
flavor: Wait, if you're over there, then who's messing with the lights?!

name: Theft Accusation
text:
[x]Choose a minion.
Destroy it after you play
a card copied from
the opponent.
flavor: Honey, where are my paaaaaaants?

name: Totemic Evidence
text: Choose a basic Totem and summon it.\nInfuse (@ Totems):\nSummon all 4 instead.
flavor: Every totem is evidence of a tree's murder.

name: Anima Extractor
text:
[x]Whenever a friendly
minion takes damage,
give a random minion in
your hand +1/+1.
flavor: After we are done you're welcome to help yourself to cookies and apple juice. Thank you for your donation!

name: Anonymous Informant
text: Battlecry: The next Secret you play costs (0).
flavor: It turns out she wasn't so great at keeping secrets after all.

name: Arson Accusation
text: Choose a minion. Destroy it after your hero takes damage.
flavor: We didn't start the fire!

name: Attorney-at-Maw
text: Choose One - Silence\na minion; or Give a minion Immune this turn.
flavor: When the going gets tough, you don't want a criminal lawyer... you want a criminal lawyer...

name: Bibliomite
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a card\n in your hand to shuffle\n into your deck.
flavor: He did NOT want to cast a spell.

name: Carving Chisel
text: After your hero attacks, summon a random basic Totem.
flavor: Look at your stone. Visualize the totem within. Then gently...

name: Castle Kennels
text: [x]Give a friendly minion \n+2 Attack. If it's a \nBeast, give it Rush.
flavor: Play dead! Oh…

name: Class Action Lawyer
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck\nhas no Neutral cards, set\n_a minion's stats to 1/1.
flavor: "Have you or a loved one ever been injured in a Consecration?"

name: Conqueror's Banner
text: Reveal a card from each player's deck, three times. Draw any of yours that cost more.
flavor: Olgra, I love your new tapestry! Where did you get it?

name: Crazed Wretch
text: Has +2 Attack and Charge while damaged.
flavor: Enrage is all the rage.

name: Crooked Cook
text:
[x]At the end of your turn, 
if you dealt 3 or more 
damage to the enemy 
hero, draw a card.
flavor: There are many things not called poison which can kill a man. But in this case, it is poison.

name: Double Cross
text: Secret: When your opponent spends all their Mana, draw two cards.
flavor: Valeera revealed herself to be a double agent. At which point Maiev felt comfortable revealing that she also was a double agent. And then Scabbs announced to everybody that - get this - he was a double agent.

name: Frenzied Fangs
text: Summon two 2/1 Bats.\nInfuse (@): Give them +1/+2.
flavor: That's one stylish bat.

name: Frozen Touch
text: Deal $3 damage.\nInfuse (@): Add a Frozen Touch to your hand.
flavor: Is this what Bob was talking about when he said he served a drink to a Death Knight once?

name: Great Hall
text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.
flavor: It's fabulous! It's grand! It's, well it's really very nice.

name: Imp-oster
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Imp. Transform into a copy of it.
flavor: There is an imposter among us.

name: Impending Catastrophe
text: Draw a card. Repeat for each Imp you control.
flavor: The imps end you, and the cats... well, they astrophe.

name: Kidnap
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, stuff it in a 0/4 Sack.
flavor: Check your coat, but don't check the coat closet.

name: Maze Guide
text: Battlecry: Summon a random 2-Cost minion.
flavor: "And if you look to your left, you'll see an even larger statue of Sire Denathrius!"

name: Motion Denied
text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, deal $6 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: DO NOT PASS GO. DO NOT COLLECT 200 GOLD.

name: Murder Accusation
text: Choose a minion. Destroy it after another enemy minion dies.
flavor: Quote From Man Murdered: "What are you gonna do, murder me?"

name: Mysterious Visitor
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of cards copied from your opponent by (3).
flavor: Dave, we can tell this letter is fake - it's in your handwriting. And take off that stupid hood, you're embarrassing us.

name: Natural Causes
text: Deal $2 damage. Summon a 2/2 Treant.
flavor: What if the suspect was framed? What if the murder weapon was... a plant?

name: Order in the Court
text: [x]Reorder your deck from\n highest Cost to lowest\nCost.
flavor: "I have nothing BUT contempt for this court!"

name: Perjury
text: [x]Secret: When your turn starts, Discover and cast a Secret from another class.
flavor: By Liar be Perjured!

name: Priest of the Deceased
text: Taunt\nInfuse (@): Gain +2/+2.
flavor: "Funnel cakes? I haven't had those in years…"

name: Relic Vault
text: The next Relic you play this turn casts twice.
flavor: Holds Sire Denathrius' most prized possession - his teddy bear, Jeremy Bearimy.

name: Riot!
text:
[x]Your minions can't be 
reduced below 1 Health 
this turn. They each attack 
a random enemy minion.
flavor: No, Blizzard!

name: Roosting Gargoyle
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2 Attack.
flavor: Jalapeñas!

name: Serrated Bone Spike
text:
[x]Deal $3 damage to a 
minion. If it dies, your 
next card this turn 
costs (2) less.
flavor: Draka, in an attempt to help, threw them a bone.

name: Sinful Brand
text:
[x]Brand an enemy minion.
Whenever it takes
damage, deal 1 damage
to the enemy hero.
flavor: My brand!

name: Sketchy Stranger
text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret from another class.
flavor: More of a 'Painted Stranger' if you ask me.

name: Spirit Poacher
text: Battlecry: Summon a random Dormant Wildseed.
flavor: Always poach from your local spirit shelter.

name: Sticky Situation
text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, summon a 3/4 Spider with Stealth.
flavor: "Now this is what I'd call..." "...just shut up."

name: Vile Library
text: Give a friendly minion +1/+1. Repeat for each Imp you control.
flavor: What type of vial library has 0 vials in it!?

name: Volatile Skeleton
text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: These ice sculpures look so realistic!

name: Afterlife Attendant
text: Your Infuse cards also Infuse while in your deck.
flavor: AH! Wrist cramp!

name: Ashen Elemental
text: [x]Battlecry: Whenever your\nopponent draws a card next\nturn, they take 2 damage.
flavor: "The castle was nice but the fireplaces were too small - 2/5 stars"

name: Cathedral of Atonement
text: Give a minion +2/+1 and draw a card.
flavor: You'll actually find more than one tonement here.

name: Clear Conscience
text: Give a friendly minion +2/+3 and "Elusive on your opponent's turn."
flavor: Do you swear to give the buff, the whole buff, and nothing but the buff, so help you Kyrestia?

name: Creepy Painting
text: After another minion dies, become a copy of it.
flavor: I do not like this painting, Harth. Its smug aura mocks me.

name: Demolition Renovator
text: Tradeable\nBattlecry: Destroy \nan enemy location.
flavor: "Look, the Sire said he wanted something more open concept..."

name: Dinner Performer
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a random minion from your deck that you can afford to play.
flavor: BANG!

name: Forensic Duster
text: [x]Battlecry: Your \nopponent's minions \ncost (1) more next turn.
flavor: He had plenty of experience with dusting things from his time as a butler, so when a murder was committed he saw a real job opportunity!

name: Framester
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 'Framed' cards into the opponent's deck. When drawn, they Overload for (2).
flavor: "Who put these beans in my pocket?!" -Man With Beans in Pocket

name: Ghastly Gravedigger
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a Secret, choose a card in your opponent's hand to _shuffle into their deck.
flavor: Some people take their secrets to the grave.

name: Habeas Corpses
text: Discover a friendly minion to resurrect and give it Rush.\nIt dies at the end of turn.
flavor: Whoops, typo!

name: Hedge Maze
text: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle.
flavor: If you keep seeing a statue of the Sire, you’re not going in circles. There’s just so many of them.

name: Identity Theft
text: Discover a copy of a card from your opponent's hand and deck.
flavor: Identity theft is not a joke, Jim!

name: Imbued Axe
text: [x]After your hero attacks, give your damaged minions +1/+2. Infuse (@): +2/+2 instead.
flavor: Technically it's a Yet-to-be-Imbued Axe.

name: Incarceration
text: [x]Choose a minion.\nIt goes Dormant\nfor 3 turns.
flavor: To Blizzard jail with you!

name: Invitation Courier
text: After a card is added to your hand from another class, copy it.
flavor: Sending mail via steward is soooo old school.

name: Jury Duty
text:
[x]Summon two
Silver Hand Recruits.
Give your Silver Hand
Recruits +1/+1.
flavor: The most criminal thing about paladins is that they actually like jury duty.

name: Magnifying Glaive
text: [x]After your hero attacks,\ndraw until you have\n3 cards.

name: Muckborn Servant
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Discover a Paladin card.
flavor: Party guests never tip as well as the patrons in Bob's tavern.

name: Murloc Holmes
text: [x]Battlecry: Solve 3 Clues \nabout your opponent's cards \nto get copies of them.
flavor: When you have eliminated the imfroggable, whatever remains, however uncroakable, must be the truth.

name: Nightcloak Sanctum
text: Freeze a minion. Summon a 2/2 Volatile Skeleton.
flavor: For VIPs only. (Very Infused Person)

name: Objection!
text: Secret: When your opponent plays a\n_minion, Counter it.
flavor: "Sire, this is a Sindy's."

name: Party Favor Totem
text: [x]At the end of your turn, summon a random basic Totem. Infuse (@): Summon two instead.
flavor: It's the gift (totem) that keeps on giving (totems)!

name: Pelagos
text:
[x]After you cast a spell 
on a friendly minion, set 
its Attack and Health to 
the higher of the two.
flavor: He's a great judge of character.

name: Plot of Sin
text: [x]Summon two 2/2 \nTreants. Infuse (@): Two \n5/5 Ancients instead.
flavor: It's a great plot, but it's riddled with holes.

name: Primordial Wave
text:
[x]Transform enemy minions 
into ones that cost (1) less 
and friendly minions into 
ones that cost (1) more.
flavor: A primordial hello to you too!

name: Prince Renathal
text: [x]Your deck size is 40.\nYour starting Health is 40.
flavor: A lot of kids go through a rebellious phase, but Prince Renathal's was a bit extreme.

name: Relic of Phantasms
text: Summon two @/@\nSpirits. Improve your future Relics.
flavor: Xy'mox chuckled. "You mean the Chaos Emerald?"

name: Service Bell
text: Discover a Class card from your deck and draw all copies of it.
flavor: The bell tolls for us! Waiter, we need more water!

name: Shadowborn
text: Deathrattle: Reduce the Cost of the highest Cost Shadow spell in your hand by (3).
flavor: You merely adopted the shadows; I was born in them!

name: Sinstone Graveyard
text: [x]Summon a @/@ Ghost.\n(Has +1/+1 for each other\ncard you played this turn!)
flavor: A graveyard in the realm of the dead; a bit redundant, don't you think?

name: Solid Alibi
text: Until your next turn, your hero can only take 1 damage at a time.
flavor: That pillow knows too much…

name: Stag Charge
text: Deal $3 damage. Summon a random Dormant Wildseed.
flavor: Stag! You’re it!

name: Stewart the Steward
text: [x]Deathrattle: Give the next Silver Hand Recruit you summon +3/+3 and this Deathrattle.
flavor: How many bites does it take to get the center of an hors d'oeuvre?

name: Suffocating Shadows
text: [x]When you play or \ndiscard this, destroy a \nrandom enemy minion.
flavor: "Reading is good for you," they said.

name: Suspicious Pirate
text: Battlecry: Discover a weapon. If your opponent guesses your choice, they get a copy.
flavor: EVERY party should be a costume party.

name: The Harvester of Envy
text: After you play a card copied from the opponent, steal the original.
flavor: "Ah, permission shmermission! You can borrow anything you want, anytime, as long as if you give it back before it's missed. Everyone knows that! Right?"

name: Tight-Lipped Witness
text: Secrets can't be revealed.
flavor: People keep asking for her award-winning vegetarian chili recipe, but she just can't spill the beans.

name: Vengeful Visage
text: [x]Secret: After an enemy minion attacks your hero, summon a copy of it to attack the enemy hero.
flavor: The mirror shows us nothing less than the deepest, darkest desire of our hearts: to go face.

name: Weapons Expert
text: Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, give it +1/+1. Otherwise, draw a weapon.
flavor: "Yes, Your Honor, this appears to be some sort of blade."

name: Wild Spirits
text: [x]Summon two different Dormant Wildseeds. Make your Wildseeds awaken 1 turn sooner.
flavor: Wait, this card just released! It should be Standard Spirits!

name: Baroness Vashj
text: [x]If this would transform\ninto a minion, summon\nthat minion instead.
flavor: Vashj was supposed to make an appearance in "The Sunken City," but after a freak accident in "Ashes of Outland," she ended up here.

name: Boon of the Ascended
text: Give a minion +2 Health. Summon a Kyrian with its stats and Taunt.
flavor: Ascension is not some external power granted to you, it is the power you find within yourself.

name: Buffet Biggun
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two Silver Hand Recruits. Infuse (@): Give them +2 Attack and Divine Shield.
flavor: "Look, I just want to know what kind of monster put raisins in this."

name: Burden of Pride
text: [x]Summon three 1/3 Jailers with Taunt. If you have 20 or less Health, give them +1/+1.
flavor: A group of burdens is called a pride.

name: Chatty Bartender
text: [x]At the end of your turn, if you control a Secret, deal 2 damage to all enemies.
flavor: "So a Venthyr, an Old God, and a Tauren walk into a bar…"

name: Cold Case
text: Summon two 2/2 Volatile Skeletons. Gain 4 Armor.
flavor: And that's why you keep your skeletons in your closet instead of your freezer.

name: Crud Caretaker
text: Battlecry: Summon a 3/5 Elemental with Taunt.
flavor: All it takes is a little love and a LOT of junk!

name: Dew Process
text: [x]For the rest of the game,\nplayers draw an extra card\nat the start of their turn.
flavor: All part of dewing your dew diligence.

name: Dispossessed Soul
text: Battlecry: If you control a location, Discover a copy of a card in your deck.
flavor: I'm afraid it came as a great shock to her when she died.

name: Halkias
text: [x]Stealth. Deathrattle: Store Halkias's soul inside of a friendly Secret. It resummons Halkias when triggered.
flavor: Everybody tough until the sinstones start walking.

name: Incriminating Psychic
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Copy two random cards from your opponent's hand.
flavor: Good news: He knows Kazakus's secret identity! Bad news: Now he's here.

name: Kryxis the Voracious
text: [x]Battlecry: Discard\nyour hand. Deathrattle:\nDraw 3 cards.
flavor: Tried intermittent fasting. It didn't stick.

name: Life Sentence
text: Remove a minion\nfrom the game.
flavor: Also sentenced to laugh and love.

name: Mischievous Imp
text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this. Infuse (@): Summon two copies instead.
flavor: Why is it when something happens, it is always you three?

name: Murlocula
text: Lifesteal\nInfuse (@): This costs (0).
flavor: The best part of Murlocula is when he said "IT'S MRRGLIN' TIME" and totally mrrgled those guys.

name: Orion, Mansion Manager
text: After a friendly Secret is revealed, cast a different Mage Secret and gain +2/+2.
flavor: The secrets of the universe are vast... and will be revealed sometime later this game.

name: Partner in Crime
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a \ncopy of this minion at \nthe end of your turn.
flavor: "You know what we need? Some rope." "That's stupid. Name one thing you'd need a rope for."

name: Private Eye
text: [x]Battlecry: Cast a Secret\nfrom your deck.\n_Combo: Cast 2 instead.
flavor: Eye see what you did there.

name: Prosecutor Mel'tranix
text: [x]Battlecry: Your opponent can only play their left- and right-most cards on their next turn.
flavor: "Your Honor. The Defense isn't a clown, he's the whole circus."

name: Scuttlebutt Ghoul
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you control a Secret, summon a copy of this.
flavor: No 'if's, 'and's, or 'scuttlebutt's'!

name: Sightless Magistrate
text: Battlecry: Both players draw\nuntil they have 5 cards.
flavor: Does "Justice is Blind" still apply with Spectral Sight?

name: Stonebound Gargon
text: [x]Rush Infuse (@): Also damages the minions next to __whomever this attacks.
flavor: Really good at "stay."

name: The Stonewright
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Totems have +2 Attack.
flavor: She wrights stone better than she reads it.

name: Widowbloom Seedsman
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a Nature\nspell. Gain an empty\n Mana Crystal.
flavor: Sometimes a blue thumb is better than a green one.

name: All Fel Breaks Loose
text: [x]Summon a friendly Demon that died this game. Infuse (@ Demons): Summon three instead.
flavor: Maybe we should have made the bars closer together…

name: Ara'lon
text: Battlecry: Summon one of each Dormant Wildseed.
flavor: If I had a nickel for every time a Hunter Legendary minion in Castle Nathria summoned three different companions, I'd have two nickels - which isn't a lot, but it's weird that it happened twice.

name: Clean the Scene
text: Destroy all minions with 3 or less Attack. Infuse (@): 6 or less.
flavor: Not even the holy Light can get anima out of white silk.

name: Death Blossom Whomper
text: Battlecry: Draw a Deathrattle minion and gain its Deathrattle.
flavor: We call her Audrey II. She was named after her mother.

name: Elitist Snob
text: [x]Battlecry: For each Paladin card in your hand, randomly gain Divine Shield, Lifesteal, Rush, or Taunt.
flavor: "I heard the Sire invited a Murloc! How dreadful!"

name: Famished Fool
text: Battlecry: Draw a card.\nInfuse (@): Draw 3 instead.
flavor: He's not hungry for food, he's starving for attention!

name: Lady Darkvein
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 2/1 Shades. Each gains a Deathrattle to cast your last Shadow spell.
flavor: You're so vein. I bet you think this flavor text is about you.

name: Mawsworn Bailiff
text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you have 4 or more Armor, gain +4/+4.
flavor: Bailiff, bring in the dancing lobsters!

name: Muck Plumber
text: ALL minions cost (2) more.
flavor: If you drink muck, you go to the Maw before you die.

name: Necrolord Draka
text: [x]Battlecry: Equip a @/3 Dagger. \n(+1 Attack for each other \ncard you played this turn!)
flavor: We originally planned on giving Rogue a Legendary minion called "The Moon", but SOMEONE jumped in the frame.

name: Relic of Dimensions
text:
[x]Draw two cards 
and reduce their Cost 
by (@). Improve your 
future Relics.
flavor: A glaive is a glaive, but a mystery box could be anything! It could even be a glaive!

name: Shadehound
text: [x]Whenever this attacks, give your other Beasts +2/+2. Infuse (@ Beasts): Gain Rush.
flavor: This Shadehound wasn't just a good boy. He was the best.

name: Shadow Waltz
text: Summon a 3/5 Shadow with Taunt. If a minion died this turn, summon another.
flavor: They're dancing to one of Rin's demonic symphonies. Her music might not be famous now, but just you wait!

name: Sinrunner
text: Deathrattle: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: Blanchy was said to be an affectionate and well-behaved horse in life. How she ended up in Revendreth? We're too afraid to ask.

name: Soul Seeker
text: Battlecry: Swap this with a random minion from your opponent's deck.
flavor: The Soul Seeker's job is to look for a snitch.

name: Steamcleaner
text: Battlecry: Destroy ALL cards in both players' decks that didn't start there.
flavor: Business is slow since the anima shortage began. Things just don't get stained like they used to!

name: Stoneborn Accuser
text: [x]Infuse (@): Gain\n"Battlecry: Deal 5\ndamage."
flavor: "I SAW THEM VENT, I SWEAR!"

name: Bog Beast
text: [x]Taunt \nDeathrattle: Summon a 2/4 \nMuckmare with Taunt.
flavor: I'm sure at least one of those bones is from an actual beast.

name: Contract Conjurer
text: Costs (3) less for each Secret you control.
flavor: This document looks illegally binding.

name: Deathborne
text: Deal $2 damage to all minions. Summon a 2/2 Volatile Skeleton \nfor each killed.
flavor: Kel'Thuzad thinks adding a silent 'e' at the end of words makes them sound cooler.

name: Decimator Olgra
text: [x]Battlecry: Gain +1/+1\nfor each damaged minion,\n_then attack all enemies.
flavor: FOUND HER!

name: Defense Attorney Nathanos
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a friendly Deathrattle minion that died this game. Gain its Deathrattle and then trigger it.
flavor: "Your Honor, my client was simply trying a new tree trimming technique!"

name: Imp King Rafaam
text: Battlecry: Resurrect four friendly Imps. Infuse (@): Give your Imps +2/+2.
flavor: Not even death can stop Rafaam from pursuing a life of crime.

name: Masked Reveler
text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 copy of another minion in your deck.
flavor: "It's party time! P-A-R-T-Why? Because I gotta!"

name: Scribbling Stenographer
text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each card you've played this turn.
flavor: A truly staggering 180 scribbles per minute!

name: Sylvanas, the Accused
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy an enemy minion. Infuse (@): Take control of it instead.
flavor: Turns into 'Sylvanas, the Infused'.

name: Theotar, the Mad Duke
text: Battlecry: Discover a\ncard in each player's hand and swap them.
flavor: "I'm afraid you've gone mad! You're entirely bonkers. But I'll tell you a secret. All the best souls are."

name: Tome Tampering
text:
[x]Shuffle 1-Cost 
copies of cards in your 
hand into your deck, 
then discard your hand.
flavor: An overdue book calls for a do-over.

name: Divine Toll
text:
[x]Shoot 5 rays at random
minions. They give friendly
minions +2/+2, and deal $2
damage to enemy minions.
flavor: Never send to know for whom the bell tolls.

name: Huntsman Altimor
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a Gargon Companion. Infuse ({0}): Summon another. _Infuse ({1}): And another!
flavor: He loves all his Gargons equally. (Hecutis is his favorite and it's not close.)

name: Red Herring
text: [x]Taunt\nYour non-Red Herring\nminions have Stealth.
flavor: He's got gill-ty written all over him!

name: Remornia, Living Blade
text: Rush\nAfter this attacks, equip it.
flavor: Was it the lead pipe... the candlestick... or the unhinged, sentient, bloodthirsty sword?

name: Sinfueled Golem
text: Infuse (@): Gain stats equal to the Attack of the minions that Infused this.
flavor: That poor golem is going to be stuck as a guard forever. He can never get a head!

name: The Countess
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, add 3 Legendary Invitations to your hand.
flavor: 3 Legendary Invitations, AH AH AH!

name: Topior the Shrubbagazzor
text: [x]Battlecry: For the rest of the game, after you cast a Nature spell, summon a 3/3 Whelp with Rush.
flavor: They got a dragon that burns 1000 gallons of anima a week.

name: Artificer Xy'mox
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover and \ncast a Relic. Infuse (@): \nCast all three instead.
flavor: "The anticipation to use this relic is killing me! Though, it will more likely kill you."

name: Collateral Damage
text:
[x]Deal $6 damage to three 
random enemy minions. 
Excess damage hits 
the enemy hero.

name: Criminal Lineup
text: [x]Choose a friendly minion.\nSummon 3 copies of it.\nOverload: (2)
flavor: Number 1, could you please sing the opening to "I Want It That Way"?

name: Kael'thas Sinstrider
text: Every third minion you play each turn costs (0).
flavor: You heard about Kael'thas? That's messed up, right?

name: Kel'Thuzad, the Inevitable
text: [x]Battlecry: Resurrect your Volatile Skeletons. Any that can't fit on the battlefield instantly explode! @(@)
flavor: Looks like Kel'Thuzad is borrowing some of Mr. Bigglesworth's nine lives.

name: Nightshade Bud
text: Choose One - Discover a minion from your deck to summon;\nor a spell to cast.
flavor: It actually thrives in partial sunlight.

name: Party Crasher
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Throw a random minion from your hand at it.
flavor: "Do you ever wonder why you don't get invited anywhere?" "… no, not really."

name: Sesselie of the Fae Court
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Draw a minion.\nReduce its Cost by (8).
flavor: They claim they're from the Fae Court, but that might be a Fae Kout.

name: Torghast Custodian
text: [x]Battlecry: For each enemy minion, randomly gain Rush, Divine Shield, or Windfury.
flavor: Why is it a common? Well we couldn't make it a LEGendary minion!

name: Insatiable Devourer
text: [x]Battlecry: Devour an enemy \nminion and gain its stats. \n_Infuse (@): And its neighbors.
flavor: You're not you when you're anima-starved.

name: Convoke the Spirits
text: [x]Cast 8 random\nDruid spells (targets\nchosen randomly).
flavor: The spirits prefer to convoke when there's some hot gossip to discuss.

name: Gigantotem
text: Costs (1) less for each Totem you've summoned this game.
flavor: Totem Golem's uncle, gone too soon.

name: Sire Denathrius
text: Lifesteal. Battlecry: Deal 5 damage amongst enemies. Endlessly Infuse (@): Deal 1 more.
flavor: History has a way of altering villains so that we can no longer see ourselves in them. Unfortunately for the Venthyr, they all look like Sire Denathrius.

name: Stoneborn General
text: [x]Rush \n__Deathrattle: Summon an \n___8/8 Gravewing with Rush._
flavor: Leads with an iron fist and a stony demeanor.

name: The Jailer
text: Battlecry: Destroy your deck. This minion\ngains Immune.
flavor: At one point, The Jailer served as Arbiter over the souls of the Shadowlands. He was the epitome of an unbiased, righteous judge of character. WAS.

name: Ransack
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If you've played a card from another class this turn, deal $4 instead.
flavor: "Fred's a talking ghoul. He can do whatever he wants."\n"I want to steal!"

name: Shadow of Demise
text: Each time you cast a spell, transform this into a copy of it.
flavor: Each time you cast a spell, transform this into a copy of its flavor text.

name: Undying Allies
text: After you play an Undead this turn,\ngive it Reborn.
flavor: Best friends FOREVER.

name: Animate Dead
text: Resurrect a friendly minion that costs (3)\nor less.
flavor: In the old days they used to animate the dead one bone at a time... it's all done by computer now.

name: Arcane Bolt
text: Deal $2 damage. Manathirst (8): Deal $3 damage instead.
flavor: Just you wait until I have 8 mana!

name: Arcane Wyrm
text: Battlecry: Add an Arcane Bolt to your hand.
flavor: Arcane Bolt on you, Arcane Bolt on your cow, Arcane Bolt on your whole family!

name: Arms Dealer
text: After you summon an Undead, give it +1 Attack.
flavor: Need a hand?

name: Banshee
text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly Undead +2/+1.
flavor: :O

name: Blazing Transmutation
text: [x]Choose a minion. Discover one that costs (1) more to transform it into.
flavor: Congratulations! Your minion evolved into a Fire type!

name: Calamity's Grasp
text: Deathrattle: Add a random Outcast card to your hand.
flavor: Kel'Thuzad's personal fidget spinner.

name: Cold Storage
text: Freeze a minion. Add a copy of it to your hand.
flavor: Sapphiron's favorite treat always was popsicles.

name: Concoctor
text: Battlecry: Add a random Concoction to your hand.
flavor: "A dash of death, with a pinch of death, and a sprinkle of… death!"

name: Crystalsmith Cultist
text: Battlecry: If you're\nholding a Shadow spell, gain +1/+1.
flavor: "I just think they're neat."

name: Devourer of Souls
text: After a friendly minion dies, gain its Deathrattle.
flavor: Winner of the Scourge's annual funnel cake devouring contest 12 years running.

name: Feast and Famine
text: Give your hero +3 Attack\nthis turn. Manathirst (4): And Lifesteal.
flavor: Please sir, may I have some armor?

name: Fierce Outsider
text: Rush\nOutcast: Your next Outcast card costs (1) less.
flavor: Look, if you stopped breaking stuff you wouldn't have to stay outside.

name: Flight of the Bronze
text: [x]Discover a Dragon.\nManathirst (7): Summon\na 5/5 Drake with Taunt.
flavor: You're telling me Hearthstone will make a 1 Mana 5/5 with Taunt? Maybe when bronze flies!

name: Foul Egg
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Undead Chicken.
flavor: Definitely expired.

name: Ghostly Strike
text: Deal $1 damage. Combo: Draw a card.
flavor: …What are their demands?

name: Jolly Roger
text: After your hero\nattacks, summon a\n1/1 Undead Pirate.
flavor: That's a great pose, Roger. But this time try happier, and with your mouth open.

name: Last Stand
text: Draw a Taunt minion. Manathirst (7):\nDouble its stats.
flavor: If you play two Last Stands in one game, you're a liar.

name: Lingering Zombie
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Disarmed Zombie with "Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Zombie."

name: Mind Sear
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it dies,\ndeal $3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Ride or die, or both.

name: Mistake
text: This has all minion types.
flavor: We like to think of it as a happy accident.

name: Ricochet Shot
text: Deal $1 damage to\nthree random enemies.
flavor: Simple geometry? Actually, I find it's quite complex.

name: Sanguine Soldier
text: Divine Shield\n Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to your hero.
flavor: They just need someone to ouch for them.

name: Scourge Tamer
text: Battlecry: Craft a custom Zombeast.
flavor: He's a hunter AND a gatherer.

name: Scourge Troll
text: Deathrattles given to this minion trigger twice.
flavor: This is where I'd put my Deathrattle - IF I HAD ONE!

name: Shambling Chow
text: Rush\nDeathrattle: Deal 4 damage to your hero.
flavor: And step, and shamble, and step, and flip the hair!

name: Sunfury Champion
text: [x]After you cast a Fire\nspell, deal 1 damage\nto all minions.
flavor: Champion of the Great Blood Elf Bake Off 12 years running.

name: Training Session
text: Discover a Taunt minion. If you play it this turn, repeat this.
flavor: Instructor Razuvious's training turns the Scourge's Death Knights into hardened killing machines. His merciless routines focus on breaking down his underlings until they build up a resistance to his strength.

name: Trinket Tracker
text: Battlecry: Draw a\n1-Cost spell.
flavor:
Dashing through the snow
On an undead trinket craze
Over the hills we go
Tracking all the way!

name: Unleash Fel
text: Deal $1 damage\nto all enemies. Manathirst_(6): With\nLifesteal.
flavor: Why'd you put it on a leash in the first place?

name: Wither
text: [x]Choose a minion. Each\nfriendly Undead steals 1\nAttack and Health from it.
flavor: The opponent's minion can't live wither without you.

name: Arcane Quiver
text: [x]Discover a spell from\nyour deck. If it's Arcane,\ngive it Spell Damage +1.
flavor: "Quiver in fear!" - The Lich King\n"Ok." - Me

name: Astalor Bloodsworn
text: Battlecry: Add Astalor, the Protector to your hand. Manathirst (@): Deal 2 damage.
flavor: I hear his third phase is even more intense.

name: Blazing Power
text: [x]Give a minion +1/+1.\nRepeat for each damaged\nfriendly character.
flavor: Apply heat directly to the damaged area.

name: Blood Matriarch Liadrin
text: After you summon a minion with less Attack than this, give it Divine Shield and Rush.
flavor: All's fair in blood and war.

name: Bone Flinger
text: [x]Battlecry: If a friendly\nUndead died after your last\nturn, deal 2 damage.
flavor: It’s the scourge bringing, plague slinging, bone flinging basher!

name: Chitinous Plating
text: Gain 4 Armor. At the start of your next turn, gain 4 more.
flavor: Durable, detachable and dishwasher safe.

name: Conjured Arrow
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Manathirst (6): Draw that many cards.
flavor: We just call them "cursors".

name: Coroner
text: Battlecry: Freeze an enemy minion. Manathirst (6): Silence it first.
flavor: It was at this moment the Coroner decided to become a farmer instead.

name: Deathweaver Aura
text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Summon two 3/2 Zombies." Overload: (1)
flavor: Knitting is a harmless hobby. Weaving, though...

name: Embers of Strength
text: [x]Summon two 1/2 Guards with Taunt. Manathirst (6): Give them +1/+2.
flavor: Remember, remember, the 1/2's of Ember.

name: For Quel'Thalas!
text: [x]Give a friendly minion\n+3 Attack. Give your hero\n+2 Attack this turn.
flavor: For kwell-kell.. for kell… for kwee- for the city!

name: Ghoulish Alchemist
text: Battlecry: Your next Concoction costs (0).
flavor: AND I THREW IT ON THE GROUND!

name: Incorporeal Corporal
text: After this minion attacks,\ndestroy it.
flavor: You won't believe how long this was called "Incorporal Corporeal"…

name: Infected Peasant
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Undead Peasant.
flavor: The peasants are revolting!

name: Magister's Apprentice
text: Your Arcane spells\ncost (1) less.
flavor: "If this is the work I'll be doing, maybe I don't want to be just like you someday..."

name: Mark of Scorn
text: [x]Draw a card. If it's not a\nminion, deal $4 damage to\nthe lowest Health enemy.
flavor: Threat Level who? Mark of Scorn!

name: Mind Eater
text: Deathrattle: Add a copy of a card in your opponent's deck to your hand.
flavor: Watch out brain, she'll chew you up! She's a Mind Eater!

name: Necrotic Mortician
text: Battlecry: If a friendly Undead died after your\nlast turn, Discover an Unholy Rune card.
flavor: Her hair, just like her name, is full of 'tic's.

name: Nerubian Flyer
text: [x]Battlecry: If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, summon a 2/2 Nerubian.
flavor: Undead Air Miles only cover Northrend and the surrounding coast.

name: Nofin's Imp-ossible
text: Give all friendly Demons and Murlocs "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Imploc."
flavor: They have faces only a morrglr could love.

name: Potion Belt
text: [x]Discover 2 Concoctions.
flavor: Pick your poison.

name: Potionmaster Putricide
text: After a minion dies, add a Concoction to your hand.
flavor: "Good news everyone! I'm a Rogue card now!"

name: Prismatic Elemental
text: Battlecry: Discover a\nspell from any class.\nIt costs (1) less.
flavor: Disappointed they were rejected from the Magical Guardian tryouts.

name: Rake
text:
[x]Give your hero +2 Attack
this turn. Deal damage
equal to your hero's
Attack to a minion.
flavor: When you're done shredding through your enemies, use it on your leaves!

name: Rotten Rodent
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of all Deathrattle cards in your deck by (1).
flavor: It's dead, but it's not a mouse.

name: Shallow Grave
text: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle, then destroy it.
flavor: Jumpscare!

name: Silvermoon Farstrider
text: Battlecry: Give all\nArcane spells in your hand\nSpell Damage +1.
flavor: Surprisingly nearsighted.

name: Suspicious Peddler
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a 1-Cost card. If your opponent guesses your __choice, they get a copy.
flavor: The best snake oil this side of Azeroth.

name: Umbral Geist
text: [x]Deathrattle: Add a random\nShadow spell to your hand.
flavor: “After all, one can't leave his shadow lying about and not miss it sooner or later, don't you agree?”

name: Vampiric Blood
text: [x]Give your hero +5 Health.\nSpend 3 Corpses to gain\n5 more and draw a card.
flavor: BLEH, BLEH BLEH!

name: Vast Wisdom
text: Discover two spells that cost (3) or less. Swap their Costs.
flavor: My wisdom is SO vast that I can count up to THREE!

name: Vrykul Necrolyte
text: [x]Battlecry: Give a friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Zombie with Rush."
flavor: If at first you don't succeed, vry, vry again.

name: Wretched Exile
text: [x]After you play an Outcast\ncard, add a random Outcast\ncard to your hand.
flavor: If you're cold, they're cold. Let your wretches inside.

name: ZOMBEEEES!!!
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon four 1/1 Zombees to attack it.
flavor: In your brain, in your brain, Zombees, Zombees, Zombees-ees-ees.

name: Acolyte of Death
text: After a friendly Undead dies, draw a card.
flavor: "I see dead people. A LOT of dead people."

name: Amber Whelp
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage.
flavor: What is a Bronze Whelp's favorite garnish? A little thyme!

name: Arcsplitter
text: Deathrattle: Add 2 Arcane Bolts to your hand.
flavor: Shockspitter, Arcsplitter, what's next?

name: Asvedon, the Grandshield
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Cast a copy\nof the last spell your opponent played.
flavor: If you think that's strong, you should see his Great Great Grandshield.

name: Blightfang
text: [x]Battlecry: Infect all enemy minions. When they die, you summon a 2/2 Zombie with Taunt.
flavor: THE GIANT ENEMY SPIDER!

name: Bloodied Knight
text: [x]At the end of your turn,\ndeal 2 damage to\nyour hero.
flavor: Chillwind Yeti would NEVER betray you like this.

name: Brittleskin Zombie
text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, deal 3 damage to them.
flavor: I was born with glass bones and paper skin.

name: Construct Quarter
text: [x]Destroy a friendly\nminion to summon a\n4/5 Undead with Rush.
flavor: It's not alive! IT'S NOT ALIIIIIVE!!!

name: Crystal Broker
text: [x]Manathirst (5): Summon a random 3-Cost minion. Manathirst (10): Summon an 8-Cost minion instead.
flavor: Broke: Crystals\nWoke: Blueberry Fruit Gummies

name: Darkfallen Shadow
text: Rush\nManathirst (@): Gain Reborn.
flavor: Manathirst AND Reborn?! Pick a side!

name: Drakkari Embalmer
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Undead Reborn.
flavor: A troll in life, death, and online forums.

name: Enchanter
text: Enemy minions take double damage during your turn.
flavor: "I know Scourgebane! Your materials and tips appreciated!"

name: Energy Shaper
text: [x]Battlecry: Transform all spells in your hand into ones that cost (3) more. (They keep their original Cost.)
flavor: '"I can do a snake for you?"

name: Frostfin Chomper
text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an\nElemental last turn, summon\nthree 1/1 Murlocs.
flavor: If you want good sushi, it is important to always keep your murlocs on ice.

name: Halduron Brightwing
text: Battlecry: Give all Arcane spells in your hand and\n[x]deck Spell Damage +1.
flavor: I wanted to generate a legendary, but I held da wrong Brightwing.

name: Haunting Nightmare
text: [x]Deathrattle: Haunt a card in\nyour hand. When you play it,\nsummon a 4/3 Soldier.
flavor: Not as scary as the one where all my teeth fall out.

name: Hawkstrider Rancher
text: [x]Whenever you play a minion, give it +1/+1 and "Deathrattle: Summon a_ 1/1 Hawkstrider."
flavor: I prefer the Hawkstrider Nacho Cheeser.

name: Hookfist-3000
text: After your hero attacks, gain 4 Armor and\ndraw a card.
flavor: But wait! There's more!

name: Keeneye Spotter
text: [x]Whenever your hero\nattacks a minion, set\nits Health to 1.
flavor: "No Rexxar, not the face, the minion right there. Yep that one righ-- Rexxar no!"

name: Knight of the Dead
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero. Manathirst (7): Restore 5 Health to your hero instead.
flavor: A Paladin will follow their oath to slay the undead, even when they count themselves among them.

name: Meat Grinder
text: Battlecry: Shred a random minion in your deck to gain 4 Corpses.
flavor: After the Horde and Alliance sieged Icecrown Citadel, they took these back to use in their delis.

name: Nerubian Vizier
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell. If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, it costs (2) less.
flavor: One of the essential constructors of the Northrend wide web.

name: Plague Eruption
text: Deal $2 damage to all minions. If you've discarded a card this game, deal $1 more.
flavor: Be prepared! (With tissues)

name: Rimescale Siren
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, Freeze 3 random enemy minions.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: She will freeze the Scourge dead in their tracks.

name: Scourge Rager
text: Reborn\nBattlecry: Die.
flavor: Why's he so mad? Well you'd be mad too if you were created as a joke!

name: Scourge Supplies
text: Draw 3 cards.\nChoose one to discard.
flavor: The Scourge is very pro-recycling.

name: Seal of Blood
text: Give a minion +3/+3 and Divine Shield. Deal $3 damage to your hero.
flavor: Don't hate! Coagulate!

name: Shadow Suffusion
text: [x]Give your minions "Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy."
flavor: Be honest - you had to look up what that means.

name: Silvermoon Arcanist
text: [x]Spell Damage +2\nBattlecry: Your spells can’t\ntarget heroes this turn.
flavor: This turn only, I'm something of an Arcanist myself.

name: Silvermoon Sentinel
text: Taunt\nManathirst (@): Gain +2/+2 and Divine Shield.
flavor: I spent 8 mana polishing this shield, PLEASE don't make me bash you with it.

name: Soulbreaker
text: After your hero attacks and kills a minion, gain 2 Corpses.
flavor: Two for one special!

name: Spectral Trainee
text: After you cast a spell,\ndeal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: After graduating at the top of her class from Scholomance, she was granted an eternal scholarship to study abroad in Naxxramas.

name: Stitched Creation
text: Combo: Gain +2/+2.\nInfuse ({0}): Gain +3/+3. Manathirst ({1}): Gain +4/+4.
flavor: To defend Naxxramas from the oncoming adventurers, the Scourge created a monstrosity the world had never seen before: an abomination wearing clothes!!

name: Sunfury Clergy
text: [x]Battlecry: Restore 3 Health to all friendly characters. Manathirst (6): Restore 6 Health instead.
flavor: Why is the sun so mad? Won't anyone ask about its feelings?

name: Timewarden
text: [x]Battlecry: Until the end of your next turn, Dragons you summon gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: When are we getting the Silver, Gold, and Diamond dragonflight?

name: Unliving Champion
text: [x]Battlecry: If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, summon two 3/2 Zombies.
flavor: Unlive a little!

name: Vile Apothecary
text: At the end of your turn,\nadd a random Concoction to your hand.
flavor: When he's feeling extra malicious, he uses the licorice-flavored one.

name: Walking Dead
text: Taunt\nIf you discard this minion, summon it.
flavor: Watch out for the Scourge, KAAARRRRLLLL!

name: Whirlweaver
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast a\nspell last turn, Discover\nan Elemental.
flavor: Of all the creations from the Construct Quarter, a naga combined with water is the most intuitive.

name: Bonecaller
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Resurrect a friendly Undead that died this game.
flavor: Hello, am I speaking to the undead of the household? We have been trying to reach you about your skeleton's extended warranty.

name: Cannibalize
text: Destroy a minion. Restore its Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: The Silvermoon health inspector has some choice words for the Lich King.

name: Daring Drake
text: [x]Rush\nBattlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, gain +1/+1.
flavor: First of all, how dare you? Second of all, how dare you!

name: Eversong Portal
text: [x]Summon $1 4/4 |4(Lynx, Lynxes)\nwith Rush (improved by\nSpell Damage).
flavor: In retrospect, it's pretty impressive that they had the Lynxes just ready to go.

name: Fel'dorei Warband
text: Deal $4 damage.\nIf your deck has no minions, summon four 1/1 Illidari with Rush.
flavor: "Felerin, I made you a friendship bracelet!"\n"...what? I said WARband, not WRISTband..."

name: Felerin, the Forgotten
text: [x]Battlecry: Add a random Outcast card to the left and right sides of your hand. They cost (2) less.
flavor: flavor text

name: Goldwing
text: [x]Rush\nBattlecry: If you're holding\na Mech, gain Windfury.
flavor: This HAS to be worth more dust, right?

name: Grave Digging
text:
[x]Draw 2 cards.
Costs (1) if a friendly
Undead died after
your last turn.
flavor: Grave digging as a profession has high turnover; it's important to maintain headcount.

name: High Cultist Basaleph
text: Battlecry: Resurrect all friendly Undead that died after your last turn.
flavor: "It's not a cult! It's a collection of like-minded individuals that enjoy undead. And rituals. And doing what I say. "

name: Light of the Phoenix
text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each damaged friendly character.
flavor: It's 3 in the morning, could you PLEASE put out that phoenix?!

name: Lost Exarch
text: [x]Deathrattle: Spend all your\nMana. Summon that many\n_2/2 Zombies with Rush.
flavor: She resisted the temptation of the Burning Legion's power only to fall victim to the Scourge.

name: Noxious Infiltrator
text: [x]Poisonous Battlecry: If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, deal 1 damage to a minion.
flavor: Noxious, but not toxic - he's very polite!

name: Plaguespreader
text: Deathrattle: Transform a random minion in your opponent's hand into a Plaguespreader.
flavor: What do they mean by Patient Zero? I'm very patient!

name: Prescience
text: Draw 2 minions. For each that costs (5)\nor more, summon a_\n2/3 Spirit with Taunt.
flavor: Wait don't change the channel! I love this vision.

name: Rotting Necromancer
text: Battlecry: Dredge. If it's an Undead, deal 5 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: You can't spell dredge without D-E-D.

name: Sanctum Spellbender
text: [x]Whenever your opponent\ntargets another minion with\na spell, redirect it to this.
flavor: "I'll take that... and that... aaand that."

name: Scourge Illusionist
text: [x]Deathrattle: Add a 4/4 copy of another Deathrattle minion in your deck to your hand. It costs (4) less.
flavor: They're not tricks! They're ILLUSIONS!

name: Shockspitter
text: Battlecry: Deal @ damage.\n(Improved by your hero attacks this game!)
flavor: That blue raspberry candy was very sour.

name: Silvermoon Armorer
text: [x]Rush\nManathirst (@): Gain +2/+2.
flavor: All that glitters is silver.

name: Souleater's Scythe
text: [x]Start of Game: Consume 3 different minions in your deck. Leave behind Souls that Discover them.
flavor: Would you like those souls for here or to-go?

name: Street Sweeper
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
flavor: The sweeper hit of the set.

name: Sunfire Smithing
text: Equip a 4/2 Sword.\nGive a random minion\nin your hand +4/+2.
flavor: It's simple, just throw it into the sun.

name: Tear Reality
text:
[x]Add 2 random
Mage spells from the
past to your hand.
They cost (2) less.
flavor: One time it gave me a black flower, a smiling pot, and a foil first edition Dracthyr.

name: Thori'belore
text: [x]Rush. Deathrattle: Go\nDormant. Cast a Fire spell\nto revive Thori'belore!
flavor: Mascot of QFC (Quel'Thelas Fried Chicken).

name: Twisted Tether
text: Destroy a minion.\nGive its stats to a random Undead in your hand.
flavor: First, convince your opponent that you just want to play tetherball. Then, you GET 'EM!

name: Amorphous Slime
text: Battlecry: Discard a\nrandom Undead.\nDeathrattle: Summon a copy of it.
flavor: A crucial component of the Lordaeroneon Choice Awards.

name: Beetlemancy
text: [x]Choose One - Gain 12\nArmor; or Summon two\n3/3 Beetles with Taunt.
flavor: Beetlemancy. Beetlemancy. Beetlemancy.

name: Corpse Explosion
text: Detonate a Corpse to deal $1 damage to all minions. If any are still alive, repeat this.
flavor: What? It's not like they were using them anymore.

name: Deal with a Devil
text: Summon two 3/3 Felfiends with Lifesteal.\nIf your deck has no minions, summon two more.
flavor: Fine, three Felfiends - final offer.

name: Disruptive Spellbreaker
text: At the end of your turn, your\nopponent discards a spell.
flavor: WHO IS THE BLOOD ELVES' DENTIST?

name: Elder Nadox
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly Undead. Your minions gain its Attack.
flavor: For an Undead, is an elder the least or most dead?

name: Harkener of Dread
text: [x]Taunt, Reborn\nDeathrattle: Summon a 4/4\nUndead with Taunt.
flavor: I hope it's good news!

name: Infantry Reanimator
text: [x]Battlecry: Resurrect\na friendly Undead.\nGive it Reborn.
flavor: Get a life! Or two!

name: Infectious Ghoul
text: [x]Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon an Infectious Ghoul."
flavor: They call him that because of his laughter! Also his plague.

name: Rotgill
text: [x]Battlecry: Give your other\nminions "Deathrattle: Give\n__your minions +1/+1."
flavor: In the summer: Hotgill.\nMechanized: Botgill.\nEveryone else: Notgill.

name: Savage Ymirjar
text: Rush\nBattlecry: Discard 2 cards.
flavor: When is an Undead door not an Undead door? When it's a(Ymir)jar!

name: Shadow Word: Undeath
text: Deal $2 damage to all enemies. If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, deal $2 more.
flavor: We like to call it FUNdeath here!

name: Soul Barrage
text: When you play\nor discard this, deal $6 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Works especially well on jazz musicians.

name: Tenacious San'layn
text: Lifesteal\nWhenever this attacks,\ndeal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Once bitten, twice healed.

name: The Purator
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, draw a minion of each minion type.
flavor: With the rise of the undead, the Curator sees it as his duty to take care of them.

name: Translocation Instructor
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Swap it with a random one in their deck.
flavor: *Translocates behind you* psssh... nothin personnel, kid.

name: Vexallus
text: Your Arcane spells\ncast twice.
flavor: He only casts the spells once - it's Shmexallus that casts the copy.

name: Blood Crusader
text: [x]Battlecry: Your next Paladin\nminion this turn costs \nHealth instead of Mana.
flavor: Defending Silvermoon takes a lot of blood, sweat, tears, and blood.

name: Bonelord Frostwhisper
text: Deathrattle: For the rest of the game, your first card each turn costs (0). You die in 3 turns.
flavor: Downside? Not if you want to be a Death Knight!

name: Death Beetle
text: Taunt\nManathirst (@): Gain +4/+4 and Charge.
flavor: Well that'll be useless next expansion. WINK WINK.

name: Felscale Evoker
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, summon a different Demon from your deck.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: So it’s a demon and a naga, but NOT a dragon?

name: Fleshshaper
text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you have 5 or more Armor, summon a copy of this.
flavor: Even THIS is better than paper straws.

name: Hope of Quel'Thalas
text: [x]After your hero attacks,\ngive your minions +1/+1\n(wherever they are).
flavor: Hey, give me a minute. I just need to load my.... uh, hope.

name: Life from Death
text: [x]Draw 3 cards.\nInfuse (@): This costs (1).
flavor: Just because you came up with a nicer name for it doesn't mean that necromancy is any more justified.

name: Rivendare, Warrider
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle the other 3 Horsemen into your deck.
flavor: More like the 4 Horsemen of the "Can't Get Here On Time."

name: Shatterskin Gargoyle
text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: Don't worry, this one's just a statue.

name: Silverfury Stalwart
text: Rush\nElusive\nTaunt
flavor: Don't strike until you see the whites of their teeth.

name: Sister Svalna
text: Battlecry: Permanently add a Vision of Darkness to your hand.
flavor: Hello darkness my old friend.

name: Unending Swarm
text: Resurrect all friendly minions that cost (2)\nor less.
flavor: swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm -

name: Alexandros Mograine
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, deal 3 damage to your opponent at the end of your turns.
flavor: Mo' graine, mo' problems.

name: Anachronos
text: [x]Battlecry: Send all\nother minions 2 turns\ninto the future.
flavor: "That's it, you're all in time out!"

name: Blightblood Berserker
text: Taunt, Lifesteal, Reborn\nDeathrattle: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: He should really go see a dentist about that tusk. And a dermatologist. And a therapist.

name: Dar'Khan Drathir
text: [x]Lifesteal At the end of your turn, deal 6 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: You're telling me that you didn't suspect him of being evil, even though the first four letters of his name are D-A-R-K?

name: Faithful Companions
text: [x]Discover a Beast from your deck and summon it. Manathirst (@): Also summon a copy of it.
flavor: That's just how they cuddle!

name: Frost Queen Sindragosa
text: Colossal +2\nAfter an enemy minion is Frozen, destroy it.
flavor: With her final breath, Sindragosa cursed her consort and all who abandoned her to die in Icecrown. When she was reborn by the hands of the Lich King, her first freezing exhale wrought only pain.

name: Lor'themar Theron
text: Battlecry: Double the stats of all minions in your deck.
flavor: Out of all his life accomplishments, making a 2/2 Tinyfin is his finest.

name: Underking
text: [x]Rush\nBattlecry and Deathrattle:\nGain 6 Armor.
flavor: "Behold, the Underking! I'm always beneath you, but nothing is beneath me! I hereby declare war on peace and happiness! Soon, all will tremble before me!"

name: Vengeful Walloper
text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each Outcast card you've played this game.
flavor: If you can't beat 'em, beat WITH 'em!

name: Anub'Rekhan
text: Battlecry: Gain 5 Armor. Your next 3 minions\nthis turn cost Armor instead of Mana.
flavor: "Who's that?"\n"A noob, I reckon."

name: Arcane Defenders
text: Summon two\n5/6 Golems with\nTaunt and Elusive.
flavor: *Arcane batteries not included*

name: Boneguard Commander
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Raise up to\n6 Corpses as 1/3 Risen Footmen with Taunt.
flavor: Commander? In Hearthstone!? FINALLY!

name: Crypt Keeper
text: Taunt. Costs (1) less for each Armor you have.
flavor: How many crypts could a Crypt Keeper keep if a Crypt Keeper could keep crypts?

name: Invincible
text: [x]Reborn Battlecry and Deathrattle: Give another random friendly _____Undead +5/+5 and Taunt.____
flavor: No it's not, I can see it right there.

name: Soulstealer
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy all other\nminions. Gain 1 Corpse for\neach enemy destroyed.
flavor: "Wanna see what destruction looks like? Here it is in undead form - it's your boy Soulstealer!"

name: Brutal Annihilan
text: [x]Taunt, Rush After this minion survives damage, deal that amount to the enemy hero.
flavor: Sometimes, problems can be solved by throwing everything you've got at it. This is not one of those times.

name: Flesh Behemoth
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Draw another Undead and summon a copy of it.
flavor: Perfect for fleshing out your Undead deck.

name: From De Other Side
text: Summon a copy of each minion in your hand.\nThey attack random enemy minions, then die.
flavor: Why did Drakuru cross the road?

name: Grand Magister Rommath
text: [x]Battlecry: Recast each spell\nyou've cast this game that\ndidn't start in your deck.
flavor: A powerful mage known for his proficiencies in Fire, Frost, and Algebra.

name: Overlord Drakuru
text: [x]Rush, Windfury After this attacks and kills a minion, resurrect it on your side.
flavor: Overlord: (1)

name: The Sunwell
text: Fill your hand with random spells. Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
flavor: The Lich King had extinguished the light of the Sunwell once before - it will take all the might Silvermoon can muster to defend it!

name: Thaddius, Monstrosity
text: [x]Taunt. Your odd-Cost cards cost (2) less. (Swaps polarity each turn!)@[x]Taunt. Your even-Cost cards cost (2) less. (Swaps polarity each turn!)
flavor: Feugen is positive that Thaddius will see play, but Stalagg seems negative about it.

name: Horn of Winter
text: Refresh 2 Mana Crystals.
flavor: Much better than the Horn of Loseter.

name: Bone Breaker
text: [x]After your hero attacks a\nminion, deal 2 damage\nto the enemy hero.
flavor: Many weapons are bone breakers if you swing hard enough.

name: Icy Touch
text: Deal $2 damage to an enemy and Freeze it.
flavor: Vibe check.

name: Ymirjar Frostbreaker
text: Battlecry: Gain +1_Attack for each Frost spell\nin your hand.
flavor: Also gains +1 Attack for each time your opponent mispronounces his name.

name: Blood Tap
text: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.\nSpend 2 Corpses to give them +1/+1 more.
flavor: Come join us in the tavern! We have whatever you're drinking on tap. Yes, even that.

name: Dark Transformation
text: Transform an Undead into a 4/5 Undead Monstrosity with Rush.
flavor: The Northrend Arm Wrestling Championship just found its new champion.

name: Deathchiller
text: [x]After you cast a spell,\ndeal 1 damage to two\nrandom enemies.
flavor: Man, death is like the most chill state... you've got nothing to do but relax.

name: Hematurge
text: Battlecry: Spend a\nCorpse to Discover a\nBlood Rune card.
flavor: She's here to PUMP! YOU UP!

name: Plague Strike
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. If that kills it, summon a 2/2 Zombie with Rush.
flavor: Not wanting to infect anyone with his cold, the Death Knight politely coughed into his shoulder.

name: Unholy Frenzy
text: [x]Choose an enemy minion.\nYour minions attack it.\nResummon any that die.
flavor: GROUP HUG!

name: Vicious Bloodworm
text: [x]Battlecry: Give a minion in\nyour hand Attack equal to\nthis minion's Attack.
flavor: Not to be confused with the Viscous Bloodworm.

name: Asphyxiate
text: Destroy the highest Attack enemy minion.
flavor: I find your abundance of Attack disturbing.

name: Darkfallen Neophyte
text: [x]Battlecry: Spend 2 Corpses\nto give all minions in your\nhand +2 Attack.
flavor: It's actually a hairball.

name: Glacial Advance
text: Deal $4 damage.\nYour next spell this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: You just wait, I'll get there in 10 years and then you'll be sorry.

name: Howling Blast
text: [x]Deal $3 damage to an enemy and Freeze it. Deal $1 damage to all other enemies.
flavor: For Death Knights, yelling really loudly is a valid attack strategy.

name: Lady Deathwhisper
text: Deathrattle: Copy all\nFrost spells in your hand.
flavor: "Psst... Omelette death fromage."

name: Malignant Horror
text: [x]Reborn At the end of your turn, spend 4 Corpses to summon a copy of this minion.
flavor: Pop goes the pustule.

name: Might of Menethil
text: Battlecry: Spend up to 3 Corpses. Freeze that many enemy minions.
flavor: Menethil's Might, at night, fights the light, not quite the blight, right?

name: Nerubian Swarmguard
text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Summon two\ncopies of this minion.
flavor: How long can this go on? Apparently even in death.

name: Tomb Guardians
text: Summon two 2/2 Zombies with Taunt. Spend 4 Corpses to\ngive them Reborn.
flavor: An absolute thriller.

name: Blood Boil
text: Lifesteal\nInfect all enemy minions. At the end of your turns, they take 2 damage.
flavor: And once your blood is at a boil, throw in the plaguetti.

name: Corpse Bride
text: [x]Battlecry: Spend up to 10 _Corpses to summon a Risen_ Groom with Taunt and that _much Attack and Health.
flavor: Until undeath do us part.

name: Frostmourne
text: Deathrattle: Summon every minion killed by this weapon.
flavor: Death Nights, Frost Morn, what's next - Blood Noon?

name: Marrow Manipulator
text: [x]Battlecry: Spend up to 5\nCorpses. Deal 2 damage to\na random enemy for each.
flavor: Also buffs your Calcium by 1000mg.

name: Frostwyrm's Fury
text: Deal $5 damage. Freeze all enemy minions.\nSummon a 5/5 Frostwyrm.
flavor: Terrible destruction, but minty fresh breath!

name: The Scourge
text: Fill your board with random Undead.
flavor: “You speak of justice? Of cowardice? I will show you the justice of the grave and the true meaning of fear.”

name: Melomania
text: Each time you play a minion this turn,\nadd a random Shaman spell to your hand.
flavor: I once saw a horse that had watermelons for hair. It was a melon mane, ya?!

name: Through Fel and Flames
text: Give a minion Rush. Finale: And +1/+1.
flavor: It's a Fel spell, but also a FIRE spell.

name: Air Guitarist
text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Durability.
flavor: Nailing that solo was a breeze.

name: Annoying Fan
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. It can't attack while this is alive.
flavor: No, Annoy-o-Tron, an air horn is not an instrument.

name: Breakdance
text: Return a friendly minion to your hand. Summon a Dancer with\nits stats and Rush.
flavor: "Commander! Uhh... I'm... Pretty sure we just got served? I'm not really trained for this."

name: Bunch of Bananas
text: Give a minion +1/+1.\n(3 Bananas left!)
flavor: This card has bananas (spelled: B-A-N-A-N-A-S).

name: Costumed Singer
text: At the end of your turn,\ndraw a Secret.
flavor: Who knows which forgotten, washed-up, former C-list celebrity might be in there!

name: Crowd Surfer
text: [x]Deathrattle: Give ANY\nother minion +1/+1 and\nthis Deathrattle.
flavor: I'm pretty sure it's the band that's supposed to be crowd surfing, but you do you little dude.

name: Deafen
text: Silence a minion. Combo: Also deal $2 damage to it.
flavor: Hey, Volsat, we can't hear you. You're on mute.

name: Death Growl
text: Choose a minion.\nSpread its Deathrattle\nto adjacent minions.
flavor: GRRRRR I'M SO ANGRY BECAUSE I'M DEAD!

name: Fan Club
text: Restore #3 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: "Well that was weird. Yeah, I just walked up to the president of the fan club, he blabbered on for like 10 minutes, and then gave me a bike voucher..."

name: Felstring Harp
text:
[x]Whenever your hero would
take damage on your turn,
restore 2 Health instead.
Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: Playing it will singe your fingers and wither your soul, but at least it never needs restringing!

name: Flowrider
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're\nOverloaded, Discover a\nspell from your deck.
flavor: Her music sounds a lot better underwater where you can't hear it at all.

name: Free Spirit
text: [x]Battlecry and Deathrattle:\nYour Hero Power gains 1\nmore Armor this game.
flavor: His soul was supposed to go to Ardenweald, but you can't chain a free spirit down.

name: Frequency Oscillator
text: Battlecry: The next Mech you play costs (1) less.
flavor: Our lawyer made us change the flavor text of this card so we wouldn't get sued.

name: Funnel Cake
text: [x]Restore #3 Health to a minion and its neighbors. For each one Overhealed, refresh a Mana Crystal.
flavor: After all this time…. I thought it'd be bigger!

name: Idol's Adoration
text: Your Hero Power costs (0). After you use it, lose 1 Durability.
flavor: That is a mic, not a door.

name: Mixtape
text: Discover a copy of a card your opponent played this game.
flavor: That tape has got poetry and clarinet on it, Garona. POETRY. AND CLARINET.

name: Peaceful Piper
text: Choose One - Draw a Beast; or Discover one.
flavor: "Is there anything worth more than peace and love on the planet Azeroth?"

name: Razorfen Rockstar
text: After you gain Armor,\ngain 2 more.
flavor: Quilboar feel Rock in their blood. And blood in their rocks.

name: Saxophone Soloist
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control no other minions, add a Saxophone Soloist to your hand.
flavor: He used to play to crowds of adoring Murlocs, but 20 years later all that's left is gigs at secluded clubs and regrets. Where did all the time go? His dreams of fame and fortune, snuffed out like the flame of a small candle in a dimly lit bar. Nothing but

name: Synthesize
text: Add a random 1, 2,\nand 3-Cost Elemental to_your hand.
flavor: After the invention of elemental audio processing, Azeroth went through a major synth phase.

name: Taste of Chaos
text: Deal $2 damage\nto a minion. Finale: Discover a Fel spell.
flavor: It's spicy!

name: Thornmantle Musician
text: Finale: The next Beast you summon gets +1/+1.
flavor: She calls the hyena her "little chef". Not sure what that's about.

name: Verse Riff
text: [x]Give your hero +2 Attack\nthis turn. Gain 2 Armor.\nFinale: Play your last Riff.
