flavor: Well anyways, here's Worgen Wall.

name: Void Virtuoso
text: During your turn,\nyour hero is Immune.
flavor: That is one interesting dress code.

name: Arrow Smith
text: [x]After you cast a spell,\ndeal 1 damage to the\nlowest Health enemy.
flavor: "What do you mean it's a violin bow!?!"

name: Audio Amplifier
text: Battlecry: Set your maximum Mana and\nhand size to 11.
flavor: And you thought we were putting Wildheart Guff in Core. We'd never do that! WINK WINK.

name: Audio Medic
text: Rush\nFinale: Gain Lifesteal.
flavor: His performance isn't over, watch!

name: Audio Splitter
text: Deathrattle: Copy the\nhighest Cost spell in\nyour hand.
flavor: "I tried to give him some constructive criticism but gosh, he really hates feedback!"

name: Baritone Imp
text: [x]Battlecry: Take Fatigue damage. Gain that much Attack and Health.@[x]Battlecry: Take {0} Fatigue damage. Gain that much Attack and Health.
flavor: He used to be an epic sax guy, but now he's just a common.

name: Barrel of Monkeys
text: Summon a 1/4 Monkey with Taunt.\n(3 Monkeys left!)
flavor: There used to be four monkeys, but then one fell off and bumped his head.

name: Cold Feet
text: Enemy minions cost\n(5) more next turn.
flavor: Looks like some of the dancers still need to warm up.

name: Cosmic Keyboard
text:
[x]After you cast a spell,
summon an Elemental with
stats equal to its Cost.
Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: Mine is signed by Algalon himself.

name: Crescendo
text:
[x]Take Fatigue damage.
Deal that much damage
to all enemies.@[x]Take {0} Fatigue damage.
Deal that much damage
to all enemies.
flavor: The more you flail your arms, the better the orchestra plays! Yup, that's definitely how it works.

name: Dance Floor
text: [x]Give your minions Rush.
flavor: I don't think Rush would ever be here.

name: Dead Air
text: Destroy your Undead. Resummon them.
flavor: We'll be right back after a word from our specters.

name: Disc Jockey
text: Combo: Add a random\nCombo card to your hand.
flavor: Hype coefficient insufficient.

name: Dreamboat
text: Battlecry: Restore #3 Health to all other friendly minions. Gain +1/+1 for each one Overhealed.
flavor: As the only member that can sing underwater, Paz saved Poison Bloom's Zin-Azshari tour from failure.

name: Eye of Shadow
text: Your hero has Lifesteal.
flavor: It's hard to makeup flavor text sometimes.

name: Fanboy
text: [x]Choose One - Give a friendly\nminion +2 Attack and Rush;\nor +2 Health and Lifesteal.
flavor: His name? Stan.

name: Groovy Cat
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Your Hero Power gives your hero 1 more Attack this game.
flavor: "Like, what if we're all just cards living in this box called Hearthstone, man?"

name: Harmonic Hip Hop
text: Deal $1 damage. Give your weapon +3 Attack.\n(Swaps each turn.)
flavor: I can name four things that rhyme with 'orange': Four inch, Door hinge, Syringe, and uh… Shmorange.

name: Harmonic Mood
text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. Gain 4 Armor.\n(Swaps each turn.)
flavor: ROYGBive your hero +2 Attack this turn.

name: Hidden Meaning
text: Secret: When your opponent ends their turn with no Mana, summon a random 3-Cost minion.
flavor: I'm telling you, if you play the song backwards at triple speed I SWEAR Mukla sings about the Burning Legion.

name: Hipster
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell\nfrom your opponent's class\nthat isn't in their deck.
flavor: Oh, so you like Hearthstone? Name every spell.

name: Infinitize the Maxitude
text: Discover a spell. Reduce its Cost by (1). Finale: Return this to your hand at end of turn.
flavor: When your music is instrumental, it doesn't matter if the words make no sense.

name: Instrument Tech
text: Battlecry: Draw a weapon.
flavor: A tech card without Tradeable? CRINGE.

name: Jam Session
text: [x]Give a friendly minion +3/+3. Deal $1 damage to all other minions. Overload: (1)
flavor: Their skills will make you jelly.

name: Jukebox Totem
text: [x]At the end of your turn,\nsummon a 1/1 Silver\nHand Recruit.
flavor: If you really love Hearthstone, put another coin in the Totem baby!

name: Mosh Pit
text: [x]Spend 3 Corpses to give\na friendly minion Reborn.
flavor: Let the Corpses hit the floor!

name: One Hit Wonder
text: Rush\nCombo: Gain Poisonous.
flavor: They're trying to get a second hit in with their next single, "Divine Shield".

name: Party Animal
text: [x]Battlecry: Give +1/+1 to\neach minion of a different\ntype in your hand.
flavor: He's the wildlife of the party!

name: Popular Pixie
text: [x]Choose One - Refresh\nyour Hero Power; or\nYour next one costs (0).
flavor: Popular Pixie personally prefers particularly powerful pop performances.

name: Power Chord: Synchronize
text: [x]Choose a minion. Add\na copy of it to your hand.\nFinale: Give both +1/+2.
flavor: "It's all about you, girl\nOn your 16,000th birthday"

name: Remixed Tuning Fork
text: Gains an extra effect in\nyour hand that changes\neach turn.
flavor: You can tune a fork, but you can't tune a fish.

name: Rewind
text: Discover a copy of another spell you've cast this game.
flavor: If you don't find the spell you want, just cast this one more time and see if you get lucky.

name: Roaring Applause
text:
Draw a card.
Repeat for each
minion of a different
type you control.
flavor: Please clap.

name: Rolling Stone
text: [x]Rush Battlecry: If the last card you played costs (1), gain +1/+1.
flavor: Sadly, the mariachi band it used to play in gathers no más.

name: SECURITY!!
text: Summon two 1/1 Illidari with Rush.\nOutcast: Summon\none more.
flavor: Check all of the boxes that contain VENGEANCE to play this card.

name: Snakebite
text: Rush\nBattlecry: Gain +1/+1\nfor each minion that died this turn.@ (@)
flavor: Don't look her in the eyes or you'll turn to ROCK!

name: Spotlight
text: Tradeable\nConvert a friendly Divine_Shield into a\n5/5 Elemental.
flavor: Everyone's eyes are on you! Well, they're also looking at the giant Elemental that we're using as a spotlight, but mainly at you!

name: Stereo Totem
text: At the end of your turn, give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: Pass the ox cord!

name: Arcanite Ripper
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a @/@ Lifesteal Undead. (Change your Health on your turn while equipped to improve!)
flavor: A guitar with a skull - perfect for headbanging.

name: Beatboxer
text: [x]Combo: Deal 4 damage\nrandomly split among\n all enemies.
flavor: "ERROR. CANNOT COMPUTE 'NO PUNCHING ALLOWED DURING MUSICAL PERFORMANCE'."

name: Bounce Around (ft. Garona)
text: Return all friendly minions to your hand. They cost (1) this turn.
flavor: Another one.

name: Chill Vibes
text: Restore #8 Health.\nFinale: Summon a 3/3\nElemental with Taunt.
flavor: "You're listening to 47.7 Shaman FM radio. It's time to kick back, relax, and take in the music."

name: Chorus Riff
text: Draw a minion. Give it +3/+3.\nFinale: Play your last Riff.
flavor: What do you mean, what do you mean, I SAY WHAT DO YOU MEEEEEAN, mean, mean, meaaaaaaan this chorus is repetitive?

name: Cowbell Soloist
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control\nno other minions, deal\n2 damage.
flavor: Hot take: We need LESS cowbell. Much, much less.

name: Death Metal Knight
text: [x]Taunt Costs Health instead of Mana if your hero was healed this turn.
flavor: He prefers listening to bands dead rather than live.

name: Demonic Dynamics
text: [x]Discover 2 Demons.\nFinale: Give them +1/+2.
flavor: The Blue Imp Group sure knows how to put on a show!

name: Disco Maul
text: [x]Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +@/+@. (Play minions while equipped to improve!)
flavor: Nah, dis go face.

name: Festival Security
text: [x]Taunt\nFinale: Force all enemy\nminions to attack this.
flavor: "Incident in the mosh pit? Copy that, be there in a year."

name: Fiddlefire Imp
text: Battlecry: Add a random Fire Mage and Fire Warlock spell to your hand.
flavor: Most find the stages set aflame by the Grimtotem too dangerous to perform on, but to him they're perfect!

name: Funkfin
text: Divine Shield\nYour minions with\nDivine Shield have +2_Attack.
flavor: Shake your groove fin!

name: Hardcore Cultist
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.\nFinale: To all enemies.
flavor: Thumb in = devil horns. Thumb out = I love you. A VERY important distinction when you're at a metal concert.

name: Harmonic Metal
text: [x]Give 4 random minions\nin your hand +2/+2.\n(Swaps each turn.)
flavor: I have bashed together plenty of pieces of metal in my day and not ONCE has it sounded harmonic.

name: Harmonica Soloist
text: Battlecry: If you control no other minions, Discover and cast a Secret.
flavor: A magician never reveals their Secrets. A musician on the other hand...

name: Heartthrob
text: Overheal: Summon a random minion with Cost equal to the amount Overhealed.
flavor: Oh no, Harth! Look out! He's here to rob you!

name: Holotechnician
text: After ANY minion takes exactly 1 damage,\ndestroy it.
flavor: Ironically, operating the spotlight comes with very little recognition.

name: Jazz Bass
text: [x]Deathrattle: Your next spell costs (@) less. (Overload while equipped to improve!)
flavor: No birds, plural, were harmed in the making of this bass.

name: Lightshow
text:
[x]Shoot @ beams at enemies
that each deal $2 damage.
Your future Lightshows
shoot one more beam.
flavor: Always remember P.L.U.R.: Peace, Laser-beams, Unity, Respect.

name: Love Everlasting
text: Your first spell each turn costs (2) less. Lasts until you don't play a spell on your turn.
flavor: Poison Bloom was accused of plagiarizing the "Ooh, how long can this go on (ooh yeah)" hook from an old-school musical group called The Saronite Chain Gang.

name: Metrognome
text: [x]After you play a {0}-Cost\ncard, draw a {1}-Cost card.\n(Then increase!)
flavor: He's very popular on Click-Clock.

name: Mic Drop
text: Draw 2 cards.\nFinale: Give your weapon +2 Attack.
flavor: The perfect card to play after emoting.

name: Outfit Tailor
text: [x]Battlecry: Give a friendly\nminion Attack and Health\nequal to this minion's.
flavor: She has this terrible habit of eating melted cheese while on the job.

name: Paparazzi
text: Battlecry: Discover a Legendary minion.
flavor: When you're a Legendary minion, you get a shiny orange gem, a dragon emblem, and about 100 of these people following you everywhere.

name: Photographer Fizzle
text: [x]Battlecry: Take a Snapshot\nof your current hand and\nshuffle it into your deck.
flavor: Look at this photograph.

name: Plagiarizarrr
text: Battlecry: Get a copy\nof the top card of your opponent's deck.
flavor: He's also working on his own Hearthstone expansion: Festival of Epics.

name: Power Slider
text: [x]Rush. Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each minion of a different type you've played this game.@ (@)
flavor: There's a huge difference between a battle-axe and an axe-guitar. One is for combat, and the other is for combat AND rocking out.

name: Record Scratcher
text: [x]Deathrattle: Refresh @ Mana |4(Crystal, Crystals). (Play Combo cards while ____equipped to improve!)__
flavor: A Rogue's favorite audio sample is an orchestral stab.

name: Remixed Dispense-o-bot
text: Gains an extra effect in your hand that changes each turn.
flavor: "Mine gave me free money!"\n"Mine gave me free ice cream!"\n"… mine gave me two sheep that explode. They were free but I still want a refund."

name: Remixed Musician
text: [x]Rush Gains an extra effect in your hand that changes each turn.
flavor: Like every bard I know, he's a chaotic Neutral jack of all trades.

name: Remixed Totemcarver
text: Gains an extra effect in your hand that changes each turn.
flavor: Music always sounds better on old, wooden speakers.

name: Reverberations
text: Summon a copy of a minion. Each one dies after taking damage.
flavor: This sounds much louder in the void.

name: Rhyme Spinner
text: [x]Rush Combo: Gain +1/+1 for each other Combo card you've played this game.@ (@)
flavor: For ONCE we're not talking about ice!

name: Rock Master Voone
text: Battlecry: Copy each minion of a different type in your hand.
flavor: After several audience members were burnt to a crisp, Voone's band became a lot less all-in on Dragons.

name: Rowdy Fan
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. It has +3 Attack while this is alive.
flavor: "This song is so good, it makes me want to PUNCH SOMEONE IN THE FACE!!"

name: Rush the Stage
text: [x]Draw two Rush minions.\nThey cost (1) less.
flavor: Left Shark, get to the stage now!

name: Shadow Chord: Distort
text: Give a minion -5/-5.\nIf it has 0 Attack, destroy it.
flavor: For some unknown reason, using distortion intentionally in your music will attract hundreds of geckos to your location.

name: Starlight Groove
text: Give your hero Divine Shield. For the rest of the game, playing a Holy spell refreshes it.
flavor: In space, no one can hear you groove.

name: Static Waveform
text: At the start of EACH turn, lose 1 Attack or Health (chosen randomly).
flavor: LET ME SEE YOU MAKE SOME NOISE!!!

name: Tough Crowd
text: Outcast: Return a minion to its owner's hand.
flavor: "Your music's bad and you should feel bad."

name: Worgen Roadie
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 0/3 Instrument Case for your opponent. (Break it for a random weapon!)
flavor: "I asked for an instrument, and you give me a CURSED BLADE!?"

name: Ambient Lightspawn
text: [x]Finale and Overheal:\nGive another random\nfriendly minion +2/+2.
flavor: Make sure it's smaller than your other lightspawns for the best fill lighting.

name: Backstage Bouncer
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a copy of this.
flavor: Doesn't see your name on the list. Also doesn't know how to read the names on the list.

name: Boogie Down
text: [x]Summon two 1-Cost\nminions from your deck.\nFinale: Summon another.
flavor: Whatever you do, do NOT sashay to the right.

name: Brass Elemental
text: Rush, Divine Shield,\nTaunt, Windfury
flavor: You handle the water spells. It's got the earth, wind, and fire covered.

name: Candleraiser
text: [x]Divine Shield\nFinale: Give adjacent\nminions Divine Shield.
flavor: You would not believe your eyes\nIf ten million kobold guys\nLit up the world to this ogre beat

name: Cool Ghoul
text: Divine Shield\nReborn
flavor: He has disco fever! :D\nBecause of the disco plague. :(

name: Cover Artist
text: Battlecry: Transform into\na 3/3 copy of a minion.
flavor: The Faceless Ones are servants of Yogg-Saron, and they feed on fear. Right now they are feeding on our fear of you realizing we copied this flavor text.

name: Crazed Conductor
text: [x]Battlecry: Take Fatigue damage. Summon that many 3/3 Imps.@[x]Battlecry: Take {0} Fatigue damage. Summon that many 3/3 Imps.
flavor: "The Twisting Nether is singing to me… WHAT IS THAT MELODY!?"

name: E.T.C., Band Manager
text: [x]While building your deck,\nassemble a band of 3 cards.\n_Battlecry: Discover one!
flavor: "This next band features the one and only M.C. Tech on the drums, the fungal king of the keyboard Loatheb, and the showstopping vocal chops of Spellbreaker!"

name: Fight Over Me
text: Choose two enemy minions. They fight!\nAdd copies of any that\ndie to your hand.
flavor: And you thought the battles between the Alliance and Horde got ugly…

name: Freebird
text: [x]Charge Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other Freebird you've played this game.@ (@)
flavor: Free!? But it costs Mana!

name: Glaivetar
text: [x]_Deathrattle: Draw @ |4(card, cards)._\n(Play Outcast cards while\n_equipped to improve!)
flavor: Might need tuning, I think it's a bit sharp.

name: Going Down Swinging
text: [x]Give your hero +2 Attack\nand Immune this turn, then\n attack each enemy minion.
flavor: Halveria was outcast from Gilneas for being too edgy, which she sees as an achievement.

name: Grimtotem Buzzkill
text: Battlecry: Discard a weapon to draw 3 cards.
flavor: I'd be mad too if you called me a 'buzzkill'.

name: Halveria Darkraven
text: Rush\nAfter a friendly Rush\nminion attacks, give your minions +1_Attack.
flavor: You know someone's cool when their name sounds like a font.

name: Heartbreaker Hedanis
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to this minion. Overheal: Deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: Hedanis has won over the hearts and minds of millions of fans all over Azeroth! Shadow magic had nothing to do with it - not that you asked or anything.

name: Instrument Smasher
text: [x]Whenever your weapon is\ndestroyed, equip a random\nDemon Hunter weapon.
flavor: Guitar? Nah, she plays percussion.

name: Jitterbug
text: Divine Shield\nAfter a friendly character loses_Divine Shield, draw a card.
flavor: The only bug that was intentional.

name: Jungle Jammer
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a random @-Cost Beast. (Cast spells while ____equipped to improve!)__
flavor: When asked what animal they would be, people always say things like "I'd be wolf-lion hybrid mix. King of the jungle, but still sociable and ferocious." No, you'd be a rat.

name: Keyboard Soloist
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control no other minions, summon two 1/2 Amps with Spell Damage +1.
flavor: Give her a hand, everybody! Or maybe 4!

name: Kodohide Drumkit
text: [x]Deathrattle: Deal @ damage to all minions. (Gain Armor while ____equipped to improve!)__
flavor: Stolen from a druidic drum circle, now destined to make music that is actually good.

name: Merch Seller
text: [x]At the end of your turn, put\na random spell on the top\n_of your opponent's deck.
flavor: "Sorry, we're all out of Mediums. All we've got left are Gnome, Extra Large, and Annihilan."

name: Obsessive Fan
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. It has Stealth while this is alive.
flavor: "Obsessed? No! I'm just really really really really really really really really really really into E.T.C.'s music and everything he says, does, thinks, lives, and breathes!"

name: Pozzik, Audio Engineer
text: Battlecry: Add two 3/3 Bots to your opponent's hand. Deathrattle: Summon them for yourself.
flavor: "I'm down here, fixin' all the Gnomish tech that breaks down mid-set while that buffoon Fizzle is up there taking pictures of the sky. YOU tell ME who's the better engineer!"

name: Pyrotechnician
text: [x]After you cast a spell,\nadd a random Fire spell\nto your hand.
flavor: The difference between a pyrotechnician and a pyromaniac is a paycheck.

name: Rhythm and Roots
text: [x]Choose One (Secretly) - Summon three 5/5 Ancients in 2 turns; or 8/8 Giants in 4 turns.
flavor: For Zok's latest song, he decided to go back to his roots. Like the ones on a tree. Tree roots.

name: Rhythmdancer Risa
text: [x]Rush After your hero attacks, return this to your hand and set its Cost to (1).
flavor: Shadowstep to the left!\nDouble jump to the right!\nClass cross!

name: Speaker Stomper
text: [x]Tradeable\nBattlecry: Enemy spells\ncost (2) more next turn.
flavor: Just like in Hoofloose.

name: Spread the Word
text: Draw 2 cards.\nCosts (1) less for each Attack your hero has.

name: Timber Tambourine
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon @ 5/5 |4(Ancient, Ancients). (Play cards that cost (5) or more while __equipped to improve!)
flavor: Timberine anyone? TIMBERINE!?

name: Volume Up
text: Draw 3 spells.\nFinale: Discover\na copy of one.
flavor: You have to pay Mana to do that!? I thought it was just in the settings menu!

name: Yelling Yodeler
text: [x]Battlecry: Trigger a friendly\nminion's Deathrattle twice.
flavor: Maybe it's OK for the Grimtotem to destroy some music forever.

name: Altered Chord
text: Lifesteal Deal $6 damage to a minion. Costs (3) less if you're Overloaded.
flavor: I'll never understand how bands and orchestras allow musicians that just…. play... off-key. Would love opinions on this.

name: Big Dreams
text: Summon the\nhighest Cost Beast\nfrom your hand. It goes Dormant for 2 turns.
flavor: Just a small town Taunka\nLivin' in a lonely... waunka

name: Blackrock 'n' Roll
text: Give all minions in your deck Attack and Health equal to their Cost.
flavor: Thank goodness it's not called Black-ska Mountain.

name: Blood Treant
text: Costs Health instead\nof Mana.
flavor: The blood of my enemies makes for some great fertilizer!

name: Boneshredder
text: [x]Battlecry: Spend 5 Corpses to trigger and gain the Deathrattle of a random friendly minion that died this game.
flavor: Is that his makeup or just his natural fur pattern?

name: Bridge Riff
text: [x]Summon a 3/4 Rocker with\nTaunt and a 4/3 with Rush.\nFinale: Play your last Riff.
flavor: Can be played in other places too.

name: Drum Soloist
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you control no other minions, gain +2/+2 and Rush.
flavor: "Was I rushin' or was I dragon?"

name: Elite Tauren Champion
text: [x]Finale: Start a ROCK DUEL! ___Players must spend all their___ Mana each turn or else they take 8 (or more) damage!
flavor: Strumming his guitar with a molten ember from the first fire of Azeroth, E.T.C.'s ear-splitting, heart-wrenching, head-banging solo held back Magatha and her forces of evil, single-handedly saving music for centuries to come.

name: Ghost Writer
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. Finale: Discover another.
flavor: This eccentric scribe was cursed to an afterlife of never being recognized for his talents! Muahaha!

name: Guitar Soloist
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control no\nother minions, draw a spell,\na minion, and a weapon.
flavor: She is the hero of the guitar. The guitar hero. Trademark.

name: Harmonic Disco
text: Discover a 5-Cost minion. Summon it\nwith +1/+1.\n(Swaps each turn.)
flavor: "Worry not, festival patrons! A disco is hardly any means for panic!"

name: Inzah
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Overload cards cost (1) less.
flavor: Inzah plays the trumpet, saxophone, piano, guitar, AND bass. No wonder he's always so overloaded!

name: JIVE, INSECT!
text: Transform a minion into\nRagnaros the Firelord.\nOverload: (2)
flavor: "WHY IS NO ONE JIVING? I SPECIFICALLY REQUESTED IT!"

name: Kangor, Dancing King
text: [x]Lifesteal Deathrattle: Swap this with a minion from your hand and give it Lifesteal.
flavor: After Dr. Boom's involvement with the League of EVIL, Kangor cut ties with the Boomsday Labs and began pursuing his true passion - DISCO!!!

name: Magatha, Bane of Music
text: Battlecry: Draw 5 cards. Give any spells drawn\nto your opponent.
flavor: Not to be confused with that one other "-agatha" that likes when you play minions.

name: MC Blingtron
text: [x]Battlecry: Both players equip 1/2 Microphones. Your opponent's increases all damage they take by 1!
flavor: If this is the outcome of the robot uprising, then sign me up!

name: Opera Soloist
text: Battlecry: If you control\nno other minions, deal\n3 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: It ain't over until the imp mother sings.

name: Remixed Rhapsody
text: Deal $3 damage\nto all minions. Gains an extra effect in your hand that changes each turn.
flavor: "Is this real life?"\n"No, this is a card game."

name: Rin, Orchestrator of Doom
text: [x]Taunt. Deathrattle: Both players draw 2 cards, discard 2 cards, and destroy the top 2 cards of their deck.
flavor: Rin's orchestra is the best of the best. When your replacement is just one summoning away, you have to play perfectly.

name: Screaming Banshee
text: [x]Lifesteal _After your hero gains Health,_ summon a Soul with that _much Attack and Health.
flavor: Her singing will be sure to wake you up (wake you up inside).

name: Star Power
text:
[x]Deal $5 damage to a
random enemy minion.
Repeat this with 1
less damage.
flavor: Five of the spectators were star-struck.

name: Summer Flowerchild
text: [x]__Battlecry: Draw two cards__\nthat cost (6) or more.\nFinale: They cost (1) less.
flavor: "Ugh, those Winter Floweradults just don't get our music."

name: Symphony of Sins
text: [x]Discover and play a\nMovement. Shuffle the\nother 6 into your deck.
flavor: Makes for some killer final boss music.

name: Dirge of Despair
text:
[x]Deal $3 damage to a
character. If that kills it,
summon a Demon from
your deck.
flavor: Oh, the misery!

name: Doomkin
text: Battlecry: Take one of\nyour opponent's empty Mana_Crystals.
flavor: Now THIS is Mana cheating.

name: Harmonic Pop
text: Deal $3 damage to all minions. Summon\na 6/6 Popstar.\n(Swaps each turn.)
flavor: Here with supporting vocals: Snap and Crackle!

name: Hollow Hound
text: [x]Lifesteal, Rush\nAlso damages minions next\nto whomever this attacks.
flavor: Uh oh, the hollow hound is coming out of its cage! Don't worry though, it's doing just fine.

name: Horn of the Windlord
text: [x]Windfury Whenever your hero attacks a minion, set its stats to 3/3.
flavor: Woodwinds! Obey my command!

name: Lead Dancer
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your deck with less Attack than this minion.
flavor: "Follow my lead!"\n\n*dies*

name: Mister Mukla
text: [x]Rush. Battlecry: Fill\nyour opponent's hand\nwith Bananas.
flavor: Music is Mukla's escape from his anger. When he's on-stage, it's like he's a whole different gorilla… Until you boo him.

name: Unpopular Has-Been
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 5-Cost minion from the past.
flavor: Oh man, she used to rock more than ANYONE back in the Year of the Kraken. I wish I could've seen her perform back then…

name: Abyssal Bassist
text: [x]Taunt, Lifesteal Costs (2) less for each weapon you've equipped this game.
flavor: DROP THE BASS (INTO THE ABYSS)!

name: Drum Circle
text: Choose One - Summon five 2/2 Treants;\nor Give your minions +2/+4 and Taunt.
flavor: It's more of a drum pentagon, really.

name: Pack the House
text: Summon a random 6, 5, 4, and 3-Cost minion.\nOverload: (2)
flavor: How many Pack the Houses would a pack house if a pack could house Pack the House?

name: The One-Amalgam Band
text: [x]Battlecry: Gain a random bonus effect for each minion of a different type you've played this game.@ (@)
flavor: Why be good with ONE instrument when you can be terrible with ALL of them!!!

name: Tony, King of Piracy
text: Battlecry: Replace your deck with a copy of your opponent's.\nFinale: Draw a card.
flavor: Tony prefers sailing on torrents rather than streams.

name: Zok Fogsnout
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two {0}/{1} Quilboar with Taunt. _(Improved by your hero Attack_ __& Armor gained this turn!)
flavor: Despite having only 3 digits on each hand, Zok plays Bass like he has 5.

name: Cage Head
text: Deathrattle: Summon\na 9/9 Blight Boar with Charge and Taunt.
flavor: You get your head stuck in a cage ONCE, and all of a sudden you've got a new nickname.

name: Concert Promo-Drake
text: Tradeable\nFinale: Destroy an\nenemy minion.
flavor: There's a reason why it's promoting the festival instead of playing in it - it's a rhyme-lost protodrake.

name: Mish-Mash Mosher
text: [x]Rush After this attacks, gain +1 Attack and attack a _random enemy minion.
flavor: In the pit, he feels more alive than ever.

name: Stranglethorn Heart
text: Tradeable Resurrect all friendly Beasts that cost (5) or more.
flavor: The Stranglethorn mentality is to be happy with the bare necessities.

name: Annoy-o-Troupe
text: [x]Taunt, Divine Shield Deathrattle: Summon three 1/2 Mechs with Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: Some classes get Void Lords, other classes get Annoyed Lords.

name: Amplified Elekk
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Deal 3 damage\nto all enemy minions.
flavor: Before this show can continue, we have to bass-boost the elephant in the room.

name: Banjosaur
text: [x]Rush\nWhenever this attacks, draw\na Beast and gain its stats.
flavor: You'll all be singing along once he gets to the tyranno-chorus.

name: Climactic Necrotic Explosion
text: [x]Lifesteal. Deal ${0} damage. Summon {1} {2}/{3} Souls. (Randomly improved by Corpses you've spent)
flavor: The less legible the band's logo, the more hardcore it is.

name: DJ Manastorm
text: Battlecry: Set the Cost of spells in your hand to (0).\nAfter you cast one, the others cost (1) more.
flavor: Do not sleep on his Tinker Town deep house set - absolutely legendary.

name: Fanottem, Lord of the Opera
text: Taunt, Lifesteal\nThis card's Cost is\nequal to the amount of cards in your deck.
flavor: Writing a compelling symphony takes time. Usually around 20 turns or more.

name: Ancient Totem
flavor: This is SO much cuter than Tinyfin.

name: Forbidden Fruit
text: [x]Spend all your Mana. Choose One - Gain that much Attack this turn; or twice as much Armor.
flavor: Not forbidden if you have a good dentist!

name: Assembly Line
text: Discover a Mech from another class.
flavor: add ecx, eax

name: Astral Automaton
text: [x]Has +1/+1 for each other\nAstral Automaton you've\nsummoned this game.
flavor: You'll want to summon an automaTON of these.

name: Awakening Tremors
text: Get three 3/1 Worms. They cost (1).
flavor: A rude followup to the Sleepy Tremors.

name: Chaotic Consumption
text: Destroy a friendly minion to destroy an enemy minion.
flavor: You're not you when you're hungry.

name: Chaotic Tendril
text: Battlecry: Cast a random @-Cost spell. Improve your future Chaotic Tendrils.
flavor: "So are you good, evil, or neutral?" "Just chaotic."

name: Curse of Flesh
text: Enemy minions cost Health instead of Mana next turn.
flavor: No! My rock-hard chiseled abs!

name: Discovery of Magic
text: Discover a spell from a spell school you haven't cast this game (from any class).
flavor: It's in a book, just take a look!

name: Drone Deconstructor
text: [x]Battlecry: Get a 1/1\nMagnetic Sparkbot with a\nrandom bonus effect.
flavor: You have to deconstruct to reconstruct.

name: Forest Seedlings
text: Summon two\n1/1 Saplings.\n(Blossoms in @ |4(turn, turns).)
flavor: You win some, you blossom.

name: Gear Shift
text: Shuffle the two left-most\ncards in your hand into\nyour deck. Draw 3 cards.
flavor: You mean the PRNDL?

name: Lightning Reflexes
text: [x]Discover a Nature spell.\nIf you play it this turn,\nDiscover another.
flavor: If you can dodge a lightning bolt, you can dodge a ball.

name: Monstrous Form
text: Give a friendly\nminion +3/+3 until your next turn.
flavor: Then, it lives. Horribly.

name: Runes of Darkness
text: Discover a weapon. Spend 3 Corpses to give it +1/+1.
flavor: "Sorry, Squirmy. I'm working."

name: Shadowtouched Kvaldir
text: Battlecry: Your next healing effect deals damage instead.
flavor: Four out of five deck doctors say this works great with Reno Jackson!

name: Shock Hopper
text: [x]Battlecry: Get a random\nOverload card.
flavor: Who is shocked about a frog hopping?

name: Staff of the Primus
text: After your hero attacks, shuffle a random\nPlague into your opponent's deck.
flavor: THE PRIMUS, RULER OF MALDRAXXUS, MASTER STRATEGIST, AND wielder of toothpicks!

name: Tar Slick
text: Minions take double damage this turn.\nDeal $1 damage.
flavor: Has +2 Attack on its opponent's turn.

name: Victorious Vrykul
text: After this attacks, get a 2/3 Val'kyr that costs (1).
flavor: Get three of these and you have a Trikul.

name: X-21 Repairbot
text: Deathrattle: Return any Mechs Magnetized to this to your hand.
flavor: The circle bolt goes in the square hole.

name: Absorbent Parasite
text: Magnetic, Rush\nCan Magnetize to\nMechs and Beasts.
flavor: Your beasts' iron levels are high, what have you been feeding them?

name: Always a Bigger Jormungar
text: Give a minion +2_Attack and "Excess damage dealt by attacks hits the enemy hero."
flavor: I saw it! It's big, scary, and blue!

name: Aqua Archivist
text: [x]Battlecry: The next\n Elemental you play\ncosts (2) less.
flavor: Do not summon! I JUST had to put all my scrolls in rice.

name: Bait and Switch
text: Secret: When a friendly minion is attacked, give it +3/+3.
flavor: Oh my god, the bait and switch works every time!

name: Bestial Madness
text: [x]Give +1 Attack to all\nminions in your hand,\ndeck, and battlefield.
flavor: "Hey this isn't what we were trying to excavate!"

name: Celestial Projectionist
text: Battlecry: Choose a\nfriendly minion. Add a temporary copy of it to your hand.
flavor: What if we're not really here, y'know? What if we're all just, like, projections in the mind of some cosmic entity? How would we know?

name: Chill-o-matic
text: Magnetic\nFreeze any character damaged by this minion.
flavor: After a number of island vacations, he thought the Storm Peaks would be a nice change of pace.

name: Conductivity
text: The next spell you cast\nthis turn also targets\nadjacent minions.
flavor: That faceless sure didn't put up a lot of (length/cross-sectional area).

name: Creation Protocol
text: Discover a copy of a minion in your deck. Forge: Get another copy.
flavor: If you want the destruction protocol, just go in reverse.

name: Crystalline Statue
text: Rush. Starts Dormant.\nAfter you draw 4 cards,\nthis awakens.
flavor: Hey! Who Greened my statue?!

name: Disciple of Golganneth
text: [x]At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of a random Overload card in your hand by (1).
flavor: Warning: If you are not made of rocks, do not stand in lightning water.

name: Distressed Kvaldir
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle two random Plagues into your opponent's deck.
flavor: Oh look at that, I have been impaled.

name: Down with the Ship
text: Deal $3 damage. Shuffle two random Plagues into your opponent's deck.
flavor: It has been a privilege playing with you tonight.

name: Embrace of Nature
text: Draw a Choose_One\ncard. Forge: It has both effects combined.
flavor: BY OUR POWERS COMBINED…

name: False Disciple
text: Battlecry: Discover a Legendary Priest minion from the past.
flavor: "...and they were roommates..."\n"oh my god"

name: Flame Revenant
text: [x]After you summon an\n Elemental, give it +1/+1.
flavor: 4x weak to water.

name: Flash of Lightning
text: Draw a card.\nNext turn, your Nature spells cost (1) less.
flavor: FLASH! AAAAAAAAA

name: From the Scrapheap
text: Get three 1/1 Magnetic Sparkbots with random bonus effects.
flavor: Well that's a load of scrap.

name: Frozen Over
text: [x]Both players draw 2\ncards. Your opponent can\nnot play them next turn.
flavor: We will find out who wins when we return in the spring.

name: Furious Furnace
text: [x]Magnetic\nAlso damages minions next\nto whomever this attacks.
flavor: He is absolutely fuming.

name: Invent-o-matic
text: Whenever you Magnetize\na minion, give it +1/+1.
flavor: The inventor was really proud, until they realized inventing something that invents things makes for poor job security.

name: Inventor's Aura
text: Your Mechs cost (1) less. Lasts @ turns.
flavor: Ok, fine, I'll read the manual…

name: Kaja'mite Creation
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from another class that costs (3) or less.
flavor: You made this? I made this.

name: Lifebinder's Gift
text: Choose One - Get 2 random Nature spells; or Reduce the Cost of spells in your hand by (1).
flavor: Everyone's investing in Nature spells these days, but that bubble is about to burst.

name: Noble Minibot
text: Magnetic\nAfter this attacks,\ngive a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: I always get the minibot with the wobbly wheel.

name: Northern Navigation
text: Discover a spell from your deck. If it's\na Frost spell, Freeze a random enemy minion.
flavor: Leads directly to Greatfather Winter's workshop.

name: Observer of Myths
text:
[x]After you summon a
minion with more Attack
than this, give all friendly
minions +1 Attack.
flavor: "Oh hey, look! A myth!"

name: Pit Stop
text: Discover a Mech\nfrom your deck.\nGive it +2/+1.
flavor: "Guido! It's time."

name: Runic Adornment
text: Discover a spell that costs (3) or less. Shuffle 2 copies into your deck that Cast When Drawn.
flavor: Rune, rune on the wall, who's the greenest of them all?

name: Saronite Shambler
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast 5 or more spells this game, give your hero +4 Attack this turn. @ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: They play the best rock music at the saro-nite club.

name: Smelt
text: [x]Give a random minion in\nyour hand +3/+3. Lose\n3 Armor to do it again.
flavor: Due to his heightened olfactory system, Kha'zgoroth is cursed with always being the one that dealt it.

name: Stoneskin Armorer
text: Battlecry: If your Armor changed this turn,\ndraw 2 cards.
flavor: Pretty sensitive for someone made of thick skin.

name: Tentacle Grip
text: Deal $3 damage.\nCombo: Get a 1/1 Chaotic Tendril.
flavor: "WINTER VEIL WAS MONTHS AGO, WHY ARE YOUR LIGHTS STILL UP?"

name: Thornveil Tentacle
text: [x]Lifesteal\nBattlecry: Deal 2 damage to\na random enemy minion.
flavor: Jennifer dumped me.

name: Titanforged Traps
text: Discover and\ncast a Secret.\nForge: Do it twice.
flavor: Always place it underneath their health pack.

name: Twilight Torrent
text: Choose a character. If it's friendly, restore #6 Health. If it's an enemy, deal $3 damage.
flavor: I hope it’s the first one.

name: Void Scripture
text: Discover a spell.\nIf you have enough Mana to play it, cast a copy of it at a random enemy.
flavor: The Old Gods like to think of them as "Addendums."

name: Watcher of the Sun
text: Battlecry: Get a random Holy spell. Forge: Also restore 6 Health to your hero.
flavor: "I've got my eye on y-AAA I'M BLIND!"

name: Aerosoilizer
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Treant.
flavor: Banned in Wild for opening a hole in the ozone layer.

name: Argunite Golem
text: [x]Has +1 Attack for each card\nyou've drawn this turn.
flavor: Golem Bling never really caught on - the fad crumbled after the Cataclysm.

name: Battleworn Faceless
text: Battlecry: Transform into a\ncopy of a damaged minion.
flavor: "I shall hug him and squeeze him and call him Earthen George."

name: Bellowing Flames
text: Deal $5 damage to a minion. Forge: Then deal $5 damage split among all enemy minions.
flavor: Too much bellowing. Not enough flames.

name: Careless Mechanist
text: After you draw your second card in a turn, destroy this.
flavor: Fly lower, you fools!

name: Celestial Shot
text: Deal $3 damage.\nYour next spell has Spell Damage +2.
flavor: He sure did.

name: Conservator Nymph
text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly Treant into a 5/5 Ancient with Taunt.
flavor: Whatever you do, don't water your Treants after midnight!

name: Contaminated Lasher
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast 5 or more spells this game, _refresh 4 Mana Crystals.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: He corrupts me, he corrupts me not.

name: Coppertail Snoop
text: [x]Magnetic\nWhenever this attacks,\nget a Coin.
flavor: Scavenges both nuts and bolts for the winter.

name: Cyclopian Crusher
text: Rush\nForge: Gain +3/+2.
flavor: Really puts the rusher in crusher. Uses its one eye to C.

name: Disciple of Argus
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon two\n2/2 Elementals with Taunt.
flavor: "Aw nuts, I put both ends in the pencil sharpener."

name: Encroaching Insanity
text: Both players take\nFatigue damage, twice.
flavor: Pictured here is Loken stuck at his 20th hour on Diamond 5.

name: Eulogizer
text: [x]Battlecry: Spend 3 Corpses\nto deal 3 damage.\nForge: Gain them instead.
flavor: "Sorry for your Ranked mode loss."

name: Fable Stablehand
text: [x]Rush Battlecry: If you control a minion with 4 or more Attack, gain +2/+2.
flavor: She took over the job when Feeble Steeblehand left.

name: Fate Splitter
text: Deathrattle: Get a copy\nof the last card your opponent played.
flavor: "What's the matter with these scissors!? The thread won't cut!!"

name: Forge of Wills
text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a Giant with its stats and Rush.
flavor: Standing in the Forge of Wills fills you with a sense of DETERMINATION.

name: Frost Lotus Seedling
text: Draw 1 card.\nGain 5 Armor.\n(Blossoms in @ |4(turn, turns).)
flavor: Really bad flavor text. (Blossoms in 1 expansion.)

name: Grace of the Highfather
text: Restore #8 Health.\nDiscover a card that costs the amount Overhealed.
flavor: The fish was thiiiiis big, can you believe it?

name: Mecha-Leaper
text: Magnetic Deathrattle: Give a friendly Mech +2/+2 and this Deathrattle.
flavor: Now to find my Mecha-Macaw and my Mecha-Titus and we'll be Mecha-Set.

name: Meddlesome Servant
text: Battlecry: If you've cast 5 or more spells this game, draw 2 cards.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: Has successfully gotten away with it too.

name: Melted Maker
text: After you Forge a card,\nget a copy of it.
flavor: Melts what he makes (cheese) and makes a mean melt (grilled cheese).

name: Mimiron, the Mastermind
text: [x]After you play a Mech,\nget a random one of\nMimiron's Gadgets.
flavor: 1N1T14T1NG F74V0R T3XT S3QU3NC3.

name: Molten Rune
text: Deal $3 damage.\nGet a random spell.\nForge: This casts twice.
flavor: It's post-ancient modern realist neoclassical impressionist art. No idea what it means though.

name: Mortal Eradication
text:
[x]Deal $5 damage randomly
split among all enemy
minions. Restore #2 Health
to your hero for each killed.
flavor: Clearly anything with 6 or more health is immortal. Such as Street Trickster. We are nerfing Street Trickster for lore accuracy.

name: Muscle-o-Tron
text: [x]Battlecry: Give all minions\nin your hand +1/+1.\nForge: +2/+2 instead.
flavor: Bro, do you even forge?

name: Ravenous Kraken
text: Battlecry: Destroy\na friendly minion. Deathrattle: Summon a copy of it.
flavor: He's witewally hitting the squiddy wight now.

name: Razorscale
text: Cards can't cost\nless than (2).
flavor: A razorscale, razormane, and razorclaw walk into the tavern.

name: Relentless Worg
text: Rush\nAfter this attacks and\nkills a minion, restore this to full Health.
flavor: It's the Year of the Worg! Wait - what do you mean 'wolf'?

name: Sharp-Eyed Seeker
text: Battlecry: If there is a card in your deck that didn't start there, draw it.
flavor: If you give it treats, it will give you shiny objects!

name: Sickly Grimewalker
text: [x]After you summon an\n Undead, give it Poisonous.
flavor: Anyone want some CHEEEEEESE?

name: Sigil of Time
text: At the start of your\nnext turn, draw 3 additional cards.
flavor: Sigil of Right A Down Right A Down.

name: Soulburner Varia
text:
[x]After a friendly Undead dies,
deal 2 damage to the enemy
hero and get a random
Shadow Priest spell.
flavor: Captain's Log. 8/11/2023\nThere are 60 minutes remaining until the Flavor Text is due. It is Friday at 4 PM. We are out of stamina and ideas. Please send funnies, punnies, quippies, or your finest hahas.\n- The Design Team

name: SP-3Y3-D3R
text: Magnetic\nStealth for 1 turn.
flavor: The itsy bitsy spider magnetized onto the water spout.

name: Starlight Whelp
text: Battlecry: Get a\nrandom card from your starting hand.
flavor: Starlight, star bright, first whelp I see tonight.

name: Steam Guardian
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a spell.\nReduce the Cost of a Fire\nspell in your hand by (1).
flavor: Its boiling steam and erupting magma serve as a pretty good form of 2-Factor Authentication.

name: Student of the Stars
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a copy of this into your deck with permanent +3/+3.
flavor: She is getting her major in Ursa.

name: Tentacle Tender
text: At the end of your turn,\nget a 1/1 Chaotic Tendril.
flavor: It's a messy job but somebody's got to do it. Well, actually, nobody should do this.

name: The Stars Align
text: Transform minions in your hand into ones that cost (3) more. (They keep their original Cost.)
flavor: Sweet, three Desert Obelisks!

name: Thorim, Stormlord
text: [x]Battlecry: Unlock your\nOverloaded Mana Crystals.\nDraw that many cards.
flavor: In the mountains.

name: Trogg Exile
text: Rush\nBattlecry: Deal 4 damage to your hero.
flavor: Trogg used to rule…

name: Turn the Tides
text: [x]Give your hero +3 Attack this turn. Summon a 3/3 Elemental with Rush. Overload: (1)
flavor:
T
I
D
E
S

name: Weight of the World
text: Draw 2 cards. Forge: Draw cards until you have as many in hand as your opponent first.
flavor: Unluckily for him, Azeroth has a tendency to get bigger every 2 years or so.

name: Alarmed Securitybot
text: [x]Deathrattle: Draw another\nminion. Set its Attack,\nHealth, and Cost to 5.
flavor: THREAT LEVEL: 5!\nWhich doesn't actually sound that bad to be honest.

name: Algalon the Observer
text: Battlecry: Replace\nyour Hero Power with\nAlgalon's Vision.
flavor: That's so Algalon, it’s the future he can see.

name: Angry Helhound
text: Rush\nHas +4 Attack on your turn.
flavor: When you wake up on the all 3 wrong sides of the bed.

name: Astral Serpent
text: At the end of your turn,\nif this didn't Attack,\ndraw 2 cards.
flavor: Call it lazy all you want, but it does have two more cards than you.

name: Champion of Storms
text: After you cast a Nature spell, summon a\n4/2 Elemental.\nForge: With Rush.
flavor: Has some grievances it just can't wait to air out.

name: Craftsman's Hammer
text: Whenever your hero attacks, gain 3 Armor.
flavor: Also gives your hero Craftsmanship +1.

name: Disciple of Eonar
text: Battlecry: Your next Choose One card or power has both effects combined.
flavor: If you do not receive his rose, you will have to pack your bags and leave Ulduar immediately.

name: Disciple of Sargeras
text: Battlecry: Discard a spell\nto summon two 3/2 Imps. Forge: Give them\n+2 Health and Taunt.
flavor: An IMP-ortant card to Forge.

name: Eredar Deceptor
text: Whenever you draw a card, summon a 1/1 Demon with Rush.
flavor: But they were all of them deceived, for another Eredar was made.

name: Helya
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle all three Plagues into your opponent's deck. Plagues they draw this game are unending.
flavor: Named after the first thing Odyn said after landing a sick kickflip.

name: Ignis, the Eternal Flame
text: Battlecry: If you've Forged a card this game, craft a custom weapon.
flavor: ETERNAL flame? He has 4 health?!

name: Imposing Anubisath
text: Taunt\nCan't attack.
flavor: He's just standing there... menacingly!

name: Infested Watcher
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Get two\n1/1 Chaotic Tendrils.
flavor: This is why you don't eat watermelon seeds.

name: Judge Unworthy
text: Set an enemy minion's Health to 1, then deal $1 damage to all enemies.
flavor: VEGETABLE JUSTICE!

name: Mechagnome Guide
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell.\nForge: It costs (3) less.
flavor: Theme park? Tropical island? Fiery pit of despair? We've got something for everyone.

name: Mindbender
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage for each card you have drawn this turn.@ (@)
flavor: I like my brain unbent, thanks.

name: Prison Breaker
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast 5 or more spells this game, deal 2 damage to all enemies. @ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: Flavor fail! Demolition Renovator did it FIRST!

name: Runefueled Golem
text: Battlecry: Discover a weapon from any class.

name: Saronite Tol'vir
text: [x]Taunt\nWhenever this is attacked,\ndraw a card.

name: Serenity
text: Give all enemy minions -2 Attack. Destroy any with 0 Attack.

name: Sinister Soulcage
text: [x]Give a friendly Undead\n+2/+2. Spend 5 Corpses\nto summon a copy of it.
flavor: Also a pretty neat night light!

name: Stoneheart King
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Earthen that gains +2/+2 for each other Earthen you've summoned this game.

name: Tempest Hammer
text: After your hero attacks, deal 3 damage to the lowest Health enemy.
flavor: LIKE SWATTING PESTS!

name: Time-Lost Protodrake
text: [x]Taunt When you draw this, add a random Dragon to your hand.
