name: Tiny Worldbreaker
text: Battlecry: If you\ncontrol another Mech,\ndeal 4 damage.
flavor: "I'm doing my part!"

name: Tomb Traitor
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Plague in your opponent's deck to deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: You enjoy raiding, I enjoying traitoring. We are not the same.

name: Twisted Frostwing
text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Summon a Chimaera with stats equal to this minion's Attack.
flavor: Not currently valid in the Twist format.

name: Unchained Gladiator
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a card.\nRepeat for each Elemental\nyou played last turn.@ (@)
flavor: We can't possibly buff this card any more, just look at him!

name: Wing Welding
text: [x]Discard your highest Cost\ncard. Deal damage equal\nto its Cost to all minions.
flavor: This is not how you train your dragon.

name: Crash of Thunder
text: Deal $3 damage to all enemies. Costs (1) less for each Nature spell you've cast this turn.
flavor: ERROR: Lightning.exe has stopped working.

name: Disciple of Amitus
text:
[x]At the end of your turn, summon
a 2/2 Earthen that gains +2/+2
for each other Earthen you've
summoned this game.
flavor: "Oh great Amitus, I took your style advice on the poncho, but pray tell - one or two golden gloves?"

name: Disguised K'thir
text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform into a random card in your opponent's deck.
flavor: That is not a very good disguise, dude.

name: Eye of Chaos
text: Battlecry: Get two\n1/1 Chaotic Tendrils.
flavor: Aye aye aye (OF CHAOS)

name: Inquisitive Creation
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal @ damage to all enemy minions. (Improved by each spell school you've cast this game!)
flavor: This mech eats books for breakfast.

name: Jotun, the Eternal
text: [x]Battlecry: For the rest of the game, cast a copy of the first spell you draw each turn at enemies.
flavor: He doesn't look like a turtle?

name: Keeper's Strength
text: Give a friendly minion +2/+2. Deal\nits Attack damage to\nall other minions.
flavor: Finders keepers, losers DIE.

name: Lab Constructor
text: [x]At the end of your turn,\nsummon a copy of this.\nForge: Gain Magnetic.
flavor: As Mimiron foretold: "Twinsies!"

name: Momentum
text: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn. Costs (1) less for each card you've drawn this turn.
flavor: "Mass Times Velocity" wasn't as catchy.

name: Sanitize
text: [x]Deal damage equal to\nyour Armor to all minions.\nForge: Gain 3 Armor first.
flavor: We were originally going to make a joke about a popular streamer, but one of our designers is a total germaphobe.

name: Tainted Remnant
text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, deal 7 damage randomly split between all enemies.
flavor: A sore sight of eyesores for sore eyes.

name: Tram Operator
text: Battlecry: Draw a Mech. The next Mech you play costs (2) less.
flavor: The guy in the back is screaming…  because the train ride is so fun!

name: Tyr's Tears
text: [x]Resurrect 3 different minions from your class. Set their stats to 2/2. Forge: Resurrect another.
flavor: Liek this if u cri evertim

name: Wisdom of Norgannon
text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each different spell school you've cast this game.
flavor: Now all we need is the power and courage of Norgannon.

name: XB-488 Disposalbot
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all enemy minions.\nForge: Gain Lifesteal.
flavor: You'll be so surprised when you figure out what XB stands for.

name: Aggramar, the Avenger
text: Titan\nBattlecry: Equip a\n3/3 Taeshalach.
flavor: Formerly a trusted lieutenant of Sargeras, Aggramar helped him fight the demonic legions across many worlds before he was corrupted.

name: Cho'gall, Twilight Chieftain
text: [x]Taunt, Lifesteal Start of Game: 50% chance to corrupt the game with a random anomaly.
flavor: He's got it all, the gumption, gall, and Cho.

name: Flame Behemoth
text: Battlecry: Get two\nrandom Magnetic Mechs. They cost (2) less.
flavor: Always look both ways before crossing the Formation Grounds.

name: Golganneth, the Thunderer
text: Titan\nYour first spell each turn costs (3) less.
flavor: With dominion over the seas and skies, Golganneth fearlessly wields the power of nature to serve the Pantheon.

name: Khaz'goroth
text: [x]Titan After this uses an ability, gain Immune this turn and attack a random enemy minion.
flavor: Creator of the titan-forged races, Khaz'goroth intended them to safeguard the world of Azeroth from corruption and discord.

name: Loken, Jailer of Yogg-Saron
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a minion from your deck. Summon a Tentacle with its stats and Taunt.
flavor: Really great at his job! - Yogg-Saron

name: Minotauren
text: [x]Rush Whenever this minion deals damage, gain that much Armor.
flavor: "Why's he so mad?"\n"He's been stuck on one of Hearthstone's hidden maze puzzles for YEARS."

name: Norgannon
text: Titan\nAfter this uses an ability, double the power of the other abilities.
flavor: His tremendous arcane magic was strong enough to save all of the spirits of the titans after Sargeras destroyed their physical forms.

name: Ra-den
text: [x]Taunt. Deathrattle: Summon each other minion you've played this game that did not start in your deck.
flavor: Regularly participates in Immortal Combat.

name: Sif
text: Spell Damage +@\n(Improved by each\nspell school you've cast this game!)
flavor: She is Sif. He is Malygos. They are not the same person. They may have similar spell damage, they may have similar colors but they are different nonetheless.

name: Starstrung Bow
text: [x]Costs (1) less for each\n_friendly Secret that has_\n_triggered this game.
flavor: Shoot for the stars, but if you miss, aim for the enemy hero.

name: Trial by Fire
text: [x]Summon five 1/1 Val'kyr with Rush. When one dies, give the others +1/+1.
flavor: Well, in ya go.

name: Tyr
text: Battlecry: Resurrect a\n2, 3, and 4-Attack minion from your class.
flavor: Brought me back to life, S Tyr card.

name: V-07-TR-0N Prime
text: [x]T1T4N This minion's abilities repeat on another random friendly minion.
flavor: Long after the titans' departure, Mimiron dreamed of creating something with an approximation of their power. He may have actually succeeded!

name: Aman'Thul
text: Titan\nAfter this uses an\nability, Discover any Legendary minion.
flavor: The leader of the titans was the first to awaken. In his loneliness, he sought out other titans across many different worlds, and together, they formed the Pantheon.

name: Amitus, the Peacekeeper
text: Titan\nTaunt. Your minions\ncan't take more than 2_damage at a time.
flavor: As a champion of harmony, Amitus abstained from the Pantheon's many conflicts until one day, shortly after the corruption of Sargeras, she vanished altogether.

name: Ancient of Growth
text: [x]Choose One - Summon three 2/2 Treants; or __Transform your Treants into__ _5/5 Ancients with Taunt.
flavor: Who passed greenhouse gas?

name: Argus, the Emerald Star
text: [x]Titan Minions to the left of this have Rush, and ones to the right have Lifesteal.
flavor: Once a proud titan, Argus was fated to meet a darker end. Sargeras and his demons would later corrupt and shatter Argus to use his power for themselves.

name: Containment Unit
text: [x]Magnetic\nDeathrattle: Summon a\nrandom 8-Cost minion.
flavor: Surprisingly ticklish.

name: Elemental Inspiration
text: [x]For each spell school you have cast this game, summon a 4/5 Vortex with a random bonus effect.@ (@)
flavor: No Hero Power required.

name: General Vezax
text: [x]Rush Battlecry: Gain 4 Armor. Deathrattle: Lose 4 Armor to resummon this.
flavor: Contrast this with Specific Vezax, who only gets resummoned if you have exactly 4 Armor.

name: Mythical Terror
text: [x]Lifesteal At the end of your turn, force all enemy minions to attack this.
flavor: You cannot pet the Terror in Hearthstone.

name: Prison of Yogg-Saron
text: [x]Choose a character.\nCast 4 random spells\n(targeting it if possible).
flavor: "We've finally captured Yogg-Saron! How should we keep him contained?"\n"How about... an open pit... right below us... with four loose chains?"\n"PERFECT!"

name: Thorignir Drake
text: [x]Rush Whenever this attacks, summon two 3/1 Whelps to attack the target first.
flavor: Throwing your children at enemies qualifies you for Worst Mother of the Year.

name: Cultivation
text: Give your minions +2/+2. Costs (1) less\nfor each Treant you've summoned this game.
flavor: Calling this an 8 mana card is missing the forest for the trees.

name: Freya, Keeper of Nature
text: [x]Choose One - Duplicate your\nhand; or Summon copies of\nall other friendly minions.
flavor: Good things come in pairs.\nGood things come in pairs.

name: Hodir, Father of Giants
text: Battlecry: Set the stats\nof the next three minions you play to 8/8.
flavor: Giant ladies, this one's a Keeper.

name: Kologarn
text: [x]Rush. Whenever this attacks a minion, put it in your hand. Deathrattle: Move any in your __hand to your opponent's.
flavor: "So am I just supposed to stand here forever, or...?"

name: Shapeless Constellation
text: Battlecry: Transform into\nan 8/8 copy of a random\nminion in your hand.
flavor: Galaxy Brain.

name: Son of Hodir
text: Battlecry: Shuffle four\n8/8 Giants into your deck that are summoned when drawn.
flavor: You look dehydrated, drink some water! Come on, chug! Chug! Chug! Chug!

name: Storm Giant
text: Taunt\nForge: Costs (2) less. Can be Forged endlessly.
flavor: Storm Giant, Frost Giant, Molten Giant... I want Fair-weather and Sunshine Giant!

name: The Primus
text: Titan\nAfter this uses an ability, Discover a card with that Rune.
flavor: As there is a Pantheon of titans, so is there also a Pantheon of Death, comprised of powerful rulers in the Shadowlands.

name: Imprisoned Horror
text: [x]Costs (1) less for each\ndamage you've taken on\nyour turns this game.
flavor: Prison changed Jeff.

name: Odyn, Prime Designate
text: [x]Battlecry: For the rest of the game, after your hero gains Armor, they gain that much Attack for that turn.
flavor: The best offense is a good defense. 30 defense to be exact.

name: Sargeras, the Destroyer
text: [x]Titan Battlecry: Open a portal that summons two 3/2 Imps each turn.
flavor: Formerly the Defender of the Pantheon, he became disillusioned by his mission and formed the Burning Legion to destroy all life within the universe.

name: Yogg-Saron, Unleashed
text: [x]Titan\nAfter this uses an ability,\ncast two random spells.
flavor: Has been known to monologue before he strikes.

name: Eonar, the Life-Binder
text: [x]Titan After this uses an ability, summon a 5/5 Ancient with Taunt.
flavor: Protector of all living things, she once saved the nascent world-soul of Azeroth from annihilation. It seems mercy was her greatest wisdom.

name: Chained Guardian
text: [x]Rush, Reborn Costs (1) less for each Plague shuffled into the _enemy deck this game.
flavor: Eternally jealous of the Unchained Gladiator.

name: Bloodrock Co. Shovel
text: Deathrattle: Excavate\na treasure.
flavor: The 'mpany' is silent.

name: Burning Heart
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it survives, give your hero +3 Attack this turn.
flavor: A 100% ethically sourced fire elemental heart is very hard to come by. This one definitely wasn't.

name: Cactus Construct
text: Discover a 2-Cost minion. Summon a 1/1 copy of it.
flavor: "I am not Malfurion! I am CACTUS LORD!"

name: Fistful of Corpses
text: Deal damage to\na minion equal to\nyour Corpses.
flavor: Technically, they're not Corpses YET.

name: Fool's Gold
text: Get a random Golden Pirate and Elemental from other classes.
flavor: Worth its weight in rocks.

name: Fracking
text:
[x]Look at the bottom
3 cards of your deck.
Draw one and destroy
the others.
flavor: For fhe person who jusf cannof decide whaf card fo puf info a deck!

name: Miracle Salesman
text: Deathrattle: Get a Tradeable Snake Oil.
flavor: "Hey! Hope you’re well. Have you ever wanted to be your own boss?"

name: Oasis Outlaws
text: Discover a Naga.\nIf you've played a Naga while holding this, reduce its Cost by (1).
flavor: With their oasis polluted by the Bloodrock Mining Company, Snake Eyes has set aside her differences with the outlaws of the Badlands to put an end to Bloodrock's operation.

name: Shadestone Skulker
text: [x]Rush. Battlecry: Take your\n_weapon and gain its stats._\nDeathrattle: Give it back.
flavor: Sharing is caring - and they don't care.

name: Shimmer Shot
text: Deal $1 damage. Summon a random minion of that Cost.
flavor: I hope I don't jinx the outcome.

name: Smokestack
text: Deal $1 damage to\na minion. If it dies, Excavate a treasure.
flavor: Don't worry, it's green energy!

name: Sneaky Snakes
text: Summon two 1/1 Snakes with Stealth.
flavor: You're a sneaky lil snake, aren'tcha?

name: Soulfreeze
text: Freeze a minion\nand its neighbors. Deal damage to your hero equal to the number Frozen.
flavor: An effective way to freeze someone's soul is to just freeze their body.

name: Stick Up
text: [x]Discover a Quickdraw\ncard from another class.
flavor: Dude, Velarok, give me a minute to play my turn, the rope's burning!

name: Tram Mechanic
text: Deathrattle: Get a Barrel\nof Sludge. TOXIC WASTE: Handle with care.
flavor: He looks at life through sludge-tinted glasses.

name: Amphibious Elixir
text: Restore #5 Health. Discover a spell.
flavor: Made by frogs, for frogs, from frogs.

name: Bartend-O-Bot
text: Battlecry: Draw an Outcast card and slide it to the left side of your hand.
flavor: Bartend-O-Bot! Make my Outcast card DO SOMETHING!

name: Blast Charge
text: Destroy a damaged enemy minion. Excavate a treasure.
flavor: Your Blast spells have +1 Attack.

name: Bunny Stomper
text: Your Beasts have Rush.
flavor: Has a PhD in stomputational chemistry.

name: Cactus Cutter
text: Battlecry: Draw a spell. If you cast it this turn, gain +1/+2 and Taunt.
flavor: Best friend of Spinetail Drake.

name: Cactus Rager
text: Poisonous
flavor: What doesn't kill ya makes you deader.

name: Cryopreservation
text: Freeze an enemy. Excavate a treasure.
flavor: Remember to take the elementals out of the freezer before Mom gets home!

name: Dart Throw
text: [x]Throw two $2 damage darts at random enemy minions. (If both hit the same minion, get a Coin!)
flavor: Did you know: Hitting the same target twice is only for skilled players. This has been a 'Dart Fact'!

name: Disposal Assistant
text: [x]Battlecry and Deathrattle:\nPut a Barrel of Sludge on\nthe bottom of your deck.
flavor: A bright green liquid that people say is bad for you... That's either hazardous waste OR a new popular brand of soft drink.

name: Dragon Tales
text: Choose One - Get two random Dragons that cost (5) or less; or Get two that cost more than (5).
flavor: "Once upon a time, there was a maaaagical toy shop, filled with wonder and Dragons!"

name: Dryscale Deputy
text: Battlecry: The next\ntime you draw a spell,\nget a copy of it.
flavor: He's here to tip the scales in our favor… and moisturize them too.

name: Elementium Geode
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle:\nDraw a card. Deal 2 damage to your hero.
flavor: Elementium, my dear Geode.

name: Flint Firearm
text: [x]Battlecry: Get a random\nQuickdraw card. If you play\nit this turn, repeat this.
flavor: You'll never guess why they call him that.

name: Gold Panner
text: At the end of your turn, draw a card.
flavor: "I don't know why everyone's got their overalls in a jumble with Azerite minin' when there's all this GOLD for the takin'!"

name: Greedy Partner
text: Battlecry: If you're holding another 2-Cost card,\nget a Coin.
flavor: "Don't worry, we'll evenly split the bounty. Then I'll have two evenly sized piles of gold!"

name: Heat Wave
text: [x]Deal $2 damage to an enemy minion and its neighbors. Quickdraw: To all enemies instead.
flavor: This is the hottest summer of your life so far.

name: Hi Ho Silverwing
text: Divine Shield\nDeathrattle: Draw a\nHoly spell.
flavor: I swear this minion had 3000 Attack at one point!

name: Hidden Gem
text: Stealth\nAt the end of your turn, restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: This will be a staple in Unicorn Priest.

name: Holy Springwater
text: Restore #8 Health to a damaged character.\nSave any excess in a\n1-Cost Bottle.
flavor: Issa bah oh auh woh ah!

name: Horseshoe Slinger
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy minion.\nQuickdraw: And one of its neighbors.
flavor: Some people think this card is broken, but I think it's farrier than that.

name: Howdyfin
text: [x]Whenever your hand has\nless than 3 cards in it,\nget a random Murloc.
flavor: You know who to blame if your drinking water tastes a little fishy.

name: Kobold Miner
text: Battlecry: Excavate\na treasure.
flavor: A mining kobold that costs 2, has very low health, and gives you resources… what is this, Warcraft Rumble?

name: Lay Down the Law
text: Tradeable\nSet a minion's Attack and Health to 1. Quickdraw: Then deal $1 damage to it.
flavor: The official term for "Because I said so!".

name: Messenger Buzzard
text: [x]Deathrattle: Draw a Beast.\nGive minions in your\nhand +1/+1.
flavor: The bird brings the word (which happens to be bird).

name: Mining Casualties
text: Summon two 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits with "Deathrattle: Summon\na 1/1 Frail Ghoul".
flavor: They'll be fiiiiiiiiine.

name: Misfire
text: Deal $3, $2, and $1 damage to random minions. Quickdraw: Choose the targets.
flavor: "Me should not have taken candle."

name: Needlerock Totem
text: At the end of your turn, gain 2 Armor and\ndraw a card.
flavor: You put the Needlerock in to get the Bloodrock out.

name: Parched Desperado
text: Battlecry: If you've cast a spell while holding this, give your hero +3 Attack this turn.
flavor: I'm green\nAnd I'm about to die\nDa ba dee da ba di

name: Pile of Bones
text: Deathrattle: The next\ntime you Excavate,\nresummon this.
flavor: It's a very well-organized pile, I'll give you that.

name: Pocket Sand
text: Deal $3 damage.\nQuickdraw: Your opponent's next card costs (1) more.
flavor: I was only trying to get it in your eyes, man. YOU didn't need to open your mouth like that!

name: Quick Pick
text: After your hero attacks, draw a card.
flavor: QUICK! Pick which quick pick trick will stick in the thick of the wick! Lickety split!

name: Rehydrate
text: Restore #7 Health. Quickdraw: Refresh\n2 Mana Crystals.
flavor: Just doing our part as the Hearthstone development team in reminding you to drink more water!

name: Saloon Brewmaster
text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion to your hand.\nGive it +2/+2.
flavor: Brewmaster Bru brought Barrelbrim bursting barrels of barely brewed barley brew. Barrelbrim bought Bru's barley brew, barring the barrels broken from the brazen brunch brawl.

name: Shale Spider
text: Battlecry: If you played an_Elemental last turn, draw a card.
flavor: The 2nd member of the VERY exclusive Is-Called-A-Spider-But-Isn't-A-Beast Club.

name: Shell Game
text: [x]Get a random Epic,\nRare, and Common card\nfrom other classes.
flavor: I thiiink… It's under all three of 'em!

name: Showdown!
text: Both players summon three 3/3 Outlaws.\nGive yours Rush.
flavor: An epic confrontation between the outlaws and the in-laws.

name: Shroomscavate
text: Give a minion\nDivine Shield.\nExcavate a treasure.
flavor: As Globb shroominated on his situation, toiling endlessly in the mushroom mines, he came to the startling realization. His boss wasn't a very fun guy.

name: Splish-Splash Whelp
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavor: Little Whelpy, you're the one\nYou make Mana lots of fun

name: Stargazing
text: Draw a different Arcane spell. If you play it this turn, it casts twice.
flavor: See those dots up there? Those are called "stars." Except for that one. That's called an "airplane."

name: Ten Gallon Hat
text: [x]Draw a minion. Give it\n+1/+1 and "Deathrattle:\nGet a Ten_Gallon_Hat."
flavor: It actually only holds three quarters of a gallon, but that doesn't sound as good.

name: Trapdoor Spider
text: [x]Stealth, Poisonous\nAfter your opponent plays\na minion, attack it.
flavor: I can respect that they're important for the ecosystem, as long as you keep them waaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaay over there.

name: Trusty Companion
text: [x]Give a minion +2/+3.\nIf it has a minion type,\ndraw one of that type.
flavor: Textbook big-sibling and little-sibling relationship.

name: Unlucky Powderman
text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Give Taunt minions in your hand and deck +1/+1.
flavor: Welp, guess I'll die... again.

name: Whelp Wrangler
text: At the end of your turn, get a 1/2 Whelp with Taunt.
flavor: "Gosh darn it! How did these winged, airborne creatures manage to escape my knee-high, fenced enclosure AGAIN!?"

name: Antique Flinger
text: Battlecry: If you've Excavated twice, destroy an enemy minion.
flavor: One man's treasure is another man's statue to the face.

name: Azerite Vein
text: [x]Secret: When the enemy plays a card on the turn that it entered their hand, get a copy that costs (0).
flavor: When the ground trembles near it, are those earthquakes or heartbeats?

name: Battlepickaxe
text: After you play a\nTaunt minion, gain +1_Durability.
flavor: You can pick your battles, and you can pick your axes, but you can't uh… pick your friends' battlepickaxes?

name: Benevolent Banker
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from your deck. Quickdraw: Enemy deck instead.
flavor: "Oh no, you've got me confused. I'm Ben, the evil ent banker. I only work with evil trees!"

name: Bounty Board
text: Your Excavate, Quickdraw, Tradeable, and Legendary cards cost (1) less.
flavor: Reno's desire to be a face known around the Badlands might have backfired a little bit.

name: Bounty Wrangler
text: Quickdraw or Combo:\nGet a Coin.
flavor: With a smile like that and Coins in her hands, she's one greedy grinner.

name: Bovine Skeleton
text: Deathrattle: If this has 4\nor more Attack, summon\na Bovine Skeleton.
flavor: The secret cow level has been unearthed.

name: Corpse Farm
text: Spend up to 8 Corpses to summon a random minion of that Cost.
flavor: It ain't much, but it's dishonest work.

name: Crop Rotation
text: Summon four 1/1 Undead with Rush that die at the end of turn.
flavor: "Dave, you're never gunna believe this! The plants ARE the zombies!"

name: Dehydrate
text: Lifesteal. Deal $4 damage to a minion.\nQuickdraw: Costs (1).
flavor: JUST A LITTLE FURTHER LITTLE GUY, YOU CAN MAKE IT!!!

name: Deputization Aura
text: Your left-most minion has +1 Attack and Lifesteal. Lasts @ turns.
flavor: You're my favorite deput- oh. You died… Ok just kidding, THAT guy is my favorite deputy.

name: Elemental Companion
text: Summon a random Elemental Companion.
flavor: Always Hiffar.

name: Eroded Sediment
text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, Discover any Elemental from the past.
flavor: A perfect minion for those feeling sedimental about their past.

name: Farm Hand
text: Battlecry: Discover an Undead. Quickdraw:\nIt costs (2) less.
flavor: I know it's an Undead hand, but bending your pinky in that way can NOT be good for your joints.

name: Furnace Fuel
text: When this is played,\ndiscarded, or destroyed,\ndraw 2 cards.
flavor: Remember Ultrasaur? This is him now. Feel old yet?

name: Gaslight Gatekeeper
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle your\nhand into your deck, then\ndraw that many cards.
flavor: This girl is such a boss.

name: Gattlesnake
text: [x]At the end of your turn, __load two bullets that deal 1__ damage each. Deathrattle: _Fire at random enemies!
flavor: He used to be an ordinary snake until he slithered through a saloon during a brawl and walked out looking like this.

name: High Noon Duelist
text: Deathrattle: Both players DRAW! Destroy the card that costs less.
flavor: "My ultimate is rea- ah, errr, I mean, I have enough Mana."

name: Holy Cowboy
text: Battlecry: Your next Holy spell costs (2) less.
flavor: Wait, but… Isn't he more of a 'holy kodoboy'?

name: Injured Hauler
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to this minion. Overheal: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: With how many cacti are all over the Badlands, this job has to be some sort of sick joke.

name: Iridescent Gyreworm
text: Deathrattle: Give each\nof your minions a random bonus effect.
flavor: This card smells of iride.

name: Linedance Partner
text: Battlecry: If you're holding another 3-Cost card, summon a random 3-Cost minion.
flavor: Where did you come from? (Linedance Partner's Battlecry)\nWhere did you go? (Face)

name: Load the Chamber
text: [x]Deal $2 damage.\nYour next Naga, Fel spell,\nand weapon cost (1) less.
flavor: Wait! Before we duel, I gotta install these shaders.

name: Minecart Cruiser
text: [x]Rush, Overload: (2) Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, don't Overload.
flavor:
Where are you drivin',
Minecart Cruiser?
Where is your bounty,
fortune, and fame?

name: Mismatched Fossils
text: Discover a Beast\nand an Undead.\nSwap their stats.
flavor: Whoever put these fossils together must be really careless.

name: Ogre-Gang Outlaw
text: Rush\n50% chance to attack\nthe wrong enemy.
flavor: Why don't they just buy another hat?

name: Pendant of Earth
text: [x]Discover a minion from your deck. Restore Health to your hero equal to its Cost.
flavor: Eaaaarrrrthhhhhh Pendaaaannnttttt Poweeerrrrrrrrrrr!!!!!!!!

name: Pip the Potent
text: Battlecry: Copy each\n1-Cost card in your hand.
flavor: One time, I was trying to get Pip's attention to warn her that the dangerous outlaw Cheery Ollie, who also goes by just 'O', was headed her way. "Pip! Pip! Cheery O!", I shouted.

name: Prosthetic Hand
text: Magnetic, Reborn\nCan Magnetize to\nMechs or Undead.
flavor: It's creaky and it's rusty! It's spooky and it's dusty!

name: Reap What You Sow
text: Deal $3 damage. Excavate a treasure.
flavor: With a hat like that, I'd say their tailor did all of the sowing.

name: Reinforced Plating
text: Gain 6 Armor.\nExcavate a treasure.
flavor: I am become death, destroyer of azerite.

name: Saddle Up!
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a random Beast that costs (3) or less."
flavor: And then they rode off into the sunset, not knowing they left their stove on.

name: Silver Serpent
text: Rush, Poisonous\nQuickdraw: Gain Immune this turn.
flavor: Skilled at exploring hidden temples.

name: Sir Finley, the Intrepid
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Excavated\ntwice, transform all enemy\nminions into 1/1 Murlocs.
flavor: And exactly how does Finley turn everyone into a murloc?

name: Sludge on Wheels
text: [x]Rush. Whenever this takes damage, get a Barrel of Sludge and add one to the bottom of your deck.
flavor: Cruisin' for an oozin'.

name: Snake Eyes
text: [x]Battlecry: Roll two dice, then Discover two cards of those Costs. (Doubles get an extra Discover!)
flavor: Hey, put ALL of your hands on the table!

name: Spirit of the Badlands
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck\nhas no duplicates, get a\npermanent Mirage.
flavor: That's the spirit! Of the Badlands.

name: Summoning Ward
text: [x]Secret: When your turn\nstarts, summon a copy of\nyour highest Cost minion.
flavor: You couldn't handle one Snowflipper Penguin. So what hope do you have… against two?!

name: Take to the Skies
text: Draw two Dragons.\nGive them +1/+1.
flavor: This is one step above reaching for the skies.

name: Trogg Gemtosser
text: Finale: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy for each of your Mana Crystals.
flavor: Oh no! You're throwing valuable gems at me! Please stop!

name: Trolley Problem
text: Discard your lowest Cost spell. Summon two 3/3 Tram Cars with Rush.\nQuickdraw: Don't discard.
flavor: If only there were thousands of hypotheticals to prepare me for this moment!

name: Velarok Windblade
text:
[x]While this is in your hand,
play a card from another
class to reveal Velarok's
true form!
flavor: His deceptive manipulations have dug the Bloodrock Company into a hole they can't get out of.

name: Azerite Chain Gang
text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry and Quickdraw:\nSummon a copy of this.
flavor: How long can this go on? For 6 years at least!

name: Blindeye Sharpshooter
text: [x]After you play a Naga, deal 2 damage to a random enemy and draw a spell. (Then switch!)@[x]After you cast a spell, deal 2 damage to a random enemy and draw a Naga. (Then switch!)
flavor: "Bullseye… I think."

name: Camouflage Mount
text: Give a minion +3/+3 and a random bonus effect. When it dies, summon a Chameleon.
flavor: What mount? I don't see anything…

name: Crimson Expanse
text: [x]Choose a damaged minion. Summon a copy of it that goes Dormant for one turn.
flavor: Idk. Looks pink to me.

name: Dang-Blasted Elemental
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to all minions except friendly Elementals.
flavor: We were told that "Dag-Nabbin' Dang-Blastin' Rootin'-Tootin' High-Falutin' Elemental" was too long.

name: Desert Nestmatron
text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, refresh 4 Mana Crystals.
flavor: Not as sweet as the Dessert Nestmatron, but still just as refreshing!

name: Detonation Juggernaut
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Give Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: Did you really need a whole giant mecha-suit just for one bundle of dynamite?

name: Digging Straight Down
text: Deal $8 damage\nto a minion.\nExcavate a treasure.
flavor: You only make this mistake once.

name: Drilly the Kid
text: Battlecry, Quickdraw,\nand Deathrattle:\nExcavate a treasure.
flavor: "I HATE that nickname. Call me Drilliam!"

name: Fan the Hammer
text: Deal $6 damage split among the lowest Health enemies.
flavor: I thought Kurtrus was more of a fan of glaives.

name: Fel Fissure
text: Deal $2 damage to all minions. At the start of your next turn, deal $2 more damage to all minions.
flavor: This will clear the board, I'm fisSURE of it!

name: Fossilized Kaleidosaur
text: Battlecry: Gain two\nrandom bonus effects.\nExcavate a treasure.
flavor: He's not that bad if you don't die turn 4.

name: Gloomstone Guardian
text: [x]Taunt. Choose One - Discard 2 cards; or Destroy one of your Mana Crystals. Forge: Do NEITHER.
flavor: From the same people who brought you Choose One, and Choose Twice, comes the exciting prequel: Choose NEITHER!

name: Glowstone Gyreworm
text: [x]Lifesteal Quickdraw: Deal 5 damage. Forge: Change Quickdraw to Battlecry.
flavor: Believe it or not, this is Tram Conductor Gerry's Gyreworm. But is it pronounced Gerry's Gyreworm, Gerry's Gyreworm, Gerry's Gyreworm, or Gerry's Gyreworm?

name: Invasive Shadeleaf
text: Deal $10 damage to an enemy minion.\nSave any excess in a\n1-Cost Bottle.
flavor: Don't throw shade, bottle it!

name: Maw and Paw
text: [x]At the end of your turn, gain 5 Corpses. At the start of your turn, spend 5 Corpses to give your hero +5 Health.
flavor: Home is where the disfigured, rotten heart is.

name: Mo'arg Drillfist
text: Taunt\n Deathrattle: Excavate\na treasure.
flavor: Also functions as the town dentist.

name: Ogre-Gang Rider
text: [x]Rush 50% chance to give your hero +3 Attack this turn instead of attacking.
flavor: Doesn't know his ride from his left.

name: Overflow Surger
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a copy of this for each turn in a row you've played an Elemental.@ (@)
flavor: The drip on this elemental is straight fire!

name: Pop'gar the Putrid
text: Your Fel spells cost (2) less and have Lifesteal. Battlecry: Get two Barrels of Sludge.
flavor:
All around the arid badlands
The Outlaws chased the Townsfolk
Gerry had a train full of sludge
POP! goes the sludge train

name: Posse Possession
text: Summon a 4/4 copy\nof a random minion in your opponent's hand.
flavor: Keep your friends close, your enemies closer, and your shadows at gunpoint.

name: Quartzite Crusher
text: Lifesteal. Freeze any character damaged by your hero.
flavor: It's not just a weapon… it's a rock!

name: Reliquary Researcher
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've\nExcavated twice, cast two\nrandom Mage Secrets.
flavor: What good is a researcher if they're just gunna keep it all a secret?

name: Rowdy Partner
text: Battlecry: If you're holding another 4-Cost card,\ndeal 4 damage.
flavor: Rowdy, partner!

name: Sheriff Barrelbrim
text: Battlecry: If you have\n20 or less Health, open\nthe Badlands Jail.
flavor: Is that Sheriff Barrelbrim, owner of the Badlands Barrelbuilding?

name: Skeleton Crew
text: [x]Battlecry: Excavate a\ntreasure. It costs (0).
flavor: They don't sweat, breathe or need lit candles... what more could you ask?

name: Slagmaw the Slumbering
text: Rush, Taunt\nDormant for 6 turns.\n(Excavate to awaken 2 turns sooner!)
flavor: You delved too greedily and too deep. You know what they awoke in the darkness of the Badlands: Rush and Taunt.

name: Snake Oil Seller
text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle 2\nTradeable Snake Oils into\nyour opponent's deck.
flavor: This oil is absolutely essential to your gameplan.

name: Spinetail Drake
text: Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, deal 5 damage\nto an enemy minion.
flavor: Mortal enemy of Cactus Cutter.

name: Starshooter
text: After your hero attacks, get an Arcane Shot.
flavor: Shoot for the stars! And if you miss, just don't hit me.

name: Tae'thelan Bloodwatcher
text: [x]Cards that didn't start in\nyour deck cost (4) less\n(but not less than 1).
flavor: He's a big fan of Control Death Knight live streams.

name: Theldurin the Lost
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, gain Immune this turn and attack all enemies.
flavor: He might be lost, but he knows where you can find these hands.

name: Tram Heist
text: Get a copy of each\ncard your opponent played last turn.
flavor: How are they gunna steal the whole tram!?

name: Waste Remover
text: [x]At the end of your turn,\ndestroy the bottom 3\ncards of your deck.
flavor: Always follow the three Rs: REDUCE their world to ash, REUSE their bones as paperweights, and RECYCLE!

name: Aftershocks
text: Deal $1 damage to all minions, three times. Costs (2) less if you cast a spell last turn.
flavor: They look shocked right now!

name: Burrow Buster
text: Rush\nBattlecry: Excavate\na treasure.
flavor: We almost went with the name "Giant Drill", but then it would've HAD to be an 8/8.

name: Cattle Rustler
text: Battlecry: Draw a Beast.\nIt costs (3) less.
flavor: What once started as a small-time cat burglary gig has turned into a life of cattle rustling. What a shame.

name: Doctor Holli'dae
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has\nno duplicates, equip the\nStaff of the Nine Frogs.
flavor: If anything can heal the Badlands, it is the power of frogs!

name: Gunslinger Kurtrus
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, fire 6 random 2 damage shots at minions in the enemy's hand.
flavor: "I have given up (a single copy of) EVERYTHING! What have YOU sacrificed?"

name: Lawful Longarm
text: [x]Rush, Lifesteal\nBattlecry: Gain +1 Attack for\neach card in your hand.
flavor: Loves to lob law bombs from his law blog.

name: Living Prairie
text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, summon two 3/3 Cows with Rush.
flavor: Whoooooa, we're half way there\nWhooa-oh, -

name: Mantle Shaper
text: Costs (1) less for\neach spell you've cast while holding this.
flavor: You got a fireplace? I've got a guy who shapes mantles.

name: Ogre-Gang Ace
text: [x]Rush Whenever this attacks, gain Divine Shield. (50% chance to _gain Lifesteal instead.)
flavor: 100% chance to not play by the rules.

name: Shadow Word: Steal
text: Return an enemy minion to YOUR hand.
flavor: Anduin will literally take your stuff and say it's a Shadow Word.

name: Shattered Reflections
text: Choose a non-Titan\nminion. Add a copy of it to\nyour deck and battlefield.
flavor: Get mad at your mirror once, see Shattered Reflections forever :(

name: Spurfang
text: [x]Battlecry and Deathrattle: Summon a random Beast with Cost equal to this minion's Attack.
flavor: He's always smiling… Not by choice, but because it hurts to close his mouth.

name: Swarm of Lightbugs
text: Summon 10 1/1 Lightbugs with Lifesteal. Save any excess in\na 1-Cost Bottle.
flavor: No, I asked for 'lightNING in a bottle'!

name: Wishing Well
text: [x]After you play a Coin, get a random Legendary minion from another class and set its Cost to (1).
flavor: Wishing upon a star? Pssshhh, that's so childish. Anyways, let me throw all my Coins into this well.

name: Blast Tortoise
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Deal damage to all enemy minions equal to this minion's Attack.
flavor:
Who's that minion?
...
Iiiiit's Blast Tortoise!
"Blast tortoise."

name: Blastmage Miner
text: [x]Battlecry: Excavate a treasure. For each card in your hand, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: "So anyways, I started blastminin'!"

name: Chaos Creation
text:
Deal $5 damage.
Summon a random 5-Cost
minion. Destroy the bottom
5 cards of your deck.
flavor: So THIS is who's been Greening everything!

name: Crystal Cluster
text: Gain three empty Mana Crystals. Any that can't fit summon a 3/7 Elemental with Taunt.
flavor: And if you can't fit any of the Elementals… do better.

name: Deepminer Brann
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, your Battlecries trigger twice for the rest of the game.
flavor: This is a very on-brannd effect.

name: Kingpin Pud
text: Battlecry: Resurrect\nyour Ogre-Gang. Give\nthem Windfury.
flavor: The good, the bad, and the ugly stats for the Cost.

name: Mes'Adune the Fractured
text: Battlecry: Draw an Elemental. Split it\ninto two halves.
flavor: Cracking open an elemental with the boys.

name: Midnight Wolf
text: Rush\nOutcast: Summon a\ncopy of this.
flavor: Three of these would make for an EPIC T-shirt.

name: Obsidian Revenant
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon two random Deathrattle minions that cost (3) or less.
flavor: What is this? A Reven for Ants?!

name: Stone Drake
text: Divine Shield, Taunt,\nLifesteal, Elusive
flavor: "I am the great Stone Drake - good morning!"

name: Sunspot Dragon
text: [x]Tradeable, Lifesteal\nQuickdraw: Deal 6 damage.
flavor: THIS is why you shouldn't look directly at the sun.

name: The Badlands Bandits
text: [x]Get eight 3/2 Bandits with bonus effects. Any that can't fit in your hand are summoned instead.
flavor: Bandits... ASSEMBLE!

name: Thirsty Drifter
text: Taunt\nCosts (1) less for each\n1-Cost card you've played this game.
flavor: Quick! Someone bring her a Manathirst card!

name: Badlands Brawler
text: Battlecry: Start a Brawl!\nIf you've Excavated twice,\nthis always wins.
flavor: Watch out watch out watch out - R.K.O. outta nowhere!

name: Dragon Golem
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Summon a copy of this for each Dragon in your hand.
flavor: I have a Dragon, I have a Golem.\nUH! Dragon Golem!

name: Giant Tumbleweed!!!
text: Deal $6 damage to all minions. Summon a 6/6 Tumbleweed.
flavor: Skarr's second-biggest hobby after laying waste to the Badlands is bowling.

name: Harrowing Ox
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you've Excavated twice, your next card this turn costs (7) less.
flavor: Dead or alive, you're pulling that plow.

name: Maruut Stonebinder
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, Discover an __Elemental to summon. Add__ the others to your hand.
flavor: Savior of the World Pillar, Maruut valiantly fought the Twilight's Hammer to aid Therazane against the Cataclysm.

name: Skarr, the Catastrophe
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal @ damage to all enemies (improved by each turn in a row you've _played an Elemental).
flavor: We're not in Karazhan anymore, Reno.

name: Therazane
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Double the stats of all Elementals in your hand and deck.
flavor: You thought we forgot about her, didn't you? *nervous laughter*

name: Tram Conductor Gerry
text: Battlecry: If you've\nExcavated twice, summon six 3/3 Tram Cars with Rush.
flavor: His name is pronounced like 'gif'.

name: Triple Sevens
text: Deal $7 damage to a minion. Draw 7 cards.
flavor: If you count the 'seven' in the name, there's actually four total 7s, not three. Huge oversight from the designers.

name: Azerite Giant
text: [x]Costs (1) less for each\nturn in a row you've\nplayed an Elemental.
flavor: Either that giant isn't really giant, or that doorway is HUGE!

name: Boomboss Tho'grun
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 T.N.T. into your deck. When drawn, blow up a card in the enemy hand, deck, and board.
flavor: Ever since the Bloodrock Company hired this guy, business has been booming!

name: Elise, Badlands Savior
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, summon 5/5 copies of 4 random minions in your deck.
flavor: From the library to the field, she's proved herself to be a leading intellectual.

name: Prismatic Beam
text: Deal $3 damage to all enemy minions.\nCosts (1) less for each\nenemy minion.
flavor: Seven colors of the rainbow, one for each enemy minion.

name: Reno, Lone Ranger
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, empty the enemy board and limit it to 1 space for a turn. It's high noon!
flavor: With an uncertain past and a questionable future, Reno was lucky to find his home on the range.

name: Rheastrasza
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has\nno duplicates, summon the\nPurified Dragon Nest.
flavor: Rheastrasza ascends above loyalty to just her dragonflight to serve all dragonkind. She believes all flights deserve a future and will give her life for the future dragon prince.

name: Thunderbringer
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon an Elemental and Beast from your deck.
flavor: You can lead a horse to water, but you can't stop it from electrocuting everything in the water.

name: Fye, the Setting Sun
text: [x]Rush, Lifesteal, Taunt Costs (1) less for each Dragon you've summoned this game.
flavor: There is a dragon way down in Bloodrock\nThey call the Setting Sun

name: Walking Mountain
text: Rush, Lifesteal,\nMega-Windfury\nOverload: (2)
flavor: The hills are alive with the sound of YEEEEHAAAWWWW!

name: Living Horizon
text: [x]Taunt, Divine Shield\nCosts (1) less for each\nother card in your hand.
flavor: Even in the darkest of days, the sun never sets on the Badlands.

name: Sunset Volley
text: Deal $10 damage randomly split among\nall enemies. Summon a random 10-Cost minion.
flavor: When the light is just right during Golden Hour, that is when you take out the selfie stick and start casting.

name: Reska, the Pit Boss
text: [x]Rush. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this game. Deathrattle: Take control of a random enemy minion.
flavor: Overseer of the Bloodrock Mine, Reska will work you to the bone. They'll then reanimate your bones and work THOSE bones to the bone.

name: Zilliax Deluxe 3000
text: While building your deck,\ncustomize your very own\nZilliax Deluxe 3000!
flavor: It only took us 2998 prototypes to figure out how to make the perfect card... by having YOU do it!

name: Corridor Sleeper
text: Starts Dormant. After 7 minions die, awaken.
flavor:
In the workshop, I go deeper.
In the mulligan, I'm a keeper.
This time, I'm even cheaper.
You guessed it right, I'm Corridor Sleeper.

name: Dig for Treasure
text: Draw a minion. If it's a Pirate, get a Coin.
flavor: "Woohoo! I'm so glad I dug up a pirate!"

name: Fancy Packaging
text: Give a minion with Divine Shield +2/+3.
flavor: Wow, this card is great value! Until you open it.

name: Giftwrapped Whelp
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, give it and this minion +1/+1.
flavor: Don't forget to poke fire-breathing holes in the box!

name: Jade Display
text: [x]Deathrattle: Your Jade Displays have +1/+1 this game. Shuffle 2 of them into your deck.
flavor: The Jade Lotus just releases the same product every year but with an upgraded camera.

name: Lesser Spinel Spellstone
text: Give Undead in your hand +1/+1. (Gain @ |4(Corpse, Corpses) to upgrade.)
flavor:
A story concluded, the kobolds had fought
Yet here is a spellstone Azari forgot
Pawned off to shops, considered a trinket
Dark powers contained, none would think it

name: Magical Dollhouse
text: [x]Gain Spell Damage +1\nthis turn only.
flavor:
Build your own dollhouse in 3 easy steps!
1. Build a castle.
2. Miniaturize it.
3. GLITTER!

name: Pop-Up Book
text: Deal $2 damage. Summon two 0/1 Frogs with Taunt.
flavor: What's up-book?

name: Red Card
text: Make a minion go Dormant for 2 turns.
flavor: Finally, Demon Hunter has expanded its color pallette to TWO colors!

name: Scarab Keychain
text: Battlecry: Discover a\n2-Cost card.
flavor: "How do you keep losing your keys!? They couldn't have just gotten up and walked away!"

name: Tar Slime
text: Taunt\nHas +2 Attack during your opponent's turn.
flavor: Too cute to be contained!

name: Threads of Despair
text: Give all minions\n"Deathrattle: Deal 1\ndamage to all minions."
flavor: Mom, I frew up...

name: Treasure Distributor
text: After you summon a Pirate, give it +1 Attack.
flavor: As the illiterate pirates always say: There is no 'I' in 'piracy'.

name: Blind Box
text: Get 2 random Demons. Outcast: Discover them instead.
flavor: THREE Flame Imps?? C'mon, where's my pity timer?!

name: Bottomless Toy Chest
text: Discover a card from your deck. If you have Spell Damage, copy it.
flavor: That's right, it goes in the toy chest.

name: Endgame
text: Resurrect your last Demon that died.

name: Fetch!
text: Draw a minion. If it's a Beast, draw a spell.
flavor: We made fetch happen.

name: Hidden Objects
text: Discover a Secret.\nSet its Cost to (1).
flavor: There are 99 gnomes in this picture. Can YOU find them all?

name: Jungle Gym
text: [x]Deal 1 damage to a\nrandom enemy. Repeat\nfor each friendly Beast.
flavor: Yeah, I work out at the gym. The one with all the plushies and toys.

name: Lesser Opal Spellstone
text: Draw 1 card.\n(Attack with your hero\n@ |4(time, times) to upgrade.)
flavor:
For those seeking glory and power
Be not swayed by Azari the Devourer
The opal grants victory to the weak
But leaves your soul barren and bleak

name: Painted Canvasaur
text: Battlecry: Give each other friendly Beast a random bonus effect.
flavor: Oh this is a present? Would you like that gift raptor not?

name: Patchwork Pals
text: Get all 3 Animal Companions. They\ncost (1) less.
flavor: "I'll name you Misha, you Huffer, and you can be the third one."

name: Purifying Power
text: Silence all friendly minions, then give them +1/+2.
flavor: I sure do love making my minions better!

name: Quality Assurance
text: Draw 2 Taunt minions.
flavor: I assure you this card is quality.

name: Remote Control
text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Hound.
flavor: For some reason, my dog keeps trying to eat this.

name: Safety Goggles
text: Gain 6 Armor.\nCosts (0) if you don't\nhave any Armor.
flavor: Remember, always be safe in the lab to mitigate injuries!\n*painfully snaps goggles onto face*

name: Scale Replica
text: Draw your lowest and highest Cost Dragon.
flavor: Get it!?! It's because dragons have hides - commonly known as scales - and this is a model of a dragon on a smaller level, also known as a scale. IT'S THE SAME WORD!

name: Shambling Zombietank
text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Spend 5 Corpses\nto summon a copy of this.
flavor: Spidertank in shambles.

name: Silk Stitching
text: Choose a friendly minion. Discover a spell that costs (4) or less for\nit to cast when it dies.
flavor: The slogan of their very exclusive sewing club is "You can't stitch with us."

name: Sing-Along Buddy
text: Your Hero Power\ntriggers twice.
flavor: One of the buttons make you sound JUST like Ragnaros. BY FIRE BE HEARD!

name: Spirit of the Team
text: Stealth for 1 turn.\nYour hero has +2 Attack\non your turn.
flavor: Horrible call! BOOOOoo00oO0o0OO0oo0oO!

name: Thistle Tea Set
text: Discover a spell from another class. Get a copy of it.
flavor: Available with Swiftthistle or Decafthistle.

name: Toy Boat
text: After you summon a Pirate, draw a card.
flavor: Try playing seven of these in one turn fast.

name: Wind-Up Sapling
text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Refresh @ Mana |4(Crystal, Crystals). (Trade to upgrade!)
flavor: I am Wind-Up Sapling.

name: Bargain Bin Buccaneer
text: Rush\nCombo: Summon a\ncopy of this.
flavor: Thrift stores have the best buccaneers.

name: Bucket of Soldiers
text: Deathrattle: Summon five 1/1 Soldiers with random bonus effects.
flavor: Life is like a bucket of soldiers. You never know what bonus effects you're gonna get.

name: Card Grader
text: Battlecry: If you've cast\na spell while holding this, Discover a card from your deck.
flavor: "Uncentered gem, fractured frame, folded corner... 10/10!"

name: Careless Crafter
text: Deathrattle: Get two\n0-Cost Bandages that restore 3 Health.
flavor: How about YOU try folding paper with only three fingers!?

name: Clearance Promoter
text: Deathrattle: Reduce the Cost of two spells in your hand by (1).
flavor: "Sorry, we just sold our last Worgen Greaser figure."

name: Cosplay Contestant
text: After your opponent plays a minion, transform into a 3/4 copy of it.
flavor: She's the winner of the Valeera Cosplay Contest! Second place was Valeera.

name: Cursed Campaign
text: [x]Give a friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon two copies of this minion that are Dormant for 2 turns."
flavor: Their group has been trying to schedule the next session since Kobolds and Catacombs came out.

name: Ensmallen
text: Reduce the Cost and Attack of minions in your deck by (1).
flavor: Come on, you know- I ensmallen, you ensmallen? He she me Ensmallen? Ensmallogy: the study of ensmallening?! IT'S FIRST GRADE.

name: Fairy Tale Forest
text: [x]Draw a Battlecry minion.\nIt costs (1) less.
flavor: Man, I wish fairy tales were real, Durg'tash the Sorcerer.

name: Floppy Hydra
text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle a copy of this into your deck with permanently doubled Attack and Health.
flavor: If you cut one of its heads off, it'll grow back twice as cute!

name: Incredible Value
text: Discover a 4-Cost minion. Set its Attack and Health to 7.
flavor: Now with expedited Overload!

name: Malefic Rook
text: Battlecry: Attack\nYOUR hero.
flavor: Was a regular Pawn but Fel in with the wrong toys.

name: Messmaker
text: Lifesteal, Taunt\nDeathrattle: Deal 1 damage\nto all enemies.
flavor: The most painful 1 damage of your life.

name: Nostalgic Initiate
text: Miniaturize\nThe first time you cast a spell, gain +2/+2.
flavor: Nostalgic Initiate: "Man I wish I could relive my college days..."\nKel'thuzad: "Say no more."

name: Observer of Mysteries
text: Battlecry: Cast 2 random Secrets. At the start of your turn, destroy them.
flavor: Nobody tell him, but he still has his Secrets set to the "Try Me" mode.

name: Papercraft Angel
text: Your Hero Power costs (0).
flavor: Warcraft. StarCraft. And now, Papercraft!

name: Plucky Paintfin
text: [x]Poisonous\nBattlecry: Draw a\nRush minion.
flavor: Not everyone can become a great painter. But a great painter can come from anywhere.

name: Rainbow Seamstress
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck started with a Blood, Frost, or Unholy card, gain Lifesteal, Reborn, or Rush respectively.
flavor: Is this card any good? It would seam sew.

name: Rambunctious Stuffy
text: Rush\nAfter you cast a Frost spell, gain Reborn.
flavor: The Lich King can't sleep without his stuffy.

name: Rumble Enthusiast
text:
[x]After you play the left-
or right-most card in your
hand, deal 1 damage to
a random enemy.
flavor: There's always room for one more game in the tavern!

name: Sketch Artist
text: Battlecry: Draw a Shadow spell. Get a temporary copy of it.
flavor: Never ask an artist how many pieces they've finished.

name: Sparkling Phial
text: [x]Deal $2 damage.\nYour next card this turn\ncosts that much less.
flavor: Lemme pull up your phial.

name: Sweetened Snowflurry
text: [x]Miniaturize\nBattlecry: Get 2 random\ntemporary Frost spells.
flavor: "You want a piece of me!? Will that be one scoop or two?"

name: The Crystal Cove
text: [x]The next minion you\nsummon this turn has\nits stats set to 4/4.
flavor: For some strange reason, everyone that hangs out at the Crystal Cove has the same name...

name: Trinket Artist
text: Battlecry: Draw a Divine_Shield minion\nand an Aura.
flavor: Many Draenei found new hobbies on the long journey from Argus.

name: Umpire's Grasp
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Demon and reduce\nits Cost by (2).
flavor: PENALTY - FEL BALL!

name: Wreck'em and Deck'em
text:
[x]Choose a friendly Mech.
Summon a copy of it
that attacks a random
enemy, then dies.
flavor: ...and Check'em for any signs of life.

name: Baking Soda Volcano
text: Lifesteal. Deal $10 damage randomly split among all minions.\nOverload: (1)
flavor: Science rules.

name: Ball Hog
text: [x]Lifesteal Battlecry and Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to the lowest Health enemy.
flavor: "There's no hog in team... ANYMORE! I QUIT!"

name: Boom Wrench
text: [x]Miniaturize Deathrattle: Trigger the Deathrattle of a random friendly Mech.
flavor: Boom, the Inventor; Can he fix it?\nBoom, the Inventor; No he can't!

name: Cardboard Golem
text: Battlecry: Increase the duration of Auras in your hand, deck, and battlefield by 1.
flavor: It's certainly... creative.

name: Caricature Artist
text: Battlecry: Draw a minion that costs (5) or more. Give it a funny mustache!
flavor: "Pfffft…. You look RIDICULOUS! And I haven't even drawn the mustache yet!"

name: Chalk Artist
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a minion. Transform it into a random _Legendary one (keeping its __original stats and Cost).
flavor: Well it's either a dragon or a dinosaur - chalk it up to art style.

name: Chia Drake
text: Miniaturize Choose One - Gain Spell Damage +1; or Draw a spell.
flavor: Huh-huh-huh Hearthstone!

name: Ci'Cigi
text: [x]Deathrattle: Get 3 random\nfirst-edition Demon_Hunter\n_cards (in mint condition).
flavor: She once bought a 1of1 Golden Skull of Gul'dan written entirely in Thalassian for 2,000,000 Gold.

name: Darkthorn Quilter
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
deal this minion's Attack
damage randomly split
___among enemies.
flavor: Still mad about not being let into the spiders' sewing club.

name: Flash Sale
text: Summon a 1/2 Mech with Divine Shield and Taunt. Give your minions +1/+2.
flavor: HOW LOW! HOW LOW! HOW LOW!

name: Fly Off the Shelves
text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. Repeat for each Dragon you're holding.
flavor: No, Whizbang, you can't pass off a poorly-made shelf as a cool Priest spell.

name: Frost Lich Cross-Stitch
text: Deal $3 damage to a character. If it dies, summon a 3/6 Water Elemental that Freezes.
flavor: Do not fear power... Fear those who SEW IT!

name: Giggling Toymaker
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/2 Mechs with Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: "HAHAhehehe. Hahaha he." -Me when I'm making toys

name: Lab Patron
text: The first time you gain Armor each turn, summon another Lab Patron.
flavor: When a Lab Patron fails out of school, they become a Grim Patron.

name: Nesting Golem
text: Deathrattle: Resummon this with -1/-1.
flavor: NESTING GOLEEEEEEEEEEEEM!!!!!!! Eh… It just doesn't feel the same.

name: Nostalgic Gnome
text: [x]Miniaturize Rush. After this minion deals exact lethal damage on your turn, draw a card.
flavor: She remembers Alterac Valley like it was 833 days ago.

name: Origami Crane
text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Swap Health\nwith another minion.
flavor: I was born with 1-Health and paper skin.

name: Painter's Virtue
text: [x]Lifesteal After your hero attacks, give minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: For when the Light hits the painting at a certain angle.

name: R.C. Rampage
text: Summon six 1/1 Hounds. Any that can't fit give the others +1/+1.
flavor: This place has really gone to the dogs.

name: Sand Art Elemental
text: [x]Miniaturize Battlecry: Give your hero +1 Attack and Windfury this turn.
flavor: This art HURT ME!!!

name: Sonya Waterdancer
text: After you play a 1-Cost card, get a copy of it\nthat costs (0).
flavor: Water you dancing to?

name: Splendiferous Whizbang
text: [x]You start the game\nwith one of Whizbang's\nExperimental Decks!
flavor: After his work at Boomsday Labs, he's taken what Dr. Boom taught him and applied it to the most important inventions of all - TOYS!!!

name: Spot the Difference
text: Discover a 3-Cost minion to summon.\nIf your deck has no minions, repeat this.
flavor: Ah, I see now! One of them is a picture of a Chillwind Yeti, and the other is a Blood Elf.

name: Tabletop Roleplayer
text: [x]Miniaturize Battlecry: Give a friendly Demon +2 Attack and Immune this turn.
flavor: "And then I uh... I curse them with... uh... OH! I got it! They have to speak in rhymes or they turn into a crab!"

name: Tigress Plushy
text: Miniaturize\nRush, Lifesteal,\nDivine Shield
flavor: The sheervalue of this card is undeniable.

name: Triplewick Trickster
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy,\nthree times.
flavor: You no take candle! Or second candle. You can take third candle though.

name: Watercannon
text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Pirate that attacks a random enemy.
flavor: There's a teeny tiny pirate trapped in each of the water balloons. Free them!

name: Watercolor Artist
text: Battlecry: Draw a Frost spell. At the start of your turns, reduce its Cost by (1).
flavor: They've amassed a largely aquatic body of work, painting lakes, rivers and self portraits.

name: Workshop Mishap
text: Deal $5 damage to a minion. Excess damages both neighbors.\nOutcast: Gain Lifesteal.
flavor: IT HAS BEEN [0] DAYS SINCE LAST ACCIDENT.

name: Amateur Puppeteer
text: [x]Miniaturize, Taunt\nDeathrattle: Give Undead\nin your hand +2/+2.
flavor: "I'm a real toy!"

name: Chemical Spill
text: Summon the highest Cost minion\nfrom your hand, then\ndeal $5 damage to it.
flavor: I said spill the TEA, not the acid!

name: Fireworker
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Boom Bots. WARNING: Bots may explode.
flavor: The one job where a spark of creativity is unwanted.

name: Forgotten Animatronic
text: At the end of your turn, destroy a minion with less Attack than this.
flavor: He ALWAYS comes back.

name: Game Master Nemsy
text: Battlecry: Draw a Demon. Deathrattle: Swap places with it.
flavor: "Rocks fall, and everyone dies. Oopsies!"

name: Hagatha the Fabled
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw 2 spells that cost (5) or more. Transform them into Slimes that cast the spells.
flavor: Soup's on!

name: Hemet, Foam Marksman
text: After a friendly Beast dies, get a random Legendary Beast from the past. It costs (2) less.
flavor: So THIS is who's been lowering the power level of all those Hearthstone cards in a foamly fashion.

name: Mystery Egg
text: [x]Miniaturize Deathrattle: Get a copy of a random Beast in your deck. It costs (5) less.
flavor: Which came first, the Mukla or the egg?

name: Nostalgic Clown
text: [x]Miniaturize Battlecry: If you've played a higher Cost card while holding this, deal 4 damage.
flavor: He used to be kind of corrupt, but now he performs purely for the fun of it.

name: Origami Frog
text: [x]Rush\nBattlecry: Swap Attack\nwith another minion.
flavor: For extra-realistic fly-snatching action, use tape!

name: Raza the Resealed
text: [x]Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Hero Power refreshes whenever you play a card.
flavor: The 10th anniversary edition of a classic bestseller!

name: Sandbox Scoundrel
text: [x]Miniaturize\nBattlecry: Your next card\nthis turn costs (3) less.
flavor: "Really? A bunch of fake plastic gems AGAIN!?"

name: Sky Mother Aviana
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 10 random Legendary minions into your deck. They cost (1).
flavor: It's a bird! It's a plane! It's 10 copies of Leeroy Jenkins!

name: Sleet Skater
text: Miniaturize\nBattlecry: Freeze an\nenemy minion. Gain Armor equal to its Attack.
flavor: How do you do, fellow Ice Elementals?

name: Timewinder Zarimi
text: [x]Battlecry: Once per game, if you've summoned 5 other Dragons, take an extra turn.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: With how generous Whizbang's return policy is, Zarimi has never been busier.

name: Toy Captain Tarim
text: [x]Miniaturize Taunt. Battlecry: Set a minion's Attack and Health to this minion's.
flavor: Whizbang is now the sole proprietor of Un'Goro.

name: Window Shopper
text: [x]Miniaturize Battlecry: Discover a Demon. Set its stats and Cost to this minion's.
flavor: OMG THAT'S LITERALLY ME!

name: Woodland Wonders
text: Summon two 1/5 Beetles with Taunt.\nCosts (3) less if you have Spell Damage.
flavor: Is this a standup fight or another bug hunt?

name: Workshop Janitor
text: Battlecry: If you control a location, draw 2 cards.
flavor: She works in a magical toy shop and they just gave her a regular mop? Make it make sense.

name: Clay Matriarch
text: [x]Miniaturize\nTaunt. Deathrattle: Summon\na 4/4 Whelp with Elusive.
flavor: I hope you didn't need all that purple clay.

name: Dr. Stitchensew
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a 5, 3, and 1-Cost minion to stitch to this. Deathrattle: Summon the 5-Cost minion.
flavor: First, do some harm.

name: Li'Na, Shop Manager
text: [x]Whenever you cast a spell,\nfill your board with random\nminions of that Cost.
flavor: Somebody has to do the paperwork around here.

name: Manufacturing Error
text: Draw 3 cards. If your deck has no minions, they cost (3) less.
flavor: You thought the 9-piece puzzle would be easy, didn't you?

name: Once Upon a Time...
text: Summon a random\n3-Cost Beast, Dragon,\nElemental, and Murloc.
flavor: ...There was a humble little squirrel on a quest to defeat an evil dragon. With the help of its earthen friend, it saved the murloc princess from danger. The end.

name: Origami Dragon
text: [x]Divine Shield, Lifesteal\nBattlecry: Swap stats\nwith another minion.
flavor: The fire will give you a papercut, which CAN burn. Does that count?

name: Puzzlemaster Khadgar
text: [x]Battlecry: Equip a 0/6\nWisdomball that casts\nhelpful Mage spells!
flavor: Khadgar Khadgar in the ball, who is the smartest white-haired, tall, handsome mage of them all?

name: Shoplifter Goldbeard
text:
[x]After you summon a
Pirate, summon a copy of
it that attacks a random
enemy, then dies.
flavor: "Arr, this plunder be great for Cap'n Fourteeth's baby shower!"

name: Shudderblock
text: [x]Miniaturize Battlecry: Your next Battlecry triggers 3 times, but can't _damage the enemy hero.
flavor: Beware the hinges that pinch, the scales that splinter!

name: Testing Dummy
text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Deal 8\ndamage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Don't worry, they're having a blast. MUAHAHAHAHAAAA!

name: The Headless Horseman
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy the enemy minion with the most Attack! Shuffle my Head into your deck, you must get it back!
flavor:
This flavor text, you would expect
to rhyme and reference, to great effect!
It starts out strong, but as you can tell
it doesn't end very good.

name: Wind-Up Enforcer
text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Summon @ |4(copy, copies) of this minion. (Trade to upgrade!)
flavor: Code 6404.5 clearly states that all Enforcers remain in their packaging until told by authorized personnel.

name: Wind-Up Musician
text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Deal @ damage to all enemy minions. (Trade to upgrade!)
flavor: Sure to wind up your opponents.

name: Crafter's Aura
text: At the end of your turn, summon a random 6-Cost minion.\nLasts @ turns.
flavor: She has at LEAST Craftsmanship +3.

name: Owlonius
text: [x]Spell Damage +1 Your spells get double bonus from Spell_Damage.
flavor: They said you sound like an owl.

name: Pipsi Painthoof
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a random Divine Shield, Rush, and Taunt minion from your deck.
flavor: "Earthmother guide my paintbrush strokes, especially on the eyes."

name: Repackage
text: Stuff all minions into a 2-Cost Box,\nthen shuffle it into the opponent's deck.
flavor: I don't want to play with you anymore.

name: Shining Sentinel
text: Taunt, Elusive\nBattlecry: Summon a\ncopy of this.
flavor: OMG, I FINALLY GOT A SHINING SENTINEL AFTER 3 PHASES AND 8192 RESETS!!!!!

name: Toyrannosaurus
text: Rush\nDeathrattle: Deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: This toy WRECKS.

name: Wish Upon a Star
text: Give +2/+3 to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavor: "What are you going to wish for?"\n"I wish I had just a liiiiiiiittle more Attack and Health!"\n"...Really? You don't want, like, a million more?"

name: Colifero the Artist
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a minion.\nTransform all other friendly\nminions into copies of it.
flavor: You are what you paint! And Colifero is paint.

name: Everything Must Go!
text: Summon two random 4-Cost minions. Costs (1) less for each card you've drawn this turn.
flavor: Go where??

name: Inventor Boom
text: [x]Battlecry: Resurrect two __friendly Mechs that cost (5)__ or more. They immediately _attack random enemies.
flavor: The best part of inventing stuff is blowing it up!

name: Joymancer Jepetto
text: [x]Battlecry: Get copies of every 1-Attack or 1-Health minion you've played this game.
flavor: Joymancy (noun): The practice of bringing joy to others through the use of magic. (see also: ethics)

name: Magtheridon, Unreleased
text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns. While Dormant, deal 3 damage to all enemies at the end of your turn.
flavor: Playing with this card can be penalized with up to a two-year suspension. Please wait until the card is officially released.

name: Wheel of DEATH!!!
text: Destroy your deck.\nIn 5 turns, destroy\nthe enemy hero.
flavor: Why don't the good guys ever get a wheel?

name: Wretched Queen
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon two\n4/6 Knights with Taunt.
flavor: Mind your head when you're around her.

name: Yogg in the Box
text: Cast 5 random spells. If your deck has no minions, the spells cast cost (5) or more.
flavor: POP! Goes the Old God!

name: Botface
text: [x]Taunt\nAfter this takes damage,\nget two random Minis.
flavor: "NOBODY CALLS ME BOTFACE!!" -Botface

name: Crane Game
text: Summon copies of two Demons in your deck.
flavor: This claw machine is RIGGED! I keep getting demons that bite me!

name: King Plush
text: [x]Charge Battlecry: Return all minions with less Attack than this _to their owner's decks.
flavor: He's so fluffy you're gonna DIE!

name: Factory Assemblybot
text: Miniaturize\nAt the end of your turn, summon a 6/7 Bot that attacks a random enemy.
flavor: I call it Mini-me.

name: Table Flip
text: Deal $3 damage to all enemy minions.\nCosts (1) less for each other card in your hand.
flavor: "Judge!"

name: The Galactic Projection Orb
text: Recast a random spell of each Cost you've cast this game (targets enemies if possible).
flavor: Look closely in the ball and you'll see the expansion of space and time itself. Or their projections, anyway.

name: Playhouse Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each card you've drawn this game.
flavor: WARNING: NOT A PLAYHOUSE. DO NOT ATTEMPT TO CLIMB.

name: Anduin's Gift
text: [x]Discover a temporary Power Word: Shield, Shadow Word: Pain, or Mind Control.
flavor: "My council assures me this is the perfect gift! Not that they needed to tell me. I know what's in there."\n-Anduin

name: Arthas's Gift
text: [x]Discover a temporary Dark Transformation, Howling Blast, or Death Strike.
flavor: "Now try it on."\n-Arthas

name: Garrosh's Gift
text: Discover a temporary Execute, Shield Block, or Brawl.
flavor: "FROM THE HORDE! AND ESPECIALLY ME!"\n-Garrosh

name: Gul'dan's Gift
text: [x]Discover a temporary\nMortal Coil, Siphon Soul,\nor Twisting Nether.
flavor: "This won't be like last time..."\n-Gul'dan

name: Illidan's Gift
text: Discover a temporary Fel Barrage, Chaos Strike, or Chaos Nova.
flavor: "This gift's burden will always be yours to bear... I lost the receipt."\n-Illidan

name: Jaina's Gift
text: Discover a temporary Frostbolt, Arcane Intellect, or Fireball.
flavor: "On this day, my magic will bring us together."\n-Jaina

name: Malfurion's Gift
text: Discover a temporary\nFeral Rage, Wild Growth,\nor Swipe.
flavor: "May this imbue you with the life of the party!"\n-Malfurion

name: Rexxar's Gift
text: [x]Discover a temporary\nQuick Shot, Deadly Shot,\nor Explosive Shot.
flavor: "I shop alone."\n-Rexxar

name: Thrall's Gift
text: Discover a temporary Lightning Storm, Hex,\nor Bloodlust.
flavor: "I wrapped it myself!"\n-Thrall

name: Uther's Gift
text: Discover a temporary Equality, Consecration, or Blessing of Kings.
flavor: "I hope you enjoy light reading!"\n-Uther

name: Valeera's Gift
text: [x]Discover a temporary\nBackstab, Deadly Poison,\nor Fan of Knives.
flavor: "Here. You. Go."\n-Valeera

name: Harth Stonebrew
text: [x]Battlecry: Replace your hand with an iconic one from Hearthstone's past. (Once per game)
flavor: "Grab a slice by the hearth and enjoy the festivities. This celebration is for all of us!"\n-Harth
